I got this item for my 11yo son; first time unicycle rider. Nice electric color, good price and everything. I was not expecting that much out of it, but still got quite disappointed. As soon as I opened the box and assembled, I found that the seat keeps dropping to the bottom no matter how hard it's tightened around the screw. Also, the pedals suddenly stop moving from time to time. This item never made it out of our living room door. I am sure there are more good ones than bad(substandard) ones, and I happened to have been not so fortunate this time. For this price, if you can be satisfied, you are lucky. At least, the buyer I bought it from provided me with the shipping label.

This review is about PRG60T-7V, the analog-digital (ana-digi) Solar Casio Triple Sensor Pathfinder Protrek watch.  Some reviews listed under this item are about different Pathfinder Protrek watches without the analog hands which I never seriously considered.  Analog dials have a great advantage - you can take a split-second glimpse and still know what time it is, and combined with digital dials they give you an abundance of available readings.  I have been looking for and buying only ana-digi watches like this because of their functionality and flexibility.The greatest selling point of this watch is the perfect combination of features that I am always looking for (listed in order of importance):- Analog-digital multi-function watch- Solar- Shock-resistant- Compass- Barometer- AltimeterSo far, I have been very proudly using this watch every day for two and a half years and it is still my #1 functionality-features watch in the world.  Although it's not listed as anti-shock but as "Tough Solar" it really is a very tough engineering work of art.  It still works perfectly even though it has gone through a significant number of abusing events.  Besides the annual vacation swims/dives in the sea and everyday normal movements, I'm an ex professional drummer who still frequently pats his knees in the rhythm of the music, and nowadays this watch has to withstand frequent clapping when listening to the music and playig with my daughter.  In addition, my 1.5 year old daughter used to play with it occasionally and she let it fall on the floor many times.  Moreover, this watch has two times received a hit that would have broken apart any other watch I have.  Once I accidentally hit a corner of a rock wall with it so hard that my hand hurt.  In spite of my expectations, all those abuses have only left a single barely visible scratch in the middle of the glass and several minor scratches on the bezel, so I can testify that the crystal/glass on it is very scratch resistant and the watch really is very tough.  I bought the titanium model/bracelet, so the entire watch is very light in spite of its size.The solar charging works great and the battery is almost always on H (high) position, and only in December during long nights and short days it sometimes goes to M (medium) and the contributing factor might be that I have the automatic backlight set up and it frequently lights up even when I don't need it.  When I get the M reading I can quickly charge the watch if I leave it in the window for half an hour during a sunny day because in the winter it is often covered with my sleeve when I'm outside.  Usually, instead of charging I like to push the envelope and see whether I can get it to L (low), but I've never seen that so far. At night and during prolonged low light conditions, the watch shuts off its digital displays to save power, but once you move the watch (or turn the backlight on), they turn on automatically and instantaneously.Some people complain about inaccurate temperature readings on watches like this, but you have to be aware that there is no way your watch will not get influenced by your body temperature, so you need to take it off and leave it for several minutes before you can get an accurate reading.  The only exception is when you are swimming/diving and you can obtain a reasonably accurate measurement of the water temperature in a matter of minutes without taking the watch off, especially if you are moving your arms and swimming or if water is otherwise flowing around the watch.The barometer/altimeter is accurate (of course, if you adjust it prior to your trip to a known reference point).  I always watch it on the airplane where you can tell which passenger plane keeps the air pressure best (or also which company is trying to save and scrape on air supplies and maintain low pressure)  - sometime you'll see the pressure drop about 33% before they adjust it and so the reading of the altimeter in a pressurized plane cabin is not at all accurate.  The internal artificial pressure they keep in the passenger cabin usually corresponds to 4000-6500 feet above the sea level.The compass function works well, but I think they should have allowed it to work for a longer and possibly adjustable period of time before shutting itself off automatically after 20 seconds.  I know it takes a considerable amount of battery power to run the compass but still, I'd like to have the option to run it for 30 seconds or a minute without having to press the button repeatedly.There is more I'd like to see and buy in a better watch and I have been looking for it for years, but I still haven't seen one as good as this.The only two main competitors I considered for a while were Tissot's T-Touch and Citizen's Eco-Drive Skyhawk.  The T-Touch watch, as seen in the James Bond movie is a bit less bulky and more dressy, so it looks better, but you have to spend about double the amount on it.  Still, if it were solar I wouldn't hesitate to buy it, but since it's not, in my referent system that translates to a waste of time and money when the battery runs out and a questionable water resistance after replacement, so it's out of the question.  Citizen's similar solar bulky watch Eco-Drive Skyhawk is a bit more dressy, but its digital and analog dials are not independent and from some reviews I can also conclude that it's definitely not as tough and resistant as this one.  Omega had an amazing ana-digi multi-function Speedmaster X-33 watch that was a serious candidate for my favorite, however, that one was not solar powered, it was many times more expensive, and it is not being made any more, so Casio's PRG60T-7V still owns the "THE WATCH" title in my world.Some minor cons:- I'm 6'3" and not skinny, and although together with the titanium bracelet it does have a rugged sturdy look, I'd like it to be a bit smaller, and definitely thinner.- Position of start/stop/reset buttons on the stop watch function is unusual.  The lower right button is used to start and stop and the upper right is used to reset (I'm used to the opposite).- The color of the first circular layer under the bezel (I suppose this is the solar charging part) is gray but in some light it gets an ugly-ish  purple shade- It takes a long time to circle almost 12 hours if your watch is one minute fast because I can only adjust the hands forward.  Fortunately, the watch is pretty accurate and I only do this several times a year, two  times because of the DST switch.Things I would like to see in a future improved model:- Atomic world-wide time adjustments- Count down timer.All in all, this is as good as it gets. I have been searching for a better watch for years, but I still haven't found what I'm looking for.
summary: I can't find a better watch

I have several "named brands" chair blinds.  I am a disabled female veteran so often this type of blind is better for me.  The "named brands" were ok.  The problem is that some just have an open window (which deer hate and I feel uncamoed and in full view) and another has 2 zippered flaps in front with the option of magnets holding up some netting should you want that.  That has been good, but usually problems occur if you are not on solid ground because the magnets won't hold the netting up.  So I would purchase magnets on my own to double up on the magnets in the blind, to help keep the netting in place.  However, with this No Name Chair blind this problem has been solved.  YOu have several options here.  You can unzip the solid front flap and have full netting.  The netting is CROSSWAYS rather than vertical.  Because of this you can slip your gun through the netting. This means your face and head are more covered.  If the shooting slit is up and down like the others your face and head movements can be seen.  Anyway, The other option is to close up the main flap and zip around  a smaller flap, still allowing you to slide your gun through the sideways slit.  Head and face pretty much camoed by the netting. Since I have a cervical spine injury I sometimes have to move my head and neck after sitting stationary.  This allows me to stretch my neck/head a bit without to much of a problem.  Only other difference from the more expensive named ones is there is only one drink holder on the chair inside (rather than 2) .. no big deal there and this does not have any "pockets" in side to put calls or stakes in.  BUT, there is a zippered pocket on the carry bag that holds stakes in that.  So all in all I am very pleased with this thing.  The stakes are a bit flimsy as are all of them for all brands and I will probably buy a more sturdy kind, but that does not detract from this blind.  The seat is roomy, does have a zippered opening at the bottom of the front, which is standard with all chair blinds I have found, so it is a pretty good comparison.  Again, I have to stress for me, the options on the front of this chair blind is what sells it for me and why I will purchase a second one.  Far more concealing (of my face and head) and gives me a more "concealed feeling".  Oh yes, it has to fairly largecovered and netted windows on the side. But I will use these only for viewing. I am not able to move a rifle to the side window without the blind moving but perhaps someone else could.  But those windows are great for air and for viewing game etc.  One last thing.  It does not have ties in places such as on the top and sides to allow you to tie a small branch to help with camouflage  Though I do actually like the camo enough not to worry about this.  Perhaps someone might take a star away because of this but I like the horizontal shooting netting so much I am not going to be concerned about minor flaws.  Shipping was fast and came very well packaged.Dec 17, 2012  Writing to give some updated information.  The blind broke at the back of the chair.  I contacted the seller.  They took immediate action.  I sent photos of the damages and they got a second blind out to me immediately.  The sent me a return UPS label so I could send the damaged one back.  The entire experience was easy and quite satisfactory.  Their communication with me was immediate and complete.  We will gladly deal with these folks again.  Great sellers.

Received it in 8 days pretty late in my book but there was a storm so I let it slide. The instructional CD was blank but the instruction booklet had a YouTube link for the BEST STEP BY STEP instruction ever !! ,I just had to keep pausing it in between steps. The woman doing the video is in her studio so she has u start off with the highest extension her ceilings. R very high there so I had to take it apart and use the smaller one for my 8ft ceiling. If your ceiling is under 8ft 2 in, use the smaller one to save time of having to redo it. I didn't have a stud finder so I had to use my knuckles for tapping for a half hr to ensure I actually found the stud for sure then marked the ceiling with a pencil. Once it was up and Safe I realized my one and only gripe which is this pole is the most slippery one I've ever touched in my life !!  I nowhad to order gloves and and ankle protectors with tack until iI get use to the slipping of this pole. All in AAll, Its Avery Good price and very sturdy.
summary: Cant believe i did it myself !

reviewText: So, I bought this pole a few weeks back and it was in within about 4 business days. I don't agree with the other reviews, the instructions are easy as is the DVD instructions for installation. You do NOT need to screw it into the ceiling--which is awesome--and it relies on tension, so as long as you can find the studs and give a little elbow grease in tightening it up, you'll be good to go. Only took me 10 min to install. Heavy duty as well! So, don't drop the base or pole sections on your foot (ouch). The video is a little corny, but teaches some basic moves and routines as well as some warm up exercises. Well worth your money instead of buying the exact same product that X-pole sells, so save yourself $150. You'll even get the tools you need to put it in.
I totaly love this sticker! You can put it on something then reapply it to something else! And overall it looks great, love the design!
Trust me it does it's job, but the pole fell down once, and it's stuck on static. I've tried everything to get it to be a spinning pole but nothing had worked.

I had 2 Tommy Guerrero boards when I was a kid and they were my favorite of all the decks I had back in the 80s.  I had a blue one with the original Powell Bonite, and later had a Green one.  Powell and Peralta was part of my every thought when I was a kid and it is a real treat to have these decals, shirts, and decks re-issued with their original graphics.  A lot has changed since the mid 80s, but Powell was part of what made it a very magical time.  I'm glad these decals are re-issued, and I am glad I was able to get one here on amazon.

reviewText: I ordered this product a couple weeks ago and it wasn't expected to arrive until the 14th, but the carrier got it here well before I expected it. The pocket watch is incredibly detailed both outside and in, and I love that it is fully functional. The necklace is also very nicely detailed, but I plan to get a new chain since the one it came with is a cheap quality and not as long as I'd like. Also, the ring does not fit well on any of my fingers, and it doesn't look very nice. But! I'm giving it to a friends, anyway, so no big deal there!When I got the package, I nothing was broken and everything was packaged very nicely. Anybody ordering this product should have no problems with the seller or the shipping carrier. I also was very impressed by the gift box everything comes in since it has such an ornate appearance that I don't mind having it sit out where people can see it, and I could use it for other things if need be.All in all, I would highly recommend this product to any fan of Fullmetal Alchemist if they're looking for the pocket watch and don't want to spend a lot of money.
summary: This is a Very Good Product

reviewText: The pocket watch itself is really nice. The hands turn fine, the chain is good. The logo on the front, and the message on the inside is great. The necklace is quite small, and the ring is a little small. The necklace and ring seem to be made of plastic? Although I ultimately bought this for the pocket watch. Shipping was good, and I got what I asked for. It could be cheaper though. The 3 stars is QUITE GENEROUS. So make sure you know what you're buying.
summary: Not too bad. Still some flaws.

This tape will bring you to tears.  Tears of joy. The smiling face of Todd Lyght (the last man standing from L.A) in the final credits, will touch your heart if you are one of the many who vicariously followed Rams through  the tough times, and suffered the losses along with Lyght.This was the  Greatest Season any team ever had. So many stories of rags to riches.  I  can't watch it without getting emotional. The kick off runs by Horne just  when we needed it.  A coach returning after burnout to tend to unfinished  business.Last seasons third stringer QB, like Moses, to lead his  people to the promise land.Keith Lyle, who said other teams called them  the Lambs his entire career.Marshall Faulk who's skills are unmatched.  Ricky Prohels heroics.Bruce, the greatest St.Louis Ram ever, with the  greatest St.Louis TD ever.And Mike Jones, who stopped the Music in  Music City.Before the Season, I was going to edit the other season  highlight tapes together to pretend we won the Super Bowl. The Rams beat me  to it!This is a great tape. Great rewatchability power. Buy two copies  because you will wear this one out. In the words of Kurt Warner,  "Thank you Jesus! "
I love this bottle. Not only does it fit in my bike water bottle rack, it's pink, so I can find it when I am ready to run out the door for a quick bike ride.
summary: Fits in my bike water bottle rack.

reviewText: This tape is really a summary of the Rams unbelievable 1999-2000 season. The Super Bowl highlights only make up the final quarter of the tape (albeit an outstanding final 15 minutes). As a NFL/Rams fan since 1970,  this past season made up for many years of frustration.The game-by-game  highlights are expertly edited and cut with player interviews, sideline  & locker room banter and "miked"  comments from coach  Vermeil. Although the plays by Kurt Warner, Marshall Faulk, and Issac Bruce  are emphasized, there are more than enough clips of the other offensive  players, the defense & the special teams to spotlight whomever your  favorite Ram might be.  The excitement of the season builds until the final  tackle of Super Bowl XXXIV. Coach Vermeil's final celebration scenes are  priceless!  Although I watched every Rams game this season, this video is  still well worth the price.  A perfect gift for any football fan but an  absolute necessity for any true Rams fan! Then again, I may be a bit  biased.
summary: Exceptional Rams video highlights an unbelievable year!

reviewText: It hadn't been accomplished in many decades -- a National League team winning back-to-back World Series championships, that is.  But in 1976, Sparky Anderson's star-laden Cincinnati Reds did just that, taking their second straight world crown by defeating the New York Yankees, four games to none.Led by catcher Johnny Bench, who was Series MVP, the Reds knocked off the Yanks by scores of 5-1, 4-3, 6-2, and 7-2.  And this came on the heels of Cincinnati's three-game sweep over the Philadelphia Phillies in the NLCS. 7 wins and 0 losses for the Reds in the '76 post-season!Cincy batted at a .333 clip for the four games of the '76 World Series; while New York could muster just a .222 team batting mark. The club ERA stats were equally one-sided in favor of the Reds -- Cincy's ERA was an excellent 2.00; the Yanks' pitchers amassed a poor 5.45 mark.28-year-old, 9-year veteran Johnny Lee Bench was on fire during the '76 Series, hitting .533 (8-for-15), with 2 home runs and 6 runs-batted-in. Bench also had 1 double, 1 triple, and 4 runs scored. He struck out just 1 time in the 4 contests.  This World Series performance helped to make up for Johnny's poor 1976 regular season (.234 / 16 HR / 74 RBI).Other top hitters in the '76 Series included George Foster (.429 batting average), Dave Concepcion (.357), Dan Driessen (.357), Joe Morgan (.333), Tony Perez (.313), and Cesar Geronimo (.308).On the losing Yankees' side, Thurman Munson was a hot hitter, batting .529, with nine hits in the four games. Future Reds' manager Lou Piniella hit .333 for the Yanks during the Series.Dan Driessen of the Reds had the distinction of becoming the very first National Leaguer to be used as a Designated Hitter in the World Series.  Starting with this '76 Series, the DH was used in alternate World Series. In later years, a more sensible system of utilizing the DH was implemented, whereby the DH is only used in the A.L. ballparks. The pitchers are now forced to bat in World Series' games hosted by National League teams.Cincinnati's Reds won 102 games during the regular season in '76 (following up their 108 victories from 1975), and won the N.L. West title by 10 games over the Los Angeles Dodgers. The third-place team (Houston) finished a very distant 22 games behind the surging Reds.1976 also represented Cincinnati's 5th trip to the post-season during the first 7 years of the decade of the '70s (missing out on making the playoffs only in 1971 and 1974). The team would find winning their division much more difficult in future seasons, however. The Reds finished a distant second (to the Dodgers) in 1977, the year they acquired pitcher Tom Seaver from the Mets in mid-season. And they finished in 2nd place again in '78. In 1979, the Reds rounded out a successful decade by winning the N.L. West, but losing in 3 straight to the Pirates in the playoffs.MLB Home Video produced this VHS video, which is narrated by former big-league catcher Joe Garagiola. What with there only being the minimum of four games played during this '76 Series, the video's run time isn't very long (29 minutes). But all the pertinent info and game highlights are included in this color video program. (The picture quality isn't very much to write home about though.)One quibble regarding this video's packaging -- On all other World Series VHS videos put out by MLB Home Video, the team winning the Series is listed first on the box sleeve (both front and back). But, for some unknown reason, the 1976 Reds are listed SECOND on the packaging (e.g.: New York Yankees vs. Cincinnati Reds). Very odd, IMO. I have yet to encounter another video in the MLB World Series collection that makes this error and displays the losing team first on the box cover.** = EDIT: That is, up until the 2005 World Series DVD, which lists the losing team (Houston) before the victorious White Sox. Starting with that '05 disc, they started showing the losing team first for several years in a row. Mighty strange. ~shrug~Anyway, it's not a big deal obviously. Just a trivial oddity that I noticed.A semi-off-topic comment (a "1976 Memory Flashback") --- One of the main things I recall about the 1976 Reds/Yanks World Series is being able to watch Game 1 on "videotape" just minutes after the game concluded at Riverfront Stadium. In '76, video cassette recorders were brand-spanking-new, and it seemed quite remarkable (at the time) to be able to "replay" Game 1 of the World Series and see, at my leisure, how Don Gullett beat Doyle Alexander, 5-1.The video machine used to record that particular game was one of the early, bulky "Betamax" units. Remember those babies? They cost about $2,500 in '76 and didn't even include a built-in timer/clock! The timer, which resembled your bedroom's clock-radio, was a separate box that sat atop the Beta recorder. And it took TWO Beta tapes to record the game, because those tapes could only hold one hour of material. Can you imagine that today? Thank heavens for DVDs, huh?  :)To be quite technical, it might very well have taken even a THIRD Beta videotape to capture every pitch of Game 1 of the '76 Series, with the exact game time being 2 hours and 10 minutes. So, unless those old-time tapes had about 5 minutes of "extra" tape tacked on to their 1-hour spools (which is likely, similar to VHS tapes nowadays), then I guess a third tape must have been utilized to get the final ninth-inning out of Game #1. That final out in the Reds' 5-1 win, for the record, was a foul pop-up caught by third baseman Pete Rose, hit by Yanks' pinch-hitter Oscar Gamble. Pedro Borbon was on the mound and threw that last pitch of the game. Oh, btw, Gamble wore uniform number 23. Borbon wore #34. -- Now THAT'S baseball trivia at its finest! :-)For those who can recall the Cincinnati Reds' short-lived, two-year "dynasty", this video serves as a valuable keepsake and reminder of when the Reds sat atop the major-league baseball world.
Nice and easy to fit in a suitcase for travel. Works as advertised, and I see no flaws with the product.

So it worked well for a couple weeks, but during a lunge workout, it snapped on me.  I liked it and thought it was a great product until this happened.  I noticed small rips on the band.  This could have been the issue.

reviewText: This seems to be a well made resistance band.  It's exactly like the ones my bootcamp coaches use.  I would recommend this product to others.

I love this product because it allows me to workout while I am away from a gym. I was skeptical at first but the resistance bands can provide a great workout. There are tons of different exercises and the included door anchor is very convenient. After about a week of use I do not see any tearing or any other problems with the rubber. The price is also pretty fair given the quality of these bands.
you know why/it help work out the distress i had when i see that doll and that big box it came in.
I prefer to use resistance bands to work out with. They're easy to use in many situations (including lying in bed watching tv), and these bands are well made and just the right length for me.
Very flimsy. Did not feel like 5lbs and the handles have a funny spongy texture that makes them feel funny

I just this in the mail to use for my insanity asylum and i must say im loving the resistance on it, i been using everlast and man was that easy but this is problem the best choice for getting lean muscle, if you wanna look good and not spend a lot on weights this is for you! I will bee a bmp customer for a long time if they keep making these :)

reviewText: good for travel and easy to keep stored all all all the wasy around the world in more than one shot

I have the whole set and I had given one resistance band to a friend while traveling and wanted to buy a replacement. I recieved this one with an offer for a free orange band so I gave them a call and they asked me to write an honest review of their product, which I had no problem with because their product speaks for itself and has met my expectations for as long as I've used it.Here comes the best part, after asking for my shipping address the representative that I was on the phone with reminded me that if I were to see any wear and tear or signs of breakage in the product to call them to have replacements sent out for FREE. He continues by saying they do that to keep their customers safe from breaking bands from extensive wear and tear. That is what I call customer service!
summary: Good quality product with a even better company that stands behind it!

reviewText: For the price it works great. Bands are not heavy by any means and I'm decently big and they provide that "just right" resistance. It really depends on how you use them. But all in all great band came with the attachment which does the job so long as you shut that door. Buy these if your looking for price nd quality.
My girlfriend is disabled and cant do high impact workouts. This band is great because she can go at her own pace, in any position and any retention she needs. A lifesaver for low impact needs.

I bought the bands becasue I needed something with heavier resistance for p90X, assuming that the band would be the same length as the other bands I've used, but this band was way shorter....too short in my opinion.
We use this at our work midday exercise classes and for a light equipment workout this is great.  It also travels well, so no missed workouts.  The best part is the cushioned handles!

I worked out once back in '08. I picked up some 40 lb weights and was like - "too easy". So then I grabbed some resistance bands and almost broke them. Now I've been recommended Black Mountain products because they are very durable. I've had a set of the 25 lb red resistance bands for 3 months now and they look as good as when I first got them after an hour of use every day except Sunday.
summary: I'm not opposed to this resistance!

reviewText: I bought this band to use as a step-up in intensity from the band included in my T25 package, and was highly disappointed with the length. It's a good length if you want to do the exercises described in the included pamphlet (mostly things that use the door anchor, also bicep curls) but if you are using this with a program that EVER has you use bands as a substitute for weights in over-the-head exercises like military presses, these are NOT the bands to buy. They're simply too short for that kind of exercise.Note that these bands are the standard length: 4 feet. The only bands I've found that have been longer are the B-Lines bands that are (as far as I can tell) exclusively distributed by Beachbody.
Very good resistance band.  I would definitely buy others of the same brand. Would have been nice to have a sheet with recommended exercises, but it is pretty easy to figure out.
These bands are great for working out in the house/apartment. They have a convenient door attachment to create the appropriate angles of resistance. Would def recommend them.

These particular bands do exactly what they said...The resistance is definitely a challenge, but all at the same time, you get results...I purchased the highest weights because I wanted more out of my workouts...These bands definitely deliver.

I am 160 lbs but strong and althetic. Been using this for about 4 months and the band breaks in half during a workout. My hands smashed together with tremendous force, cutting and bruising them. I flew backwards and almost hit my head on a sharp corner of a counter.This was a great product but I lost all my faith in this type of product after this incident.
summary: Broke in half... Almost died using this

reviewText: I previously had purchased a much cheaper band and it was not good quality. This was still incredibly affordable but it is good quality. The handles are comfortable, the band has exactly the resistance I would expect and having used it several times now I am tempted to go back and buy the multi set they sell. I haven't used the door hook at all, but it seems good quality as well. I definitely recommend this band, if anything I would recommend just getting the multi pack right away.

I have owned the whole set for about a year, and had to buy this to replace the green one which broke. This is the middle band, which is the lightest one to get constant use in P90X routines. So I suppose that is a reasonable amount of use before it broke.

This is a great product! Is highly durable, easy to use and just an all around great band (much higher quality than the products i have bought at some chain sporting good stores). The only reason i gave it a four star rating is because after i bought this product, i actually ended up having to buy the adjustable set because i needed to have something a little more diverse for my p90x regimen. But thats more of my fault than the products falt, lol.Update: Today, one of the two bands i bought, had a huge rip in it (it has been a little over two months since i started using) its not as durable as i thought it was when i started with them. I emailed BMP about the product warranty. They responded in under a day, i told them about my situation and they decided they would send me two ORANGE BANDS UPON MY REQUEST (one for my set where the handles detach and one normal one, orange is the heaviest band they have and isnt available on amazon). Excellent customer service!
I work out with a group of ladies and our other bands were worn and breaking.  These are definitely NEW!!  They are making our work out tougher for sure!!
Heavy duty material and works great.  Would order again and recommend to any one looking a for good made band.
Came as described, quickly. I love the door anchor and that I can bring this anywhere, even to the park and wrap it around a thin tree!
Bought for my shoulder rehab.  Very happy with the product.  I probably should have bought one with less resistance but this has worked well.
Love the bands, it is the weight I wanted, the door clamp works perfectly and it comes with a guide to various kinds of workouts with the bands. Awesome!

I bought the purple one to add to my Strong Man Set of 6 to make it a Super Strong Man Set of 7. This is one tough band. Great for high intensity bicep curls and door anchor exercises, such as back rows and standing chest press. But too difficult for tricep kick backs. It came with a door anchor and an instruction pamphlet. There's no BMP logo on either handle just like their orange band. Overall I'm glad Black Mountain is going the direction of making their systems better and stronger. Keep up the good work.
I have been using this as an assistance band when doing pull ups and they are very strong and durable.
Have had no issue with my resistance band. Works great, no problems, no surprises. I'd recommend this for someone looking for a quick, portable way to work out.

Got this in the mail pretty fast. I'm not sure why amazon had to use a 2 ft long box to ship this but they did! It's a bit long for me but I have short arms >.< I do wish they had an actual person for the exercises that come with it and not a cartoon haha
Just received it. The description says there is a door attachment included. However, I cannot find it in my package. Also the plastic bag is broken. Maybe they sent me a returned one.
These work as expected. You don't need to keep looking they work just right and are very helpful with their chart allowing for you to choose higher and lower resistance before buying.
summary: Just what you are looking for

reviewText: I ordered a number of these bands in varying resistance levels for folks in my class.  I teach group fitness, and we use the bands regularly.  They have held up well, and the varying resistance levels make it easy to meet everyone's skill level.  Highly recommend these bands!
ripped it in 2 days is fun plus you working out at the same dam time feel me is cool

The band itself seems to be sturdy, but the handles are made of a thin plastic. After 3 workouts, one of the handles cracked and a chunk of the handle came off. It's still usable, but it's a bit awkward.
The supplier, BMP, is awesome to deal with and I'm happy with the product!  I had an issue with my bands upon delivery and had no problems getting them replaced!

Love it, only thing that bothers me is that it feels kind of short.  I'm 5`11 and it can be a little tough doing certain things with it. I probably should have got the black band though so it's my fault. Overall  it's a great product.

Along with a 65" Black Mountain Anti Burst Exercise Stability Ball, I have a Black Mountain resistance band (black = heavy = 15-20 lbs). Both are very well made and very useful. The foam-covered handles on the resistance band are very comfortable, and the foot/door anchor works quite well.The resistance of the black model is perfect for me. I highly recommend both the exercise ball and the resistance bands!
Seems to be a sturdy, reliable product so far. I've been using it about every day and I like it!

Literally a home gym, except portable. I got the black band, and it works perfectly. These are great because you can take them in your suitcase if you travel a lot, and in my case I do. Thanks for delivering it in good condition, and for the price!
Great for my older students to use in fitness stations.  Kids love them.  I will definitely get more and recommend them to other teachers.

Either I am not strong enough for the 10 lb resistance band, or it really is too short. I am 5'2" and I have a very difficult time using it under my feet and pulling it up for arm strengthening exercises. I'm using it for the Jillian Michael's Body Revolution program and I wish I had the ones she has in her video. I often have to wrap it around my bed post since it's too short to wrap around my foot and bring it up to work my arms in a parallel position (such as holding my arms up to the sides (parallel to the ground), keeping them straight, and bringing them in towards the chest). I could use the door holder that it comes with, but then I wouldn't be able to see my TV to follow the reps in the exercises.
summary: I like it, but it's too short

reviewText: Great compliment for my T25 work out.  A little more resistance, and comes with a nice door mount feature. Purchased this for me, as my wife is using the T25 included set.
Well I have had this band for about a month and its as good as when I got it so yeah I will be ordering another if this one snaps.
I bought the green bands and they feel like they are about medium resistance. These are my introductory bands to get started working  out again. They are very durable. Exactly what I wanted.
I use this for Tapout XT. Although it is quality band material, lengh is shorter than I expected. That would be perfect if it has a couple of inches longer band.
BMP has made some new improvements on their products.  They are stronger and more durable, I have not had any problems with mine and they are used 5 days a week.

Comparatively speaking, it's a good product for a great price. this resistance band feels like you are lifting the actual weights but with more comfort and easier to use and carry around
I have been surprised at how many ways I can use this thing.  It is particularly good for shoulder exercises
Works just as advertised. Great, soft, but rugged spongy handles. Great tension. Seems well built. The locking device for the door works perfectly.
I love these bands, they are versatile In the many different ways you can use them, great for upper arm strength as well as for your legs, made of good quality, I use them all the time and it shows.

Will adjust star rating if they fix the issue.  Otherwise, I really like their products.Edit: Email regarding lack of door anchor was responded to within 24-hours and shipped immediately. Great response time.  Bumped up to 4 stars now that the issue was resolved.
I bought this product it the hopes of using it along with various video's and have not had a need for it.  This is why I only gave it a 3 cause I have not had a chance to try it out.
Bands work perfect for what I need them for.... If I experienced any hand rubbing, I usually turned the bands around and it went away.
This is an average product . just for begineers or if you want the arms warmed up. Go for heaviest one if you want it.
Great for my at-home exercise routine. They are the same as the ones at the Y gym. They will last.

I bought this to use for my Tapout XT workout and well this band is good, very stretchable and won't snap. however, there were some workouts i can't manage to do with the strength that i have. I realized that the price is too high when it's only for 1 band, they have a set for $29 and it comes with 5 bands INCLUDING THIS ONE and a bag to carry them in.

Haven't had the chance to fully use this yet, but after inspection and testing, it seems in good shape and appears it will hold up. I'm already waist deep in my workout program, so it wil be used shortly.

These bands are high quality and very easy to use. My one issue is the side straps at the handles tend to rub the sides of your hands with certain moves. I still would recommend purchase at this low price.
This isnt a cheap product. It works for me at least. I would reccomend it for others. The door strap is very useful.

reviewText: The band came in good conditions, it was just shorter than what I expected. I am still able to use it for some activities but special with the extra attachment, I can put that piece on the wall and make the best of it.

I have had 3 sets of resistance bands made by others, and the ones I have from BMP are simply the best by far. They are stronger, more durable and, most importantly, so much smoother is use. When I first got them (this one is just the strongest one that did not come with the 5 band set I bought last year), I noticed that they were shorter than any others I had used and was quite concerned. But, once I used them, I found the range of motion was the same and the smoothness of the motion was so superior that I can feel I am getting a much better workout.

Its a great buy im getting the best workout ever with out weights.but im having one problem ....where the band is joined to the handle,  with the intense works out I see its starting to burst ....but other than that its better than weights.
My trainer recommended that I get a resistance band for my house and I got this one. I am really happy with it because it looked great and works extremely well for what I need it to do.

This was my first purchase and use of resistance bands.  I have limited mobility due to my health, weight and age and my doctor recommended I try these for low impact exercising to start with.  I have been able to find a number of workout routines online even some I can do sitting in a sturdy chair.  With diet and the use of these bands for at least 30 minutes a day I have already lost 10 pounds.  I am sure my doctor will be as happy as I am.
I've been using these for over a month to do P90X, and they work great.
So far so good, I use them for TapOut XT program, they seem to work just fine!
Perfect to keep I shape with out all the large machinery normally found in gyms.....

These things are a must have if you're trying to work out with limited space. I got them for my dorm room workout rotation, and I can't imagine not having them at this point. They store easy, give you a good amount of weight resistance, and come with an extremely easy to use door anchor that fits and works well on everything.
These things are great. You get the use  of dumbbells without the dumbbells.

Fantastic purchase. Very easy to use and I have been getting great results with more toning! It's portable too. I just took the whole set on a plane in my bag and have taken it on long road trips in the car. This is a fantastic way to get portable strength resistance training.

reviewText: I bought these because I can't afford a set of dumbbells and the bands work great. The only negative I have about the product is that when I do swimmer's press the material scratches the back of my arms.
This set of resistance bands feel very sturdy and gets the job done right. I am impressed with the quality of the buckles, clips and handles....great quality great price... Speedy delivery!!
summary: This set of resistance bands feel very sturdy and gets the job done right

reviewText: I bought these resistance bands for shoulder, wrist, and ankle rehab but have since begun using them for in workouts as well.  Great product!
Like the fact that it has multiple tensions and attachments.  I use it for shoulder exercises.  I use it 1 -2 times per week.  No complaints.

I bought these bands as an alternative to free-weights to use with P90X and for general exercise use so I could have some kind of resistance.The problem I ran into was using them in any stance that requires me standing on them, such as curling, squats, rows, and such. The band rubs against the shoe and over time wears away the rubber until it snaps. The band you use the most will go break first. My first one broke 4 months after first use.Still it comes as a whole set so there are other ones to use as replacement and I really liked the fact they could be combined to the same handle for increased resistance.
summary: Didn't last as long as I thought

reviewText: These bands have been very helpful. It's nice to not need to go to a gym. When I called Black Mountain to ask some questions, their customer support was excellent, as well.If you're wanting to save some money, and avoid the gym hassle, this is a great way to go!

Set just came today...am very impressed...already, ideas come to mind...connecting two+ bands for more resistance is just a part of these well made, well thought out exercise bands. The most comfortable handles you'll ever use...strong bands will give most people a good safe workout, in your home or away. Can't get to the gym?,,,no worries,  have them handy at home...these will give you a good pump...all they need is YOU to make it happen. Money well spent, I am very happy with this set, and I recommend....going 5 stars on this one!  Will use to rehab a torn meniscus following surgery, and also to endure the effects of RSD...those of you who know, I will not say more.

This is a great product and the quality is good.  I like that the set comes with 5 bands and a door anchor which is really handy for doing workouts at home! I dislike that it only come with 1 set of handles, so when performing a variety of workouts you have to unhook and re-hook, it disrupts the workout flow.  Another dislike is that the bands are short, I'm 5'7 and its easy to do curls but tough to do a shoulder press & resistance squats unless I use the very light band.  All in all... it was a great buy, I've modified certain workouts to accomodate the short bands and invested in an additional set of handles.  I would recommend it....

I recently injured my shoulder at the gym & was told by my physician that I would have to undergo Physical Therapy. A friend of mine who similarly injured his shoulder recommended the use of resistance bands. I have been using them for nearly a month & I am beginning to improve. I travel a lot for work and I am really pleased by the fact that I can roll them up in my suitcase and take them anywhere I go. The take up very little room in my bags.
I bought this set to have for travel and it works perfectly.  Compact, nicely made and easy to use with the color codes.  Very pleased with the value of this product.

Excellent product. Great price.The quality of the product is very impressive. It's super easy - and fast - to add and remove bands. And I particularly like how you can use the nylon "block" and close a door on it.

It's been a few days since I've had these so I cannot speak for their durability. You can do just about anything with these bands. I use these bands to pre and post exhaust my body parts during a workout, but you can certainly use them as tools for the main bulk of your workout. I find the bands extremely helpful for arms (shoulders, biceps, triceps), abs (resistance decline situps), and chest (pushups), but you can probably find ways to incorporate every body part. I would recommend YouTube/Google to find creative ways in using these things. If you go beyond the listed exercises, you'll have a much better workout. The only limitations of these bands is your imagination. And that's one of the greatest aspects of these bands: versatility.
summary: Just what I was looking for!

reviewText: Been using for about a month. I am a pilot and spend lots of time in hotels. Most workout facilities in hotels just plain suck. These are easy to pack and work well. Also used them with P90X and they work great. Great product at a fair price. Highly recommended for any business traveler!
summary: Great for businees travelers... Highly Recommended!

reviewText: I travel extensively and needed something small, light and portable to enhance my workouts.  Hotel gyms are inconsistent and difficult to maintain a routine with.  Reviews on the Black Mountain Bands were good so I gave it a try.  Other than taking a little getting used to (since I've always used weights in the past) I found this set very easy to use and surprisingly versatile.  Works great with P90X as well.  My only complaint is that they feel like bands, not weights - the resistance is not linear.  But it would be silly to expect otherwise.  I am not taking any points away since they are an excellent space/weight saving alternative, very durable and exceeded expectations.  After extensive use over 3 months, I purchased another for my wife.  Very satisfied and would highly recommend.

All bands and attachments fit into a small easy to travel with bag.  The bands, straps, and carabiners area all very good quality.  These are great bands for standard pulling exercises.  While doing more advanced exercises like rear tricep curls, the carabiners have a tendency to dig into my wrists.  Aside from that, I highly recommend this product.
summary: Great bands! Versatile and travel well.

reviewText: I bought these because I don't drive, and was having difficulty getting to the gym.  These are perfect for getting in a workout at home, or on the road. Quite a few excercises can be done with them. The overall quality of the product is great. I would very much recommend these to anyone that is looking for a compact home gym solution.

Great product. I keep these in my backpack and can bring my workout on the road. Build quality and design are excellent. Easily interchangeable between different band weights and attachments. I'd recommend to anyone!

Very happy with this purchase. Great for rehab following a surgery and useful for strength training when I cannot make it to the gym. Efficient design and outstanding customer service. The bands appear fairly durable so far - I have used them 5x per week over the last month and no signs of tearing.
The product is fantastic, you have so many "weights" in only one product.Certainly this was my best acquisition about sport accessories.
These have been a staple in my exercise routine since the day I got them. I love being able to mix in band work with my regular workouts.
Love it. See great results, I work out 5 days a week with this and have been able to up the resistance all the time

I've had other bands in the past, but these are the best I have ever used.  The handles are much easier to grasp, and the strap that connects it to the door is very secure.I had one band start to tear a little, and after a quick call to the company, they had a replacement on the way, which arrived in two days.They are easy to switch out, and I never worry they are going to snap and hit me in the face like I've had others do.  I highly recommend these bands.
summary: High quality product, and even better customer service!!!

reviewText: These things work well and have held up well.Pros: Everything clips together so you can combine handles with different combinations of bands.  The door anchor works well and the ankle strap worked great for doing hip exercises after my hip replacement.  I now use the red band to keep my upper body/arms toned up with lots of repetitions. The wife uses the yellow band.  It all fits in a pouch for storage.  More convenient than weights and you can take it traveling with you.Cons: The handles could be a little wider.  I suppose they also could be nicer built but I'm sure that would cost more.Does a good job for what it is.
These exercise bands are very well made.  The hand grips are very comfortable.  All the connecting parts are sturdy.I've only owned the bands for a week...
Haven't really gotten a chance to start my workouts yet with these bands, but they appear to be of good quality!
These are nicer quality than bands I've used in the past. This is a great set of bands with comfortable grips and a bag to travel with.These fit my needs perfectly and are a great price.

Great quality products - just what I needed for a lightweight, portable, and low cost gym. The bands are extremely well made, and the accessories (ankle strap, door jam) are helpful for more exercises. The included instructions are brief, but tell you what you need to know. There are a few suggested exercises, too. The carrying case is useful to me because I travel a lot, and these band easily fit in small backpack. Great Product, A+ quality.
These bands were as claimed all sizex and good for me a 5'7 inch 145 pder who loves to use them daily  They pkg was complete leg band good soft handles and door anchor  Great buy
Great product! Comes with everything you need! I've been using it during P90X3 workouts I.e. instead of pullup bars. Works great!

5/31/2012: I have been using these bands for a couple weeks, now, and I'm very happy with my purchase. I will update the review if that changes. These look and feel high quality and are comfortable to use. The set includes an exercise chart, which is better than I expected. Of course, it doesn't include all types of exercises you can do with these - I recommend watching videos on Youtube to get demonstrations of more exercises. One thing to note: resistance bands are not going to last you a lifetime. They will deteriorate over time, and that is normal. Avoid doing things like keeping them in a hot car / in the sun / etc.Update on 4/22/14: Everything in the set is still in good condition - still happy.

Great Product. Came in time, and was shipped appropriately. They also sent out an Orange band, so I could work out for my pull ups. They were curtious and prompt in service, and though this is my second week using the  bands, I am happy with the craftmanship. I know people do not like the yellow bands, but they come in handy for drop sets, especially for tricep kick backs, from P90x. Great product, Great Price, Great Service.

I've always been interested in calisthenic training and the use of resistance bands. I decided to try these bands out to get back in to shape and hopefully stay in shape! When I read through reviews after I ordered them, and to those who are doing the same before buying the product, continue reading. I started getting worried because as I went through pages, I kept seeing one star, one star and it just continued. --Make sure you chose the "View new reviews first" option-- They had recently used swivel clips, which break very easily and the reviews were horrible back in 2011/12. Now they use strong carabineer clips. Always, before and after a workout, check the bands for tears as a safety precaution. Few exercises are listed in the manual, I would recommend looking up "San Diego Personal Trainer" on YouTube for resistance band training! Very good quality bands from what I've inspected upon setting them up and after the first work out. I would recommend these to practically anyone.

I bought this product about over a month ago,have used it when I'm unable to hit the gym.I've rated it at 5 stars because of the fact that each band comes with clips built into it, which is so convenient that I can't even begin to describe it. It also comes with the door anchor and ankle strap, both of which are a great bang for your buck.So far the workouts have been great,it does take some time to get use to it, especially if you're going to have 3 bands on at once for greater resistance...try using a small velcro tape to hold them together just for safety.Aside from that,having amazon prime made this product purchase well worth my while, the quality is great, the design is intelligent and the price is superb. And this is the best contingency plan if you tend to miss the gym due to being busy...trust me.Worth the investment.

Amazing deal for the amount of stuff you get, and really good quality. I was tired of my cheapo 24 hour fitness gym not stocking these types of bands on regular basis. Love the carrying bag it comes with; the different sized bands are great for combining and getting exactly the resistance you. Very comfortable attachments that help in combining them.
summary: Amazing deal for the amount of stuff you get, and really good quality

reviewText: My husband purchased these for a fitness program we are both doing (P90X).  The products seem to be well made, and I appreciate the storage back that was included.  I am eager to support a small family business as well.  Obviously, they are lightweight, compact and affordable.  I'm sure that we will make use of the bands when we are traveling, but for home use we decided to switch to weights (the expensive Powerblock) for several reasons.  (1) It was hard to get appropriate resistance in certain positions (hands near the ankles for a dead lift from a squat, multiple lunges across the room).  (2) It is more satisfying to see tangible progress with weights (15 lbs last time, 20 lbs today), than with bands (blue to green, or worse, small loop to big loop).  (3) Changing the handle between the different bands takes up time, and we had to pause the video while we fumbled around.  It might be worth getting a set of bands that has a handle for each band.However, if bands are right for you, you will be well served by this set.
summary: Work great for certain things, not so great for others

reviewText: Resistance bands are very useful to exercise many parts of your body, and can be adapted to very different needs and workout routines. They are very light, so you can carry them easily. It's like a two-pound weight gym! On top of this, the bands are very cheap.
These work very well for resistance training. I do like the door anchor, and ankle strap accessories.They stretch quite far if needed.
summary: Good replacement in you have no barbell weights

reviewText: I purchased these bands to rehab a shoulder injury.  I've been using them for over a month and find them to be very durable.  The best part about the band set are the handles - they are durable, easy to use, and the right size.  The bands are easily interchangeable and make it very easy to combine multiple bands to increase the resistance.Very pleased with this purchase and would recommend to others... especially those rehabbing a shoulder injury or looking to strengthen the shoulder/arm muscles.
Will recommend you get a lot for the money. I am using it for about 2 months still no problem.

Packaged very well and arrived on time. Don't compare it to P90X bands as they are almost double the cost of these. I would definitely purchase other products from BMP. I would also prefer additional handles so do not have to switch out bands constantly while exercising.Bonus: After providing feedback, you can call them to send you an orange band for free.
I thought these would have burst in a couple of days but I still have them now using them with moderate to heavy wear. I would recommend these because of long it lasts!
If you are creative, you can do almost any exercise with these bands, and they all fit into a small tote bag.  Build quality is good -they are durable.
Great buy! Very durable and strong resistance bands. I strongly recommend buying it! Plus it was very cheap. Supper worth it!

I ordered these bands for some shoulder rehab and to mix up my workouts a little instead of focusing strictly on strength training.I used them for shoulder exercises primarily after I separated my shoulder. They work in ways that traditional weight-lifting will not. They help strengthen the joint and the surrounding ligaments, tendons and muscles. There are multiple bands so you can work up your resistance as you get stronger and healthier. There is a strap to attach it to your ankle or something else stationary. There is also a bracket to slip into a closed doorway. I personally could not come up with any other attachment or accessory that would have made this a better product for what it is.The quality of the product is just as good as bands that some of my friends have from other sports retailers - which, of course, cost much more. Not me - Amazon prime shipped to me within 2 days.Now if I could only get over my own laziness and use them more often...obviously not anyone's fault but my own!
summary: Exactly what I ordered...great set...great price!

reviewText: I have worked out with other bands and the rubber rips or they snap. This are strong and don't do either
EL PRUDUCTO FUE ENTREGADO CON LAS ESPECIFICACIONES MOSTRADAS, EN EL TIEMPO OPORTUNO Y EN LA FECHA ESTIMADA. RECOMIENDO 100%. EXCELENTE PRODUCTO!!

I bought these a couple of weeks ago because I hated my overcrowded gym and I wanted to start working out in the mornings before work. Buying a dumbbell set or even those all in one dumbbells didn't seem like a good idea since you would need a bench as well and there is no space for that in my house. So I bought a yoga mat for core training and the resistance bands for pretty much everything else. So far I have to say I love them, they are super portable (you can easily travel with them) and you can mix and match them to get the desired level of resistance. Overall, its a great product I highly recommend it.
The bands are sturdy. The end of the bands look like they can take the stretching, and the handle is comfortable.The quality is great, and they are a must for P90X.

I was really pleased with the overall service and communication of the seller. The seller was very quick and responsive with any questions or concerns i had. We ordered a bunch of bands as a group and they shipped right away. When we got the bands there were a few things missing, so we contacted the seller and sure enough he shipped out the few missing bags right away and they arrived the next day. The other great part of these bands is that they are great for the p90x program. I tried out some bands and they seemed fairly week and i was kind of hesitant to getting bands because i was so use to just using weights. When i got the bands i could tell that they were a lot stronger than the other ones i used. I still am not that used to bands instead of weights but i can tell that these bands are way better than the other ones i used. Overall, if you want good bands and great customer service i highly recommend purchasing these bands!
Great quality, just what i was looking for. Good resistance and good for anyone from beginners to advanced. love these things.

I bought it to use for my P90X program and it works just fine!The only thing I would like to see is visual instructions on how to use Door Anchor and Ankle Strap. I know it has some description, but pictures would help.Excellent product!

Was a little skeptical at the quality of the product I'd receive at such a low price, but these bands are fantastic!They come with an adjustable strap, two handles, and a doorway anchor point. The connecting links are very easy to use and durable. I've used them to do squats, curls, tricep extensions, chest exercises, and shoulder presses.Great way to get in some resistance training at home or on the road.I'd recommend this product to everyone.
summary: Extremely well made with durable links/connectors!

reviewText: Black Mountain Products is a very impressive company.  The carabiner (snap hook) broke on one of the resistance bands.  After a quick email directly to the company, I had a new resistance band with an ankle strap.  The D shaped ring on the ankle strap was *slightly* bend (definitely didn't need replacement!).  No questions, no forms, just *one* short email and I had the replacement merchandise 1-2 days later.  They paid for USPS shipping with a tracking number.Highly recommend purchasing this set of resistance bands.  I'm a heavy user and they've been holding up great; except, of course, for that one unlucky carabiner.

I was absolutely blown away by the quality of this product! These ain't no sissy rubber bands, but these are the real deal! The first time I used them, I felt like I was at stinking NASA or something! Traditionally, I have been a weight type of person because, let's be honest, pumping iron is incredibly manly. I started the P90x program, however, and unless you have a full weight set lying around (which is quite unlikely for college kids like myself), it is quite difficult nailing the weight that the workout requires. Seeking alternatives, I contacted the seller for some info and was quite surprised by the service I got.Normally, when you need something from an online company, it is a royal pain in the butt to get helpful advice from a real and knowledgable person. This time, however, I felt like I stumbled upon the pot of gold at the end of the Customer Service Rainbow. The seller was super responsive and extremely enthusiastic about his products! He took me under his wing and helped me find the perfect set of bands for my needs. He even checked up after they arrived to see how I liked them! I had to pinch myself because I thought I was dreaming. Nobody checks up on their products nowadays!This purchase has given me new faith in online shopping. The product is way better quality than you pay for and the service is unrivaled. Heck, this probably costs less than most people spend on protein drinks every week, but it will last you practically forever! I am very satisfied with this purchase and am stoked to finish the program with my new bands! Five stars for sure!

Although I used to be quite active in my past life, it has been a while since I hit the gym.  Now with a toddler and a baby on the way it is even harder to find time to make it to they gym so I decided to start putting together an at home gym to make it a little easier to find the time.  This was one of the most inexpensive options I could find on Amazon and thought it would be perfect for helping me get back into shape.I have used these several times and am happy with the quality and the variation that this set provides.Thanks!

I have never used resistance bands before, but this product was better than I hoped it would be. The bands are very high quality and seem very durable. The handles are very comfortable, and it is easy to change the resistance weight with the different bands. I would recommend this product to anybody!
Just bought it and it works great. Comes in a nice bag for storage and everything seems sturdy. Recommend it.

I like it but I have to say I wish they included a way to "loop" the band over something to be able to do pull-down or back exercises. I ended up using the "ankle" attachment to do that and works for me. Quality is great and would definitely see this lasting me a long time. I love the carabineer because you can use 2 or more at the same time with the handles once you get stronger.

I received the bands in a timely manner, after using the bands for a few weeks, I can tell the difference in both strength and tone. I will continue to use these bands to grain both strength and flexibility.

I recently ordered these resistance bands to use for P90X. I love that it comes with the different resistances so you can work your way up. The strengths are perfect for me but may not be strong enough for muscular men. The good thing is that you can add multiple bands to the handles because they just clip on. I would definitely recommend this to a friend or anyone looking to start P90X or a similar type of workout regimen.

I bought this resistance band set around a month ago and I've been really pleased with the product. I injured my legs several years ago (martial arts-related injury) and I've had chronic pain ever since then. However, I've been strengthening and stretching my legs again with these resistance bands over the last several weeks and I've had a lot of improvement. My chronic pain is resolving; I'm gaining flexibility; and my legs are getting stronger. It works really well. I've been following some stretching exercises I learned on Youtube ([...]) and also some exercises that a physiotherapy friend taught me (to take advantage of the ankle strap and door anchor).Overall, the quality of the product is excellent. The only suggested improvement I have is to include more details/illustrations in the instructional booklet that comes with the resistance band set. In fact, I am so pleased with the product I have already ordered 4 more (to give away to friends and family).
Got a great deal and the bands are sturdy! I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for resistance bands.

I purchased this set of bands to use for P90X workouts.  I have never been able to do pull-ups effectively, so these bands provide a great alternative to doing pull-ups in the workouts that involve back strengthening exercises.I selected this set of bands based on the positive reviews provided on the Amazon website, and I have not been disappointed.  The bands seem to be durable and well-made, and the door loop apparatus is also durable and easy to use.  The band set and door loop came with clear instructions for use and included an explanation of the strength/weight of each of the bands (the width of the bands also increases from light to heavy, so it is self-explanatory as to which is which).I purchased the full set of bands since I wasn't sure which resistance(s) I would need.  I don't anticipate using the lightest two bands much, but the mid-range (blue and black) ones should meet my needs perfectly.In addition to being pleased with the quality of the product, I was also happy with the courteous and helpful customer service provided by Black Mountain Products when I called their service team.

This is a wonderful set! I purchased these to rehab a nagging injury in my shoulder. After a week of use i can definitely feel the difference. These are durable and extremely comfortable. I highly recommend for every day use and for rehab purposes.

Just got them and used them for a short period - very well constructed.Love the "metal D rings" (instead of cheap plastic like in some other products) for quick changing of bands.Advice for "tall people" - you might have to do some of the exercises while on your knees (instead of standing).Advice for "short people" - just spread your legs wider to make the bands shorter.Overall very well constructed and the price was Great !!

My husband bought these as a gift for us. We feel they are constructed very well-just like the ones at the gym. The bands are sturdy and you can get a good workout if you plan out exercises. The handles are comfortable and easy to change from one band to the other.  We will definitely go through this manufacturer again for other like products.

I received these bands about a month ago and started using them 4 times a week. Since it was my first time using a bands-based product it took a couple sessions to feel completely comfortable in terms of how far they would stretch and positioning my body to allow for the greatest resistance. However, since then I've been very happy with the product and how they improve my workout, take up very little storage space and with the quality of the materials. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who works out at home or on the road.

From the time of purchase to delivery was successful, the shipment arrived immediately, when I see the product is exactly what they offer, the strings are a bit short but effective for me, with a stainless steel finishing grips to give it a touch of QUALITY ... GREATEST. Although I get a label that said that I can get another free resistance band and hope orange is true.

This product was exactly as described in both the photo and written statement.  Frequently I buy things and they are nothing like the picture or the description of the  item's virtues are over stated.  In this case you will be getting what is described for a lot less than the "As-Seen-On-TV" products.  The only thing that was a bummer about this product was the wait.  As an Amazon prime member I'm not used to waiting for stuff but the set was out of stock so I had to wait two weeks.  Other than that it was a really great deal and goes quite well with my p90x.

Hello I purchased this item for my husband,and he raved so much about the quality of the product that I had to try the bands for myself.  I was sold.  We now use them together and it has allowed us to share the same fitness experience without the intimidation of free weights, and having different fitness levels and goals.  There are bands for him and bands for me.
High quality set.  Great for those who travel.  Packs easily.  Good leaflet with suggested exercises.  This set has everything you need --  Handles, door anchor  etc.
summary: Excellent fitness set.  Perfect for travel

reviewText: Great and easy to use. A bit confusing at times if you aren't used to bands. Excellent quality. The clips and handles are high quality. The more my son and I use these bands the better they get. I chose BM because the handles clip to each band together or separate. Other brands the handle and band are 1 piece so they cost more and are less versatile. We don't have a lot of space so putting things up is a breeze. I would go 5 of 5 but wished I had 1 more door strap. This is a must for some exercises safely.
Bought these to do some light assistance exercises/rehad and they are perfect. I could not be more satisfied with this product at this price.

I have been using the BMP resistance bands for about a week and I am surprised at how convenient they are to use.  The bands can be easily attached to and detached from the handles to adjust the resistance to suit the exercises described in the enclosed brochure.  The door anchor also attached easily to any door without any damage even at a high level of resistance.  The more than a dozen exercises in the brochure are enough to keep variety in your workout.  Most important for me is that I can now work out anytime and anywhere.  Being able to squeeze a workout into a busy schedule was an unexpected benefit.  Great product.
I liked this setup that I went and ordered one for my Son.Well made and easy to use. No hard impact so its easy on my old joints.Able to get a great workout.

I had been looking for something similar to the Pilates springboard that I could use in my apartment in between my 2 Pilates classes a week. This product is a perfect fit. I've only been using it for a few days but the quality seems good and I am hoping nothing breaks before it's time as is mentioned in some of the reviews here. I tend to double or triple up on the bands if I am looking for a higher resistance, which I am hoping will reduce the wear on an individual band. Resistance training has been a god send in treating the arthritis that has developed in my spine. I am still fairly young and losing mobility is just not an option at this stage of my life. This kind of workout along with yoga and massage/acupuncture/chiropractic care has enabled me to only need a very low dose of a mild medication. I am so glad to have found a way to do resistance training at home and for such a good price.
summary: Great product to fill in the gaps between my Pilates classes!

reviewText: I'm really impressed by this.1. It's inexpensive.  MUCH less than an exercise machine or free weights.2. It's versatile.  You can easily customize your workout for specific muscle groups or, as in my case, vary the stain on damaged areas.3. It's small and light.  Good for travel and doesn't take up a lot of space at home.4. Everything in the package looks to be of good quality and low maintenance.5. It's quiet.  If you live in an apartment or with others, you can use this anytime without disturbing anyone.This is similar to, but much more complete than, what I used for physical therapy a few years ago.

I ordered this set of resistance bands because I travel a lot and many hotels I stay in only have cardio equipment in their fitness rooms. I prefer to work out with free weights and the bands seemed like a great alternative when I couldn't have my weights with me. for the most part, I was very pleased with the ability to work out with the bands. The only thing that was a bit frustrating was the hotel room configuration, where it was hard to use the door as an anchor - not the fault of the company, but it did keep me from being as effective as I would have hoped with my workouts.The only other thing I would suggest is a bit more instruction on how to use the bands. Otherwise a great purchase!

I really appreciate the design of these bands, as they easily attach to my other equipment and to each other to enable more flexible work out routines.  I purchased 2 sets, to give me and my wife the flexibility to work one band with 2 handles, and both arms at the same time, and not disturb my wife's work out if she is using different bands.
summary: Flexibility of interchangeable handles with bands is great

reviewText: I received what I ordered and they work well.  I have been using them to do my workouts.  They are built well and I am enjoying them.

I was looking for a cheaper alternative to buying weights, and this is the perfect fit. At first I didn't know how I was going to target certain muscles, but there are tons of resources online for workout ideas with resistance bands! Great quality and features.
Just started working out and needed something for when I am home. So far so good just what I needed and doesnt take any space at all.

I work out 3 times a week, medium intensity, with some dumbbells, pull-ups, and curl bar.I got the resistance bands mainly because a saw a video that demonstrated use for forearm training.I have since found out that they can be used for a wide variety of motions and activities. I can hit every aspect of my chest and arms, as well as legs.The selection of band strengths allow me to challenge myself to limit or tighten up with a light quickie.Construction is solid and assuring. Highly recommended.
summary: Excellent tool for all levels of workout

reviewText: My son wanted a workout set that didn't take up too much space in the dorm.  He goes to the gym but wanted to have options for hours when the gym isn't open.  This set is great and is very compact, yet offers a good variety of resistance settings.
Love the wide variety of resistances you can combine. Because I don't have room for a weight set with bench, these bands and an exercise ball are perfect for my workout.

I've had these for less than a month, so I can't really attest to their durability. But I have to agree with the reviewer who wrote something along the lines of, "So what if they wore out and broke, it means you're using them! Buy another set and wear those out too!" I love that review.These bands are so portable and easy to store, there is just no excuse to not do a workout. On nice days I've been using them outside in the fresh air, on the colder rainy days we've had lately I just use them indoors. So easy.I'm finding you can replicate almost all of the primary freeweight exercises, and several of the gym equipment exercises. There are a couple books out there that have good photos and sample circuit workouts. I bought one called "Resistance Band Workout", by James Milligan. It has some great photos and explanations, and tells you exactly which muscle group you are working with each exercise. I have also found some great instructional videos on BodyBuilding.com. Have a look at several references, and develop your own workout. I combine mine with lunges, squats, and cardio so I get about an hour and a half of a great workout that leaves me "just right" sore for the next day or two.While the bands will never take the place of "real" weights in my opinion, they are a superb alternative.My bands arrived in two days, but that's because I have the Amazon Prime two-day shipping thing.I really hope this helps you to decide whether or not to try these out, and if you do, please check out the above references, because they really helped me. After a fairly long haitus from "organized" workouts, I am getting back into it, feeling fantastic, and I find the bands are just so accessible that workouts are really easy to keep up on.And best of all: no more, oh I Have to drive to the gym, but first I Have to fix my hair and put on a fancy matching workout suit and fix up a sporty "natural healthy girl" makeup style so I look really cute while I'm in there... you can do these anywhere at home, wearing whatever you are comfy in, and sweat as hard as you want without wondering if your mascara is running. No more discovering too late that you were inadvertently pulling a convincing smeared-mascara Alice Cooper impersonation during an otherwise pretty attractive bicep curl...

So far I am happy with the quality of the bands.  Some people complained that having only 2 handles was a problem, but I figure that I will not be changing weight all that often anyway.  I use them for pullups and dips for my young boys. They can't really do many if any pullups without some assistance.  I like the clips because then you can clip them to the pullup bar instead of using the handles at all and then they don't get in the way of where I put my hands.
summary: Good Quality, Fast Delivery, Heavy Duty
