reviewText: the resistance bands are good for anyone who needs to workout, and want to do it at home or when traveling.  They come in a bag to store everything you need to do light to moderate arm and legs workout.  This is great for people that are strengthening after an injury or the elderly that want to keep there strength up without haveing a lot of equipment or travel.
summary: great wokout at a reasonable price

reviewText: Thanks guys so much better than trying to use the old fashioned dumb bells! These are the smart way to work out!

This is a wonderful set. Is a high quality product at an extraordinary price. I have been using them for over a week for hight intensity workouts and have come to believe that they will last me for some time. The size of the set works great for travel or for regular home gym use if you don't have the room or desire to have a bumch of equipment  around. Very versatile piece of gear, you can do so many different workouts with them that you can always find a way to use them. I would and already have recommend this product to my friends.

This is a terrific product to keep you in shape even when you are traveling.The workmanship is very good and support is excellent.I would recommend this product to my closest friends.  I already have.I have been on a university employee wellness committtee for over20 years and I will be recommending it to them this fall.

This product exceeds expectations. Incredible value and quality.  Fast shipping.  You can combine tubes on one handgrip due to the quick releases at the end of each tube. Great idea to be able to customize your resistance.  My physical therapist wanted to sell me a single tube to continue my exercises at home and he charges 5 X as much for just the tube itself!  Buy this item!
This product overall turned out a lot better than I had originally thought it would. Great price and works very well.

After using the bands, I have found them very useful.  They come with a nice anchor to be used with a closed door.  In addition, I found the versatility of being able to add multiple bands a nice advantage.
We are enjoying using these bands along with the P90x workout.  We read that they may be too short for some of the exercises, which could be true, but we make it work.

I bought these as I have a set of adjustable-weight dumbells in my home gym, but I wanted to be able to try some new excersizes and have some variety.  The resistance band set has worked great to that end.Additionally, the set is small enough that I can pack them in a backpack or suitcase in case I want some workout options for business travel or vacation.  This is a highly useful product for the price.
summary: Awesome to Compliment Dumbells for a Home Gym

reviewText: Great product, I have used these for some of the P90X moves for the past two years and they are very durable. I also bring these when I travel to make sure that I don't need to skip workouts when I am in a hotel room.

First and foremost, I look for a product that is of high quality and at a value price. I don't want to overpay for crap.  I usually am able to find products that satisfy my needs, but usually have to compromise slightly on the quality or pay more than I would like to get the quality preferred.  This product does both.  The quality and the price on these bands are really quite fantastic.  I am a personal trainer and nutrition coach and have a gym full of equipment of every variety.  To have a complete set of bands with quality handles, easy clips, and some accessories (though I do not use the bag), is really great.  These bands get used every day and they are holding up nicely.  I am optimistic these will hold up quite well...if they do not, I will update this review.

I am really enjoying my Black Mountain resistance bands. They are a great adjunct to my fitness routine and I love having the ability to take my resistance training along with ease (vs. free weights etc). Make's staying on my fitness program EZ even while traveling.I did decide to order a second pair of handles so I can utlize to different band strengths during a work out. This is really personal preference as the quick release mechanism on the ends of each bands don't make it difficult to swtich .. I just prefer not to have to switch mid workout. Overall I am very pleased with the product performance and quality.
summary: Good product for a fair price

reviewText: I purchased these bands to rehab a painful shoulder injury and continue to use them on a daily basis.  I travel often and simply throw the bag and bands in my suitcase.  Definately a quality product.  Thanks!

I bought this set to help with shoulder rehab after rotator cuff surgery.  I have used them almost every day for the last few months.  There is no sign of wear on any of them.  I ordered 2 additional handles purely for convenience of not having to switch bands for different exercises.  I strongly recommend these for anyone looking to get in shape or maintain their current levels.

It is not often that I get to rate a product 5 stars and write a review title such as this. The packaging is genius. I can slip all tubes, grips, and straps into the drawstring pouch provided. The tubes are very easy to coil and store. The whole package takes up a small amount of space in my Trainer backpack, where I store all sorts of gadgets and profiles.The system itself is very easy to customize. From a Beginners assessment, to Max Strength Training, I can swap out the tubes or combine tubes to meet my client's needs.
summary: Everything I Hoped it Would Be

reviewText: This product is a good basic product and was everything it said it was.  Would recommend for beginning, basic training.
This is an excellent starter set.  The yellow and blue bands are light and the others are stronger.  I use them for travel and general workouts.

This is the first set of resistance bands I've used.  I realized very quickly after starting P90X that my low weight dumbbells wouldn't work.  I didn't want to shell out the $300 for a set of adjustable dumbbells, so bands were my next option.  I was hesitant to spend a lot on these, so low cost was a priority.  It hasn't taken long to get used to using them, particularly because you can add multiple bands at the same time.  I can't say how they compare to other bands in the market, but I'm satisfied with them and have already recommended them to another first time P90x'er.

This is the second of these I've bought.  I had one before and gave it to a friend.  I like that the ends and the bands are interchangeable and that you can easily combine multiple bands on the same end to get different resistance levels.  I was originally going to buy a pull-up assist band, but realized that I can use this for that purpose but also get all the other benefits of multiple bands for general exercising!
summary: Great product at a great price -- I bought a second one!

reviewText: I get a lot of use out of my Resistance bands. In fact I ordered a 2nd set to have spares or to do crossovers and such. These are good quality, and I've had no problems at all. On the first set I lost the brochure that gave you the "weight" ratings for each color. I emailed Black Mountain and they responded within 30 minutes with an attachment of the brochure that I lost. Great service!

In the past, I've had issues completing workouts that required pull ups or chin ups because I simply didn't have the equipment available to do these things.  And when I had to travel, it was just as bad and unavailable.  But after buying and using these resistance bands, I am now getting a great, complete workout and may not even need my weights anymore!  This product is very easy to use and dynamic in the fact that you can use multiple bands at the same time to increase your resistance as well, and let's not forget the fact that these bands are portable so I can get the same workout I do at home when I travel as well!  This is an effective and more cost efficient option than buying the expensive chin-up/pull-up bars that may or may not work in your door frames at home, and if you use the correct resistance you will get the same results.
summary: This is exactly what my workouts needed!

reviewText: this is perfect for what i need them for. i kept reading other reviews of the eyelets breaking or the straps and handles but these seemed to look to be sturdy needless to say I'm unsure of when mine exactly broke but the inside of the handle has a crack, it hasn't broke completely but I'm uneasy of using them on a daily basis so now they're just used every once in a while.

I got this product bundle a couple months ago and truly enjoy it. I use them while watching TV, taking a break from my computer or bring the bands along when I am traveling which is often. I like these resistance bands better than my resistance loops too. With the handles, it does not hurt my hands like the loops. I also like this "package" where everything is organized. I think there are two downsides however. One, the set-up for connecting to a door is not viable for every home depending on how doors are put. I honestly do not have one spot in my house where I can use the set-up and not hit another wall or lamp or something. One needs to have space and I did not understand that beforehand. Next, using the guidebook, I was hoping there would be more leg exercises with the bands - all the examples are arms. Overall, I am pretty satisfied with the purchase. $30 is worth it! In the black zipped bag, I can bring this portable workout with me when I travel and need to fight stress. It also builds my upper body (again mostly arm workouts) to help with my yoga chatturanga dandasanas!

I ordered these resistance bands after purchasing some at Target and realizing they were not was I was looking for.  My favorite feature for these bands are the clips at each end, allowing for quite a bit of versatility. I also really like the leg strap, which allows for a wide range of leg workouts that would be otherwise difficult to do.I have always been a person that goes to the gym, but as my career builds, I find myslef at work 10+ hours most days. As a result, I have been skipping the gym as it adds an additional 45 minutes of driving due to rush hour traffic.  These bands have given me the chance to do incredible workouts at home.  I use an elliptical for my cardio and the bands for weight training and I feel like my workouts are equivalent to what I was getting at the gym.  Once you begin to learn how you can use the bands to isolate the different muscle groups, your workout options are endless.
Exactly what I was looking for in terms of ease of use and storage space required.  To soon to tell about results but I am optimistic.

For me the main purpose of these bands is to start a exercise program.  I'm 6 months post op from a lumbar fusion.  Not being able to lift and do much around the yard has left my upper body weak.  I needed something to gently build some strength up.  I think these bands are just what I need.I purchased this band set because I don't have the space for any machines.  And free weights are too expensive, and again, I don't have space for that.So far, I'm impressed with this (my first) set of bands.  Well constructed and easy to use - meaning, it's easy to change/add bands with their clasps.  The door anchor and ankle strap work great.  I actually use the ankle strap in different scenarios.  For example, I wrap it around an overhead rafter in the basement and run the band thru it - for pull downs.Very universal, and easy to take with you.My only real complaint is the provided starter program.  The instructions are not clear and the diagrams aren't that great.  Luckily there are plenty of free programs to follow online.  I'm not going to deduct for this tho - the band set is great.

This is a great "starter" set, with enough variation to allow beginner to advanced users options.  I appreciate the high quality of the bands and the ability to attach the same handle set to any of them.  The only request I have is for an additional set of handles -- that way, you could have 2 bands ready to go for your workout and interchange them quickly, instead of having to stop and unlock/reconnect when switching "weights".  All in all, a great product that I have enjoyed using and look forward to bringing with me when I travel.  (I have not had reason to use the door anchor yet, but have been able to do plenty of exercises without it.)
summary: Great "all-around" starter set -- bonus would have been extra pair of handles.

reviewText: The bands so far have worked great for me, and the ability to change the grip on the bands makes this set different from many others (especially in its ability to combine bands for even more resistance options).  The booklet comes with some exercises to get you started with your set which are pretty easy to figure out and are really effective.As someone who is kind of short, there are some exercises which required me to use a thicker band not because I was too strong, but because the light bands didn't resist much for my height.  But that really doesn't take away from my experience with this set.Overall a great set, especially for a beginner!
summary: Great Workout for a Great Price

reviewText: The ability to swap the bands for different purposes is what caused me to purchase this product.  I can now snap on the resistance I need for biceps and then use a heavier resistance band for back and shoulder exercises.  There is a good range of bands to cover every exercise.  The door mount wasn't thick enough for my door but that was easily fixed by running a towel through it.

So here's the deal, folks.  These bands work  very well for what they're made to do (light to moderate resistance training).  If you're using them for heavier training, they will eventually break, but that's just the nature of the product.  I've used the bands for p90x through two and a half 90-day cycles now and am on my third set of the red and black bands, after snapping two of them.  So why the 5-star review?  The customer service from BMP is fantastic.  The bands come with a lifetime warranty, so if they break, BMP will replace them right away.  Both times that I've had to have the bands replaced, I received a reply email within an hour of my initial email confirming the shipping of the replacements and including a UPS tracking number.  You can't beat that for great service.To recap: while these aren't the most heavy-duty bands in the world, they're a solid alternative if you don't want to shell out over a hundred bucks for a full set of free weights.  Be prepared to have to eventually replace them if you're using them for high-intensity training, but since the replacement is free and the customer service is great, it's not really a problem.
summary: Solid Product, Even Better Customer Service

reviewText: I like that you get several band strengths in this package. And if they're not strong enough for u you can combine them. Previously I owned a set of flat bands without handles. i chose this set for its flexibility and the handles and door doohickey. Both were nice to use............Stay far far away from these things if you have a latex allergy. You may not have to touch the bands because of the handles, but u will have to smell them and breathe in their dust. They smell like hundreds of balloons. I tried wiping them down but that wasnt effective.........I do like the product but I have to find a nonlatex set.
summary: Nice collection of exercise bands - STRONG rubber/latex smell

reviewText: I Use the bands for the Tapout XT workouts and they have resisted just fine, it's a good quality product, I even bought a set for my boyfriend as a birthday present and he hasn't complained ether.  Also I live in Mexico and the package arrived a lot sooner than expected so I'm guessing that if you live in the US it's even faster.

The materials and construction are top notch.  I did return these however, due to the fact that the exercises for the legs are not enough for me.  The book I bought to go along with this did explain that the lower body did not receive as good a workout as the upper body using resistance bands.  IF that had been in the description of the product where I could have view the information BEFORE buying I would NOT have bought it and be out the shipping to return the merchandize to them.  Which is really my one and only complaint.  But since I am out that money and have no product to show for it I feel it is a serious complaint.

I have had other bands in the past but decided to give this set a go after reading some favorable reviews.I could not be happier! They are excellent and extremely durable. I have had problems in the past with handles coming off, but these Black Mountain Bands are holding tight. Based on the way they are connected, it looks like they are going to hold for a long, long time.Strongly recommend this item to include in your home/travel gym.
We were very impressed with the quality of these bands .  We bought these to replace a set purchased at a local box store, which weren't nearly as nice as the Black Mountain set .

I have to say that before buying this product I was a bit hesitant but decided to give them a try given the great reviews that they had. When I received the bands I started using mostly the RED one and it broke in about 3 or 4 days of intensive use. I believe it had to do with the pressure I was putting on the band and the type of shoe I was wearing that made a bad combination and made it snap.So after it snapped I decided to email warranty@blackmountainproducts.com and sent them a picture of the broken RED band. A few hours later I got a reply asking for my address and saying that they would ship immediately a new RED band and also they would send me free of charge an ORANGE band which is a step above in resistance from the RED one. This was a great unsolicited gesture, from a great company that truly knows the meaning of excellent customer service.I have since received both bands and I'm very happy with the extra resistance from the ORANGE band.
summary: Great Product, even better customer service!

reviewText: These resistance bands are pretty high quality, and they're certainly worth the money you pay for them. They flex well, and seem to show no signs of breaking/tearing. I'm satisfied with their quality. If I had one biggest complaint about them, it's that you cannot really get too much weight out of them. In order to get to ~60lbs of resistance, you need to link up three different bands. Admittedly, with bands you can always just create more tension to get more resistance (by creating a loop on the floor; look up videos on youtube if you're curious) instead of just attaching more bands, but I don't like putting that much strain on my bands. If you're expecting these bands to turn you into the Hulk, come back down to earth and rethink what you're buying them for. If you're using these to put on a little size, tone, or to supplement your use of heavier dumbbells/machines, then I'd highly recommend these. I'm using them for P90X, and I have no complaints. Occasionally it takes some effort to figure out how to reach the right amount of resistance for a new workout, but they always pull through for me.

I am rehabilitating a shoulder injury and had been using the bands that the physical therapist had sold to me. They were just bands without the handles and straps that Black Mountain comes with and found it was difficult to hook the bands in the right position to do my exercises. You know tied to the bannister for one, looped around a door handle for another, wrapped around the table leg for another....So the end result that it was such a pain I tended to not do my exercises. I was considering joining a gym until I ran across the Black Mountain Kit. Using this kit with the door jam feature and handles makes it so easy I'm doing my PT all the time and am looking forward to building even more muscle after I'm healed.The instructions for different exercises that comes in the box aren't as comprehensive as what Black Mountain has on their website.Overall a well built product at a great price. I think all Chiropractors and Physical Therapist should sell Black Mountain Products in their offices. Patient compliance and outcomes would probably improve..

I work as a personal trainer and nutritionist and was looking for a set of resistance bands to use for travel. After reading the other reviews on this product I decided to give it a try. These really are wonderful resistance bands and I would recommend the set to anyone. It comes with everything you need for a great workout. The quality of the materials is also excellent. I have had other bands snap on me in the past, but I can put these through some pretty rough workouts with complete confidence. Even after plenty of heavy use neither the bands nor the accessories show any signs of wear.

I'm starting to get back into working out and these bands are extremely useful in effectively getting yourself back into workout shape. They are extremely customizable and seem to be very sturdy, The simple fact that they can be carried with you wherever you go means you never have to go anywhere without working out. All you need is a little bit of open space and a door for mounting the door-thing and you're good to go. For the price, the quality seems fantastic and I would definitely recommend this product to someone who was looking to get back into a workout routine.

I like these bands. They are perfect for someone wanting to work out in a small apartment. Only thing I wish it came with was some kind of attachment to a pull up bar similar to the door jam attachment. Sure you can just wrap them around the bar but I wonder if over time that might wear on the bands. But so far they work fine.

I've owned these bands for about a year and a half, and have been really happy with them and the outstanding service at Black Mountain Products.  These bands will wear out and break, but the lifetime replacement warranty makes them a great deal.  I've had to replace the red band 4 times and the black band 3 times.  Each time I've requested a replacement their service department notifies me in a couple of hours to tell me that the new band is on its way which usually arrives within a day or two.  I use these bands at least a few times a week for "P90X" and "Tapout XT" workouts.  It's very easy and quick to switch up and increase the resistance.  They are also great for traveling if your work requires you to be on the road and you are looking for a significant improvement to the standard hotel "fitness room".
excellent product, recommended for use by persons with disabilities and for healthy people. My patients are happy. Thank you. Andris.

These Black Mountain resistance bands are much better than I ever expected and are cooler than anything I've seen in stores. I was surprised by their quality and performance, especially for a number of different types of workouts. Even better, I love the versatility of being able to combine them for more resistance and greater weight.

These bands are a great quality item.  The addition of the door and ankle straps are wonderful features.  The company ships quickly and is very customer oriented.  My only criticism of the product would be the starter guide.  It's nothing more than a sheet of paper with a couple of exercises on it.  I think they could add more to it, and link to video exercises on their website.  Overall though, I would recommend them to anyone interested in purchasing exercise bands.  For the price and quality they can't be beat.

I have been using these bands for about 2 weeks with P90X and they are the new 2011 version.  I have been very happy with them and the clipping system works very well to add additional levels of resistance.  Also the Door Anchor works well to do pull-ups.  The quality of the bands seems to be very good, but i did have a problem with the black band getting a nick in the rubber tubing in both ends of the band.  I called customer support about this and they said this should not happen even if you have to step on them to do some of the moves for P90X.  They have agreed to send me out a new band and were very helpful. Even though I had a problem with one of my bands I would still say this are good bands for the money and would recommend them.
summary: Great bands and great customer service

reviewText: These are good solid & sturdy bands.  Initially, I had some doubts about the strength of them, since I just broke a Reebok band.  Turns out they are great.  Exactly what I was looking for.  The lighter ones for my wife to use, and I can combine the bands together for my use.  I use them for P90X training and it works very well.  Definitely worth the money I paid for.Like any exercise equipments, safety is a big concern.  make sure the handles are properly connected to the bands.I think this package needs an extra pair of handles, or at least an option to buy extra handles.  Switching between exercise is easier without removing the handles.  I'll check with customer service to see if they sell any.  Beside that, if you are looking for a versatile solid band to work out, these are it.

The ability to swap and change the bands in this set was what first attracted me to these bands and good reviews sold me.My own experience hasn't been so great though ;(After about three weeks in my first band snapped, and week by week another band bit the dust.I'm not in any way a big guy and only used them for some fitness training, so have been very disappointed by their performance.Glad others have had a better experience, but not for me.Andy

Review of a 37 year old male, 6'2".I purchased these bands about three weeks ago, and have been using them in the P90 Master Series program. Previously I have been using weights, however, I hurt my back pretty badly doing one of Tony Horton's lawnmower exercises (not his fault, I stupidly pushed myself too far!!)At first, when my injury dragged on, I wanted to try just doing the non-back exercises, but I found that I still couldn't as trying to lift a heavy weight to do some arm exercises still aggravated my back.  I started researching back problems, and someone recommended switching to bands for this very reason.My only previous experience with bands was with EA Sports Active, and they were terrible.  There wasn't enough resistance, and the bands broke far too easily.My experience with these BMP bands is a complete 180 from the EA ones.  First, these have an incredibly sturdy metal clip on either side of each band, which attaches to a comfortable handle.  Bands can be added and detached easily, and even combined to increase the weights without having to buy more bands!For my back exercises, I found that I could very easily just pick the very easy yellow bands, and do extremely light exercises even though I was still recovering.  This allowed me to assess my situation without endangering myself even more.  After three weeks, I am moving up to the green bands (the middle one) on my back, confident that yellow and then blue were no problem for me on the previous weeks.As a final note, I'm fairly tall (6'2") and I was concerned that my height would affect the efficacy of bands in general.  I was completely wrong about this; using resistance bands seems to be a personal thing.  You experiment with various combinations, you can adjust where your feet are, you can loop the bands, etc, until you "find the burn!"  Then you jot that down, and you're set for next time.
summary: Great bands!!! Bands > Weights if you have a back problem!

reviewText: For a long time I had written off resistance bands and stayed strictly with free weights. I never thought they could provide a worthwhile workout. I was wrong. It's just a different type of workout. The weight is actually more than I thought it would feel like with multiple bands. Seems to provide a good speedy workout without having to switch plates and such.The quality feels nice on all ends with the handles having nice padding and the fasteners on the ends seem sturdy. The storage bag is nice to have. I haven't had these very long but if they last more than a few months with almost everyday use between multiple people I'm already sold on another set.

This seems to be a great set of bands, although I've never owned any previously. No issues with use and I like the attachment to use with the door. Everything appears to be very sturdy. Only thing I've found frustrating is having only one set of grips. It's inconvenient to attach and reattach whenever I need to move from door to floor, which also requires a change in bands used. Also would be nice if the bands were labeled by weight so I didn't have to refer to the book. I'm sure I'll get to know them by color over time and use.
You can vary your workout and custom it to the part of the body you want to work. It is high quality equipment that can be used for a toning workout or a tough muscle building set.

If you're familiar with resistance bands, then there isn't very much to explain. The picture shows everything you get, and it's just about all you need for your exercises. You get:- 5 x resistance bands with clips: You can easily mix-and-match for more resistance. The resistances aren't labeled, however, and sometimes I get mixed up with red/black and blue/yellow, because they're both about the same thickness and I forget the order of increasing resistance.- 2 x handles: Decently padded with foam, but I wish the handles were a bit more structured, because on some exercises, the nylon straps on the handle scrape against my hands. Not a big deal, and more of a nuisance than anything.- 1 x door anchor: Works fine, just make sure your door doesn't flex very much.- 1 x velcro limb strap: I've never used this to strap onto my arm or leg. Instead, I usually use it to wrap around staircase railing or various poles around the house as an anchor, so that I can simulate pulley-type exercises.- 1 x carrying bag: Not very robust, just a cinching pouch made from that weird papery-clothy material.As of this review, I had used this set for five months, and everything's mostly held up. The exception is on my green band. The spring on one of the clips on my green band broke, so the clip doesn't stay closed. I e-mailed BMP and they responded and shipped a replacement band within the same day. Impressive customer support!
summary: Good set of resistance bands, with a lot of variety.

reviewText: Quick service,  includes everything shown in the picture.  So far so good!  Even includes a exsersise chart to help you get started.
These are great for home workouts.  They give an excellent workout for upper and lower body.  They provided a great workout for me and my teenage son.  Highly recommend these for all levels.

I am using this resistance band forPOWER 90: Tony Horton's Total Body Transformation 90 Day Boot Camp Workout DVDs, and for the most part I am loving it.  Due to my job, I travel a lot, and this light weight-resistance bands fits nicely in my suitcase without being an extra weight.  In order to get different feeling, I am also usingBowflex SelectTech 552 Adjustable Dumbbells (Pair):  For the most part I notice that there is a good correlation between dumbells and resistance band.One draw back I have is when I do military presses in P90, the black fabric at each end of the band before the hook rubs against my arms and shoulders and I end up getting scratches.  Today, I got two of them.  I am thinking about taping around the fabric to avoid scratching... I wonder if others are having a similar problem.
summary: For the most part, I love it but...

reviewText: I love these! These give me just what I needed to do the Chalene Extreme program without having free weights. They give you a great workout!
summary: Free weights not needed with these!

reviewText: I was looking for resistance bands for Chalean Extreme since I do not have the space for a large collection of hand weights or the money for Selecttech weights.I decided to go with these bands since you switch them between one set of handles and can be doubled up for additional resistance.These are very easy to transfer from one band to the other and really do work well for upper body resistance exercises.My only complaint is that because of the way they clip onto the handles, when doing an exercise like a fly or chest press when laying on the floor the bands seem like they are too long and they're difficult to grip under the clip to make the bands a little shorter.These are a wonderful product for an exercise like Chalean Extreme and fit nicely into the provided bag so you can put them away when you aren't working out if you live in a smaller space or be able to easily throw them into a suitcase to take them with you if you travel.

These arrived in two days (Amazon Prime) and just as advertised. I have been using them for three weeks now and am very impressed with the quality. The low price was an added bonus. Very happy with this purchase!

I got this for a family member as a Christmas gift and he loved it.  It's a well-made product and he's actually traveled with it several times.  With a little creativity, the workouts are endless.  Great product!
summary: Well made product that does its job

reviewText: I am currently using these bands for p90x and they work great! If you add up all the bands you can really feel a burn. The bands have held up so far and have no signs of wear or use. Great quality from a small family owned American company! Best bands for the price. The bodylastics are overpriced compared to these.

I have lower back issues and as a result have difficulties doing leg excersizes such as squats with weights. With thses bands I have been able to perform various excerizes without impacting my lower back.

We ordered a few of the resistance band sets for the physical therapy office that I work at, and all of the patients that have used them, love them. They are easy to use and can be used on many exercises for different body parts. Some of our patients loved them so much that they have bought a set of their own.
These are a great set.  I have noticed that some bands start to wear if you stand on them a lot.  Other than that, they have held up well and add a lot of resistance to my training.

Bands are awesome. Very durable and a good addition to my workout. Seems like they may lose some of their resistance over time, or I'm just getting stronger. Good for my girlfriend and I, easy to adjust and the door jam piece doesn't leave any markings on the door.

So far, the door anchor and the lightest resistance bands have both snapped. When the door anchor snapped, I went flying across the room and landed hard. I was not seriously injured. The lightest resistance band snapped today and the carabiner part of it was rocketed into the ceiling with enough force to break anything remotely fragile. The scariest of all is that there is no indication that a part is going to break... it happens suddenly. I am nervous to continue using the unbroken products and will buy some free weights when I can afford them.Edit-Bought some adjustable dumbells and am much happier using the dumbells for almost all the exercises I would otherwise use with the bands. I still use the bands for a lat pull-down.
summary: Dangerous - parts snapped during normal use

reviewText: These resistance bands are PERFECT for all fitness levels - beginning to advanced.  I love how they very from low pound to higher.  And what makes them even better are how you can stack them.  So as you feel yourself getting stronger, you can put bands together.These are also great for travel.  I love how I can just toss them in the bag (which came with them)  and they easily fit for travel or in a backpack.I used to lug around my adjustable dumbbells around but no need anymore.  I can easily do full body workouts or bust our Tapout XT and don't EVER have to worry about these bands.Even better is their customer service, super nice and helpful.  I'd HIGHLY recommend this product to all my friends and family :)
summary: These resistance bands are PERFECT for all fitness levels - beginning to advanced

reviewText: the handles are comfortable and its easy to change out the resistance. the resistance is plenty for me doing any excercise. good product

Everything about this set is very high quality. I can see these lasting for a very long time. So five star for being a high quality product.If you're looking to get fit, best option is to join a good gym and get on a good, proven program. Don't expect to get buff fast, using these. That's not what these are for, imo. What these are excellent for, is when you're traveling and don't have many options.You can get a decent upper body workout. Some compound movements (the important stuff), like any pressing or rowing/pulling movements may feel a bit awkward, so you'll have to play around and experiment a little. For isolation, accessory movements, these are great. The feeling is very different from free weights but not necessarily in a bad way.Lower body, you have to get pretty creative... or forget about it and just go do some box jumps or sprints.

Really good product that you can use for working out.  Variety of bands offers different levels of resistances.  Also comes with a booklet that shows you what exercises you can do with the bands.  Seems very sturdy and well made and built to last.  What's pictured and described is what gets delivered, no surprises.  Would recommend this for anyone!
summary: Great product for working out at home or in hotel

reviewText: I just received this set of bands and upon first time using it, black (heaviest resistance supposedly) snapped on me and now my shoulder hurts. I am extremely upset and want to warn everyone out there who is planning to buy this set to be extra careful and think twice. It might happened to you...In the box seller is asking to resolve issues peacefully without leaving negative feedback. I will not leave negative feedback because it seems like seller is reputable and willing to exchange/return, but I am leaving this review for people to raise awareness as it is very dangerous and potentially harmful.

I ordered this in Nov of 2011 and it came quickly, and exactly as described.  I have used it almost daily since and love the product, variety of resistances it offers, and how quickly I can change up my workouts.  The company is also top-notch - I contacted them last week when a band broke (actually, the metal grommet broke) to see about a replacement.  Since it was after the warranty I had no expectations but thought it never hurts to ask.  In under a day from my email I have a replacement band being shipped first class with a tracking code!  Wonderful product, company, and I definitely recommend this to anyone considering a resistance workout program.

I'm a former powerlifter who can no longer use freeweights or lift heavy because of health conditions, and I've using resistance bands (therabands from the many instances of physical therapy I've been to) to work out with for a while now, they agree with my body much better with free weights at this point.I worked out with the B.M.P. resistance band set and it did it's job as intended.  I love the fact that the bands are totally modular and I love the door strap.  So I won't be messing up my doors with my old t-band tubes anymore (side-note: this also caused them to fray, break, snap or slap you in the chest--not pleasant when working with high resistance tubes).Handles on these are comfortable so they don't put a disproportionate amount of stress on the forearms and wrists when doing bicep/shoulder workouts like bands without handles do.These things are great, really glad I bought these and I am very pleased with my workout this morning.  Hell of an improvement over what I was using before.  Product got here crazy fast too.

I bought this resistance band as a temporary aide to keeping my weight training on schedule during a trip I made last year. I've been using them off and on since then, and have found them to be of excellent quality. The only minor gripe I have against them is the slight discoloration that comes with age, but that might be asking too much.All in all, I'd recommend these to anyone looking for a nice set of resistance bands. You can stack them as you grow out of each one as well, which is a plus.

I have been extremely impressed with these resistance bands.  I travel frequently on business and these bands come in a bag that fits easily in my suitcase and provide the equivalent of a workout with weights.  The strap allows me to anchor the bands to a door.  I have used bands in the past that broke where the bands met the metal clips, rendering them useless, but these are much more thoughtfully made and reinforced at the connection to prevent breaking.  These are the best I have seen or used, and the clips allow for maximum flexibility in varying levels of resistance and easily adjustable.  Thank you for an excellent set of resistance bands.  I use these at home as well as on the road.
summary: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set

reviewText: I started P90X3 and needed a set of resistance bands and found these to be quite popular on Amazon. Upon purchasing, I found them to not disappoint! The bands themselves were high quality and so far have been performing excellently for my P90X3 routines. I have yet to see any wear or tear on the bands and these bands feel like they will last me a very long time. The free bag that it comes included with is also very handy and higher quality than I expected for a free bag. They fit all the bands, handles, door jambs very comfortably with room to spare.
summary: Great bands for P90X3 and greater customer service

reviewText: I am new to the resistance band scene, and I saw largely positive reviews for this set so I decided to try them.The resistance provided by bands is very different than that of free weights, and when paired is a great combination. The company included an offer for a free orange band, but I haven't contacted them yet about it. I have had some concerns about using a door to anchor the bands, and I feel like I'm going to rip the door off its hinges, so I stick to the standing exercises.Overall, great bands and I would definitely recommend them to anyone interested in buying a set of bands.
I'm about 5'10" or 5'11"ish and I'd say the quality of this resistance bands are pretty ok (since this is my first resistance bands set). It's just kinda short, but it's still good.

This is great value compared to what you get at superstore. The length of the bands is perfect for you to perform many exercise compared to longer version available at stores. Very practical, can have it lying around in my living room and can do some resistance exercise while watching TV. Amazing yet simple concept better, more practical  than dumbbells.
summary: Great value, practical solution to your strength needs

reviewText: Before I bought these I read all the reviews, they are ok  although the handle broke after 3 times of use, definitely expected much more uses.
I've been doing P90X for a few months and decided to try these bands. They are high quality for a reasonable price. I haven't had any problems with them yet.

The first thing I must point out is that the foot strap is the stinkiest thing I have ever smelled. Just touching it made my fingers stink for hours. I had to put this thing outside for a couple of weeks to air out enough to bring inside. I'm still scared to touch it, let alone wear it around my foot while trying to work out to a sweat. Unfortunately, one of the reasons I purchased this particular package is because it did come with a foot strap.Bands work adequately and switching them over is pretty easy. That said, if you are going to switch bands frequently, you might want to get a kit that has more than one set of handles. The bag is handy.
This product is affordable, well built and a great alternative to traditional weights. Will definitely keep Black Mountain in mind for future at home gym products.
summary: Great product, exceptional service and quality

reviewText: I'm using these for P90X.  I love the ability to stack them.  I plan to buy some powerblock dumbbells at some point, but these bands allowed me to get started before making such a lofty investment.  I'll definitely also get the orange and purple bands.  Even after I get some dumbbells, I still think these bands will be a good change-it-up option, and allow me to do some exercises that dumbbells won't really be usable.
summary: Love the ability to stack them1

reviewText: I have used these about 4 to 5 times a week for a light work out.  Haven't had any problems with them.  I like them but kind of wish i had just bought some weights.  Good product though!

I normally workout about 3 times a week at a gym, (mostly weights, with some cardio) and I was looking for some at-home workout equipment that I could use when I didn't have time to go to the gym, but still wanted to squeeze in a good workout. That's why I bought this product, and I've been using it for a few months on "busier days."These are a great alternative to buying dumbbells (much cheaper, and easier to carry with you on trips). I was pleasantly surprised at the build quality and appreciated the carrying bag that came with it.They work perfect for me at my height of 5'8''.The only two things that I would wish to improve on this product would be the following:1) Printed weight labels on the bands so I don't have to refer to a sheet to know how much resistance approximately is on each band. (I simply took a sharpie and labeled them myself, except for the black band. It'd be nice to not have to do it though).2) The carabiners could be a little bigger, to prevent the need for me to awkwardly rotate the carabiner within it's black cloth attachment to snap in the handles. (Not a huge complaint though, since the price was great!)Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.
summary: Good value, Solid quality, better than expected at price point

reviewText: I absolutely love these resistance bands! You have every amount of resistance you could need, and bands can be easily added together to get your perfect resistance. The handles are comfortable, and the door anchor does stay in the door. I was a little scared to try the door anchor because I was afraid it was going to come flying out and hit me in the face, but I tested it using a long broom lol. I do love using resistance bands instead of weights because you get lean muscle instead of bulky muscle like from free weights. This is a great set, and I highly recommend them.

I received the standard bands for Christmas so I can use it for P90X, much better price than the recommended product.  They worked great, but I needed a heavier band for the pull-ups.  I exchanged them for these stackable bands including the orange band.  So far, I like them not only because I can double (or more as needed) on the bands for the pull ups but on other exercises I add the yellow band for added resistance in between bands.  Black Mountain Products has a great customer service policy.  If you are not sure if you need the standard or stackable, contact BMP and ask them what they recommend.
I got some exercise bands for free. I needed an extra one so I went on to but this one.
This product is great. It arrived the very next day, and it's easy and fun to use them. I am lazy person, so I am using them while I am watching tv.

I haven't had any problems with these whatsoever.  The cables, handles, and straps are all great.  You can get just about any workout you want in by combining these bands - anything from power lifting to light aerobic training.  GREAT!
I love these, my kids even use these. I bought these to go along with my p90x videos. Great buy!
This was a great product. I am glad I made this purchase. Product was nicely made and works very well.
We love them and used them everyday during our vacation to Florida when we couldn't easily get to a gym!

Love these workout bands.  I am able to use them with my P90X workout with no issues.  Easy to change bands, easy to use the door anchor and easy to store in the carry bag.  It also comes with a "cheat sheet" to remind me which band = which weight.  Well worth the money.
the bands are great the services is great, when can you make a call  and get the owner on the phone what more could you ask for, great bands  great price great services that saids it all

I have used the resistance bands for a couple of months and have been very happy with the product.  The bands are very easy to use.  The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is, like other users, I would have liked a nicer workout chart.  Other than that I would highly recommend this product.  The handle are very comfortable and you get plenty of bands.
My wife and I use these and they work great! No problems so far. I would definitely buy another set.

I've used a few other bands like these over the years, and these are by far the best.  Rather than having a set of individual bands with handles, all of the bands have a clip and the set comes with attachable hand grips and leg straps.  This makes it far easier to use multiple bands for an exercise, and this alone makes these bands better than the others that are out there.Aside from that, the bands are good quality, and they come with a nice bag for easy travel.  Great if you have to spend any amount of time away from your regular gym.
Save time from going to the gym and space at home.Really happy that I bought these band. Helped me a lot with my workouts and very durable.

I'm a throwing coach and we use a lot of resistance bands during workouts, these bands are second to none, they have amazing durability, the grips feel great, and the door anchor along with the ankle straps feel...well you dont feel them, thats the best part, you just get the workout without the hand hurting or the ankle marks.Being able to adjust the resistances with the wide array of bands is nice and the clips are high quality so they easily snap on and off the grips. The workouts provided are nice and easy to start with but the BMP website has over 150 workouts that you can pick and choose from to customize your workout.

I was in the market for some physical therapy equipment and everything was so expensive. I happened upon this great deal by accident and I do not regret buying! I use it daily to warm up my shoulders and avoid injury. Definite buy if you're looking for home gym equipment!
Works well, strong, and does not snap back in you face. Works well with two people of different strengths. Great

This was a great surprise for the money.  I looked at resistance band workouts on YouTube and decided to try it out. At this price why not?  I really feel like I had a good workout after my first try.  The door anchor worked great.  I'm 71 and keeping big equipment around the house is just not possible.  This I just keep in my night stand and any time I've got some extra minutes I do a little workout.  Pleasantly surprised and pleased.  I highly recommend.

took this on vacation, worked great. got through the airport ok. now i use this at home. the bands are strong. you can exercise most of the major muscle groups, might be a few gaps but not many. holds itself in the door just fine for the exercises that need it. I personally like to have it pull towards having the door shut, i don't trust it pulling towards the door open unless there is a dead bolt.
summary: this works great for travel or is the cheapest way to workout at home

reviewText: Great product and great service.  I would buy from again next time I need another set of equipment.  I like having the bad included too in case I need to take everything traveling.

This is a pretty decent set of resistance bands. The only thing I would change about it, is that the band themselves are a little bit long. When you put the attachments on them, they are too long to do some of the exercises I would like to do. I have tried to tie the bands in knots to remedy this, but they are very hard to untie, so I try to avoid doing that. Also, if you call the company after you get your package, they will send you a free orange band, which is even stronger than the strongest band in this pack. That was a nice little bonus!

As a fitness trainer I like to use all kinds of devices as well as body weight. This set is awesome because the bands are made better than most other products and it comes with everything you need to anchor and manipulate the bands. I especially like the clips on ends and the ability to be about to double, or triple-up (or more if you like) the bands for more resistance. This package provides everything one needs for a full body workout, the literature details the ranges of resistance in lbs for those who want to guage their strength. I especially like the fact that I am buying from a family-owned business. That's important. The tote bag makes them easy to transport, which is important when I'm traveling. I have yet to find a place where these bands can not be used. Thanks for the product.  Bajai

Bought this so we could take our workouts with us where every we go! Bought a great book on kindle with 70 exercises and these bands are kicking our butts! Great Quality! Shipping was really fast, and very happy with the product! Will purchase again through this company.

I was hoping for a nice set of resistance bands that I could use to continue my recovery from a rotator cuff injury and maintain some tone in my shoulder muscles. These bands are a bit too long for that purpose. The quality of the materials is good ... probably the best that I have seen - the bands are well made as are the clips. Some of the exercises shown in the booklet are not practical unless you are about 10 feet tall. For example, the only way that I could do the  behind-the-back tricep extension is by doubling the band - i.e. slip one of the handles on the band and make a loop with the band. I don't know if it spoils the band using it this way.  The lighter bands are probably not practical for most males unless they want to use them in tandem with other bands which makes it a little clumsy esp for the shortened length that I described earlier. It's a reasonable product for the price but certainly not the deal of the year.

great product no complaints, love these bands, use them just about everyday whether it be a quick workout or an extended workout, I also use these along with my P90x workouts. I would definitely recommend these!

The product is as advertised.  The bands themselves are good quality, no flaws, and they seem to provide a consistent amount of resistance.  My only problems have been that they only come with one ankle strap, I would have liked two, and the bag that you see pictured in the product description is extremely low quality, and has already come unbound along its main seam.  Beyond those problems this is a fine product.
There is is lots of versatility in this set of stretch cords. I wish there was one that was more resistant - rather than having to hook up more than one

These bands are incredible. They are made of very high quality rubber and ensure a solid workout every time. The seller was very easy to work with and the bands shipped within 3 days even though they weren't required to arrive for 7-10 days. They seem to be very sturdy and of much higher quality than normal exercise bands. They are especially useful for completing workouts such as P90x. I'd recommend these to all my friends. Keep up the great products.
I have used all parts of the set and everything works perfectly so far. It seems very durable. I really like the handles and straps, comfortable and strong. Excellent value. Also quite portable.

I bought these bands to use with P90X2 in order to modify some of the workouts. Ive found them to be very useful for this, particularly when used with the door attachment. Using the bands with the door attachment offers an effective alternative to doing pull-ups that still provides a good workout. They can also be used fairly well as a pull-up assist band, although the resistance is a little low to be completely effective in this manner. I would recommend them if you need a easy, portable option for an upper body workout.

These bands are a decent substitute for actual weights. They are strong and they won't snap. I put them through a tough challenge as soon as I got them (P90X) and I think they last well. Resistance maintained throughout my 90 days of the program. I will say, though, at the end of my ordeal the red band (since that's the one I used more often) became noticeably longer than the others. But I assume this is inevitable being that they are after all rubber bands.

These are by far amazing!! I have utilized other bands before but these have redefined the way I feel and look at resistance bands! The many different variations for added resistance as opposed to having to utilize a certain band is absolutely genius! The Caribbeaner clip and single pair design is fast and flawlessly designed! Switch resistance in and out in a flash and you are good to go! The space saving, weight avoided and durability is PERFECT if you're looking to get your money's worth while getting the most out of a home workout... such as P90X!!! Highly recommended! :)
summary: Excellent! Better than the average band!

reviewText: I originally had a negative experience due to not actually receiving the product I ordered and left the below review. Since that review BMP contacted me back via the email I sent them and made sure to send me my product by the next day. Unfortunatley, I was missing the carrying bag that was suppose to be sent, BUT I talked to customer service and he was VERY nice. He apologized a lot and even through in a free resistance band for the trouble. As far as the products themselves I am very happy with them. The bands, door anchor, and anckle strap are very well made. If you do order from BMP and they happen to mess up DON'T WORRY, they will make it right.Original review:I was really looking forward to trying out this product due to all the positive feedback, but I have yet to actually receive anything. I placed my order on Nov, 20th with some other items from other sellers; it is now Dec 5 and nothing from BMP has come through. Even more disappointing is they haven't even responded to my "Where's My Stuff" email that I sent two days ago.Hopefully I can rate this item higher when I actually get my item, but until then......still waiting.

My husband bought these bands as a Christmas present for me and to help with my arm/shoulder and neck recovery program.  Over the first week I have been able to move from the yellow band to the light blue one and I seem to be getting stronger with an increased range of motion each day!  I wish there were more instructions shown, but it has also been fun learning on my own.  Thanks for making a great product that's easy to use.

bands recommended to me as low impact way to strengthen back and hamstrings to abate pain. very easy to used given color coding and nicely padded handles. i bought a manual with good photos of exercise positions for clarity. easy to do while listening to music or watching TV so easy to keep to the regimen. i would recommend readily  but probably no match for muscle building compared to weight training.

This band set is perfect!  It offers a great variety and great quality.  I did have a problem with one of the bands, and they took care of it right away and sent me a new one quickly!  I would definitely do business with them again!

Great Product!The bands are really durable and the multiple resistances gives you the opportunity to work out at your own rate.Although nothing takes the place of going to the gym, this is a nice alternative when you are short on time.

Had used the flat bands in the past till they broke.  Then searched for replacements and found the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set on Amazon.I've been using the bands for arm exercises for over a month and find them to be extremely user friendly the way they are configured - the hand grips make a big difference and the door anchor is perfect.The price is reasonable - would recommend them to my friends, neighbors, etc.
really enjoy useing these bands. Just the right amount of resistance. They give you a good workout. Excellant product and recomemded.

I really like this product. I have to say that this is the best exercise equipment that I have purchased. I love that fact that you can get a great work out from it. I take it to wok with me and use it during my break time. Love it, love it, love it.

I bought these along with a recumbent bike and wanted to wrap them around the front to work my arms while I pedal away on the bike at the same time.  Work perfectly and I could not be more satisfied with the quality of these bands.~ Ben Donley

This resistance band set truly is top quality and a fantastic buy. They come in a nice bag and are easy to organize and use. With helpful instructions and easy to change handles, these are perfect for working out. I would like another set from black mountain that was a bit longer because I am six and a half feet tall so some of the overhead stuff is a bit challenging, but still, these are fantastic!

This equipment gives you the utilities that you need to do whatever resistance exercises you want to do.  Includes a bit of paper with cord resistance values and suggested exercises.  I would buy again.
summary: A variety of configurations and exercises!

reviewText: as a man who works behind a computor alot i find myself searching for time to get exercise (or work out). The Black Mountain resistance Band set is awesome for  those of us who cant set aside several hours a day/week for fitness training. These Bands Are well built and are a great way to work out in any enviroment. I have fond a way to use them at my desk while thinkung about the problem at hand.i bought the full kit and an extra set of handles. I then Gave the lowest bands (and the extra set of handles) to my mother to help her stay in good health. All of us love our moms, and anything that can help them is worth it.I have had this kit for several months so far and i am very happy with the quality.The only reservation i have is that the handles themselves have enough flex in them that it concerns me that after prolonged use they might break. Even if the handles were made with an added fraction of thickness i would feel much safer. (note nothing has broken on me yet, just a suggestion to the great guys at Black Mountain)

This product is of a much higher quality than the other resistance band sets available on Amazon.  The grommet and nylon is much, much more durable.  Although my package originally did not come with the door anchor, all I had to do was call the customer service line and they shipped one out to me immediately free of charge.Great product and great service!
summary: Great Product and Even Better Customer Service

reviewText: Great product. Tone muscles while adding strength with minimul bulk. Alternative work out for those who want a simple but effective training system. Strong reinforced bands with all the needed anchors handles and wraps for a total body work out.
summary: Keep it right, keep it tight, keep it light!

reviewText: The red band(heaviest resistance) started tearing the first time I used it, so for obvious reason I stopped and tried the black one. The black one lasted fine for the exercise, but the next day it started ripping in the same place as the red one. I will not use the other colors as they simply do not have enough resistance.  A big minus is that this set has only one pair of handles and to switch from one handle to another is a big inconvenience and a waist of time.

Got these as a gift and have been very satisfied!  I feel like I am getting a whole gym's worth of machines in a compact and portable bag.  Very versatile and the straps and handles are well made and durable.  Highly recommend these if you want a good workout at home or if you travel and want to have a way to exercise on the go.  Great product!

I purchased these to do P90X3 as I don't have a high enough ceiling in my basement for a pull up bar.  This work great with the varying resistance bands.  Construction is very solid and I have no issues with using them do to my work out each day.
Great product.  This is really helping my back muscles after an injury I sustained.  Thanks for a great sturdy item!

I got these as a gift about 3 weeks ago and fell in love with them.  Was tired of wasting the time driving to the gym when I could get a good workout in at home.  These bands are just what I was looking for.  Great quality and easy to use.  Will definitely recommend to my friends.

Bought these for my husband for Christmas and he LOVES them. They pack up easy and he can take them anywhere for a workout wherever he is. And, because they are easy to combine, he can use them for a lot of things! great1
Was very excited to receive my Resistance Band set and get started with my workout..no can do..did not receive anything but the resistance bands..no exercise chart and no door anchor....

I bought this product because my local gym charges over $40 a month for a membership.  When I first got it in the mail I could tell that this product is made out of high quality materials!  I started working out with it immediately and it really gave my muscles the workout that they need.  The booklet is helpful to start using the door attachment.  I used it with my door and it worked perfectly.  If i had to change something about this product I would get rid of the yellow band (2 lb) and add a stronger band with more resistance.
Arrived as promised. Good quality item.
I bought these bands last year and have been very happy with them. They are appropriate length for me (I'm 5'7") and appear to be well-made as they are holding up fine.
summary: Great band set for travel and P90X.

reviewText: It was a gift for a friend who had shoulder problems. When I saw her a week later, she raved about it. So even though i never looked at it, I would have to give it two thumbs up, just on her say so.

These are perfect for P90x if you can't afford a weight set. I have been using these bands a lot and they have been showing no signs of wear. Being able to switch out and combine bands easily is great. I highly recommend these resistance bands.

I've bought other bands rated at "heavy" and would end up snapping them - and it stings like hell and can be dangerous if they hit your face/eyes.I like these because you can clip them together to add more weight which in turn makes them less likely to break. Also the door thing is great for doing pull-up type exercises.  They also come with a sheet that tells you the weight in lbs for each color band so that you can calculate which ones to clip together.I use them for my P90x workouts. I combine these with the reebok braided bands for my workouts when I'm away from home (braided bands are heaviest and strongest you can buy).  I have years of experience with home workouts involving both bands and dumbells and I highly recommend these bands.
summary: never need another set of bands after these....

reviewText: I had occasion to call the manufacturer with a question. Those folks talked to me like I was family, what a refreshing change from normal support calls! As far as the product itself is concerned it seems to be very well made with useful accessories.

I purchased this product after using it at physical therapy (rotator cuff surgery.) My therapist swears by it and I have to say that I'm quite impressed with the quality of this gear. Considering how inexpensive it was, I regard this as an exceptionally good buy.

Decent bands, but you can do better.  They are shorter than any band i've ever owned and the handles are a bit cheap.  As someone who has been using resistance bands for years, I would suggest looking at the Bodylastics bands instead.
They work really well you can use them in any way they even work out with pull-up bars and can attach it bench and use for reverse push-ups

I am really happy with these Black Mountain bands which are way better than expected. All of the components are well-made and, overall, this set compares very favorably to those furnished by my health club which I assume are a commercial grade since they are used all day long.  I bought this set to use when I am away on vacation, as a replacement for the Nautilus type workouts I do at the gym. I subsequently called Black Mountain to inquire about a promotion they were running and found the person I dealt with to be extremely friendly, knowledgeable and customer-service oriented.
Easy to assemble, easy to use, very good quality! The instruction booklet provided lists of and describe every exercise imaginable to re-hab and strengthen the body.
The product is well made and seems to do as advertised.  The only thing missing is more instruction on workout routines.
summary: Good product but needs more instruction

reviewText: I live in a dorm room. And going across campus to go to the gym during the freezing cold winter isn't something I enjoy. So I use these for a nice little work out in my dorm room.I wish the cables had a little ore resistance because I think using multiple cables is quite a bother. But other than that, I find them quite useful.
summary: Great for working out in a confined space.

reviewText: I've been using the product for a while now and I must say, the resistance bands actually deliver an intense burn. They really get the job done.

We bought a set for our CrossFit gym to start working on Scapular Stability exercises, and my business partner and I liked them so much, we bought 6 more! We can't wait to start programming all kinds of crossover drills. These have already began to help my posture and strengthen my back, which often times gets neglected during most CrossFit training.I highly recommend these- its icing on the cake that they are a fraction of the cost as many of their competitors.

Hi, purchased these bands approx. 2 months ago, was looking for something to keep me in shape when I am sailing.  My husband and I (we are 50plus)go to a gym regularly to work out and wish to keep that wonderful feeling but while sailing we miss out on some of it, so I purchased these bands without his knowledge as I know he would shrug, he was impressed and we use them regularly , the quality of the bands is great and surprised us.  The resistance is plenty for me and he gets a good work out as well, we are planning another long trip, months at a time and these will definitely be along for the ride, fair winds.  Thanks for a great product.

I have purchased other resistance bands and these are much higher quality than my other set.  If you are performing circuits at home with cardio and resistance training, this is a great way to go.  Also, if you are traveling, you can get a great workout with these.  Some hotels with 'fitness centers' only include cardio equipment and no free weights or machines so these bands are a must if you travel!  The set includes a door stop and ankle band as well.  I recommend getting an additional pair of handles in case you have two bands/sets of bands you want to work with during a circuit but this is not required.Great product!
summary: Great well-made addion to your home gym!

reviewText: I just received the Resistance Band set from BMP and they are great. Good quality grommets and straps. Resistance bands are great way to stay active the hassle of tons of weights.
A great set of bands.  I've used them for 6 weeks with P90X now and there is no sign of wear and tear yet.  Door anchor is fabulous.

As most exercise products, these were used a few times, and stored away in the bag for a few months. I took them out to start using them again after a car accident has kept me off the free weights, and the bands are starting to discolor and fade. Makes me nervous that the integrity of the rubber is weakening...

I got this band set to do PT from back and shoulder surgery.  These bands are great, many different uses and resistances.  Very durable and nice case comes along with it.  I would definitely recommend these.  5 Stars!
summary: Fantastic Resistance Band set for PT

reviewText: This set of bands is well constructed and easy to use. The handles are very comfortable and the clips on the bands attach easily. The ability to combine various bands makes the set very versatile.

Used another brand for about two months and ended up returning them as the bands and handles broke.Found the Black Mountain Products to be made for what they are intended to be used for.On the days that I can't make it to the gym, they work for me just fine.  Great product...

I've been using these bands for p90x workouts.  The combination of multiple bands together (red + black + green) gives plenty of resistance.  All the components are good quality, and the included door anchor is great.  Couldn't be happier with this purchase, exactly what I was looking for.  Plus, I feel good about supporting a family business here in the States, instead of getting imported price point product.
This Band set is Very Heavy Duty and feels very good in the hands.  I can see these lasting years of daily use!
summary: Best set of bands ever had.

reviewText: This is great product. I do P90X and it works perfectly with the workouts. These are also light and easy to travel with, perfect for small hotel rooms. The door attachment is also nice and doesn't ruin the paint on the door frame. I would recommend to anyone. Easy to use and inexpensive.
summary: Nice and easy to travel with

reviewText: I purchased ten sets for people in a voluntary health/wellness/exercise program. Since we also have light free weights, I wasn't sure if the bands would be used by participants, or would just gather dust. I also had more experience with the rubber strips which have the advantage of being very inexpensive. Unfortunately, they are not at all durable and hard to grip for some people.In fact, the bands became the most frequently used pieces of equipment in our program, exceeding the use of our weight sets. I receive positive comments about them, and some people who are not exercisers are nonetheless motivated to use the bands. The included ankle straps have come in handy.Now that I have used these bands for a while, I am pleased with their durability and quality construction. None has been damaged, and certainly none has snapped. The bands are guaranteed for life, which is great, and customer service states that the bands don't snap without clear signs of fraying first, an important safety consideration.So basically I'm pretty well satisfied.

reviewerName: Bob of all trades "Does a bit of everything"
reviewText: This package is extremely useful.  It is well designed, with the caribiner-type clips making it easy to change bands, and the handles and door anchor work fine.  I am using it on travel to replace the Bowflex machinery I have at home, and it serves very well.  There is nothing I would change about this system - if you need something like this, give this one a try.And - customer service is the best!
summary: Great Exercise System - Best Customer Service

reviewText: I had a habit of injuring my rhomboid muscle and ended up in 3 weeks of physical therapy.  One of the devices used by the therapist was resistance bands.  I wanted to buy the same system.  It was almost $900!!  I found the Black Mountain Product on Amazon and immediately ordered it. The product worked great.... No more back pain....and I didn't spend $900.I highly recommend the product.
I work two jobs and only have a short amount of time inbetween. Therefore this works great, as my truck becomes my gym and I can work out any time I can

I recently purchased these bands looking for something that would be cost effective and be able to perform a variety of exercises. I must say I am impressed with the versatility and quality of this set. They are well constructed, inlcude a band for every level/type of workout,the hamdles are very comfortable, and the set was very affordable. I am considering purchasing an extra set.
summary: Great Product at a Great Price!

reviewText: Nice set. Seems to be sturdy enough for me. Comes with everything you really need. The price was good, and I think I got a good value.
summary: A nice way to get my physical therapy.

reviewText: I purchased a set to use with T25, and I love them.  Very simple to change the resistance bands to increase or decrease resistance.  I have already recommended them to a few friends.  I do wish they were a tad bit longer.  Awesome quality and great customer support when you call BMP.

This product is great for those who want a good workout band for at home or on the go.  This company is top class and very helpful if you ever need to contact them.  The 90-day warranty cannot be beat!  I bought this item and within two days bought their pull up bar.

These resistance bands are an excellent value. Easy to use and sturdy, I've used them for several months for my P90X workouts. It takes just seconds to switch between the bands, and the carrying case is also very useful.
This product works even better than they said. Makes for a quick fast burn exercise. And the little exercise book they send with it help to start out so you can see how many ways it can be used.

I received the bands as a gift along with a video, about 3 weeks ago. They work well, are very convenient to travel with, and appear to be of a good quality. Everything is as promised, and I'm pleased with the results.

I'm no "strong man," but I do okay with strength training at home.  (300 lb squat, 320 lb deadlift x 5, 190 lb bench press...so far)  I bought these resistance bands to warm up my shoulders before heavy lifting and to allow my wife and kids to do assisted chin-ups.  They work for those tasks quite well, but they surprised me by how useful they are for "assistance" exercises like hamstring curls and glute extensions that I would otherwise need gym equipment (cable system) to perform.  (OK, maybe not a heavy lat pull-down, but chin-ups or assisted chin-ups if you must are much better anyway.)  If you put both handles in one hand, you can approximate a "fat bar" dumbbell to build grip strength.  These bands provide all of the resistance I need for non-barbell assistance lifts.  Seriously.  The benefits when traveling are obvious, which is another reason I bought them.OK, so this is an endorsement for resistance bands in general so far.  I will say without reservation that my Black Mountain bands are very well made, as are the handles, ankle strap, and anchor, and they are easy (and fun!) to use/clip/unclip.  The price is fantastic.  The lifetime guarantee is nice, too.I was initially disappointed that there was only one ankle strap, but you only really need one for standing glute work.  (Leave it loose enough to slide your foot in and out to avoid clipping/unclipping.)  And it's big enough that I can secure it around both ankles for hamstring curls if I wish.  I've found it to be a non-issue, and at the modest price I paid, I have only praise.As I write this evaluation, my children (5 and 7) are doing overhead presses with the blue band, making their papa proud...under his careful supervision, of course.
