I always bring these with me while travelling. They are so light and can be used anywhere. The quality make it useful for day to day usage and with so many bands of resistance, I would imagine a good fit for any user.

I received the B.M.P. resistance band set a few days ago. After a few uses I am impressed with the quality and am very happy with my choice to go with B.M.P. over other well-known and overpriced resistance bands. The removable handles are convenient  and makes it easy to quickly adjust the resistance by simply attaching another band to the handles. Overall a great product I would buy again without hesitation.
I loved these bands because of the ease of use and the product quality. You can instantly feel the high quality of these bands and it compares very well to more expensive brands.

I have been using these bands for two weeks everyday now in conjunction with P90x and they are a great addition to the workout program. They have shown no sign of wear and are well constructed. I would definitely buy a Black Mountain product again in the future!
summary: These resistance bands are second to none!

reviewText: i found this kit to be well equipped and when i had a small problem with the one handle BMP was very prompt to respond and fix the problem. Black mountain products is good stuff and will be using them in the future. thank you BMP

I recently purchased this set of resistance band in order for me to use them with the insanity asylum/p90x hybrid.  while other people were complaining about how cheap they were and how they break, they seem to be holding up pretty well for me.... for now. We'll see how it goes as i continue to do the workout!
Great price on these straps. I love having all the different levels of strength. Much cheaper than buying them individually. Well made. No complaints here..

I recently gave up gym membership and was looking for something I could do at home.  I love the bands.  I am 5'7" so they fit well. It came with some workout routines but I went on the Internet and found more.  Great way to get strength training at home without buying a ton of weights.
These resistance bands are excellent quality and I have had no problems.  I would recommend them to everyone. The exercises could be a little more in depth tho

These seem to be in great order upon arrival.  Everything is here and came swiftly using prime.  So far as I can tell the customer service is great because they are seeking positive comments on this site to recieve the illusive orange band.  So all in all this is a forced review to help a smart marketing team over at B.M.P.
Been using the cables for about a week in conjunction with P90X and is easier than switching out weights on dumbbells.

i usually work out in the gym with heavy weights in front of a big mirror so I can see myself get huge....but I bought these things for my wife.  One day while she was working out I decided to try them out and I have to say....not too shabby, I got a deep burn in my thigh but its worth it if you want to look good for beach season. resistance bands sound a little sissy so I call them chuck Norris dental floss and It makes me feel better about using them and I should know what a good work out consists of, I was on my high school football team, although I work at long john silvers.  Bottom line, good product if you haven't realized yet I am joking....just trying to be humorous.  but it is a good product, give it a try, I don't think you'll regret it.

Personally, I don't think Resistance Bands get enough good press.  If your wanting to tone, trim, and sculpt your physic, rehab injuries...this band set will do it!  Pay a annual membership to a gym or spend $30 one time.  Your choice!  Worth every penny!
summary: Quality product for Quality workout, CHEAP!

reviewText: I want to say these are really nice quality and they will do any job you have in mind for a band. I like how you can add them together to increase the weight resistence. I would recommend them to a friend, the customer service is great, and they are exactly what I was looking for. The only reason I gave them a 4 out of 5 stars is because the foam on the handles was a little messed up but I can live with it. Go with these bands, you will love them!!

I bought these for use at home with programs such as t25, p90x, etc etc. They definitely get the job done and are a lot cheaper than having a bunch of dumbbells at home.They would not be great for any serious weight training, real weights and dumbbells would be best there, but these are one of the best solutions at home with out a dedicated gym.

I've had these just about a week. The quality is excellent and exceeded expectations.  It's very easy to change out the handles from band to band, and equally easy to combine bands to give different resitances.  I've tried out the ankle strap and door support and both are good quality, and easy to use.  The quality level for the price is great.  These cost me about the same as one co-pay at the physical therapy center!!It's also very nice to have this much excercise equipment fit into a tiny case.I can't predict how long the bands themselves will last under daily use ... i hope to return to this review in 6 months to let you know how things are going.
summary: Great quality for Price, and Very Easy to Use

reviewText: I have used these a few times so far for mock pull ups with P90X3.  I have 3 bands hooked together and they give great resistance and feel very sturdy with the door anchor.

Awesome quality and customer service. When I called for the free band they said if a band breaks they will replace it for life. I just wish the free band didn't come with the handles built on. Nevertheless, still free and awesome. I recommend this to everyone!

Purchased these bands because I have a job that requires constant travel.  I was skeptical at first being a person that for years has only used the gym, but decided to go ahead and give it a shot because they were so cheap.  After using them, I must say that these exercise bands are a great, cheap and effective way to have weights that you can easily take with you wherever you go.  My job requires me to stay in hotels often far from any gym so dumbbells are pretty much out of the question in these circumstances.  These bands give a wide range of resistance and also are able to give me different options of doing various workouts or hitting different body parts.  Now I'm able to take these wherever I travel and get a full body workout in any location I may find myself in.

I have to say that I am very pleased with this product. I love the fact that you can stack these for more resistance. I originally bought these as a pullup substitute for P90X because I don't have a suitable doorway for a pullup bar in my apartment and have continued to use them with Tapout XT. A few of the bands have broken but that is to be expected especially since I put them through what I would consider heavy use but they lasted a good amount of time for the abuse that I put them through. I just bought my second set of these and will continue to buy them in the future as needed. A geat product in my opinion.

As the shoulders get more miles on them I've been finding in more difficult to train.  I opted to give resistance training a try and the B.M.P. five band set appeared to be good way to go.  After the first four days of training I'm very pleased with the progress.  The muscles and other support tissues are getting their work in, but my problematic shoulder joint is feeling no worse for wear.  I've contacted the B.M.P. staff and they too were friendly and helpful.

I am using these bands for P90X and they work GREAT! There are a lot of complaints for bands (these bands included) about tears in bands. If that happens, contact customer support. I got my band replaced for free and it arrived 3 days later. Customer support is AWESOME. Wear and tear WILL happen even when used properly.For my next run at P90X, I'm going to add in the orange and purple bands for that extra range of weight! Great product, great support.
Great product for a great price! Comes in a nice bag that would be easy to pack. Would definitely buy again.

Great kit. This has all you need making workouts on the road easy. I did have one band break, Black Mountain had a new band out to me in no time. Changing out bands is quick and easy. Love the product.

I bought these initially for working up to a pull up because I wanted to tackle the 7 Weeks to 50 Pull-ups Program and found that this set is perfect for everything else I wanted to do aside from that.I recently took these on a vacation where I couldn't be sure what their gym facilities were like and it was very convenient.Light weight, durable, and no tears so far, if you're considering buying them, just do it. They're well worth the cost and convenience
summary: Well worth it for Travel Exercise

reviewText: Bands are good quality and work pretty well. Since I haven't used resistance bands before some more fool-proof instructions would be nice, but the product itself is great!

Good for those small exercises that one can't do with freeweights. I use it for slight rehab on a knee. It's perfect for that. With the door stoppers you can get angles that really help (if you have old joints). Of course it's all very light, so I can't see doing anything heavy (for those looking for something to supplement freeweights, such as wrapping around barbells when doing squats and so forth) with these, but they're good so far and seem to be made to last.

I feel the cables/rubber bands are very very long, its makes certain exercises very difficult and or even impossible if your not taller than 6ft. Other than that the product is great.  I recommamend them.

Perfect for stretching and light weight work to increase my mobility and balance and strength to, hopefully, help improve my golf swing.I especially like the ability to use the clips at the ends of the bands to clip more than one to the handles to increase the weight being used.

I'm 68 yrs old and wanted to begin an exercise program that would help me keep fit, and at the same time be cost effective and not take up a lot of space.  This band set does the trick.  I enjoy using it.
summary: I think the bands are great.

reviewText: This is exactly what I was wanting.  Well made, in a pouch I can carry traveling.  The instructions are pretty basic but I know how I want to use this product.
summary: Excellent product.  Exactly what I was wanting.

reviewText: These bands are a great addition to any workout routine in place of some more expensive dumbbells.  Being able to mix and match the bands lets you get the right amount of resistance.  I haven't tried the door anchor, but I took an eye hook and screwed it into an overhead beam in my basement and added a carbiner clip.  It works great for pull-ups, chin-ups, shoulders, and back.  It's great to have so many options in one small package.
These bands are great. I really like the removable handles vs. fixed handle bands. The orange band promotion is great too. I got mine the day after I called.

I've read through many of the lower rated reviews and they seem to indicate problems mostly arise from individual band defects, not a defect of the entire line. I've used these for several weeks now and see no problems. Everything is working great and it's an effective workout. Plus from what I've heard of the customer service and the lifetime warranty, I'm optimistic that if I have problems down the line they will be corrected by the company. I'd highly recommend buying this product.

I got these for Christmas as a gift and they are a great addition to my home gym. I anticipate using them primarily for shoulders, biceps, and triceps workouts. They seem sturdy, but I am sure they will begin to wear out over time. I cannot imagine a resistance band that will stay in perfect condition forever. They come with a list of exercises which is convenient for getting new ideas for workouts. Also, I don't typically spend a lot of time reviewing products, but they offered a free orange band with a review and that seemed like a good deal to me. It only takes a few minutes to write a review and they are going to send out a whole new strap.

We recently purchased these bands to use with P90X. This is a great product at a very good price. Quality construction using quality materials. The bands stand up well to the rigourous demands of P90X. I would highly recommend this resistance bands set.

I have always taken care of my physique with great detail. I travel for work a lot so taking weights with me everywhere I go gets tiresome. I use these on my travels and they are lightweight and small enough to stuff into any luggage with no problem. I have been doing p90x and they are great for the workouts.  I recommend these bands to anyone who is looking to tone specific parts of their body without the hassle of having to use heavy weights. I use them in the comfort of my own home and when I'm in a hurry and don't have time to go to the gym. I bought a second set as well with individual handles for variety purposes. I highly recommend everyone wanting to start a new workout routine and tone up to use them as well as the more seasoned athletes who need to stay fit and in tip top shape. Best bargain for great product!!  I'm super happy.
summary: Amazing bands at incredible price.  Bought a second set as well.

reviewText: You can do a full body workout with these. Resistance training is an awesome way to get in shape and these help you get there!

These resistance bands are a great tool for home workouts.  We're paddlers, and I wanted something that I could use for strengthening my rotator cuffs in the winter.  So far they're great...I bought a set for each of the family!  My only concern is that where the bands go through the loop for the door jam, it is pinching the band.  So far no problems, but I've only had them for a couple of months.  I'd definitely recommend getting a set!

I am currently doing P90X and this band kit is perfect for what i am using it for.  Its a very high quality band and havent have any problems with it so far for the excercises that i am preforming.  Also this company has a very good customer service department that will help you with any questions you may have.

Once these bands arrived, I put them to work right away. Usually I'm a weights person, but travel a lot and wanted these to use with 90X. They work great and come with a travel case. Good product and the price is right.

Don't buy this. My set had little tears and imperfections in the bands. It says to contact them about those things and I did. They said give us a shipping address and they ship me a new set. Never happened. I'm still waiting to hear back from them about this new set. To the bands: it seemed as my set had been used. There were tears and little bits of plastic sticking out of all of the bands. Then one of the outer rings on the backed cracked and broke. And I didn't every get a door hanger or ankle strap... Still waiting on that new set too...

The bands work well.  I especially like the ability to add multiple bands to increase the resistance.  This allows for the ability to have greater resistance without having multiple "fixed" bands. The entire set is very portable and good for travel.  I have used the door anchor and it works well without problems.  The bands themselves seem durable.For my needs a set with heavier bands would be nice.  I don't really use the lightest bands. All in all, this is a solid set and I am happy with my purchase.  Stronger folks may want to purchase another heavy band to add to this set.
Arrived timely.  Excellent  quality materials and metal work.  Instructions could be better, are fairly obvious.  Perfect for the very low price.
Upon opening, it looks like a Boston Strangler's equipment kit. Seriously...they are perfect for all around resistance rehab or training. Workable for retired folks, too.
Can't beat the price for these bands. Comes with five bands from light to heavy. Can stack the bands to add more resistance.  Well made and well worth the money.
You get exactly what you expect.  I think I would like to mount these to a wall or door as I believe it will work better.  But works well for my P90X.
Only thing bad about it is that it smells like like what it is made out of, but it was to be expected.I was really surprised of the total resistance you get when using all 5 bands

I admit I'm not an exercise buff at all - so I thought I'd start lite with these. So far so good. Definitely quality, and I no longer fear they will snap and rip my anatomy off during a poorly executed yoga pose. :)Clearly I'm no expert. But they seem like they'll do exactly what they are meant to, and last a good long while. The door anchor is well constructed and the bands are definitely enforced well. I do long for the day they stop smelling like a hospital (latex/rubber scented), but that cannot be half as bad as winding up in one because you got an inferior product. ;)Enjoy 'em. Cheers.
This is a perfect set to keep packed up for when you are traveling.  They don't take up too much room and if you know what to do with them you can get a complete work out no matter where you are.

Haven't been using it too long, but loving the variety that it adds to my home workout routine. Seeming quality product, although the door bearing is a bit flimsy, probably going to make my own that won't snap out with a good tug.

As a father who has to watch the baby as my wife works and vice versa. These get the job done for a stay at home work out. Granted I have to mix and match bands for a good tension, but that's what its made for.
I use these bands whenever we go travelling, and I need to take my gym with me. They seem very durable so far, and I can honestly say that I highly recommend them.

I am really impressed with the quality and ease of use of these resistance bands.  The individual pieces are well designed, the clips are of high quality, and the bands are sturdy.  I love that it's easy to change the bands quickly during workout and the door adapter is easy to use.  I especially love that all the items fit nicely into a bag :  Highly recommended!!
summary: High quality and easy to use set of resistance bands

reviewText: These are great.  The bands are strong, and the ankle loop allows me to do a variety of leg lifts and swings, in addition to the lunges and squats that I can hold onto the handles for.  The variety of exercises that these allow is tremendous.  The door anchor is very strong and secure -- if you use it properly on the hinge side of the door, there's no reason that it should every come out.  I also like that it's a family-owned business and that the product comes with a brief exercise guide (more exercises are also explained through the company website).
Easy to assemble and easy to use - I am happy.  This was a good purchase, I'd recommend getting this.

I purchased this to strengthen myself after a car accident and my physical therapy has finished. I have been using these for about 6 weeks and I have found this is better quality than others I have used. The bands have very good resistance.

I bought these bands for my 90X workouts and they work great. They have a good variety of resistances and can be mixed and matched together to fill the in-between weight gaps. The handles are soft on your hands yet they are still sturdy. It comes with extra handles that you can strap to doors or furniture for positions. The carrying case comes in handy too, it is made of a good material that will last. The only thing I wish is that these bands came with an extra set of handles, but that is only because when switching bands back and forth mid workout I don't like to have pauses to switch the handles around. That being said Black Mountain does sell additional handle sets for around $8 last I checked and the handles do clip on very easily.
summary: A great set of workout bands

reviewText: There are almost unending ways to utilize this great product from stretching soar muscles to ripping your abs. No matter how weak or strong you are these workout bands would make a great addition to your fitness collection. Affordable too =D. I bought these as a gift for my mum but I use them too.
summary: Everything you see fits nicely in the bag

reviewText: Very hsoop. Never used bands before but works great.Very easy to use and do not take lots of space.Can definately recommend this product.
amazing company, amazing bands, amazing customer serivce!!!excellent work out product. simple, easy , affordable!!!i love it great change from free weights
Excelent to work out AT home but already need more resistance lol
This item was recommended to me by my exercise instructer.  I found it to be really great quality and it will be a favorite of yours!

I bought this since I am disabled and it can help me exercise while sitting and and in my wheel chair.  I look forward to using your great product to help me get stronger.  They were recommended by my PT and neuro surgeon.  I have already tried them and love it.
summary: Black Mountain Product resistance band set.

reviewText: Since December of last year, my mission was to lose weight.  Starting weight was 277 lbs.  6 months later, I down to 203.  I lost the weight by eating healthy and I took up running.  Now that I'm nearing my target weight, I decided that I wanted to start lifting to tone things up a bit.  Considering that I have 3 kids at home, I don't have time to go to the gym and I don't want to be locked away in the basement hitting the weights while the kids are left alone.  After doing some research, Black Mountain always came to the forefront of the rest.  The minute I opened the bag, I immediately noticed the quality.  Everything from the bands to the carabiners.  These bands are meant to last (if taken care of and directions followed). I try and work out on my off days from running. These bands just make things easier and it makes me want to work out.  I now have a gym in a bag that I can use pretty much anywhere.  I'll be taking the kit on vacation with me next month.  The best thing is that I can work out, still be in eyesight of my kids and also not worrying that my kids are going to drop heavy weights on their feet.  If I could give these bands 10 stars I would. Great product you've got here!!!

I am using these occasionally, and they have held up really well to the abuse I have dished out to them. There appears to be no tears, breaks, flaws, etc in the materials, they are well made. I recommend this to anyone.
These bands were a better quality than I expected. The quality, the price, the service was all 5 star. However I find the feed backs required somewhat confusing

These bands are really great, I do not mind changing bands on the handle and they are what I needed. My trainer has me working out with different resistance in the gym so these where great for my home gym to help build strength!

I bought these for my husband in March of 2012 to use with P90X. He used them for one full session of P90X and started to use it for another session of P90X recently. Right out of the bag the clip that holds the bands to the handle broke on the black band.  And since then 2 more bands have snapped in two. They are used on a smooth, rubber surface or looped over a pull up bar.  Always stored in the original bag.

This is a terrific product recommended by my physical therapist. It is well designed! Light, strong, flexible use, easy to use in small space, quiet, well marked, great storage bag, easy to transport! Great price. Works really well! Clear weight equivalent description included. Simple exercise instructions. Bought a book for more exercise descriptions. Much more economical and flexible setup choices than Spry bands I bought previously.

We just got our new resistance bands in the mail and have used them a couple of times.  They seem to be very good quality.  We will be ordering another set of handles (only $5.99) so more than one person can use them at once.  Customer service was also very friendly.

These bands come with a full lifetime warranty and they mean it.  I have been using these bands for 1 1/2 years with no problems what so ever and I love them, but as you know nothing lasts forever.  I had a handle start to split after all this time of P-90X abuse and I called today and they are sending another to me free of charge, also, after talking to the owner of this fine company he had me inspect the bands and they are just starting to fray so he is sending me two new ones.  This is truly great customer service!!!  I am sad to hear a couple of the bad reviews on these as these have lasted me a year and a half with no problems.  These bands have to be checked often for any spots or fraying and if you ever have any problems call these guys they are great!  I am buying any future workout equipment from this company!

After having had these bands for a couple of weeks, I can attest to their quality. Compared with others I've used, the build quality is excellent and solid. The accessories are well made. I had a question about the warranty, and was able to speak with a customer service representative in minutes, and he was helpful and friendly. I really don't think you could do better for anywhere near the price. Nice job.
These bands are a lot sturdier than most. Great cushion on handles. Great versatility with swapping and mixing bands. Highly Recommend.
You get all the bang for your buck! It's a great kit that's worth the money. I would suggest it to a friend and have purchased this for friends.

hi I bought this band a while back. I used it with XT Tapout. The handle is made of plastic can be fragile. I snapped one of the handle accidentally and cracked. Other than that, it's still manageable.
I got this a few days ago and started using them as a step into heavier workouts, and found them to be very appropriate. Time will tell about wear and tear but for now, they work just fine.

These bands work great and this set is really nice. You can use one independently or combine for a higher "weight". The carabiners are metal and thus won't break easily through constant use with either the ankle and door accessories or the handles. The instruction book is a little sparse on exercises but they do indicate the approximate weight you are lifting which is helpful if you need to add or reduce the resistance. The bag is nice and stores all the bands nicely so you can keep everything in one spot.I would recommend this product to anyone looking to increase their resistance or weight for building muscle or increasing their lean muscle mass. Girls, don't worry you won't become the Hulk.BMP also has friendly and helpful customer service. Plus, if you get this set and give them a call you get a free orange band which is a step up from the red band.

How much can I say - they are well built and of good quality.  I only wish they had come with two pairs of handles so that my husband could use them at the same time (since he is stronger than me and would always be using a different resistance than me anyways).  But I did see that I can buy a pair separately, which I will due.  Recommend!
summary: So far well built and good quality

reviewText: Purchased this item in hopes of getting trim and fit. So far this product has exceeding my wishes. This item has allowed me to trim my waist, reduce my love handles, and starting to get toned. This item is worth the money if used properly and you should achieve your desired results.

Shipping was quick - these were on back order and I got them DAYS before they were supposed to arrive - bands work great and the anchor for the door is easy to set up and take down - i like that you can double them up to make the weight heavier --
works well and comes with alot of extra stuff a good workout for limited space and if you travel. 15min and you can feel your heart rate climb and a good sweat if used right

My daughter is a fitness expert for a living and I an a runner for exercise and sanity. She got me the bands for Christmas since I needed to supplement my running with some resistance training. So far I have enjoyed the diversion from only running and the bands are sturdy and work well. I like the fact that there are different weights and that you can combine them for more or less resistance. The bag is great to keep everything together and so far I have been very pleased with the product. I am not a big person that does a lot of weight lifting, so someone else may feel differently, but for me there is plenty of resistance. The door anchor and ankle strap are great to have also.
I would like to have slightly larger handles in order to avoid hurting my hands but these bands are very good for the price that I paid.

Over the summer, I managed to damage my shoulder muscles as a result of pushing my body too much. As a result, my muscles became very weak and I needed physical therapy/ mild workouts to strengthen the muscles again. However, as a full time college student, I do not always have the time to go to the gym, which was about 20 minutes away. So, I purchased these bands and has been using them ever since. The bands are great. They feel solid. For a price of under $40, I do not believe that you can find a better package of bands anywhere else. Lastly, the company that sells these bands also have amazing customer service. It is nice to know that company cares about their customers.
very fast shipping, does everything it says, customer service is perfect.i only wish they had more bands lol. but other than that i would recommend this product to everyone
Yeah you still have to use these things to make the program work.  It didn't work by putting it under my pillow.

When time constraints forced me to cut back on gym time, I looked for alternatives.  I found the Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set more than met my need.First by altering the tension or by using more than 2 bands at a time I was able to approximate the resistance and exertion of standard weights and machines.  By either standing on the bands or by using the door anchor I was able to duplicate all the exercises done with weights and resistance machines both in the contraction and release phases.Secondly the bands are very durable to date.  I have used the bands on a regular basis for three months without evidence of fraying or damage.In addition the bands are highly portable and fit into a small bag.  I have used them in my house, office and on the road.Finally the Black Mountain company is very user friendly and cooperative.  I had occasion to call them and they were quick to answer my questions.  The company is a family owned enterprise and they are more than willing to help their customers. In the package, there was a coupon for a free extra orange band which is even a larger gauge than the red 25 to 30 pound band.  This certainly attests to the willingness of the company to work with their customers.

I am a distance runner. I ordered these with the purpose to use to strengthen my hips after having many problems with my hips. They are great for hips, but also for all sorts of other exercises. Perfect alternative to heavy dumbbells which only have specific uses. Great product for only 30 bucks. Definitely suggest. VERY portable. You can take them with you whenever you travel.
Compact and easy to use for anyone. Work great! And take very little space to store. Very versatile. Definitely recommended.
summary: Compact and easy to use for anyone

reviewText: I just figured out how the door anchor piece works. It is quite convenient and flexible.The foot strap can also be used as an anchor to wrap around a pole.
Great quality. Exactly what I was looking for in a resistance band set. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
My green band broke prematurely after only 10 workouts. Overall the equipment is great but the bands should last longer than that.

Using these for P90X3, and by and large they're pretty good. My only complaint is that the bands are not high-resistance enough. Even if I put the top two together, it's still not much of a workout. Putting three together is cumbersome.Other than that, they work great, and the bag is very handy.

I must say the durability of these bands are very good. Im currently training with a MMA/Muay Thai fighter and our work outs are pretty intense, so far through 10 full blown work outs, no snapping or signs of wear. On top of that they send me a 35-40lb band (orange) for free by just callin in. The other resistance band kits for that weight cause $10 dollars. Overall i must say this product has exceeded my expectations, and with any faults im sure customer service will aim to please.

I brought these as an alternative to weight training for my female clients, and for myself when travelling. I was very disappointed when the red band pop it came right out of the hole, while doing a basic shoulder press they should consider better reinforcements to keep the bands lock in the hole. Will not recommend these to my fellow trainers.

I purchased these resistance bands on August 31st, and got them shortly thereafter in the mail (it was free supersaver shipping, so while it wasnt the most expedient, they showed up at my door in just over a week). I'd been conflicted between getting these or the Bodylastics, and decided to go with these, and having had the opportunity to use them, I have no regrets with my purchase.These resistance bands are very well made, and so far, they have met and exceeded my expectations and taken everything I've thrown at them. I love that I can stack them and work my biceps/triceps, or use them to work my quads and other leg muscles (although I've most been using them for golf exercises, for which they are excellent IMO!)I hope my review helps someone who is on the fence. Give these a go, I've been very happy with them

I have been using the product for about a month.  The bands themselves preform well and appear to be made of good materials.  The handles are comfortable.  the clips are easy to use and appear to be a good quality for everyday personal use.  Generally I find this to be a very good product for everyday personal use.

I say decent shipping because of the bad weather north of me in indy it got delayed 2 days but its understandable.  I got them and love them used them and they are strong.  I would recommend this to the next person that clicks through amazon looking for a great deal for a great product.
summary: Great for the price and decent shipping

reviewText: Great for building strength, toning or rehab.  The set allows for so many things, I have been using them for my rotator cuff and they are great.  I have also used them for some chest flies and adding a few together provides enough tension for toning.  The handles easily connect with very high quality clips.  Best bands I have used.
These work well in our corporate gym. I love how you can easily up resistance by adding multiple bands. Time will tell how long they last, but at this point we would definitely re-order these.
summary: exactly what we were looking for

reviewText: product came with everything i needed. The bands offer plenty of resistance. I particularly enjoy the door jam holder. Lets me hit every angle. highly recommended.

I'm just starting to work out again after being a bum for a while. This is my first time using bands, and so far I love them! You can work your muscles from angles not possible with free weights or machines. They're much cheaper then the equivalent weight in free weights. They also weigh next to nothing and take up very little space for the amount of resistance they provide. I got a set of Powerblocks too, which I used in the past, but I'm thinking I'm going to be using these much more.
summary: Great bands at a great price

reviewText: This is a really useful tool for bodybuilders and average fitness enthusiasts alike. I recommend buying 2 sets to offer a wider array of exercises with more resistance if you're seeking a more effective workout.

These bands offer portability and an excellent variety of exercises.  I've used these for almost a month and have found the quality to be excellent.  They're perfect for travel, and I can replicate many gym exercises with the bands, door anchor and handles.  Note that the set does not come with an orange band, but combining the others can provide significant resistance.  The company included a note with a customer service number, which gives me confidence that they will be willing to resolve any issues I may have, although I don't foresee that happening.

You can do just about any resistance band exercise you want with this set.  It is very easy to add or take away the different bands for varied resistance. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great set.

I'm a professional personal trainer and have been training people for over 20 years and I've used all different types of resistance bands over the years. I just wanted to say that I've compared the BMP bands with other resistance band products I've used and these bands are definitely more superior in both quality and strength.I also train with them myself, and enjoy the interchangeability of the bands, (it's more convenient for my clients when doing circuit training). I'm not really nervous that some part of the band is going to break if I'm hard on them, mainly because I've gone through literally hundreds of resistance bands over the years and BMP bands are by far the most durable I've had the chance to work with.I know their only rubber and rubber doesn't last forever, it just like anything else has a resistance threshold especially being used as much as I use them, but for the price their fantastic. I recommend these bands to all of my clients for traveling purposes and every day workouts.I feel that the design overall is tremendously better and being able to stack the bands on one handle creates a great workout not only for me, but my clients as well, A BIG PLUS. I also like the extras that are included in the package like the ankle strap and door anker, you don't get those with a lot of other packages and if you do, you have to pay more in order to get them most of the time.I even called BMP to drill down on their product even more because I believe in getting what I pay for and the customer service was impeccable. They answered all my questions, they were very personable and were extremely helpful. That's what impressed me the most, hence why I'm writing this.All-in-All, I'm really happy with my purchase and would recommend BMP bands to others and would also recommend them if you're planning on using bands for high intensity workouts such as the P90X program, aerobics classes and other circuit training exercises like I perform with my clients. You can't go wrong!
summary: Smartest Purchase I've Made In Years!

reviewText: Although I have a very extensive list of quality home gym equipment, travel has always  been problematic. most of my equipment pieces are close to immovable. These bands are of excellent quality and can be used to create a wide ranging resistance, singly or in combination, and I can get a great workout, home or away.  As one who has always had very expensive, club-quality gear, I honestly view this as one of my wisest purchases.

I bought these bands to do P90X and I think they work great. The bands offer a nice alternative to standard lifting weights. They're easily portable and travel very nicely with the bag it comes with. The handles are comfortable and I love how the bands use fastening clips. That way you can adjust the resistance very quickly. The door strap is also nice for something to pull against, this is used in P90X for those of us who don't have a pull-up bar. Overall a good product that I would recommend.

I have been using the resistance bands to do P90x for 2 months now. So far they seem to be working well. They are strong bands and can handle the amount of pulling you do in P90x. I bought them because I could not afford to buy free weights and I needed something to be able to do the workout. They work well and give a good amount of resistance to feel a burn. I like how easy it is to get more resistance, all you have to do is make a bigger loop in the band leaving less to pull. I would recommend these bands to anyone that cannot afford to buy weights or is looking to save money. They are easily worth the amount spent on them.
Use these for my P90x workout.  Hardest part is getting the resistance right for your workout and making rapid changes (removingor adding) bands.  Overall these have held up well.

The Door Anchor broke with the first use and now I'm a little afraid to use itagain. I don't want to flip that thing into my face. That could really ruin my day I think. Maybe I should give it to my Mother in Law and let her test it first:)  Hopefully the other parts will last longer.
summary: Door Anchor broken with first use

reviewText: I have been using these bands for my rotator cuff exercises for the past year and they work, I have had no issues.

After finishing physical therapy for my shoulder, I was looking to buy a set of comparable bands to what they had at my clinic. Man, I was very surprised when these extremely high quality bands and accessories showed up. The rubber itself is very high quality and the clips and clasps are all very smartly engineered. I'm extremely happy with this set, and will be able to enhance my home regiment using them.
summary: High quality set of home resistance bands

reviewText: I have started to do more travelling for work and at most hotels they don't have access to much resistance training equipment. These bands are nice and compact and easily fit in my travel bag. This has been very useful in providing some sort of resistance training I can do while on travel. Of course they have their limits but BMP has made a quality product and my experience so far with their customer service has been great. I would recommend this product to others.
I bought this resistance band set for my husband and he likes it.  He travels a lot for work and wanted something that he could bring on the road with him and these are perfect.

My sister ordered this product for me several months ago and I have to say that it was the perfect gift. My work schedule forces me to travel a lot, so it is difficult to consistently work out. These resistance bands have solved that problem. They are lightweight and easy to carry around in my luggage. The accompanying pamphlet provides a variety of different strength exercises that imitate many of the exercises I do at the gym. It comes with bands of different weight values so it is extremely easy to adjust and work with. I definitely recommend this product.

I was looking for some resistance bands to start a functional training program.  I had been using weights, but I kept getting nagging injuries.  Now I'm using the bands and so far, so good.  This product seems to be well made.  I think I need only the top band for most of my workout because I already have strength and weight.  I probably didn't need the whole set, but perhaps I can share it with a member of the household.

Compared to other brands, where each band is its own resistance, here you can combine multiple bands to increase your resistance as you need it. That was a huge plus for me. The little accessories like the detachable ankle strap and door anchor are great add ons, and on top of that there is a nice little bag to keep them all organized.I have just had them for a short period of time, but look forward to using them alot.

I have used numerous bands, like rip cord, ones they have at the physical therapy office, and others. By far these are the best i have used. They are easy to clip on and off. They are extremely strong. The handles don't dig into your hands. I would recommended theses to anyone who wants to work out with resistance bands.

After receiving these bands and using them, I like them very much. They are easy to use, very flexible and all the products look like they were made with good materials. While using them, I noticed that the bands were very strong and did not show the slightest sign of ripping or tearing which is very important for a product like this. Overall these bands are one of the greatest if not the greatest set out there.
High quality bands, been using daily for several months.  Lots of different tension options.  Everything feels really sturdy.  Would recommend.
I started using this product for PT when my back was bad and it was a lot better than free weights if you're looking to get tone and improve your body!!! I really love these- Michigan Resident

This product does exactly what it is supposed to do. The bands and handles are a breeze to change out and offer plenty of resistance when combined together. I would say they were of professional quality.So what's not to like? I would have preferred rubberized handles vs. the foam. I feel they last longer and don't soak up sweat a much. My only other suggestion is related to the carrying pouch. It is a nice addition, but I would have preferred a nylon mesh type with a draw string, again for longevity and ventilation.Overall I am satisfied with my purchase and would recommend them to friends and family.
The Bands are GREAT, the grips not so much. They are made quite cheaply. Mine broke shortly after my purchase. I ended up making my own. Bands still hold strong.

Bought these to use with P90X3. Travel a lot for business so needed something sturdy that could pack and carry easily in my suitcase and these do exactly that. Well built, quality and provide nice resistance. Hook up very easily to doors. Would absolutely recommend to anyone.

I bought this for p90x. It's good because I don't have a gym near me and I don't have the money/space for a weight set. Pair this with a door gym and some push up bars and you're good to go. I've been using them for about a month. These are great bands with strong comfortable grips. I've used plain bands and gold's gym ones before. These are much better. My only gripe is that the carabiner clips can have sharp edges. I've nicked myself switching bands in a hurry. It doesn't affect my rating. These are the best bands I've used, but they won't replace free weights. I prefer free weights, but for a tenth of the cost of a gym set, no storage issues, and easy enough to throw in a travel bag, the pros outweigh the cons. I just bought a second pair for my wife. She's getting on board with Tony Horton also. Beach body here we come.
summary: Good for p90x if you don't have weights

reviewText: I've not used it yet as I've just had some major back surgery. Really hoping this will "speed up" reha when I can start.
Great price and fast delivery. Quite sturdy and the adjustable band makes it simple to add resistance when needed. Highly recommend this wonderful product.

I received these resistance bands as gift, and I must say these are a great set of bands. Everything in this set is made of high quality materials, so there is no need to worry about a band snapping. I have also done multiple exercises with these bands, and have enjoyed the results that these bands have giving me. The Black Mountain staff is also very friendly and helpful, if anything were to happen to your bands. These are simply some of the best resistance bands that you can purchase for the money.
summary: If you are new to resistance bands, check this product out!

reviewText: I purchased this product to be used the T-25 program because I wasn't happy with the resistance band I received with the original T-25 Package.  After using these for just a few weeks, I have to say that these bands are of much better quality and you really can't beat the price of about $30 for 5 bands and the rest of the accessories.Just a few pros I've noticed:- These bands are very flexible and allow you to go through a wide range of movements, including overhead presses, without any tearing- The bands over plenty of resistance so after any of the workouts in the T-25 program my muscles actually do feel fatigued.- The handles are soft and very comfortable and do not slip even after sweating.- The snap-on system is a great idea and really allows you to increase the resistance by combining more then one band on the handles.  Most resistance bands are permanently attached to their handles which means you can only use one band and resistance level at a time.Really looking forward to giving these a try with the T-25 Gamma program I plan on starting next month.

These exercise resistance bands provided a good workout for me.  I gives me other options aside from just push-ups, pull-ups, situps, etc... It's an all-around good product.  Would recommend a better system to attach the bands to the handles.  The current setup can get a little cluncky.  Even so I could still live with it.  Thanks.

We purchased this kit for varying resistance in workouts.  The bands have great elasticity, handles are easy to grip, and the versatility of clipping the handles onto different bands is a plus.  Would recommend these to anyone looking to enhance their workout routine.

This was my first experience with resistance bands and they have exceeded my expectations. They are very easy to change out and feel very sturdy, even when stretched to the limit. I am using them for P90X and being able to customize the weights has been really helpful to my workouts. The included bag is perfect for storing them when not in use.

I recently purchased two sets of Black Mountain Resistance Bands to replace my Bowflex Extreme II Home Gym. Bowflex is a great product, but required too much of the precious square footage of our 1,800 square foot home.I am happy with the product because it is made of high quality materials, allows me to continue to incorporate some resistance training and it doesn't way 800 pounds or require 75 square feet of floor space to operate! These could be packed up in a suitcase and travel with me anywhere (try lugging around and 800 lb bowflex). We have recaptured a large portion of our great room that can now be used for entertaining and relaxing with family and friends.Thanks Black Mountain!
summary: Replaces my Bowflex Extreme II Home Gym

reviewText: My order is in transit, and I ordered based on the good reviews that this product had.  I've recently started spin class, and I wanted an at-home workout that can work on my upper body and strengthen my arms as well so I decided to go with this product.  I will definitely be back to update and give my first impressions upon receiving product.Edited 10th may 2013I received my resistance bands! Only issue i'm having is that they're too long for me...I'm 5' 2" and they're wayyyy too long. Does anyone have any ideas how I go about shortening the bands?Edited 31st August 2013Had to give away my bands because I'm just too short to utilise them.  BMP should indicate that this is only for persons above 5' 6"
summary: Haven't yet received, but anticipating a pretty good product!

reviewText: Good variety of strengths for the bands.  Best combination that I found.  Instruction booklet should have more uses for legs - has just one.  I've come up with quite a few, to imitate my Pilates machine, for stretches away from home.

I've used the bands for about 2 weeks now. All in all I am quite satisfied with them. Here's the bottom line...Basically I bought these because I wanted a basic workout, but I didn't want the inconvenience of weights or to go to a gymPros-Cheap yet effective workout-Extremely useful attachments (foot band is great. For the door band put it in the hinge side of the door so it can't pop out)-Doesn't take much space/easy to bring traveling-Versatile, can just keep adding bands and you can do a ton of exercises-Seem fairly well madeCons- These aren't really a knock on this product, just resistance bands themselves-Inconsistent force (just inherent in stretching forces)-Feel like the resistance will decrease with use (again probably inherent)As with most things the real question will be how long they last, but at the two week mark everything seems good. If something catastrophic happens I will update
Excellent to use in my workouts. I would give 5 stars if it only came with an extra set of handles. I love the fact that you can change the strength.
summary: Could use extra set of handles

reviewText: I received the bands and immediately began using them in conjunction with P90X.  They provide the perfect alternative to free weights and the portability gives you the flexibility to use them where ever and when ever.  I would highly recommend these bands to everyone!  They are also very durable, so you can really go hard with no worriees.

I received this as a gift from my fiance and I must say this is well worth the price. I can perform all my workouts using these bands. It definitely helps me achieve the same pump as I would using free weights. The only difference is that I have more range of motion using these resistant bands. Easily detaches to reduce resistance. Also comes with a promotion for an orange band which is about 30-40 lbs of resistance for free.

This is a great set of resistance bands. It comes with a variety of bands equaling different amounts of pound resistance. It also comes with the ankle straps if you want to use the bands to do leg exercises as well 2 handles to clip the band(s) onto for arm exercises. There is a bag if you care to store them in the bag and a small paper booklet giving you some examples of different exercises you can do.  These are a good alternative to free weights or weight machines. You can do so many different exercises with them and work a variety of muscles.  Keep in mind, if one band doesn't satisfy your weight resistance desire, you can double or triple them up, just hook them onto the handle or ankle strap and work with the combined resistance. I have been using these for a little over a month and stretching them pretty good during my use, and I see no signs of wear or tear.  Anyone looking to add a little variety to their workout or for an alternative to weights or machines, I would definitely give these a try.

The resistance bands were more durable than I expected.  They snap onto the handles and you can stack them (ie, put more than one on at a time to increase resistance).  I wasn't aware they could do this.  The attachment that goes on the door is a piece of plastic/knot you thread over a door and close it, creating a sturdy lock to pull from.  I was concerned about it breaking the door or causing harm to the frame but I haven't encountered any problems yet after some frequent use.  Overall I am pretty impressed with the quality of these, for the price.  I wish they were a little bit longer (I am 6'2" and have longish legs) but they are still a good size.

I bought these after becoming in bad shape from running (too much, on concrete, with inherent leg structural problems, wrong shoes, etc), and had patellofemoral syndrome. I can't run 5 minutes now without my hips or knees hurting a lot. A lot of online sources told me to use resistance bands, and my physical therapist's opinion too sealed the deal.Thus, I have found myself ordered these from the good reviews. The products are good, but as someone who had never ever seen these before, I admit I was unsure how to use them. The instruction manual wasn't particularly helpful because it shows a single position and what it was called, along with terminology I wasn't 100% sure about. I don't even know which muscles are being trained, or what's good for runners like me. Thankfully, you can go to youtube and lots of online forums to find answers.But before that, I had emailed BMP asking which exercises were best for runners at both their website and on their customer support email. No answer from either. So, along with no answer and a poor instruction manual, I am obviously questioning...how can they make good products when they don't even answer questions about the product? Not answering implies not knowing, and who wants to buy bands that haven't been tested or seemed to be developed for the purpose?I'll update if I get a response, and I've only used this product several times since it came in. I like them so far, so 4 stars for quality, minus 1 for terrible customer service and a terrible instructions manual. Example? Along with these bands, came the door anchor and ankle strap. No labels or either. How do I know what is what? The instructions for using both were a mess. I can't ever see myself using the ankle strap either, mainly because I don't know if the way I put it on was correct or not. The door jamb was slightly more obvious, but it seems so crude. Just a strap with a ball on the end that you slide under your door and close it.Update, same day: just got an email from the reps (he was on vacation). I'm so happy!Here are some things that look good: "In the future we plan on upgrading our brochure, making videos, and posting information on our website. But as a small family owned business, we can only move forward on a few things at once, due to expenses and overhead. Our main priority at this time is to improve our quality of our equipment which we work on daily. Also, besides YouTube, I often recommend The Great Resistance Tubing Handbook: http://www.amazon.com/The-Great-Resistance-Tubing-Handbook/dp/1926534522. The book has many great tips and exercises for a fair price. Lastly, to care for the bands, always inspect the bands before use. Always check for imperfections, cuts, tears, or abrasion. If you see anything please contact us as we warranty all our bands. When using the bands, always try to work out on thick carpeting or an exercise mat. Thin carpeting or concrete floor can cause severe damage to the bands. Also, watch the shoes you wear when stepping on the bands. Shoes with lots of grip or that are worn outside can also cause abrasion to the bands."Don't hesitate to contact them! Thanks BMP! :)
I ordered these on May 3, 2014 and the green band broke today. I used them about 3 times a week. Not impressed with quality.
Better than anything at the local gym. Item is made of high quality parts. Easy to change tubes from/to handles. Highly recommended.

I have had these for about a week now... and i am afraid to use it at full potential...why?well from the first minute i took it out of the bag, i could tell it is made of cheap material...it just did not feel sturdy or durable enough to handle any demanding exercise or tension... the rubber bands look like they can snap if you push them... and if that happens it could be very dangerous as it might hit you and cause you injury...i will continue to use and update this review....but regardless of whether anything happens or not...this is not a product i would buy again as it doesn't feel firm or sturdy enough for the kind of tension workouts it is intended for...
summary: Has the potential to be dangerous

reviewText: I ordered this set of bands as a result of working with a trainer to rehab my frozen shoulder.  My husband already owns a different set of bands but it is more convenient to not "cross contaminate" exercise equipment!  Our uses of the tubes are very different and yet he was impressed with the quality of the hardware and the sturdiness of these tubes. We swapped sets of tubes since I use mine several times a week and he uses his daily.  I wish there had been written instructions on how to use the door anchor.  That took some fiddling with to figure out when it is really extremely simple once you know how to place it in the door opening.  I anticipate these tubes will last a long time, even with daily use.  I contacted Black Mountain with a question and an actual live human answered the phone on the first attempt!

I took these to Physical Therapy today, and my therapist was impressed with the quality and durability of them. She also said the foam grip handles that came with the set were of exceptional quality and a great asset to my workouts. I highly recommend these to anyone going to PT for rehab, or looking to increase strength in a controlled, fluid way (which is best). You'll not find anything better than Black Mountain products, even through the so called medical supply companies.

I owned the Lifeline resistance bands prior to this purchase and I'm happy with it so far.- Grips are comfortable, soft and squishy. Feels like memory foam.- Bands are easily clipped on/off. Hopefully they last.- Nice range of resistance between the extra light (2-4 lbs) and heavy (25-40 lbs). Of course, you can mix and match the bands to the desired resistance. I find anything more than three a bit cumbersome to handle efficiently though.- Because of the clipping mechanism, it may be a bit odd when using it for overhead exercises. I find the latches sometimes scraping against my arms, but otherwise, it's fine.Overall, pretty good in ease and comfort of use. Durability-wise, I've yet to see how well they withstand heavy usage.

My shop is inside a connex in Afghanistan and I am able to set this up in the shop and workout during the day, with a variety bands and different positions that were provided to workout throughout the day!!

I received these BMP bands as a Christmas gift. I frequently travel for work, and the travel bag is very convenient to carry the bands with my luggage.  I use the bands multiple times a week and have definitely noticed an increase in my definition and strength.I am a big fan of the door anchor (both at home and in hotel rooms) for doing multiple exercises.  My only complaint with respect to the door anchor is that sometimes on a carpeted floor, the anchor can come loose when used at the bottom of the door and dangerously snap back at your body.I also received P90x as part of my gift and I understand that the bands work with the routine.  Unfortunately, I have not been able to start the P90x program, so I cannot provide an assessment with respect to that.Overall, I am very pleased with the bands and look forward to continuing using them as an integral part of my workout regimen.

I've used these regularly for about 3 weeks, now with the 3 heaviest bands clipped together to the handles. The clip attachments are the sturdiest I've seen--and I've gone through many bands from other manufacturers. These are a great alternative to your dumbbell routine when you travel or if you just want to mix it up. Easy to use and figure out right out of the box! Don't lose the sheet of paper that tells you the resistance for each color band. You can figure it out, of course, but better to hold onto it if you need to move quickly.  The resistance is actually accurate-not the case with other bands. Door anchor is awesomely simple in design, and though the material used in the thick end of the door anchor broke into pieces after a week, it is still thick enough to function- and function well.

I originally got this set to use when traveling.  I like it so much that I use it at home.  The adjustable bands are great to use for all different exercises.  It would be nice if the set came with better instructions, how much can the bands stretch?

Bought these bands about 10 days ago to use for the P90x training program. They are a great low cost solution for the program as they are much less expensive than the P90x bands. I haven't used any other bands so I have no frame of reference as to quality and design but it would appear that these are fine bands for what they are meant to do and I wouldn't imagine the p90x bands are any better. If I find that these break easily or wear down after a bit I will definitely get in touch with the manufacturer/seller as they are warrantied for 90 days, which is exactly how long I'll need them! Customer support and shipping were both excellent as well. Good buy overall.

Received the product last week and so far I am very pleased with the bands.Ability to clip multiple bands to single set of handles is great!  It all seems to be very well made.  There are a number of workout examples with the product, but I am discovering even more.If anything happens/changes I will update my review.

I was looking for a variety of resistance bands for my personal training clients. This product allows you to pick from a large range of weights and combine them if you'd like. I really like the door anchor- it allows you to do trunk cable rotations, hip adduction/abduction, and exercises for triceps, biceps, and deltoids! All in an easy-to-carry bag (and everything does fit right in the bag, no hassle). Great product!
summary: Just what I was looking for

reviewText: The kit idea is great and the band seem to be very good, but the second time I used them, one of the handle broken in my hand. The handles are nylon, foam and plastic. The foam covered plastic tube broken using just the red band. If there were some way to switch the plastic tubes to alum. or a heavier plastic, I would give them 5 stars.

I am very happy with these bands.  They are an easy way to switch back and forth between resistance levels and different users.  They seem very durable, and I like the strength of the metal clips that attach to the handles.  I am equally impressed with the customer service from BMP.  Danny spent a lot of time listening to me explain my needs and helped me pick the best bands for my situation.  BMP fully stands behind its products and is interested in helping each of its customers to pick the very best product.  Product shipped the same day, and I was able to use it 2 days after ordering.  Thanks for a great buying experience!
These are an awesome yet of resistance bands! With a variety of resistance, they are great for high reps and toning.

I got these bands to use with Tony's 10 minute trainer videos. They're not quite as good as the ones he has in the videos (mainly cause there isn't a waist belt to strap them onto). This is the first time I have used resistance bands. They work well and seem like good quality. I will say, its much harder to keep good form using bands (rather than weights/dumbbells) but you use a lot more muscles at the same time.

These are the best items I ever ordered. Useful, easy to use, very versatile, I love the ability to switch from light to heavier strength bands with a simple click.These bands are better, other band come with an attached handle & once the handle breaks they become useless, but Black Mountain's bands all you need to do is order another set.I greatly pleased with this product & would continue to order from Black Mountain.

My wife and I purchased two sets of these bands to use when starting P90X.  The bands are very good quality, and come with a couple nice extras.  These being the storage bag, ankle strap, and door anchor.  The door anchor has been key in our ability to actually follow the P90X program because the way our condo is situated, an over the door pullup bar does not work (we have tried).  The door anchor lets us complete all the pullups required to stay with the program.At first I wasn't sure about the modular design of the bands, but now I quite like them.  Its nice to be able to mix and match the bands to change the resistance without having to hold onto multiple handles.  For pullups for example, I use 5 bands at once, but they clip neatly on to the comfortable handles.As far as exercise bands go, you can't go wrong with these ones.  I have since recommended them to several others at work.

They were great! The item is really sturdy and the interchangeable bands make it really easy to switch gears. Everything's solid, so I'm not afraid that the bands are going to snap on me or the door hold'll come loose. The bag they come in is handy so I can keep them all in one place, and the little booklet has some good exercise ideas to get started. I really like them for getting in some exercise when I don't have a lot of time, as I can stay at home. The ankle strap is a really nice feature, too.
Love these resistance bands as they have hooks to change handles and increase weights, easy to use over the traditional ones with out the hook fasteners.  Recommend.

Great for the price. I've had them for 3 weeks now. The bands are versatile, have a burly structure/design compared to other bands, and easy to travel with. I use them for rehab/PT purposes - not working out purposes - and they've been ideal so far.My one suggestion would be a better door anchor. If you're trying to use the anchor they give you to the bottom of a door that has a small gap in it, it won't hold. Easily modifiable by duct taping a rag or shirt around the anchor but could definitely be improved.
Love the quality of the bands and that they are interchangeable. Like that you get the ankle strap and the over the door accessory
I like the versatility of this set.  I like being able to anchor them into a doorway, and I like having the various levels of resistance.  the booklet that comes with it has been helpful to me also.
Just workin on my fitness!  These bands and the various anchors work great.  I like being able to double and triple the bands depending on how much resistance I want.

I've only had these for a little while and I did end up buying extra handles (different company though because the handles I got received better reviews and they definitely are better)...I ordered enough handles for all the bands but the strongest since I'm not at that point yet.  I had my husband hang a hook on the back of my door to store the bands and install two different heavy duty hooks on the wall (one at waist level and one at over the door level).  I use these bands on these hooks to work different muscles.  I also ordered the FitDeck (I think that's what their called) for resistance bands and it gives me ideas on how to use these bands best.  I looked on youtube too for some ideas.  These bands are actually fun to use.  I have to figure out a certain routine for myself still but I do like them and they seem pretty sturdy.  I store them up on the back of the door so the cats (I have two) don't get at them.  They love things that hang and they attack (ugh).  I would recommend these as long as they don't break easy...if they do, I'll update.

Great set of resistance bands!!! They came with separate handles so you can combine bands for different resistance levels along with a door handle and a carrying case. I have used them everyday since I received them the quality of the bands seems great and they come with a manufacturer warranty in case one does break. Would recommend these to anyone looking to pick up a set. They also have a free promotion going on to get an orange band with 35-40 pounds of resistance.
Been using for about a month now and can definitely see a difference in my appearance. Cuts you up quickly... Love the stackable bands...just wish it came with more weight

Hi, my name is Scott, and I purchased Black Mountain's Resistance Band Set. Let me say right up front, these resistance bands give you one great work-out. If you are just a little creative, you can offer yourself a truly wonderful work-out. I need the flexibility to change my work-out, I am disabled, so I am unable to work with traditional weights, like most people. I want to let you know I no longer feel left-out, because today with Black Mountain resistance bands, I can create a work-out like know other. These bands are great, and what a burn. Now don't misunderstand me, you don't need to be disabled like me, to create a top notch work-out, in fact I think any gym, or home gym, would be much improved, with the addition of Black Mountain Resistance Bands, and the work-out challenge that you get with these bands, are unmatched. In conclusion, let me say that they are a wonderful value at under $30.00, and I would recommend them to anyone looking to keep themselves in great shape. Today its up to each of us to keep ourselves as healthy as we can, and the Black Mountain Bands, will help you do that, in my opinion. I would like to Thank B.M.P for there affordable equipment, its improved my quality of life.Good-luck to the rest, I hope my review has helped.Sincerely, Scott Fenske

Great product! I ordered the bands for P90X and they work perfect. I've used bands in a local gym and these are just as good. I really like the clip attachment which makes it easier to adjust the amount of resistance using 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 bands. The product works great and do what they were designed to do, provide resistance. I recommend this to anyone.

I bought the Black Mountain resistance bands to improve my fitness and to maintain muscle mass (I'm considered, by some, to be an "old" guy)...now, if I can just stay motivated to keep exercising. I am very pleased with the product, with the prompt delivery, and with the construction of the the entire package that I received.  Recently, I had an opportunity to speak with the folks at Black Mountain and found them to be couteous and cheerful...a good company producing a good product that's easy to work with.

Before I placed my order, I called Black Mountain Products to ask a few questions.  The gentleman I spoke to was very helpful and took the time to answer all my questions.  I really appreciate that.  The bands are great!!  I really like the metal clips that make it very easy to adjust your band strength in the middle of a workout.  I am doing the P90X which uses a lot of different weights, so that bands are great for this.  Also, with standard shipping I received them in a couple of days.  Nice!!!
summary: Great Item for a Great Price

reviewText: I used to own the other elastic bands by Black Mountain (the ones where the handles come attached on both ends). Some of them broke so i bought this version. I compared both versions to the same lbs in each band, and for some reason there isn't the same resistance in the version, as there is with the other. Ex: both 30lbs don't provide the same pull of resistance. This version is weaker.It's hard to explain, so by all means find out for yourselves.

I travel a lot and a friend showed me some exercises with his set of resistance bands two years ago. I bought the same set and have used them since I came across this Black Mountain Products set. These are far superior and more versatile than almost any other set and the quality is outstanding. I've had them for about two weeks and I am thoroughly impressed. Six bands, a door anchor, an ankle strap, a carrying case and a lifetime guarantee for under $30 make these a superb value. I would recommend them to anyone who knows the benefits of exercise and the versatility of resistance bands. You will not be disappointed.

What I love is that you can combine your own resistance bands if resistance isn't enough. They are affordable in comparison buying a large set of dumbells. I highly recommend this product if you are trying to find resistance bands.

I bought this set for when I travel for work. I've used them like crazy and have had no problems with them. The door mount is great for pullups and the easy connectors allow me to change out bands quickly. I recommend this set to anyone looking for a good resistance band set.

I was blown away by the professionalism in this company. It's 2 brothers who own the business and the customer service is outstanding. I purchased a multi-pack set of bands with one handle. Not only is the product of excellent quality but it comes with a quality bag, instructions, nice note from the company and an offer for a free ORANGE band (promotional item).  I called the company based upon a flyer, I received a live person on the phone who was very friendly and come to find out, he's one of the owners. He put my ORANGE band in the mail the same day and it arrived 2 days later.If you are considering other bands, don't, buy from this company as you won't be disappointed.
Waiting to use this product after I get a release from my Dr. to start my exercise routine back up.

In week 2 of p90X we are glad that we have them now.For 25.00 bucks you get a lot for your money. I wish it came with two handle bars, and the other over the door stopper.So far so good.Will update if things tend to happen.Good bargain.
summary: Good so far, weary and cautious may snap

reviewText: My husband & I had been working with a trainer & now want to work out on our own at home, so purchased this set.  Our trainer likes the set & showed us more things we could do with the various bands.  We are very pleased with the quality of the product.  I called to order an extra set of handles, as it comes with one set that is detachable to use on any of the bands. I received excellent customer service.  It came with a pamphlet showing a few exercises, not many.  This is part of our continued strength training at home to keep us sixty-something strong.

Bought this for more options to do the 10 minute trainer and othertubing workouts.  Easy to use, very durable, clearly a quality product....I would order a waistband attachment if they sold one but could not find one on their website.
summary: Only wish it came with a waistband

reviewText: Hi,I got the bands within days of ordering and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality.  So far so good!  You can add bands for more resistance and they have a nice adapter for the leg and door which makes working out with these much more versatile.  The customer service is great!Thanks!
This set of exercise bands etc. is a great buy. I use them often and they are handy and versatile enough to make adjustments.

I purchased these bands so I could exercise on an upcoming trip.  However, I've been using them at home and have found that they are very versatile.  The door anchor is wonderful as I can attach my bands at any height.  I also can easily use multiple bands together.  Wish I had gotten these earlier!
summary: Great exercise equipment for home and travel

reviewText: I recently began using these bands and they are everything you need to get a complete workout. They are so much easier to use than free weights and quicker to use than setting up your desired weight with dumbbells.I am using them with p90 and they are all i need.

I've been using these bands for over a month. Great range of motion without the joint pain weights would give me. I use them for everything! a warm up stretch, resistance when doing squats, etc. I love that it came with a door holder. I was going to rely on my pull-up bar but the door holder makes it easier to go from one thing to another. I'm too short for the foot holder but my husband uses it and loves it. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and family.

I am a Personal Trainer by profession from Bangalore, India. I wanted to add more depth to my clients' workout, so i found this Black Mountain product very useful and portable. Even my clients love it!

I bought these products to train and exercise when I was at home and didn't have access to gym equipment.  Shipping was very fast.  There are many many many exercises you can do with these products that will give you a full body workout.You can use a combination of the bands to get a higher resistance for your workouts.  The quality is very good; I've stressed them out pretty well and they are keeping together.  The door strap and bands feel and look like they are high quality materials and won't break.I also purchased the pull-up bar to go with this product and both work hand-in-hand.Great seller and products!
- 'No questions asked' warranty- Pamphlet of easy work out ideas with picturesQuality product to have especially when those spontaneous exercise moods come around.
summary: Easy and affordable way to do some light toning
