reviewText: I got these bands a few weeks ago and they have held up to my routine so far. I was happy to see that they weren't old and brittle, like other resistant bands I've gotten before, and i think they will go the distance.

This is my first amazon review but the customer service from these guys is so great I felt obligated to write. I have been using these bands for p90x the past 4 weeks.Pros:- can double up bands to add extra resistance- good price- takes up no space compared to weights- will send you free orange (35-40 lbs) band if you call them!Cons:- it isn't quite "instant" to switch handles for each band between exercises, and with p90x you have to do that frequently especially when you go through two cycles of the same exercises. but they do sell additional handles which i might end up getting.- I am 5'8" and I wish they were about 6" longer, mainly for doing any sort of overhead presses- I fear they will snap regardless of the strength of band but that is also me being paranoid.If you think you will want to be able to add incremental weights by doubling up the bands I'd definitely get this clip-on version, otherwise I would probably get the ones with handles attached. Either way this brand is a good deal.

I bought the B.M.P. resistance bands few months ago to workout while traveling.  I found it to be easy to switch during quick exercise and durable.  I used the many other bands to work out with p90x but this one is by far the best.  My mom tried once and enjoyed so much, so I ended up buying another for her.  Great customer service and prompt delivery !!

I have used a friend's exercise bands in the past and got a decent workout by having to do a lot of reps.  After receiving this set of bands, I combined several of the bands together to increase the resistance and able to get a great workout with having to spend so much time.  The overall quality of these bands came as a good surprise, I hope the product continues to please me for a long time.The workout guide provided excellent examples of exercise positions and techniques. I plan on incorporating these and other exercises detailed on the blackmountainproducts.com site into my exercise routine while traveling.
great product, strong, really resistant. well worth the price. customer support is really good too.just would like the clamps to e a bit larger.
summary: great bands, well worth the price

reviewText: Great product. the ability to combine weights makes it easier for guys who need a little more resistance than the single heavy bands. The bands have been great, quality has not been an issue and none have broken on me so far. The linking chains make it easy to add/reduce bands for more or less resistance.The only issue I have is that you have to memorize the weights of the bands, they weights are not written on the band so you need the piece of paper to know what your using.
summary: Durable and quality product -- practical information missing

reviewText: I have been using it with my P90X workouts (also bought their chin up bar) for about a month now. I mostly use red and black bands and they work great! And the price is reasonable too (compared to buying it from P90X website). All in all bang for the buck!
summary: Great product at a good price!

reviewText: I am doing the P90X 3 program, which requires you to go from one exercise to the next without rest. Changing the resistance bands quickly and moving them from place to place is a bit of a hassle. For example, I will use them for a pull up alternative with the door mount, but then I will use them for curls for other shoulder exercises which require a lighter load. So I have to pull the bands all the out of the door mount, remove a couple of bands, do the exercise, put the bands back on and re-thread it through the door mount. Because of the alternating nature of the program, this gets annoying really fast.The quality is outstanding and the bang for the buck is awesome. My problems with it are not related to the quality of the product, but since it is being sold as an all-in-one solution, some people might want to consider how they will be using these and adjust accordingly.I might just buy another set.

The bands are very easy to use, come with a variety of different types, and are safe. On top of this, they are insanely portable for travel and are designed to be used in any living situation. As long as you have feet, you can use them!The only down side is you do not know "exactly" how much you are lifting because the waiting variation becomes large when you mix-and-match bands together. However, it is still a great product, and if you are on a tight budget, its a great alternative to buying $500 dumbbells.On top of this, customer service is great and BMP is always willing to help with the problems that you have.Excellent Product. Highly Recommend.

Great product.  They really have great customer service as well.  I bought resistance bands from my local sporting goods store recently.  They broke in less than two weeks.  These are quality bands that wont break.  They even sent me a free heavy duty orange band as a promotion which was awesome.  Great product, great customer service, shouldn't be disappointed.
This product works great for me and my clients easy to transport for home training on the go.  Only downside is its elastic aka it stretches but bmp has no problem with great customer service.

I really like these bands. I am doing P90X and they work great for that.  Because you can combine the bands you can create a significant amount of weight.  The door and ankle attachment are also a nice feature.

I have had these bands now for about 1 month and I have really been able to enjoy quickly moving from one exercise to another.  I spoke to customer service once and love the "person" experience I received.  I also found out that as a home user of this product, the product has a life time warranty including shipping.  awesome!  I will be getting the more powerful purple band to enhance my workout.  Very happy with the product and customer service.
summary: Great Product for quick but effective workout.  More powerful band will be needed for men.

reviewText: I purchased these resistance bands primarily for travel and for times I wouldn't be able to access my gym.  I've found they're very versatile once you figure out what exercises you can do with them, and they've provided perfectly adequate workouts for someone used to free weights and cable machines.  I gave the product four stars primarily based on the lack of instruction that accompanied them - the included booklet has very sparse directions for only six exercises, and in my opinion doesn't provide a very clear explanation of how to perform the exercises or how to use the extra accessories.  I would recommend a website like [...] ([...] is a good example) for more detailed guides on resistance band workouts.The resistance bands themselves are great!  I'm only 5 feet tall, so I didn't have any issues in terms of length when performing exercises that required you stand on the bands.  When using the door attachment or wrapping them around a pole, I did have to experiment before finding the best way to position myself; I found that standing with my legs in a staggered, lunge-style position provided the most stable base for exercises like a standing chest press.  Also, positioning the bands overhead using the door attachment allowed me to kneel or sit in order to perform lateral pulldowns.  The door strap has proved to be extremely useful, and I haven't had any issues with its sturdiness.  I've used it with door frames that are quite old, and if anything I would advise users to make sure the door you use reliably stays closed.The interchangeability of the bands is definitely one of the biggest selling points of this set.  I really like that each band has its own attached clips at each end; it makes it faster to change resistance, which is important when you're doing a circuit with limited rest between sets or moves.  You can incrementally change resistance by adding or removing multiple bands, or by shortening the amount of slack you allow at the beginning of an exercise.I also like that the handles are padded - I imagine using the bands would be uncomfortable with hard handles.  The size of the handles is perfect for me, but I'm a fairly petite girl, so for a guy with large hands they may be a tight fit.I'd definitely recommend this set if you're looking for a good basic resistance band package.  For someone looking for heavier weight, the guide indicates there is an additional orange band you can purchase that goes up to 40 lbs.  This set fit my needs as is, and I'm excited to find more ways it can enhance my fitness repertoire.

I had arthroscopic shoulder surgery about 4 months ago, and I've finished my rehab assignment and have begun strengthening.  I hate having to go to the gym, and this product has made it easy to complete my strengthening at home.The first thing I noticed about this product, from the moment I held one of the bands in my hand, was the quality.  The bands are thick and smooth, and are secured to nylon straps which have carabiners for attachment to the hand grip.  I've used it for almost two weeks now and it's durable and easily stored.  It comes with a nylon tote bag, which makes it easy to hide or transport.  Inside the bag is a manual which tells you how to mix the bands for more resistance.  Put simply, the bands do exactly what they are supposed to.I wouldn't recommend this product for anything but rehab.  Real strength is gained by working and sweating in a gym, not with bands such as these.  That's not to diminish the quality of this product, but if you're seeking size and power, buy yourself a gym membership.My only complaint is that the carabiner does not attach easily to the door wedge piece.  I had to find a spare, larger carabiner, attach it to the door wedge, and then attach the band carabiner to the other carabiner.  That's my only complaint.  The manufacturer can easily fix this be designing the door wedge.

I recently purchased these bands for my P90 X workouts.  These bands are very easy to use and provide good levels of resistance.  I really like how I can use multiple bands at the same time if I want to get more resistance or the between levels.  I find these a much better option than dumbells which are the alternative because these are less expensive, easy to store and just as effective.  I would also argue these are safer as if you lose your grip you will not break anything.  They appear to be a very solid product with no signs of failure.
These are very high quality, come in a convenient carry case and has thus far met all my expectations. A very good price too.

I really like these bands. Keep in mind, they're for toning the muscles, not for building big muscles. They seem to be of good quality. I saw some reviews where they snapped, but, I haven't had an issue with them. I bought them on the gold box deal for half the price of some of the other bands Amazon sells.
Delivery was fast and easy and work as expected. One note, they are nice since you can combine them easily whereas some bands don't let you do that.

I just received bands yesterday, and I was just testing out the feel of the green and black bands together and after 4 curls...the metal part of the green band popped out of the connecting socket and snapped into my foot.  Thanks to the poor quality of this product, I now have a giant welt on my foot. Just to let everyone know I am 5'11 and 160lb, by no means a BIG guy, and was not even close to pulling with full force. Perhaps I just received a lemon, but I'm demanding a refund. I would advise any potential buyers to be careful.

This product is absolutely amazing for half the cost in the stores.  If you are looking for resistance bands these are for you.  I really like being able to simply connect all the bands together for added resistance or disconnect them for lighter resistance.  This is a must have product for a busy schedule.  All of the attachments are great and it even comes with an easy storage bag.  I highly suggest this to all.  Awesome product Black mountain!!!!

I've used resistance bands from a number of companies over the years, and these are some of the best I've tried. My girlfriend and I have been using them for a bit now, with no issues whatsoever. The clip-on system makes it fast and easy to not only switch bands, but combine them as well without being cumbersome, which is nice for workouts where you're in need of multiple levels of resistance. All of the components and accessories seem to be of very good quality (the handles are comfortable to hold, which is not always the case with resistance bands), and the value for the total package is excellent (the door anchor is great for pull-downs when a pull-up bar isn't an option). Plus, they're manufactured by a small, family-owned company -- you can't beat that.

I purchased these to have a little more flexibility in weight/resistance training wtihout going to the gym.  They work great at home.  I also travel for work and love that they're light and small enough to fit into my suitcase so that I can workout right in my hotel room.They are well made and durable and I enjoy the convenience of their portability both in traveling and being able to put them away when at home.  I saw in the reviews before I purchased my set that some people complained about the clips being flimsy/breaking and they've remedied this problem.  My set has actual caribiners as clips instead of the smaller leash type clips in the picture.  My sister has used them with me for the last two weeks and liked them so well she's ordering her own set!
summary: Work perfectly for traveling and at home!

reviewText: I received the product quickly and really liked the easily opened packaging.  I've used the resistance bands for several weeks and love them.  The cushioned handles are excellent.  I like the wide assortment of different bands, lots of different ones and combinations from which to choose.  The storage bag is a nice item.  I use it to pack the bands and often take them on my business trips for a quick exercise session in my room.  I highly recommend them, great quality.
summary: Black Mountain Resistance Bands are great

reviewText: I purchased this product a little over a week ago and thus far I have been very pleased with the purchase. Since its delivery, which arrived well ahead of schedule, I have been using these bands non-stop at least twice daily. As a physically active man I was in the market for a product that was easily transported, affordable, highly recommended and most importantly durable. Thus far the B.M.P. resistance bands have received high scores from me in that regard.With such excessive usage my main concern is centered on product failure. However I love the assurance than if I discover any defects in my bands I am able to get a replacement within 90 days. And based on my interaction with the company thus far and the reviews of others I don't foresee this becoming an issue if the situation ever arises. Overall I believe it was a worthwhile purchase.

Purchased this set to replace a set that was deteriorating from use and age. These tube type bands are a much better alternative to the thin flat bands. A fairly good assortment of tension(s) The storage bag is nice, but I prefer to hang them on the wall to eliminate digging through the bag and untangling.
Really liked how the bands were so easy to change.  I was able to increase and decrease resistance quickly to keep my workout going.  I think they're great!
They provide a wide range of resistance to make your workout progressively more difficult to strengthen your body. They include a hoe to booklet that is quite useful.

I've had these bands now for about 2 weeks and they are everything I expected and more!  The quality of the actual band material is first rate.  I'm not some sort of expert who can tell what kind of synthetic material they are made of, I've only had them for two weeks, and I'm certainly not strong enough to impress you with a story about how I pulled my truck down the driveway with them.  But, I am smart enough to know that the bands are all smooth, with no signs of defect and that they have a consistent stretch throughout the length of the band.  They are securely connected to the snaps at either end.Oh yeah, those snaps at the end of each band....that's why I bought these to begin with.  You'll notice some of the other sets available have handles permanently attached to each band.  That might work if each of those bands are exactly the weight (resistance) you want to use.  But if you want to combine two or even three bands it's going to be pretty difficult with two or three of those handles.  With these bands you simply choose the bands you want to use, clip them to the handle and you're all set.  And with all the bands in the set you have a pretty good idea of the weight range you get.Lastly the handles...perfect.  Foam padded the entire circumference of the handle along with flexible, heavy duty nylon strapping, and sturdy D rings to attach the bands to.I'm very happy with these bands and can't imagine some of the others costing 3 times as much are at all a higher quality.  Certainly not worth 3 times as much as these.

I searched high and low for an affordable set of resistance bands so that I could do my physical therapy exercises at home and speed my recovery. At the physical therapy office they shut the bands with knots tided in them in the door hinge to secure them, and as the exercises are done the band removes the hair on my leg. The Black Mountain resistance bands set solves both of these issues. It comes with a sturdy nylon door anchor that will NOT slip out and pop you. it also comes with a nice wide padded Velcro leg/arm strap so the rubber tube does not pull the hair of out of ones leg. Each band comes with small aluminum 'Carabiner' that is used to attach the band to either handles or leg/arm strap. These attach securely with no chance of slipping off. I would recommend this product to a friend in a heart beat.
summary: Look no further for Resistance Bands

reviewText: I like this product very much.  I have only used them for several weeks, but they are a good alternative to using free weights.  They make my workout more interesting.  The carrying bag makes it very easy to take the bands on business trips.  The handles are very comfortable.  I am impressed with the quality for the price.
Very well made, with sturdy and easy clips.  The bag is handy for travel.  I have only been using it for a month, so we will see how durable the tubes are.  So far, no signs of wear.
These resistance bands are compact, easy to use, and lightweight. Great for workouts while traveling as well. Bands provide a full range of motion. Great buy!
summary: Great for on the go workouts!

reviewText: I separated my shoulder and started seeing a physical therapist.  The therapist had me using resistance bands at the clinic so I ordered the set from Black Mountain for use at home.  I have been using the bands for 2 weeks now and they have helped my recovery quite a bit.  The therapist said I was making "monstrous" progress.  The products are well constructed, with very solid materials in the fastenings, so I feel comfortable the bands will be able to handle the tension that's put on them.

I love these resistance band so much I bought a second set. I have worked out most of my adult life (53 yrs old) primarily with weights. The past 10 yrs found weights hurt my joints. Real bummer. I was not sure how good a workout I would get with resistance bands, but have found the resistance bands allow me to get a great workout without the joint pain. The quality of the bands are quite good.Thanks Black Mountain. Staying fit without the joint pain.
Highly recommend this product, great quality!Comes with a leg accessory, door attachment, instruction manual and a travel bag.Thank you BMP, great product!

First off, my order  came two days after I placed my order using just standard shipping, which I was mildly impressed with. I was pleasantly surprised by the product itself. Now don't get my wrong, you're not paying for gym quality equipment and you're not getting it with this either. But if you're like me and you need something inexpensive to use around the apartment to deal with a repetitive stress injury you can't do much better than this.  A while back I had developed what is known as "Jumper's Knee"(tendonitis). My doctor told me to lay off volleyball for about a month and gave me this cheap little red rubber-band thingy and told me to exercise using it. I really didn't like the jerky feel of it and as a result I didn't use it much. The look and feel of these are much better. I've been putting them to good use, not only on my knee but on other areas of my body that could use some more attention. The only negative thing I can say about this product is that the instruction manual could seriously use some beefing up. It's literally just a sheet of paper folded in half.
Shipped really fast and got here way earlier than I even expected. The bands have been great to work out with so far...thanks!

Until purchasing this set of bands I had been using adjustable free weights at home for the P90 master series. I have no problem using barbells, but they're not very portable, and I get tired of having to adjust the weight based on the exercise.After a month of use I've found these bands to be structurally durable (no problems with grips or tubing) and easy to use when rapidly switching  between exercise sets. Granted, in comparison to some other reviewers I am on the shorter side - 5' 7" - so I'm not stretching the bands to lengths that might hasten their wear 'n tear; however, I'm impressed that they haven't shown any signs of damage with frequent use. I can't speak as to how long I will need this set since I am already using the red bands with greater frequency and have all but abandoned the lighter resistance colors. People that are looking into P90 or similar programs or who don't have much experience using weights would definitely find this set useful based on their portability, affordability, and ease of use.

I recently started the Athlean-X program.  When I realized most of the workouts include exercises that utilize resistance bands, I reluctantly started the search.  I say reluctantly because I never really thought you could get a decent workout with bands, but I wanted to follow the program as prescribed.  I chose Black Mountain because they offered the widest variety of bands, but most importantly, detachable handles.  This is key, because you could use multiple bands at once to increase resistance.  I'm about one month in and I can now say that I am believer.  I always get the resistance I need by either using multiple bands or increasing tension.  I am a fan of the versatility.  I love that if I need a little more/less resistance mid-set, I can just increase/reduce tension without stopping and changing weights.  Very happy with the purchase.

These band are actually built and made very well. The quality is actually quite nice with no plastics involved in any of the clipping mechanism. All the clips are made out of metal so their will be a less chance of it braking like the plastic clipping bands that are also sold on Amazon. They seem to be very durable. Also, I would recommended this set for people who are up to 5.5". If you are tall this may not be the right set for you.

I enjoy my resistance bands. They pack up in the small travel bag so they are easy to take on the go. Easy to change tension quickly to ensure you get the workout you want to get. Been using them for about two months and still show no sign of wear and tear.Lost a star because I feel the clips are installed backwards, and a few other technicalities that I feel would be easily made to make them perfect.

Upon opening the box, I was pleased to see a nice black pouch that contained the set. I opened it to find the different color bands as well as the handles and a velcro strap that i can imagine a million uses for.  door knobs etc.There was also a small pamphlet with contact info which gave me some confidence.I like the high quality construction. The handles attach to the bands using high quality stainless steel carabiners. I like the fact that the handles separate from the straps. It gives great versatility. This makes it very very easy to adjust the tension. ALSO i think this set is very good for the traveler looking for a portable gym.Pros - high quality construction, versatile, very complete setup.cons - non as of yet

I just got my resistant bands in yesterday, and I have to say I'm impressed. The material of the bands are thick, and it doesn't feel like the bands will break while doing the exercises. The bands can be attached/detached to the handles giving you a variety of resistance for any workout. The bands also come with a door piece. Which you can put in your door and have even more variety of exercises to choose from.The bands also come with a carrying case for convenience, and a instruction manual. The manual gives the amount of resistance each band is worth, and it comes packed with different exercises to choose from. This product is a great buy for anyone who wants to start using resistance bands, or anyone who exercises in general. This is a must have for anyone trying to build a home gym, get in great shape, or looking for variety.Enjoy!

This product is very good because of all the accomplishments I can achieve using it. On top of that it makes you save a lot in gym membership. I would recommend it to anyone who dont have enough time to go to the gym.
This product is exactly as I expected it to be!  They are great and provide such a great work out.  Easy to carry around. I bring them back and forth from work to home.  Even my bosses use them!

I purchased these bands three weeks ago, and I have been very pleased with the purchase.  They are very good quality and it is nice to be able to adjust the weight as you progress.  I use them with the P90 system and they have been great so far.  Also I travel a lot for business, and with the case they are very easy to pack and bring along.The bands themselves are much better quality than the bands that you can get with the P90 system.  They are shorter (I would guess around 40-42" as opposed to 48") however I am 6' tall and have no problem using them for overhead lifts (Military or Swimmers Press).The only downsides of the bands are that when I do the overhead press the grommet and carabineer that holds the band to the handle do tend to rub against the arm and shoulder.  However this is a minor annoyance to myself, and the fact that it uses these items is part of it being a much higher quality band than the ones I previously have used.If I could make one recommendation it would be to get a 2nd set of handles, as it can make transitioning from one exercise at one weight to another exercise with a different weight much faster.I will edit/update this review in another couple of months, to update the progress after continued heavy use.
I really enjoy using the BMP resistance bands.  you can perform multiple exercises at various resistance weigh.  This is also great to help you get a quick pump if you feel then need.

I have to travel for my job. Having the bands has revolutionized my ability to work out on the road. They don't take up any more space than an extra T-shirt and are a must to complement your aerobics workout.
I'm using these with my physical therapy for a nasty ankle sprain, as my doctor suggested.  They certainly are easy to use and very portable.

I'm new to the whole resistance band training. I have just been following YouTube videos, but now I'm hooked. I don't have anything to compare this too, but I am very satisfied. To be able to get everything you need for a home work out for a couple of dollars, worth it!

Better than I expected, way better!  These Bands are by far one of the best small investments I have made in fitness equipment.  I have years of weight lifting and working out and have finally found equipment that answers issue of how to travel and keep working out.Price: This product is worth twice what I paid for it. So for the cost of a month at a gym I now have a gym in my travel bag!Durability:  Stronger and and more rugged than I expected (and I have hi expectations)Flaws :  NONE! (but I will keep trying to find one)Design:  Clips are flawless, connections strong, handles good, multiple bands combinations is genius!Resistance:  I am a serious weight lifter.  These were able to take me to failure and kick my butt! (Also able to figure out ways to do cardio type workouts with lighter resistance bands and hi rep exercises)Versatile:  yes, veryI took this set on a trip to the Bahamas living on a boat.  Used them daily.  The variety of combinations gave great versatility to fine tune each exercise to my specific needs and strength.  I could wrap the bands over the main boom, around winches, around the mast, and just experiment and try different things.  Kept the workouts interesting and fun.  Imagine doing a weight workout on a pristine white beach with the crystal blue ocean in front of you in a balmy breeze in the shade of palm trees!  (yea it doesnt get much better than that!)Results:  no rust on metal parts in a continuos salt water environment, no wear or stretch marks on the bands, nothing broke or even showed signs of fatigue, no loss of resistance in the bands.  Three of us used them and they got over two hours of use every day.This set is perfect for travelers or people who have down time at work and can set aside a little time for a quick workout on the fly.  Fireman, Police officers, outdoor workers, office workers, medical professionals.  Think about having 15 to 20 minutes of spare time and being able to pull a gym out of your black bag and and do a quick workout.  Pretty cool concept!!for those who have broken bands be careful not to tye knots in the bands or wrap them around sharp or rough objects.  that will wear them out or tear them quickly.  Common sense rules!Also call the company.  They will openly discuss their products and listen to criticism.  They are very customer friendly!(disclaimer: I am not associated with, payed by, related to, or in any way connected to the manufacturer.  This is an honost review)
Nice handles too.  The clips on the handles make it easy to combine multiple bands for extra resistance.  At the price, I don't see how you can beat it.
I use it once in  a while when I workout at home, I prefer actual weights but I am sure it works well if I use it more often.

The bands seem durable in the few times ive used them so far. They say that the bands can be stretched 400% their original length, for a beginner like myself this is more than enough resistance. I like how portable it is, you can workout anyplace. Great for someone who is constantly traveling.
This is a fantastic produce for me. I need the exercises but I don't have time for a gym. I love that they are portable and easy to take with me when I travel.

reviewerName: D. Deutsch "Chance favors the prepared mind."
reviewText: I bought this set of bands to work on rehabbing my knee outside of the gym. This type of product is certainly convenient to use and offers a fair amount of resistance for my purposes. However, for those intent on building gobs of muscle, weights are of course ideal. I found that I needed some time to adjust to the feel of these bands. While the manual indicates some type of pound rating it doesn't feel accurate. The nominal rating of weak to strong is a better way to judge the resistance of each band. I chose a familiar exercise that would allow me to work through a range of bands. I knew what I  could lift with weights and compared that sensation to the band with a similar resistance. From there I could start to estimate which bands i might start with  for other exercises. The kit is nicely put together with a wide range of bands and extra straps for doors and ankles. The carrying bag holds everything without being cramped and is well suited for travelling. As another reviewer noted, the bands are rubber and are subject to wear. It behooves the user to inspect them regularly before use.Update: I have used this kit several times now and wanted to add a finding. I found the exercises more satisfying when contracting and holding the muscles being worked on at the end of the positive movement. This gives extra focus to the area at hand and makes the most out of the resistance that the bands offer. Hopefully, I am not overstating the obvious, but I found this feature easier to do with the bands than with free weights.
My chiropractor suggested that I purchase this kit. He was right! My upper body strength has improved and I feel great after I work out. It is very well made and will last for years of use.

I wish these were all once piece with attached handles. Once I started using them I found that the metal clamp was annoying and in the way. Perhaps it's human error but I find it awkward - especially if you need to switch sizes often.The quality of the actual bands are good though - Very thick.

I have been using a  personal trainer for the past 4 months and decided that I would try to do these resistance exercises at home.  Very easy to install and to use with the instructions that came with the set and in addition I added some of the exercises I did with my trainer.....and for much less expense!  Stacking the straps makes sense.  I spoke with one of the owners about an additional weighted strap which is gratis and he gave me some excellent suggestions for using the equipment.  A family run business....What a pleasure!  BTW.....I am a75 year old female, am pulling between 35 and 55 lbs and lifting free weights of 12-15 lbs.  Let's hear it for the grey panthers!!!
summary: Almost as good as with a personal trainer

reviewText: I like these bands, particularly the ease of swapping the handles from band to band, as well as the ability to easily combine multiple bands for increased resistance. Ankle strap and door strap are also included.I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend it to others. The quality is good, the variety of bands is larger than with some other kits, and the price is right. Delivery was also quick -- I received them on the first day of the estimated delivery range.

Product matched the on line description.  Purchased for my son's physical therapy for a dislocated shoulder.  We purchased a ring at the hardware store to loop the band thru so we could hook to wall mount to use both handles simultaneously.

This band set seemed expensive compared to deals I have seen at the store. Once I got the package in the mail, however, I realized that this is a truly professional setup. They appear far more sturdy, complete with metal clips (I don't know the correct terminology for the fastener thingys). I was surprised at the amount of weight that they would resist with - not to mention the door anchor and ankle strap comes with them. Most certainly a good buy.

I'm no athlete, and I have used no other resistance bands to compare them to, but this kit is perfect for my needs. I discovered that resistance exercise is exactly what I needed to keep my blood pressure down. I discovered that when living in a place where I could walk up steep hills every day. When I moved to somewhere that was just flat, I didn't know what I would do, at first, so I started doing some research and then came looking for resistance bands. Ten minutes daily with these resistance bands keeps my blood pressure at 110/70. They are durable. I've been using mine for two years now, and they are just as resilient as when I bought them.
summary: Helped me lower my blood pressure.

reviewText: Bought this product to enjoy a quick stretch and work out while at the office.  The bands are great quality and the connections are easy to use. I would buy from this company again.

A well made product.  Has nice extras for different exercises.  We got these resistance bands because a number of classes we now take at the gym are incorporating these type of resistance bands into the workout.  Good to practice at home.
summary: Black Mountain Resistance Bands - Great for exercising at home.

reviewText: I've had this set for several weeks now and so far they are just what I was looking for. I don't really enjoy going to the gym all that much but wanted to do something for my upper body so I purchased the Black Mountain bands. These bands give me all the resistance I need and it's nice having them at home so I can do as much as I want when I want. I'm 68 and my real love is running.  This product has proven to be a worthwhile addition for me for upper body strength.
Love it, it does the job. I haven been doing this at work on my spare time or during breaks. Makes me feel like I get a small work out in the office when I don't have time to hit the gym.

I have used bands for a few months regularly, and I was looking for more to provide me more flexibility to have bands packed for travel or having bands at work. These bands appear well made, and I have been using them a few weeks. They come with some written suggestions for exercises that provide a start on how to use them. Some might find a DVD more helpful, but I already had one from my other set. These bands use the opposite connection system as my other set (i.e. bands clip to handles) and that detail escaped my purchasing decision. They also are shorter than my other bands, which makes them fine for a conventional bicep curl, but too short for some of the shoulder extension exercises I like to do. So it would be nice to know the starting and extended length at the rated resistance. Overall I like them, and I like the flexibility to customize resistance by changing the number and color of bands. An extra set of handles or the option to add more handles to the order would be nice too.
summary: Good quality product appears very well made.

reviewText: Very well made, couldn't be happier with this purchase. Every workout you can do with dumbbells can be replicated with the bands, and adding a loop really increases intensity. Don't think I've used regular weights since these arrived, and I don't think I'll be going back to them.

Ordered the Black Mountain set of five bands, because I did not want to have to buy additional bands separately, if needed.  Plus, I like having the door anchor and ankle strap, too.Quality product, the straps are strong, stitched well, and not flimsy, so it seems it should last a long time.  The door anchor is also very strong and put together well.The bands come in a range of resistances from 2-4 pounds, to 25-20 pounds, plus you can combine the straps to produce upwards of 50-62 pounds of resistance.  ( Resistance measurements based on supplied documentation )Their customer service is knowledgeable and helpful.  This was my first time using bands, so I just wanted to ask about what to expect, care for the product, and anything else that would be useful.The straps do what they are supposed to do and I am happy with the purchase.

I would advise against these. They worked great for about 6 months, then all started showing signs of wear. Now, 8 months into owning them three have snapped just from using them for pull-up exercises, and some lifting exercises. The door strap chews away at them as does the ankle strap. No good at all.
Great product for the money. Have been using these daily with an exercise program, and they are holding up well. So much better than carrying lots of weights around!
I have been using the bands for over two weeks now with no signs of wear or tear.  The bands are heavy duty and they are easily exchanged out.  Definitely recommend these bands for the price.

I ordered the bands for p90x.  They work well enough, and I am able to do all of the movements.  My only problem is that I'm short and can't really get all the resistance I want without using loops.  Fortunately, Black Mountain does offer a free band upgrade (orange, 40lbs).  If you are like me and on the short side, or if you are stronger, I would suggest ordering the orange band; I believe the shipping and handling is free as well.The bands do start to show some wear after a while, but that is expected with bands.  If you're someone who can't afford buying a set of dumbbells, this band product is a good substitution.
summary: As good as can be expected

reviewText: Black mountain products has done a great job with this product. The attachable/combinable tubes, door anchor and ankle strap maximize the exercises you can do and minimize the clutter. I would definitely buy from them again.

I really love these bands, but man... I really wish they came with a second pair of handles. I share these bands with my husband when we workout together, so it is kind of a pain to have to swap out the handles with another size band. Despite not having two pairs of handles, I still really love these bands. They are made well and worth the buy.

Purchased these just over 3 months ago and have consistently used 2-3 times per week since then. They seem to be great quality and have had not issues so far. Very quick and easy to change the handles or strap.I primarily use these to cross train and exercise those hard to reach places as well as for standard strength training. Seem to be of similar quality to those I have used at the gym.I called Customer service when I first received them and they actually picked up and quickly answered a basic question I had. The only negative I can think of is the storage bag is a bit flimsy but I can deal with that.

I have been working out with bands for about 15 months, I have lost 40+ lbs, however I always found my old set frustrating to adjust the weight.  These are great, the clips save time and frustration when doing any workout.  I highly recommend them for P90X or anyone on the go that wants to throw their gym in a bag when on the move.

This bands gives you a excellent workout, better than regular dumbells.I like the way you can add more resistance to the bands very easy an fast. Its so portable you can take it anywhere. I would definitely recommend this to all.

I purchased these about two weeks ago and am very pleased with my purchase. I am 26 years old and in pretty good shape at 150 lbs. These provide great resistance and are perfect for P90X and other programs. They feel sturdy and I picture them lasting a very long time. Good Buy. I got them cheaper on Black Mountain's website, and they offer free shipping.

These are very strong and durable.  I love the door attachment and eased of transferring the weight.  I have used otherbands that only allow the use of one color at a time.  This allows you to add or reduce as many as you want.

This is the first resistance band product I have used and have found that they provide just as good a workout than any workout at any gym. It's a great convenience without taking up a lot of space in my home gym.
summary: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set

reviewText: I have just completed P90X and have used these bands exclusively (no dumbbells or pull-up bars, only bands).  The bands have done everything they have been asked to do with only a few areas of visible wear and tear.  I believe those areas were mostly caused when I needed to stand on the band to increase the resistance.  Even with that, it appears they will last for a long time.  I especially like the easy to use door attachment to allow for pushup/pullup exercises.  Overall, good value for the money.

Purchased these bands after breaking my previous resistance bands(of some other brand) three weeks of P90X. These bands are pretty strong and the fact that it allows combining all the bands at once makes them quite strong. I have used them for over a week now and I don't see even a single stretch mark on the bands. These are really excellent!

My husband and I have been working out in our "home gym" consistently for 2 months now.  We had two resistance bands that only had hand holds.  This made it very difficult to do anything but upper body exercises.  These offer a ton of options now.  They are also easily convertable from hand strap to leg strap to door anchor.  We love them.
They are convenient to carry when traveling. They get through security clearances also. I like the color and coordination with the information sheet.

After I dislocated my shoulder I wanted to get some resistance bands to replicate my exercise at physical therapy.  These bands are better than the ones at the therapy center I go to.  Instead of individual bands haphazardly tied to a mounting rail, some with, and some without handles, these bands are easy clip on, clip off to get the exact amount of resistence you need.  I told my PT that the center should buy a couple sets of these for their office.
summary: better than the bands at my PT

reviewText: These bands are by far and away the most well built I've ever used.  Right out of the box I knew I would not have to worry about these bands breaking or popping out of the connectors.  Everything fits perfectly in the bag provided.  The door and ankle attachments work very well and expand the range of exercise that can be done.  I can't stress enough how well these products are made.  I've used Gold's Gym bands as well as others and NONE feel as solid as these.  I would absolutely look to Black Mountain for future purchases of similar equipment.  Well done.

Exactly what I was looking for at a cheaper price than my local sports equipment store. With the variety of bands and carrying case I don't think there is much else to want with this! Took it for a week long trip and it served its purpose nicely. The door anchor is also pretty awesome.

I bought these resistance bands after comparing them to other sets online.  I took a chance after seeing the number of positive reviews but keeping in mind the few negative reviews.  Everything was going well after I had received my product and was using them with no trouble at all.  Two months go by and as I was doing my usual routine, the green band snapped and almost hit me in the face! I know that these bands like all resistance bands will eventually snap.  I didn't stretch the bands out too far and only worked out with them once a day weekly so I'm confused as to why after only 2 months they decide to wear down so quickly.  I'm not pleased with the durability and the fact that the return window closed only days before they broke but that's life I guess.
these bands start sticking flat when used where stepped on and start ripping at these areas they are only good for temprary use!
these seem to be very well made bands.  they are stretchy and the handles are nice.  haven't used the other options yet but overall very happy
I purchased these bands with door attachment to modifications for pull ups. I think the strap attachement and the bands work great. I typically use the red or black band for more resistance.
These bands have worked great so far. Have been using them with the p90x3 program and have been easy to use. Easy to adjust the amount of resistance as well.
summary: Has been great so far (2 months)

reviewText: For $29.99,  you cannot beat the value with these resistance bands.  There are varying weights and you can combine two or three bands to creat greater resistance.  I have been using these for P90X and they're perfect.  I have a low ceiling so I cannot use a pull-up bar so these are a great alternative.  Would purchase again.
I bought the set of bands to replace a set that I had bought some 10 years ago; I look forward to getting as much use out of this set. They are awesome!

I bought this set about 4 weeks ago for P90X.  So far, I am very happy with the set.  They provide a large range of resistance, but are also able to accomodate small changes.  Also, the ability to quickly change the bands is a great feature.  I know that any sort of dumbbell set, with this range of resistance, would cost 5-10 times this cost.  Also, Black Mountain's Resistance Band set was a much better value than any other similar set I could find at the stores.That being said, I am still getting comfortable with excercises that I need to shorten the bands.  I have had some success with wrapping it around my foot, but there are times when it is still awkward - especially when using multiple bands together.  I assume I will be able to modify and tweek this in the future - for comfort and a better work out - but I am still working on this.All and all, I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend it to others.

I am really big fan of Lifeline products and was about to buy similar product by them. But, I decided to get these as this was 10 times cheaper. I am so glad I did; I am sure lifeline are great. But, these are also awesome! really nice. I will be buying another set for a friend. Sorry Lifeline, but, these killed you and a lot cheaper.
all you need! and a free extra band too :) great little carrying case too. so compact and easily storable!

I have recently started the P90x system, and required these resistance bands for the program. I have shopped around and priced these things all over, and these are the  least expensive by far... especially considering the quality and the included door anchor, leg strap, and the fact that these bands are stackable meaning it will be a long time before you max out on these things. The materials are of high quality. The metal rings are of good construction and the metal clips are thick sturdy metal. the handles are made of high grade nylon webbing and are very strong, the handles have foam grips that are very comfortable to use. The included bag makes taking your stretchy gym everywhere you go very convenient.

These bands are way more convenient then free weights,and just as good a workout.I especially like that you can workout anywhere.I've been using them for several weeks,with no sign of wear.I would definitely buy from BMP again.

This is a good product for the price, & a good one for beginners since it has several strengths of tubing.The padded hand grips are especially helpful.  Everything is well made & well designed & of good quality.Donna
Simple to use anywhere, workout. Bands, connectors and handles are reasonable quality for the price. Door anchor works upper body where I need it the most.
I would recommend these bands to anyone in an exercise program. I think the bands work your muscles in ways you just can't accomplish with dead weights.

Wanted to exercise at home without investing too much in gym equipment.  Was very impressed with the quality of the bands.  You can even combine them or incremental weights.  You feel that burn after the first use.  The backback that it comes with is also very neat to keep everything together.

I used to bodybuild and from lifting heavy weight my joints started to hurt. So I bought these resistance bands and they work great. They are not heavy but after so my repitions you can feel the burn. I work out home, work, and on the go. I a gym in the bag.

I bought these to use for some of the P90X3 workouts that I wanted to do in my apartment vs. the gym.  I used them about one workout a week for 12 weeks.  They fit the bill perfectly.  I. Haven't noticed any rips or tears or faults in the bands at all.  I like that you can add multiple bands to the handles to increase the resistance.  Depending on the exercise, you do get the bands rubbing against bare skin and thus some discomfort or redness.  You can prepare for this by good technique and/or wearing longer sleeves/pants.  This problem would be inherent to all band products...it's just the nature of the product.  Admittedly, I haven't used them excessively, but so far I have no complaints and they are definitely better than a bunch of weights in my apartment for a workout or two a week.  If my opinion changes, I will update my review accordingly.  I normally don't do reviews, but the company is running a promo where you get another stronger band for free if you review- just to be up front.
summary: Worked perfectly for my P90X3 sessions

reviewText: I bought this set to help my P90X3 workout. They're been working out well for the most part. One of the things that drives me insane is switching the handles though. It takes me a while and you don't want to pause the workout every time you want to switch the colors. I've purchased a second handle already but I feel like the set should probably come with at least two. Another thing about the handles... When I'm rushing to switch bands, I always expect the hook to be on the handle. I don't know why it confuses me so much but it does.

Started using these a couple weeks ago for a work-out program and they definitely get the job done! Good price and they're easy to interchange on the handles. I like that they come with the bag so they stay organized and out-of-the-way when not being used (unlike a bunch of free weights which would take up more room).  Haven't used the ankle strap or door anchor.
I am living in my motorhome and need a compact exercise system.  I like the ability to add resistance as you progress in strength.  The equipment is well constructed.
My son and husband both use these bands and they are holding up very well. Would recommend them for all ages.

I live in Northern New York and do a simple workout throughout the winter months (this year too many months) to maintain some flexibility.  I enjoy a simple workout that I do with Black Mountain Resistance Bands (tubes).  My workout consists of Overhead Press, Lateral Raises, Upright Rowing, Biceps Curls, Triceps Extensions, Standing Row, Chest Press and Calf Raises; then as golf season get closer I add Overhead Wood Chop (R&L;),  Standing Side Twist (R&L;) and Reverse Wood Chop (R&L;). These last three are very helpful in getting back into the rotation mode you will need for your golf swing, and if you are like me you need all the help you can get.The Black Mountain Resistance Bands (tubes) are color coded which makes it easy to select the right resistance for what you need.  The ones I have are Yellow 2-4lbs., Blue 4-6lbs., Green 10-12lbs., Black 15-20lbs. and Red 25-50lbs; and you can combine these to make other various resistances.  This package also includes a door anchor that is great for two reasons.  The first it allows to try quite a few more exercises by giving you a stable anchor at various heights on the door.  This anchor has the blocking necessary to prevent it from slipping through the door when shut, but it is small enough to slip through the crack in the door from the front.  This allows you to position it exactly where you want it quickly.All these various bands(tubes) and the combinations allow you to personalize your workout by switching or combining the tubes to give you the resistance that works for you.  It also allows my wife to use the same equipment (two for the price of one), which make it very cost efficient.  It takes almost no room for storage and we can take it any where we go on vacation.Great product, very pleased and I highly recommend it.D. Leonard

Have been using it every day since it came. Very impressed with the quality of the product. Metal clips were used instead of plastic. Comes with its own bag so everything can be kept together. Nice selection of bands, and more variety and strengths than most other companies. Last set I purchased only had three bands. This set has five with the the possibility of a sixth. Also comes with an ankle strap. I highly recommend it to anyone who would like a lot of workout for not much money. And it only takes up the same space as small throw pillow.
summary: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set

reviewText: This product is great !!!, Black Mountain Products are excellent quality and exceed every expectation.I think Black Mountain Products Rocks.

I am 67 years old and have been into regular, daily exercise for over 35 years.  I run (pavement and mountain trails and even treadmill); I use the elliptical and free and stationary weights.  I also do extensive daily core exercises.  The problem has been the time it takes each day to do all this and the inability to do the weights when I travel.  This Resistance Band set has been a true God-send for me.  I can accomplish so many of my exercises with the resistance bands and maintain my fitness regimen in less time and no matter where I go in my travels.  They are excellent quality, compact, and actually fun to use.  The variety of resistance levels for the various colors of bands seems to correctly match actual hand weights.  The written instructions that come with this set gives clear easy instructions for a wide range of exercise uses along with diagrams.  I wish I'd have found something like this 30 years ago.  I could have saved a ton of money and time in maintaining my own fitness program.  Thank you Black Mountain!
summary: Best Addition To My Workout Regimen Ever!

reviewText: So.... these are great. Whatever you do, make sure you get a number of bands (just like this set!)When I started P90X I used just one braided Reebok resistance band, because I didn't think I'd need multiple different resistance strengths. I was wrong. Certain exercises were too light, no matter how big I made the loop, and certain exercises too heavy, even with no loop. The problem, especially with making a really big loop, is that you overstretch the band and before you know it, it tears. Mine tore within 2 months.The BMP set, however, is great. I use all five bands, from the lightest one (yellow) for straight arm shoulder flies to a combination of the heaviest ones (red and black) for bicep curls. Speaking of which, this is a really clever system that allows you to use multiple bands in one exercise, so you can create your own weight. Really smart. The door hook anchor is also cleverly made, with no metal parts, so if for some reason your door isn't strong enough, at least no metal will be flying in the direction of your face.The only thing I would do is call BMP before they ship your stuff, and ask them if you could order an extra set of handles to be shipped along with your order. It makes switching between bands (and therefore between exercises) so much easier! And the staff of BMP is super friendly and nice about it.Enjoy your workout with these!

I purchased this set of exercise bands to user for rehabbing an IT band injury from running.  I have used them daily for the past three months and they have held up very well.  The door anchor and ankle band are fantastic - they are easy to use and work well.  I have had bad luck with door anchors in the past.  This one secures through door hinge and is very secure.  The only issue I have had is that the tote bag included to house the bands and other pieces ripped.  Admittedly, I have been hard on the bag with daily use and traveling.  I contacted Black Mountain Products to inquire about obtaining another bag.  I received excellent customer service and they quickly resolved my issue.  I highly recommend these exercise bands and Black Mountain Products as a company.

UNREAL!!!!! This stuff is Arnold quality.  I went from a shrimp to danger zone in a matter of weeks only using these puppies.  The assortment of bands and quality is second to none on a serious note.  I normally steer clear of these bands but not anymore.  Oh and if you look up customer service in the dictionary...the phone number for black mountain is the only thing that shows up.  Thanks again guys for an outstanding product!
summary: Not now, I'm in the zone!

reviewText: I have never used resistance bands before, but purchased it to use with EA Active for Wii.  For me, this is a high-quality product and the handles are comfortable.  I do enjoy using free weights - it has a different feel - but can't use them with Wii.  Occasionally, the bands get in the way when I used them, but that probably would be true for any resistance band.I've used the bands for a couple of weeks now and they seem to be of high quality - no tears or 'white' stress marks.  When I'm done with them they store nicely in the bag and stows away.
summary: Very Nice - Portable and small storage footprint

reviewText: Great value.  Just what I thought it was.  Have to change out the handles every time I use a different band, but I knew that going into the purchase, so all is good.

These resistance bands are a great addition to any workout.  I can simply bring the bag with me wherever I travel and I have an instant gym!  Black Mountain also sent me an extra resistance band when I called their number for the promotion.  I have traveled around the East Coast and the bands have been great for road travel.  Great quality materials!

I've been using the bands for over a month now with P90X and I've got to say, they're great.They're strong, durable, and the customization is just great. From the start I was maxed out on the highest band, but with the ability to combine bands, I'm able to fine tune my tension for each and every workout. Before buying these I tried a single band that I payed the same price for. No comparison.They also come with a door mount (which I haven't been able to figure out yet) and an ankle strap. Anyone who is considering these bands, don't wait. Pick them up today!
summary: Excellent Bands for an Excellent Price

reviewText: These resistance bands are great.  I really like the way the different bands can be easily combined to result in additional resistance for different exercises and workouts.  The ability to combine bands also makes it very easy for my wife and I to easily customize our workouts for the correct resistance for each of us.
summary: Great product - easy to use - easy to customize resistance levels

reviewText: I purchased this product about a month ago and was immediately impressed with the high quality bands with such a low cost. Being a experiencing weight lifter I was skeptical about the amount of resistance these bands would offer. However after continuous use over the past month I am a new believer in the benefits these resistance bands can provide. Another thing that I appreciate about BMP is the great customer service and the great warranty it provides on it's products.
Quality is very good and well constructed. The grommets are heavy-duty, and with everything supplied, you can do all the basic exercises needed. Great for travelling as well.

A simple product that does exactly what one would expect from exercise bands.  Extremely well made and warrents its lifetime guarantee.  Product support is responsive.  I would recommend this product for anyone looking for an easily useable exercise device.

I've been using these regularly for a couple of months now, and am pleased with the quality and operation.  The only snags I can think of are that the instructions get a little rumply inside the bag, and when you have all the bands in use the rings get a little crowded.  Would recommend to a friend, would buy again.
summary: Good product, does what I want it to do.

reviewText: Been using these bands from time to time and so far so good. Elasticity is great and the accessories come in handy. Just wish they were a tad longer.
summary: ... bands from time to time and so far so good. Elasticity is great and the accessories come in ...

reviewText: If you like to lift, enjoy having some definition, but hate the gym and lack the space for larger weight sets... Buy this!

Received as a gift and am very happy with the product thus far.I used them during P90X workouts and find that the various color combinations give me the needed resistance.Just hope they last a long time, no concerns yet.

I bought these bands for some rehab at home after having surgery on a severe tendon tear in my shoulder.  The easier bands are all I have been able to use thus far, however, I'm looking forward to using the heavier blue and black ones once my strength comes back.  I also happen to be a Certified Personal Fitness Trainer and would definitely use this equipment if I was working with a beginner or intermediate (male or female) at their home or office.  VERY VERSATILE equipment that allows for an incredible range of motion/movements.  The clips are easy to attach/detach and the door anchor allows a full range of positioning.  There are probably 50 different exercises (maybe more) you can do with these bands.One word of caution - even the toughest band wouldn't be enough for an extremely strong person, so if you bench 400 and do 150 lbs on tricep pull-downs, you may have outgrown some of this equipment or will be bored with it.  However, even for the biggest person, there are some neat balance exercises and small muscle groups you could work on.I really like this set so far.  Quality seems excellent, however if I have any problems with it, I will update my review.
summary: Great set of very functional bands for training at home!

reviewText: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band set is a good value for the workout available.  The range of 5 bands strengths is good, and the instructions show you how to combine them to make 3 heavier levels of force.  The included handles are nice, and all the attachments appear very sturdy.  I haven't tried the ankle strap or door anchor yet, so I can't comment on those.  However, my first impression is that Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set is a good workout value.
Great quality.  Light weight and so convenient for travel.  Provide a lot more resistance than expected so you get a good workout.

Very happy with the bands, I am coming back from full rebuild or my right side from a tumor wiping out 2 vertebra in my neck along with major nerve damage. I can use the light bands and my brother uses the heavy bands for more rigorous workout.
It's a good set and they're quite durable. Probably won't be enough to get someone into good shape but is good for toning or intense stretching.

Very nice band set for the novice or more advanced user.  The ability to add more resistance to match your needs is fantastic.  Only wished I purchased extra handles on day one to allow  multiple users or preset up configurations.
As a physical therapist I'm always looking for durable bands to use at home or in the clinic and I hit the jackpot on this one.

These bands are sturdy and durable, have been using them for a few weeks every day now and they are still strong. Makes your muscles and joints feel great as well, if your'e going to get resistance bands you should get these ones. Also, it comes with a velcro strap that you can attach to a machine at your gym so you can do more quad and hamstring exercises.

I love my new set of resistance bands. I can work on strengthening by body without leaving home. What makes these bands especially good is that they can be stacked to increase the amount of resistance with which you are working. This makes it so easy to move on to next level, all in the comfort of your home. I would recommend them to anyone who is interested in sculpting their body or merely in just toning. I showed them to a co-worker who is a personal trainer and he immediately bought a couple of sets.

Because of a bone spur in my shoulder, my doctor advised me to quit doing chin-ups. He recommended I switched to a rowing motion for similar upper body conditioning. I asked him to review the exercises listed in the instruction guide, and he marked several as essentially unsafe. The rest of the exercises are, in his opinion, safe exercises that are not likely to create new customers/patients for his sports medicine practice.From a practical standpoint, I really like these bands. I am on the road a lot and have been able to use them wherever I go. For me, they are supplemental to my primary training (distance running). They take up very little space in my suitcase, and they are easy to adjust to the varying environments in which I find myself.To increase resistance beyond the heaviest band, simply add another band to them. The colors of the bands indicate different weights or resistance levels. I'm adding a label to each of the bands so that if or when I lose the chart from the book, I will still have a pretty good handle on their expected resistance.
summary: Check with your doctor before using

reviewText: Got these bands a few days ago to use with p90x, because a dumbbell set cost atleast a couple hundred, and the bands sold at beachbody are way more expensive than these.I used old 5 quart jugs filled with sand before for everything, but these work phenomenally better. I've only been using them for a weak, and they show no sign of wear thus far. I'll update this if/when that changes.There's not a whole lot to say about them though. They do exactly what they're supposed to. And I like that you can use multiple bands for different weights.My only complaint is for a few exercises, the fabric on the bands sometimes rubs against my arms.

The resistance band set was great for the versatility and use at home.  The bands have held up well with use and the ability to combine different bands to change the resistance is very useful.  This can't replace a normal gym or help you gain a ton of muscle mass, but I would recommend this to anyone who wants the opportunity to keep lean without the gym membership.

I have been using these bands for about 2 months now and they are performing as described. The snap hooks to change from one band to another work fine. The padded hand grips are more conmfortable than the ones they replaced and the storage bag is compact and makes it easy to pack them.

I love this product. It's a great way to get a different workout than the one you get at the gym every day with the same free-weights. I think its better for toning but when you combine 2 or more bands you can still get a strength workout.  Essential piece of a home workout set in my mind.  Only thing that worries me is them stretching really far since I'm tall, but the lifetime warranty on all bands makes me not worry.  Highly recommended.
summary: Great Change Up Workout at Home

reviewText: I got these to use with a of the Beachbody program (P90x3 and 21 Day Fix) and really love them. Incredibly high quality and it's easy to double up bands if you want extra resistance. I think this was the best $32 I have ever spent on at home fitness, and I'll be recommending it to everyone!
summary: Absolute BEST resistance Bands I have EVER purchased.

reviewText: Peak Your Performance with these Resistance Bands. Excellent product transaction. Quality bands. Our students, and staff  have been using them and in their words, "those are great." Thank you BMP products! Were excited to do more business with you in the future.Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying Case
Good set of exercise bands.  Very versatile. I really like the door frame hooks.  I can use it in my office at work

Product is as described. Really resistant and provided a great fit to workout with P90X. After working out with these for 2 months already resistance is still there and there wasn't any signs of wear or tear. Would purchase this product again!

These things are more effective and better made than I expected. As a pastor in my late 50's, I don't get a lot of exercise, nor do I have a lot of extra time or money. I wanted something small and inexpensive - not a weight machine that I would have to set up in the basement. My wife suggested exercise bands. After a quick review, I determined that 1) I needed a complete set to have enough for a good workout, 2) they had to me made well (many reviews complained about weak stitching and other failures). BMP's "new and improved" set (that included a Door Anchor - which I use in about half the exercises I do) seemed like the best choice.As a former engineer, I look closely at design, workmanship and quality of materials. I have not seen other brands up close, but I am very impressed with this set from BMP. The straps connecting the handles to the bands are made of heavy "ballistic nylon", with an extra piece added to double the thickness where the heavy duty metal grommet is located. To keep the bands from pulling through the grommet, they appear to have something like a large ball-shaped bead over the tubing with a tough rubber sleeve over that - a very nice design. The handles have a somewhat thin, but comfortable padding. The clips that attach the bands to the handle are heavy-duty and easy to clip with a single motion.Before my first workout, I tried each exercise to determine what band combination I would need. I then ordered my workout to somewhat minimize the number of band changes -- but I was surprised how quickly I could change them out. I was also pleased with the variety and quality of the exercises - I thought bands would be a poor substitute for machines and free weights, but in many ways I find bands to be better - especially compared to the kind of machines you can afford for home.One of the things I found to be lacking with the BMP set was exercise instructions - they only have six exercises. If they just printed one more double-sided piece of paper they could have added an additional 12 exercised. So I found a good small booklet - "The Great Stretch Tubing Handbook" for $8.95.
summary: Just right for an out-of-shape pastor.

reviewText: I was having neck and upper back pain and ordered this product to help me strengthen my upper back and neck.  Due to the flexibility of the product, I was able to work out each muscle exact as it needed.  After just 2 days, I am now pain free!!

Great!! easy switch to add or remove resistance good for beginners trying to develop strength and stability. great product and feel of the handles and ankle wrap is a plus to develop those leg muscles. easy to carry with the bag provided, also easy storage of equipment.
Is really convenience and is really good for my beginners athletics person on my training classes  they love it and that's whats all about.  Thanks....
summary: The Best Set for a Complete Work out and a very good price !!!

reviewText: These are neat. For only a few dollars, you get bands for your workout. I use the resistance to stretch my muscles and I always feel better after doing so. They're small and lightweight so you can stick 'em anywhere when they are not in use.

I have used these bands for over a year.  I had issues when one of the clipss broke.  I contacted the company and they sent out a replacement, no questions asked.  Really happy with this company.  I bought a 2nd set for my sister becuase of their customer service!

This product is well made and several different tension strength that allows different levels of excersise. I had a spinal fusion and in need of another one, this allows me to build up my back muscles. Really like this product.

I was looking for an alternative to augment my weight training that was well constructed and compact. This product is everything i expected. The quality of each band and connections for them is excellent. I have used the bands almost daily for weeks. I  have had great results.  This is a good product and very reasonably priced. I recommend this product.

I purchased the set about two years ago and have used the bands maybe a total of two dozen times while on trips. Quality construction, but two of the bands are already shredding and are unsafe to use. Appears the latex deteriorates faster than it should. I'm disappointed that I'll have to replace them at my cost........although BMP's website claims their products have a lifetime guarantee.

This is one of those rear times when a product is much better then advertised.the packaging was superb and i am very happy.  i will see how it goes for the next six months and then write another review but for right now i am a happy  camper.

I purchased this set to compliment my P90x workout and the Red band (the highest resistance) broke on me and snapped in the middle of one of my exercises. Reasoning was because I had stepped on the band to create a loop and increase tension. I called the company and they immediately replaced my band and also included a higher tension level complimentary for me and I was very pleased by their service.
summary: Band snapped but company quickly replaced it

reviewText: Been using these bands for a while...they are awesome and I get a good strength workout from them. I am female and not seeking a deeply cut physic...this does the job
We are using our bands for P90X3 workouts.  They travel easy and are very durable.  I would like to purchase some longer bands though.

I purchased these Black Mountain workout bands about a week ago, and have been PLEASANTLY surprised with their durability and craftsmanship. I am a big guy 5'9 210 lbs, that competes in both BBing and Plifting competitions. I was looking for a way to work on my explosive exercises, while minimizing joint strain and these bands have been perfect. I have shyed away from resistance bands in the past because I always feel like I am going to break them, but that has not been the case. The hand grips are also very comfortable making tricep movements and over the head movements easy to perform. Overall very impressed.

I have been using this product for the last 3 months for 2-3 workouts a week. The bands seem to be very durable and have done exactly what I needed them to do. They are great for travel and easy to use.

My wife and I use these bands to help with our p90x routine.  She can't do the pull ups so we use these bands against the door to get a pull up motion.  The bands a good quality and the do have a good resistance feeling.

This product has been wonderful for every muscle group at home. Every color is a different weight, I love being able to do a complete workout in the privacy of my home. I would and have recommended this to anyone who loves to workout!

My BMP Resistance Band Set just arrived so this is part one, God willing, of a two part review.My initial reaction is extremely positive. The Amazon package itself arrived intact and the items themselves were nestled safely within their own easy to open BMP packaging. The high quality of the exercise bands, straps, handles and carabiners is immediately apparent. The amount of weight resistance stated for each band felt accurate when testing them out.Oh yes, you also get a pleasant little surprise when you open the box. I won't give it away, but it did cause me to call the number given...and that's when I received the second pleasant surprise: a human being, a nice young man by the name of Justin, answered. He answered all my questions thoroughly and patiently.This is a small family business and, if what I am seeing continues, it should turn into a larger family business. I do hope, when that happens, they continue to forgo Voicemail as the primary means of initial interaction with old, new and potential clients.Now all I have to do is actually use the bands regularly...I was an exercise maniac until the birth of my daughter twenty years ago (she born with a serious medical disorder that took precedence over my exercising...and sleeping, eating, socializing and any other normal everyday stuff...so, until recently, going out for a two to four hour run five days a week was out of the question.) Now, at the ripe old age of 59, I am slowly getting back on track. I've a long, long way to go.
