This band set seems to be the perfect solution for overcoming my strength training inertia and a great substitute for going to a gym.We shall see...if there is a second review in about two weeks, that will mean I am well on my way to improving my strength. That, in itself, will be a testimony to the ease of use of this band set.
summary: Excellent Bang for the Buck...actually even more

reviewText: I ordered these to use with P90X and they work great.  Being new to the P90X scene, I've been using the three lowest weights, but they have provided me a great alternative to bulky weights that take up a lot of space.  They are easy to change bands between exercises.  They travel well because everything fits into a nice bag so I can continue my workout on the road.  My husband also finds them helpful in his fitness goals because he can have a variety of weight options, again not taking up much space in our limited basement.  This product certain serves the purpose for a great price.

Really great product.  We're doing P90X and these are really helpful for our family with a variety of resistances and easy switching to make things tougher or easier.  Quality handles are comfortable and easy to switch.  So far, after 7 weeks the bands continue to show no wear or nicks or signs of breakdown.  Quite pleased by the product and the price.  We ended up buying 4 sets.
Works well.
Exactly what was showed in the ad...exactly what i needed..no regrets.. fully recomendad!good quality, shipped on time.
summary: Exactly what was showed in the ad...

reviewText: I received this resistance band set a week or so ago. So far so good; I've had no problems with the bands stretching out of shape or snapping during a workout. I'll update this review if any of that changes. Otherwise if you're looking for a good set of resistance bands go with this item.
summary: good item, no issues so far

reviewText: I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality of these bands at their price point.  They are sturdy, well constructed, and well thought out.  There is no difference between these and the fifteen dollar single bands available at large sporting goods stores.The interchangable handle is very easy to use, taking only seconds to transfer.  The item I was most interested in was the door anchor.  It is very simple, again well thought out, and easy to use.  I'm using it in a standard hollow-core interior door and it doesn't budge a millimeter.  I am using the bands with P90X.My only complaint it that after just the first few uses, the padding on the handle began to crush and remain crushed.  It seems like it won't be long before I wear it off entirely.  I voiced this concern to an extraordinarily responsive customer service rep and was told that should the padding fail the handles will be replaced free of charge.  With customer service like that this product and company receive 5 stars!

For simple workouts at home without space hogging equipment these bands are great. They can offer up decent resistance and are incredibly versatile. Included in the bad of bands and connectors is a small instruction manual for tips on exercises and while I laughed at it I eventually turned to it and it did help as bands are different than free weights.One other great note is that these bands offer a better core workout as more muscle groups are working to keep me stable/anchored as I do my rowing or curling exercises. abs get a great burn going and even noticed my legs feeling a little sore after a good rowing set
summary: Everything you get from bulky equipment without the wasted space!

reviewText: This item is exactly as it's described and performs as its manufacturer's claim.  After nearly 500 stretches, these bands aren't cracking or splitting in the slightest.  The handles are comfortable and the way the handles rotate as you move means you can shift the position of your wrists in mid-motion without having to adjust your grip.  They are also comfortable in your hands, not big and awkward, even in small hands.They're good for short and tall people alike, being neither too long nor too short.  They're built sturdy and going by the adage that a unit is as strong as its weakest link, and every piece is built to last.
Durable and really easy to change weights.  Would highly recommend for anyone looking for some work out gear to travel with.

I had to stop going to the gym because of my back.  These resistance bands provide a very low impact work out, along with a good starting program with the included booklet.  My son even uses the lowest resistance band when he works out with me.

I am very pleased with my recent purchase. This item shipped quickly and the quality is higher than I expected at this price point. I would highly recommend this item for someone looking for a high quality band package for their home or office.
summary: Great product at the right price

reviewText: I've had these bands now for 15 months and they are still going strong.I bought them to use with P90X for more variation than only using free weights and for general workout use.I really like the caribeaner style hook-up for adding multiple bands.It would be nice if the door attachment piece had a gromet in it so that you could bolt it to a location rather than bolting straight through the fabric, as I don't use a doorway, but rather have it mounted.Overall I am very pleased and would recommend these bands.
For those that hate or don't have access to a gym this is a great alternative workout! Must buy now!

I have been working out with weights for nearly 30 years.  But there were a number of exercises I could not do well due to shoulder, tennis elbow irritations, and kinks in the knee.  I couldn't do shoulder presses, any type of dumbbell presses or flies, tricep pullovers, preacher curls, bench press, rear deltoid flies, barbell squats, etc. Upon switching to the resistance bands I have been able to do all of these exercises and more with no problems whatsoever.  And I have been doing very heavy resistance with the bands.  After having a bad shoulder for over 20 years, I never dreamed this kind of intense workouts would be possible again. the resistance bands have strengthened my shoulder.  I am stronger now than I have been in a long, long time.the bands are strong and sturdy.  I have no problems lifting them overhead, clipping on 3 and 4 bands at a time.  I did buy some loop bands from discount-bands.com, which seems to be a part of Amazon.  they are unbreakable.  I do squats, shrugs, and heavy stuff with the loop bands.  the squats are great with the loop bands, with less stress on the back than a barbell.  Not much need for iron weights and the gym any more.  But I have not lost any muscle strength. with some thought, there is no muscle that resistance bands cannot work in a very effective way.

I absolutely love this product.  I have had mine for a couple of weeks now, and I can already feel the difference in my muscle size and tone.  The door attachment is a must have.  I also really enjoy that I can clip several bands at a time to the handles to customize resistance, as each band by itself doesn't seem to provide enough resistance for my needs.  The bands are made of quality material and are covered with a lifetime warranty if I'm not mistaken.To those who are upset that the product doesn't have more explanations of how to use the bands, I would say this:  If you can use Amazon, you can use Google and Youtube.  There are hundreds of sources of information on how to use resistance bands.
Excellent product. Very satisfied and good value for the money. I am using it to rehab my knee after acl surgery
They came exactly like they said they would and have been working great!  I really like using them all the time

These bands are great. They are durable and very stretchy. Haven't had any problems with rips, nor were any of my bands damaged when I received them. The carrying case is a bit large, but it leaves room for me to put things like my water bottle and towel in it too. The only gripe I have is, which hasn't really become a problem yet, but the handles that come with these bands are a little lacking, but I hope not. Let me explain. The handles are made of plastic, and covered in a thin coat of foam padding. I understand that lightweight handles may be desired, but they don't feel sturdy enough; When there is a lot of tension on the bands, I'm not usually worried about the band snapping, I worry that the handle will slip, or snap/bend. They haven't failed, but that still doesn't mean that they won't.

I ordered these bands in the hope that they would push my workouts to the next level, and i was not disappointed. If you are using P90x3 or any quick interval training program, the worst thing in the world is having to change the bands, but keep pace with the workout. The clips system with these bands makes changing the weighted resistance effortless. I have the hand size of a professional basketball player, but the handles are very comfortable. The weighting system for the bands in very accurate as well. If you are looking for a great set of resistance bands look no further!!
Seems to be very good quality. The rubber tubing is good, and especially the connections and connection hardware has been done very well.
I am very pleased with the set.  The multiple bands allow for many configurations of resistance.  I ordered an extra set of handles.  I use the heavier bands and my wife uses the lower bands.

The fact is all these resistance bands are made from similar materials and they WILL break down over time if used regularly. That being said, Black Mountain stands by their products 100%. I've never had problems getting any bands replaced, and my set came with a voucher for a free higher level band just for buying the set. Telephone support is super fast, and email support is almost as quick. I can't say enough good things about them.The product itself is well made, and the door anchor is great for doing pull-ups, especially if you don't have a door-frame which is required for pull-up bar usage. Works fairly well for p90x but not perfectly, switching bands constantly between workouts can slow you down, and some exercises are really awkward with the bands. Still, for $30 or so, they are very hard to beat for how versatile they are.Highly recommended.
summary: Great quality product, even better customer service

reviewText: I purchased this set to use for P90X when traveling and staying in gyms without great exercise facilities.  I'm very happy with it.  In particular:- The band ends swivel to prevent twisting or binding.- The grip rotates as well, making for very smooth motion when doing standing curls, tricep kickbacks, or any other motion more complex than a straight pull.- The clips and stacking hardware are very high quality, and the stackable nature of the bands (can work with one, two, three, or more different bands at once) allows me to get a lot of variety in resistance from low resistance for tricep work all the way up to very high resistance for pull-downs.- Door hardware works great.- One set of handles and a pile of bands packs a little tighter than a set where each band has its own handles.Minor downsides to be aware of:- the stacking hardware can be problematic (scrape you) if trying to do exercises where you draw the band across your body such as overhead tricep extensions.  Usually just means adjusting your technique a bit.- When using stacked bands it can be harder to vary length by stepping on a loop of the band.  Just something to be aware of, but by no means a big problem.Would enthusiastically recommend.

I am currently stationed in Taji, Iraq and needed to get some weights or bands to continue with my P90X.  Since these resistance bands didn't cost to much to ship I decided to do the bands.  The bag they come in is a little flimsy, I have already torn it, but it does get abused.  The bands are good and the door and leg attachments work well too.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because I didn't realize that there was only one set of handles.  I have to keep changing the handles when I change bands and it makes sharing the bands impossible.  So far so good though, they seem to be well made and put up with loads of abuse.
summary: Good for P90X on the go

reviewText: This was my first time buying bands. They appear to be of good quality. And they have a warranty which is reassuring. great product for the price (5 bands, 2 handles, door jam, nice bag, etc)

I am on the road a lot.  These bands make working out on the road easy.  Take up no room in the suitcase.  You can pack the bands you need and get some good resistance training.  Especially nice when the hotel exercise room is less than advertised.
summary: Makes working out on the road easy.

reviewText: I loved the bands for about 2 weeks! My workout was much more portable.  I loved it, that is, until while doing bicep curls with the door anchor under my door frame, the bulky knob slipped out from under the door and I got hit in the face with 30 pounds worth of resistance band!  I was fortunate enough to not be seriously injured (I hope.. provided the blurry area in the vision of my right eye comes back to normal).  The bulky knob on the opposite side of the door has the capacity to compress!!! They didn't use a hard object, so it wore down over time, compressing more and more until it slipped under, resulting in a great deal of pain, and a black eye.  Word to BMP: FIX THIS UNLESS YOU WANT TO SERIOUSLY INJURE SOMEONE!As far as the bands go, they're great.  Sure.  But be careful about that anchor....

I just received the product last week but am very pleased with the product.These bands are HIGH quality. You can see and feel how well made they are!The Black and red ones are so heavy!These are amazing for home exercising!Definitely recommend them!
I found these bands to be good quality. They are working well for my pt at home. I would buy them again.

I've been using the bands for a few weeks now and I'm happy with my experience. I've seen results, through using them 2-3 times per week. They're extremely easy to carry around and move, which is great for someone like myself who moves regularly. Unlike dumbbells, I can just throw them in my suitcase and not concern myself. Customer service phone line was very helpful and cordial the only time I got in touch with them.I can think of only two minor drawbacks: Firstly, that using multiple bands at once can be a bit unwieldy, but it's certainly something that can be gotten used to. Secondly, that I wish the bands had some markers on them to indicate a halfway point or other marker points to make it easier to do exercises that involve standing on them or using another stability tool.
summary: Big fan of the product and company

reviewText: This set is great.  Does what it's suppose to and easy to interchange.  I got these for P90X and find myself liking a lighter set-up and heavier set-up.  You'd need 2 sets of handles for that, but this set is great otherwise.
summary: Add an additional set of Handles

reviewText: I was very happily surprised by the quality and variety of the resistance bands as well as the attachment point devices included with this kit. Everything appears to be made from high quality materials and is packed in a convenient nylon pouch (that will hopefully keep me from losing any of the pieces...). The different levels of resistance offered by the color coded bands and combining two or more if necessary, should satisfy pretty much anyone other than a body builder who is looking to gain strength from ultra high resistance. This kit is obviously for rehabilitation of injured and/or weak joints/muscle groups and should be perfect for anyone who is looking for that kind of system.I'd recommend it and would buy it again.

I'm 44 years old and travel a lot.  The resistance bands from Black Mountain were exactly what I was looking for.  The bands and included accessories have allowed me to utilize all of the videos in Tony Horton's "10-Minute Trainer" workouts.  The price is low for these bands, but the quality of the hardware and construction are not.
summary: Great product at a great price

reviewText: I love what you get for the price.  Unfortunately, the band with the least resistance broke on us within the first week of use.  I'm worried that if that happens with one of the other bands someone in my house may lose an eye!
I am very happy with my new excercise bands. I wanted something portable as I travel with my job. This is perfect to use in my hotel room. I can get as much or as little a workout as I please.

I purchased these bands to use while doing P90X workouts at home. I don't know that the bands really correspond to the weight that they say they do. I'm healthy and strong, but not a hulk by any means and I skipped all the bands and started with the highest weight one which is red. Then I used red and black together which seemed to give me more of a challenge.  In the package they shipped with there was a postcard saying that you could call and get a free orange band (more weight than the red). I did this and also mentioned that one of the handles that I received was slightly torn and also wanted to pay for an extra set of handles. They said it was no problem and that I wouldn't be charged for the extra handles. So, I received my orange band (perfect for me) as well as 3 handles. They customer service is prompt and very happy to help. I am very pleased with my purchase and have been using these for about 1.5 months and have had no problems. Definitely worth the money.
summary: Good bands, even better customer service.

reviewText: I've been using these resistance bands for a couple of months and really like them.  By combining the various bands you can achieve practically any level of resistance imagineable.

I purchased these bands to use with the 10 minute trainer work out system. So far they have been working out fine. My only wish is that BMP made some sort of chest band for use during push ups.The bands don't attach well to the chest strap that I have now, but that's the only limitation that I have noticed so far.

I travel a lot for work and some of the hotels I stay at don't always have the best gyms. I bought these to help with keep myself active. Let me say they are great quality. Nice metal clamps at the ends. The grips are very comfortable. The exercise guide is nice and detailed. I do wish, however, that in the guide next to each exercise they said which muscle group you are using. Since I'm new to bands that would have helped. But they are great and I recommend them to anyone looking for good quality resistance bands.

I ordered the P90x and needed to look into resistance bands.  These bands were highly rated and I bought them just over a month ago.  These bands have surpassed my expectations from durability to functionality. I am new to resistance bands as well, and was also happy with the instruction booklet that had a circuit of exercises to also use as well.  Called customer service with a question and was never placed on hold either. They were very helpful and I will defintely purchase Black Mountain Products again.Update -- It has been over four months I have been using these bands, they really are standing up to the workouts.  VERY DURABLE..  I will be ordering more products from Black Mountain.

I bought these bands since they are the same ones I use at the gym with my personal trainer.  Thought since they are good enough for the pro gym, they are good enough for me, and i haven't been disappointed.  The door hinge strap works well, but at some point I am going to want some fixed anchor points on the wall, because adjusting the position between exercises is a little cumbersome.  I would definitely buy these again if I had to do over, and would recommend to anyone else.  And the price is right too!
summary: Great addition to my home gym equipment

reviewText: I've had these bands for a couple weeks now and they are exceptional. I use them for myself and my son's shoulder workouts for baseball and I can definitely feel the difference. They also have quick concise customer support. Looking forward to doing business with this company another time.
summary: Great bands for a great price!

reviewText: I bought these resistance bands 2 weeks ago to use along with P90x.  Everything looked good upon arrival.  The carrying case is nice, and all of the accessories seemed pretty straightforward.After using the resistance bands once, the green band already had a tear in it.  I was pretty disappointed, and called Black Mountain's customer service.  They were very nice on the phone, and said the band must have been defective.  They offered to send me a new green band free of charge.  I have yet to actually receive this band after 2 weeks, but I haven't lost hope yet.I had been using the rest of the bands daily for P90x over the past 2 weeks.  This morning, I had the yellow band completely snap on me, which was pretty unpleasant.  Now I've had 2 of the 5 bands either tear or snap on me.  At this point, I'm just buying a different brand, since I don't trust the durability of this set anymore.One thing to note is that I think these bands are particular sensitive to the exercises where you need to step of the bands closer to the edge.  The particular exerciser that caused the yellow band to snap was the squat x-press.
summary: Didn't last more than 2 weeks for P90x

reviewText: I bought a set close to 3 years ago, and finally wore them out.  These new bands are even more reinforced, and I think I'll get just as much if not more use out these new ones.

I bought this product for my wife because it had a light weight band. You can not find lite weight bands. And she could increase the resistance as she progresses. Well I tried the bands stacked and I liked them. I exercise 6 times a week and have one extra heavy band. I really liked this set because the different attachments and the different way to vary resistance. I like to vary my training and the Black Mountain tubes allow me to do this. We are on a limited budget and this product is inexpensive and good quality. I just bought another set for my self. This worth the money.

reviewerName: F. Williams "Practice and you will master you...
reviewText: This product offer a wealth of different strength exercises. Its never a dull moment, and with the manual included makes things a lot better. Best money spent!
Bought this set for my wife and she has been using it every night. Product is providing exactly what we were looking for. The added exercise booklet was a nice bonus

I use it for working out at home and its very good. It's a great thing to use when you're not able to go to the gym and lift weights and also for phyiscal therapy. its very light, easy to store, and carry. you can do various exercises. I highly recommend this product to anyone who loves to work out
These are the best resistance bands ever!! I absolutely love them and easy to adjust for comfortable workouts and toning up :) I will keep using B.M.P  equipment for home use thanks!
Fantastic product! More durable than I expected. Best quality band I've seen/used. More of a work out than I expected. Great customer service too! Thanks BMP!
High quality and extremely versatile.  These bands are much better than any I have seen before.  They are extremely versatile and extremely high quality.  Would highly recommend.

I have recently purchased this item to be used at home when I am too lazy to get to the club to move the weights.  The materials seem to be well made and I hope they will last for some time.  The fact that there are multiple interchangeable bands make it possible to vary the amount of effort necessary to stretch them which is nice.  There is a simple book of directions which will enable the user to exercise most of the muscle groups.  On YOUTUBE there are video demos of the various of exercise options.  Since it was quite inexpensive it is hard to complain.  It is also very portable.  It does not replace a real workout.  I would buy it again.
summary: It seems sturdy but time will tell

reviewText: they are the best band set i have ever ownedi would highly recomend them to some one looking to get in shape

These are a great product. I had to start Physical Therapy on my left shoulder. At the clinic they had a very expensive cable pull machine and many of their recommended exercises were designed for a cable machine. Several of these exercises could not be duplicated with either my free weights of my multi-station gym. So, I bought this Resistance Band set and they have been perfect for duplicating the movements I needed. I have had no problems with band length. I just use the door attachment and place one end around the doorknob and adjust my body position relative to the door and pull the other end. EASY PEASY
summary: I bought these to rehab an injured shoulder.

reviewText: I really like this band set. I have bought others but they we not complete with the different strength bands or connectors and hardware components seemed cheap. This is very adjustable and easy to travel with. Bonus it comes with a travel bag too!
I'm a SAHM, and this set is perfect for working out at home.  The moves you can do are pretty much limitless. High quality product with great customer service. Company is family owned.

I got this for some basic workouts. Does the job well. Definitely can't replace dumbbells though. Took off on star because I really wish it came with a way to wrap up the bands because all the bands being lose will make it a jumbled mess.

These bands are made of strong, high-quality material. And I like the door attachments. But I'm 6-1 and find the bands too short. However, there is a workaround. To increase the band length, simply add a carabiner in between the handle and the band. Also, the color-coding is confusing. Instead, they should label the bands from 1 to 5.
summary: Best in class, but a lot of room for improvement.

reviewText: I'm very satisfied with this product.  It is very well made and versatile - I like the fact that you can combine different bands for different resistance levels.  I travel frequently - most places I go to have a treadmill, but not weights.  This set works great for keeping up with strength training while on the road - a gym in a bag for all muscle groups.

I had these bands for about 3 weeks now and I really enjoy using them.  I think it's giving me the results I'm looking for.  At about 2 weeks I've already seen the results I want compared to using weights.  I brought these bands based on the Amazon ranking as the best seller in Exercise Bands.  I agree with the ranking as these bands are good quality bands and the resistance are true to form.  I also like the fact that you can combine bands to add resistance which helps double my workout.  It's also a plus that they are offering the orange band which is a even heavier band for free.  I highly recommend this package if you want to get a good work out, quality material, and to be able to go anywhere with it.

This bag contains the necessary tools to strengthen all muscle groups. The instructions are skimpy but a couple of bucks willget you a book on the use of bands. Take a large sheet of oak tag and list the exercises and hang it on the wall. Do the ones you like least the most, these muscles need it!
summary: An excellent addition to a modest home gym. No need to buy expensive equipment. This will give you all the resistance you need.

reviewText: Great Value. Bands were exactly as advertised.  Exactly what I needed to complete my physical therapy at home and on the road.
this is all the extra you need to complete your workout with  Marcy cardio mini cycle. I would suggest this to anyone

My husband and I have been using these for our weekly workouts for about a month. We needed bands instead of free weights for rowing and pulling exercises in general. They have worked well for us, although my husband has to attach four bands to get enough tension for his rowing. Luckily, you can get a free one (orange) by writing a review.
Ordered two of these kits, high quality and lifetime warranty , can't beat that.  Less than half the price of others we had considered.

I am delighted with my exercise kit now. Yoga mat, trx and this great, flexible band system. They are the ultimate and a good value. I love the quick release attachments and the door attachment. I am able to dial in my creativity in any hotel room and get in a solid workout.
summary: A great addition to my exercise travel kit

reviewText: I recently purchased these bands to use in my P90X program.  They are easy to use, incredibly durable (my son even uses the heaviest band to help assist him in doing pull-ups), and include sturdy, high-end connection components.  I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a well-priced, well-made set of resistance bands.
These are great!  I just ordered a second set of bands. The new mini-carabiners make it very easy to change resistance and configure the bands for a wide variety of exercises. Overall, a great find.

I got these bands so I could do the P90X workout. The green band I used for less than 2 weeks and it snapped on my 5th usage. I am very disappointed. I am terrified to use the other bands as I dont know if they will snap and hit me in the FACE or not. Luckly I got my hand up to block this one but it damaged my knuckle pretty good

I bought these bands to use for the p90 x workouts. They are very sturdy and do not crimp when stepping on them as some other products do. I have used them about a month so far and they show no signs of wear.They are the best of all the resistance bands out there.

I have been using the bands for a couple of weeks now and I love them.  You can get quick quality workouts in virtually anywhere.  I initially bought these bands to use while recovering from shoulder surgery but I plan to use them to supplement my usual weight training exercises.  I prefer them over therapy bands because you can use the handles and add additional bands for more resistance.  I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for easy way to workout without using weights or going to the gym.I was pleasantly surprised to see how much you get for the money.  And since the bands are under warranty for life you can't really go wrong with this one.

I like this product. For the price, it is well made and durable. The only minor issue I have is, the lbs resistance should have been printed one the Band. Would make it easier to know the lbs resisitance that way, instead of trying to remember the color code.

I have been using this product for about six weeks as part of p90x.  So first of all p90x is a great program.  I had never used bands before and was a bit skeptical.  I gave them a try because I travel quite a bit.  The bands work great.  There are a number of workouts where I get a better burn with the bands than I do using free weights.  During yesterdays workout I managed to break two of the bands.  One I had noticed had been frayed and I had procrastinated calling and asking for a replacement.  I called Black Mountain this morning.  There was 0 hold time.  The gentleman on the phone immediately incited that they would send me two replacement bands for free by express mail.  He also indicated that given it was the two strongest bands that had broken....I probably needed more weight...which was true.  I was going to ask to purchase a stronger band.  He indicated that along with the two replacement bands he would send me one harder band for free.  Really impressed with their product and with their support.  Both band broke when I was using them with very little space between my foot and the handle...so a lot of stress on a  very short piece of material....I am still learning.  A stronger band may help avoid this situation.  And word to the wise...when you are using the door attachment in a hotel room: LOCK THE DOOR...DOUBLE LOCK THE DOOR..

Just got them and havn't used them too much, but so far everything seems in good working order. If I could change anything I would include heavier resistance bands and make them a little longer. Other than that though, everything looks great.

I received these bands as a gift.  I am not usually a fan of bands.  Past purchases (not Black Mountain) were not durable and broke easily after 6 months of use.  While I have not had this set that long, I can see that the are made FAR better than those previously purchased. I particularly like the fact that the bands can be easily adjusted using the metal clips.  I am a small woman and use the lighter bands.  My son, however, has become very fond of the heavier ones.  He leaves the lighter ones on for me and I need only take off the heavy duty ones.  This is a great feature.  I also like the fact that the bands are graduated, allowing the system to grow with my individual needs.  Furthermore, the design makes it easly to adjust to the type of exercises as the resistances needed for upper body are different than those for lower body, at least for smaller women.  The set is very compact and easily transportable for those that travel.In addition to being extremely pleased with the product, I am very impressed with their customer service. I had an occasion to call the company to ask a question.  They were awesome.  No IVR...a real person.  They could not have been more accommodating.  I am very satisfied with this product and will purcahse one as a gift for my older son.  I sincerely recommend it to anyone using resistance bands.  This product delivers and it is American made!

Very pleased with the quality and usability of these bands. I use them for my primary stretches and exercise regiment. At 69 years old, I find they are great for working the kinks out before getting into more strengthening work with the bands. I use them in the basement and have a secure hook on the ceiling which allowed me to work up to very deep knee bends with the bands assisting my return to upright. The seated rowing regiment has eliminated my need to spend hundreds on a rowing machine which I was seriously contemplating. Highly recommend these quality bands.
summary: Very pleased with the quality and usability of these bands.

reviewText: Plenty of different band widths, and since you can combine multiple bands on handles, you have a large variety of resistances.Comes with two nice handles, a strong velcro wraparound, and a carry bag.

I really like the ability to stack bands together on the same handles for a greater choice in weights, but these bands are just too short for the my use. I returned them to order the 48 inch bands from the same company. The door anchor and ankle strap were unnecessary for my use as well. I would have preferred to have this same product in at least a 48 inch!

got this for my mom was great value, great quality fast delivery.  She loves it, and looking forward to putting in her daily workout routine.  Had leg attachment for multi work out areas, excellent quality, and the door stop (jam) accessory for different options on using bands was a great addition.  This was well worth the value and monies paid, have been in contact with company since and great folks to do business with.  I would definately recommend this company and this product.

This is a great product.  The bands are perfect tension for all sorts of different workouts and are durable.  The buckles are strong and solid.  The product arrived quickly and has exceeded my expectations.  For the price, this is the best option out there.  Highly recommended.

I've been a bonafide gym rat for 15 years and recently had to quit.:-(  Even with olympic weights, there were just so many exercises I didn't think I could replicate at home.  My husband wouldn't let me use the door thing b/c he was afraid of it loosening the hinges, so he installed a hook in the basement ceiling and it works great to do lat pull downs.  If you wrap them around the poles in the basement, you can do killer tricep and back work as well.  I just purchased a purple band which is more resistance so I don't have to stack as many bands.  This was a really good purchase and great addition to a home workout program.

These work well- combining bands helps you add and reduce weight and the quality seems pretty good.  Some exercises are hard to accomplish because of the length of the straps, but that's not the fault of the manufacturer.  Longer or shorter would face their own downsides.  Great for travel.
The snap hooks on these make them versatile.  The door attachments add variety over flat bands.  I take them to my physical trainer for workouts. I can use them at home making them doubly useful.

These bands are excellent for someone who works out at home and travels.  I've been using them with P90X when the exercises are to difficult to do with my hand weights.  They are easy to use and of high quality. Just change out the bands with a simple carabiner.  You can add the different colored bands together or just use one if that's what so choose.  The bands come with a carry case for storage (I love that)and the akle band and door anchor have good stitching and are very easy to use.  I would definately recommend this product to a friend.
So far the bands are working great for me. Might be too short as some others are saying but I'm 5'9" and haven't had a problem yet. I use them for p90x
this is a great product and it's all that you really need to get a great workout, I recommend this to everyone and it's cheep.

I wish I had purchased this set first, rather that learning the hard way that one band would not be enough long term.  The fact you can use multiple bands is great and the construction is high quality.  I would buy again in a heartbeat

These bands are great! We got them because we don't have (or want) a gym membership, and they're really fast to use in the morning before work. No commute to the gym!  II like that you clip together as many (or as few) bands as you want to create the resistance you need. Between the 5 bands my boyfriend and I have all the weight levels we need, plus they fit neatly in the small bag we can toss behind the bedroom door.
This product delivers a good workout for a very reasonable price.  Great for when you can't get to the gym.  I used the bands while rehabbing from shoulder surgery and they worked beautifully.
The Bands work great and can easily be added together for additional resistance. They are made of high quality materials.

I bought the package deal knowing I only needed the higher weight resistance bands. The way they allow you to add on more and more is fantastic. You aren't getting any junk with this company AT ALL! I use these with P90x3 and absolutely love them. I'll be ordering more from this company in the near future.
I love the fact that I can get a great workout, fold everything into the nice storage bag and not have to have a cluttered mess of dumbbells.

I purchased these resistance bands about 5 weeks ago for use with P90x.  I required an affordable and convenient way to easily move workout equipment from one room to another.  These resistance bands achieve that requirement.  From a product perspective I have been extremely impressed with overall quality and performance of the bands.A really nice feature of these bands is the ability to add multiple bands for additional resistance to one handle using the clips.  The clips are great for ease of transition to different resistance bands, however if you are trying to do Lawnmowers or Heave Pants the additional 3-4 inches the clip extends the handle limits your range of motion.Overall I am happy with my purchase and the overall quality of this product.  I would definitely purchase this product from this company again.
summary: Excellent Quality, Excellent Price, Excellent Performance

reviewText: These bands are nice quality and come with all the necessary parts to attach to a door or just 2 handles.  Wide variety of tension strengths and handy bag to store them all in.  Highly recommended.

Takes up little room, easy to transport and travel, and the handles allow for a good grip when working out. I bought these to exercise with at home and work, when I have time. I am going through rehab after a recent knee surgery, and tone up after so much down time overeating every day. A few weeks with this product and so far it does the job.
Excellent!!The bands has a lot quality and they are very usefully.It's  come with a very basic book to learn how to use It
I was super happy with this purchase! You cannot beat the price of the quality of these bands. Very durable, made to definately last. Better than any other that I have seen at my gym and elsewhere.
I take these with me when I travel between jobs.  These allow me to get a workout in even when I am not near a gym.

I bought these to use for the popular P90X program. They worked well enough for the first couple of weeks although I felt I wasn't getting as much as I could out of the workout using bands compared with free weights. After a couple of weeks, the red band started showing signs of tearing on both ends about an inch from where the band connects with the handle. It seemed to still hold up to stress so I didn't think much of it; however, later that week, one end snapped and whipped my back, leaving a huge red, stinging imprint in its wake lol. I wrote an email to Black Mountain's customer support address to see about using the "Lifetime Warranty" that's advertised to get a replacement band; it's been about a month since sending the email and I've yet to hear back from them. I went out and bought free weights to use instead and I'm MUCH happier! As suspected, I wasn't getting the most from my workout with the bands. Using the free weights provides a much more intense workout than I experienced with the bands and my muscles are actually sore the next day. If you're at all like me and contemplating using resistance bands over free weights, do yourself a favor...save yourself time and money and go with the free weights...I wish I did!
summary: Wished I purchased free weights instead!

reviewText: I got these for working out at home with P90X. I do go to the gym and use weights as well but sometimes it's just easier to work out at home. The bands work great. I was a little skeptical at first but after performing several routines using the bands I can't complain about the workout. My muscles are tired at the end so they must be working just fine. I liked this set because I can add bands together to create the resistance that best suites me. Others, with individual handles, can't be added together so you are stuck with the level of each individual band. The quality appears to be first rate as well. I've seen the junk they sell from overseas and it doesn't even come close. I feel confident this set won't break apart and whip me when I'm really pressing them. They have nice solid clips that are easy to use. The handles have a nice feel although I think they could be better if they were a bit bigger. I also talked to customer support and got a real person who knew the all the products very well, can't say the last time that has happened. After my talk with these guys I feel confident they would honor any warranty issues that may come up.

I don't write alot of reviews, but I love these bands.I'm a physician who teaches exercise classes for beginners to advanced. Band work outs are a great way for beginners to get safely started, but I've always felt that bands were a "passable" substitution compared to free weights for advanced trainers. NOT THESE! I love the ability to click and add multiple resistance bands fast and easily. You can seriously adjust the resistance on these things! Well constructed. I couldn't be happier. I plan on recommending them to all my patients for home and travel work outs.
These bands are the best!!! They have just the right amount of tension to them and it's a breeze to change the weight around with the attachable clip. Great product and a must have for working out!!!

I had to have hand surgery so free weights were out of the question.  I have used the bands now for a month and have had wonderful results. Great product and at a great time.  Now my wife wants a set!

I have no basis for comparison But so far these resistance cords have work very well for me. I have them attached to various places on the inside of my car and I use them for exercise during long car trips. The three orange resistance cord is the night touch too.

These bands are great, I started using them after dislocating a shoulder again and I really like them.  At 5'6" I have no height issues with the band length and find them as versatile as my imagination for exercises.  As a gymnastics coach, I have a pretty good imagination when it comes to exercises.  the door anchor and ankle strap are both good quality.The bands, although not a substitute for gymnastics rings, high bar and the like are really really great for a whole bunch of exercises.  Using one of the band combinations with the door anchor I got a couple of really good ab exercise and some good pullovers (for muscle ups).  Sure today I was able to do some levers so but these exercises are really helping me stay strong through injury and I can see them going way beyond.  Far better and more versatile than weights, these band are fun and create exercises that require small muscle stabilization far better then weight machines.For the price you could do far worse.  If you're one of those folks in a DVD program, start to improvise, do what feels good.  Yes I have push up bars, I use them for handstand practice, really good stuff.  Get them and enjoy.  If you're a serious pump monkey, keep these around for vacations or while watching tv.I have since purchased some of the new heavier pull bands, this product is now an exercise stable for a gymnastics coach.  The nature of them makes them better than free weights and the versatility of exercises is amazing.  I have a pull up bar identical to the one Black Mountain sells, you can do some really cool stuff, limited only by strength and imagination.As an aside, the Black Mountain guys are really nice and answer all questions.  All bands and handles are reasonably priced.
The bands and clips are well constructed and of good quality.  Also pleased about the promotional offer to get one more band of higher resistance.

This is a great set of bands. They can be used by a man or woman. I am using them with P90X2. You can change the level of resistance in a snap by adding or subtracting multiple bands.They come with the door anchor and a handy leg\arm strap which are both easy to set up quickly. Would recommend these to everyone.

Well made.  Bands are various strengths and the stretching excercises add to a good workout.  The handles disingage so you can reuse them on different bands.  It is a bit awkward with the metallic clanking, but the bands perform well, so I would recommend this to anyone.
I bought this resistance band set a few months ago. I loved it so much I bought another set. The rubber bands are pretty steady.

The shipping was fast and the product was very good. I went on YouTube and they had some great workouts that made using this product real simple and effective. I especially like the fact that you are able to hook up these bands all to one set of handles and increase the "wieght" without having to hold many handles at once.
Great set with the extras, like the door strap. Seems to be decent quality... Haven't snapped my eye out yet anyway!

I have been very impressed with this set of exercise bands.  The set provides a good range of resistance and the handles are very quick and easy to change.  I had been using a set of bands that were more expensive than these, and when I started working with the Black Mountain bands I realized how much lower in quality my previous set were.  Highly recommended!

My wife and I have been using these bands for just over a month now for P90X.  They are holding up really well, with no signs of wear.  It is easy to change out the handles from one band to another or to double up on bands, though it is a bit of a hassle to make the change between every exercise.  Still, I think I prefer these to the bands that you cannot clip together.  Also, there are certain exercises where I need to hold the handles sideways, and the cushion part slides around on the strap portion of the handle.  Not a big deal, but something to be aware of - it would be nice if the cushion part were secured to the strap.
I am a personal trainer and these bands are really handy.  unfortunetly I just ripped the bag yesterday from using it so much
Bought these for working out after shoulder surgery & rehab. They have helped termendously. Very easy to travel with to continue working my arm. Thanks for a great product.

Bought these for my daughter who is a competative swimmer who had severe shoulder pain.  The PTs gave her rubber tubing which wore out quickly.  I saw these and ordered the set.  They are great.  Her strength returned and improved with the graduated resistancs.  She now uses them to maintain her strength.  We also carry them when we travel so there is always a workout where ever we are.A great product.  Thanks
summary: Great Product for on the go workouts and Shoulder therapy

reviewText: Practical and portable fitness kit. Good variety of resistance bands. Simple to use. Haven't tried to use the piece that can be used with door

My husband drives and only really walks as exercise. His cab is cramped and doesn't have room for weight or other things. So on a whim I bought this one day for him. Although he hasn't been "motivated" lately to exercise he did give these a try and likes them. He now uses them quite often as they are so convenient and he can do it regardless of the weather.
Love teh bag it's all organized in.  Makes it very convenient to pack up and take with me.  Good quality, also.

I purchased this product when beginning the P90X3 workout system since they recommend a variety of bands.  I used these both as a band and with the included door mount for the workouts and really love the quality and variety.I definitely recommend these for anyone looking to do workouts like P90 that require a lot of band options and for those who want to travel with an exercise system.My only wish was that they sold a set with two sets of handles since for P90 I would have a band on the door mount and then for some workouts have to use a band as a weight.  It would cause me to pause the DVD to switch the handles from one band to the other.
summary: Well made, versatile and portable band set

reviewText: easy to pack up this equipment to travel.  it is also easy to store and easy to use at home. it takes up no large footprint in the house but it is easy to access and simple to use. the multiple "strengths" of the cords make it easy to get a decent workout.

I have been using the Black Mountain resistance bands for the past eight months, they are great for traveling and until this morning's workout I would have given them a high rating. However the red band snapped and the severed bands flew back and caused injury to both of my hands, bleeding knuckles, serious pain and black and blue bruising. I had not done anything other than use the band as directed.In Black Mountain's favor they have responded immediately to my issue and are replacing the failed red band as well as providing a stronger orange band which was not part of the original package. I will be sure to check the bands for weakness in the future.Based on their response I will raise my rating from one star to three stars.
summary: Injured due to failed resistance band

reviewText: I like the versatility this set offers. I have been using this set for two months doing P90X. I did buy an extra set of grips to make it easier when doing my routine so I don’t have to swap the bands over. Lots of options with resistance with this set. Works awesome! I would recommend this to others.
My husband is a pilot and takes one or two of these at a time.  States he gets a great workout from them.  Really not small enough of a bag to take it all at once.

This set of bands is fantastic: comfortable handles with strong clips that make it so easy to switch from band to band. Love that it comes in a bag for convenient storage. So much easier to manage than free weights. Definitely bringing this on my vacation! Right now they are offering a promotion for a free orange band (heaviest resistance). Great customer service.

overall bands are useful for p90x and good resistance.  nice that you can combine bands for more resistance.  would have given 5 stars but the black band snapped out of one of the connectors and hit my foot.  since then a bit paranoid that the other bands will end up doing the same.  other bands have been working ok so far.
summary: good for p90x...joints could use more support

reviewText: these resistance bands are great!  i can get a real work out out of them.  i use two bands together for more resistance and so far very satisfied.

This is my second set of resistance bands.  My first set were more expensive and of lesser quality.  I called and spoke to Black Mountain Products prior to purchasing these bands and found them to be incredibly helpful when it came to answering all of my questions and also providing insight as to what other products are being considered in the future.  Also, I would be remiss if I didn't include the fact that I ordered these bands on Thursday and they came the very next day.....UNBELIEVABLE!  These bands are sturdy and I don't have the fear that the clip is going to slip off or have the band break in the middle of a workout.  They also have a nice selection of weight types so a full set can accommodate workouts for the very young/old to someone who is fairly serious by combining or mixing bands.  The handles are comfortable and don't feel cramped when several bands are attached to the handles at the same time.My only complaints are the following, but they don't bug me enough to lower my 5 star rating.  It would have been nice if they labeled each band with the corresponding weight and also include a slightly larger clip on each end.  The last request is knit picky, but I have the need to clip onto objects other than the handles that came with my set so a larger clip ring would be better, but as I said this is far from a deal breaker.

The combination of stretch bands and ankle strap makes a perfect work out.  If you only have 10 minutes or if you have 30 minutes, you can build your strength with these bands. Each band offer a different strength and can be combined to boost your work out.
The sturdy, interchangeable bands are great for different exercises.  They are great for travel and for use in any places, especially in small areas.

I DIDNT GET MY ANKLE STRAP ALONG WITH THE PRODUCT.BUY THE ONES WITH HANDLES ALREADY BECAUSE IT IS EASIER UNLESS YOU WANT TO COMBINE AND USE BANDS.HOOKS ARE STRONG. GOOD QUALITY OTHERWISE.HARDLY OCCUPIES SPACE FOR TRAVEL
The quality of the bands is great, I dont feel scared that the bands will snap during the exercise unlike those cheap bands that looks like its gonna snap any minute.

Came with everything in the picture. It comes with a chart that mentions an orange resistance band, and I thought it was left out of my order, so I emailed Black Mountain Products and they sent it to me the next day! I didn't notice that it wasn't originally with the order, so I kinda got a free one out of the deal, but everything comes as expected. Not an insane amount of resistance on the strongest one, that's why I made such a deal about the orange band. But overall, 5 stars!

I bought these bands to use for my P90X workouts and so far I have been well pleased with them. They are of quality construction and seem as if they will be durable. All the hardware and connections seem sound. Everything did together in the handy carrying bag. What's not to like?

I previously had used bands of several varieties and found that they broke often (not due to any particular strength on my part). A friend suggested using tubes and the B.M.P. package seemed to be a good choice. I was able to easily match the colors to achieve the resistance level for my particular exercises. The process of switching tubes is very easy and the handles are very comfortable. Additionally, I called the customer service line to pose a question and they were extremely helpful. I would strongly recommend this product.

This resistance band set was my answer to doing my exercises at home.  I had been going to Curves for 12 years but unfortunately the Curves closest to me have all closed. I needed something to continue exercises and going to a co-ed workout place just didn't appeal to me.  ilmiaz

I received these bands approx. 6 months ago to assist in a physical therapy program.  I have used them over 30 times now and they are holding up just like new.  No loss in tensile strength or worn stitching.  Having many bands and accessories is great for doing many different exercises.  Its always good to support a family-run business too! A+

I don't often write reviews, but a month in and I love this product. I was going to go to my local sporting goods store and buy a resistance band. Then I started to look into it, and the cost of getting them in multiple "weights" added up quick. This system has the ability to be quickly tailored to difference resistance levels 'on the fly', and comes in a nice compact carry-bag.Loved it so much I bought it for a family member as a gift!
summary: Great Product, can not be beaten for the $

reviewText: Love this product.  Very easy to change between different resistance bands.  Nice padded handle.  Book has some great workouts in it.  Delivery was fast.

I have been using BMP products for about 3 weeks now. I have to say the resistance bands are the highest quality bands I have ever used. Each different band comes with its own set of metal carabiner clips that easily attach and detach from the handles. When I purchased these bands I also purchased another set of handles to do resistance exercise on  a selector machine from a different manufacturer that were half the cost of the band set and the BMP handles are actually nicer. I only really use the black and red resistance bands but their resistance is perfect and the quality is top notch, I feel like they will last forever.

Pros:*** First I love the band because it's very affordable and made in mainland US.*** It is very convenient gym equipment to have... I can bring it anywhere I would wish to.*** It is a Pocket Gym with the same benefits of a traditional gym that eats up a lot of space to set up.*** Lots of upper body, lower body, and core exercises are provided on their website: *** [...]*** Quick delivery, courteous customer service.Cons:*** Would be great if the length could be shortened to become suitable for a shorter/smaller person.*** Would be awesome if the "Door Anchor" could be mounted to a door bottom with slightly bigger gap.*** It would be nice if the band has got a jacket or protective cover to protect it from potentially sharp surfaces/materials while being use.
summary: Good quality and affordable US made equipment.

reviewText: Honestly I have done my research and these are the best bands to buy on Amazon. It also rocks that they are low cost too. You will not find a better deal even at the sport stores (I've compared).Don't think about which ones to buy, just biuy this these.Honestly great product and customer support was fantastic!Thanks guys!

Overall great product, and like others have said, construction is pretty solid. I admit, I am a little bit fearful of being whacked in the face, but after a few reps, you get used to it! I am using the set for P90x workouts. I did not realize there was another version of this product where each band had it's own handles. This product has removable handles, so you can switch bands, or put more than one band to add resistance. I should have bought the ones with permanent handles on the bands because I find I am constantly having to switch bands during the P90x workouts. Maybe it will be easier as I get into the routine, and it will become more automatic? Let's hope! I thought I would mention it here since a lot of folks seem to pick up these bands for P90x purposes.
summary: One handle, multiple bands: Good and Bad

reviewText: My wife and I recently completed an eight week exercise program and these exercise bands were a very important part of our program.  At our age (75+) we were looking for practical and minimally stressful exercises to keep flexible and fit. The Black Mountain resistance band set met all of our needs and we enjoy the variety of exercises specific to certain parts of the body that they can be used for.A great product which we would hily recommend to our senior friends seeking to keep fit!
Great product, great quality, great price. I've searched dept stores and sporting goods store. You cant beat this deal, I promise!
This set offers great variety as the detachable handles allow you to mix and match the bands to find the perfect resistance.

I have been using this product for the last few days with my at home gym and I am very impressed with the way that it works you out.  Given that I have recently quit the gym in favor of an at home gym, this gives me an excellent workout in triceps, biceps, legs, shoulders and back. I bought this with low expectations with resistance bands (never used them before) but I must say that I am blown away by the product and how close it is to what I am used to doing at the gym.
summary: Great Product for at home workout

reviewText: What ever they say is in that black bag says it all.I started out little by little everyday. Its such a great product to have around if you need to burn those extra calories.Its constructed very well with clear cut colors for the resistance i need.Just please remind family members your using the door when your using the resistance band with the ball packets.I think the instructions are a tad primitive but the web offers so much more so no problem there.Love the product and actually cant get over how well the product is put together.

When I bought the previous version that had the swivel clips I wasn't to keen on using it too much. But now that they changed to standard carabineers instead, I decided to buy a second set, which I use more regularly. Also I recommend getting the new extra strength orange and purple bands, sold separately. I would say the only drawback may be is that the bands, all bands not just the two mentioned, are a little short for some people, and probably best suited for people in the 5'4" to 5'9" range. I'm not saying people below and above that range shouldn't get a set. Let me just make it clear the height range I gave is not a concrete standard. It's just an opinion as to how I feel. I'm 5'11" and I'm very careful how I use my bands. Black Mountain is a very good company with awesome customer service, and they're always working on improving their products. For the price and some common sense usage it's tough to find a better basic set than this. My previous swivel end set is a souvenir I keep in my closet. I hope they come out with a new set the has all 7 bands, 2 ankle straps instead of just 1, 2 sets of handles that are bigger than what they have now, a door anchor with a cushioned liner, and a really nice bag to put it in. If and when that comes out I'll be getting that for sure and ready to post a 5 star review.
summary: BLACK MOUNTAIN PRODUCTS UPS ITS GAME

reviewText: I have never used resistance bands before and was a little skeptical, but I bought these resistant bands for my P90X workout and am very happy with them. The bag makes it convenient for transporting and they are really easy to use on a wide variety of workouts. The only thing I wish was included is an extra set of handles to make it faster when switching bands frequently. I would recommend these bands to anyone who is doing P90X or don't want to buy/store a bunch of dumbbells.

I've been using these for a couple weeks, rehabbing an elbow injury.  Good quality product for the price.  The lower pound resistance band's primarily only serve the purpose of being paired with the higher pound resistance bands, but they do come in handy.  The handles are great, a lot better than some other brands i've used in the past.
The bands are a great thing to have in the house when you don't feel like making it to the gym. They don't take up any space and they are very versatile for a variety of different workouts.

It says they include door anchor, ankle strap, carrying bag along with the handle and bands... But!!!I only received the 2handles and the bands, what happened to my door anchor, ankle strap, and bag?! Am I being Punked?!!

I have had this product for about two months now and they are absolutely fantastic for what I purchased them for. If you are a hardcore gym rat, then these might not be the best choice for you, but if you are easing into strength training or if you are in need of some resistance therapy, then this product is exactly what you are looking for. The large clips and handles make it easy to add more resistance if needed. What prompted me to choose this product over all others were the companies customer service reviews. And I can attest that the customer service for this company is truly second to none. The only reason I called them is because once the product arrived at my house (2-day shipping with prime) there was a a certificate inside stating that I can get a free orange band (25 or 30 lbs. I cant remember) by calling the company and requesting it. Talk about added bonuses! I called the number, an actual human answered, and I told them about the certificate and they asked if I wanted it with or without handles and what my mailing address was. No other questions and 4 days later the band arrived. FOR FREE!! All of this aside, the actual exercises you can do with these bands are limitless. I am discovering more and more  new ways to use them and I can not express how much they have helped my shoulder (I have rotator cuff issues). In just 2 months time I can tell the difference in my body and have already lost 15 lbs. (I add cardio to my normal workouts) GREAT product, excellent and friendly customer service and made in the USA!!! I cant recommend this product or this company enough!

Not a whole lot to say about them, other than the fact they seem like good quality bands that have lasted well over a year now. I don't use them daily, but try to get a couple uses a week. I'm happy with the purchase.

I bought these resistance bands for my P90x workouts. Product comes with 5 bands that are easy to connect together when needing more resistance and the package provides level of resistance for all bands. I'm planning on buying extra band handles ($8.99 on amazon) to help speed things up when I'm needing to change weight bands between exercises as p90x has some workouts that switch a lot between exercised.I have no complaints about these bands and I really like how they are easy to combine the resistance bands together with the handles. I wished they did come with an extra set of band handles and this is why I rate it a 4 stars out of 5.

I bought these to use with Insanity: The Asylum vol 1 and 2 and I love the band.  Super high quality with a great price.  You will not be disappointed especially with all the extras included plus it's been a free months and no signs of wear and tear.

I have had these bands for about a week now and I love them! I got them to travel with and be able to work out at home when I can't make it to the gym. I previously only lifted with weights but tried some bands at the gym and really liked them so I thought I would order a set for myself. I have completed a couple full body workouts with them and actually felt the workout in the days afterwards. It is a great way to change up your workout so your muscles don't get used to the same thing and is very easy on the joints unlike weights that sometimes cause me pain in my shoulders. The door holder also works very well and allows for more angles to be created to get a good back workout too. I found myself using all of the different bands as well as combining them as suggested on the chart provided that lists all of the weight equivalents. I don't see myself using the light band too often but none the less it is included and my be useful in some workouts. They did not feel like they were going to snap at all and were a great product for the price. I am very pleased with my purchase, the shipping speed, and the customer service representatives who are very helpful with any questions and do answer their phone quickly.I would HIGHLY recommend these for anyone looking for resistance bands or easy weights to travel with or use at home!

Bought these bands in place of dumbbells and chin-up bar for use with the P90X3 workout.  The materials seems pretty strong and the handles are nice to grip. So far they have worked out great and I have been able to get enough variety of  weights for most of the different exercises.  I am 6 feet tall and so far they seem long enough with the handles attached for all the exercises that I have tried. The added door attachment has worked out well, though the included bands only go up to 70lbs which is not quite enough to replace all the pull-up exercises.The only problem that I have had so far is that it takes a little while to change the handles between bands when switching exercises.  Might be useful to get an extra set of handles for this purpose.

I purchased these a couple of weeks ago and so far have been very happy. I have used them for stretching and resitance training. I have used the door attachment which has worked well and have even found that I can put the strap around my olympic bar while it is racked so I can perform some exercises. The different levels of resistance allow me to use them for warm ups, a pump, or strength training.  The material used all seems to be of high quality.
summary: Nice addition to my home gym

reviewText: The Black Mountain Resistance Band Set is a great economic choice for workout enthusiasts.  It packs up nicely for travel, anchors in any door, and has a wide variety of different exercises you can do almost anywhere.  The bands are color coded, so the user has a variety of options for weight per exercise.  I would definitely, and have, recommend this product to others.

Awesome bands, I have been using these along side with my Olympic weight set for my at home routine. Allows me to do most exercises which require a cable machine. If used properly these will definetly tone and cut your muscles... they are amazing and very durable. Sometimes attaching the clips to the nylon mount is tough but other than that these are awesome! would definetly recommend these to anyone looking to tone/shred!

The bands are good and they do what you expect. They stretch and then come back. Yay!It's the little things on the side that I expected to be a bit better for a pricier product in this market. The instructions are just kind of sad; they only show 5 exercises. I'm writing this review because you have to write a review to get the orange band.There should really be something to help you secure one end to something like a power cage. They could actually just give you another one of the ankle straps and it would work fine.

I bought this in 2011, and use it every other day.  It's 2014, and item still feels brand new.  The bag it comes with is a little torn, but the actual resistance band is still hanging strong.It's nice to have a quality product you know will last for a long time.  I will probably upgrade to the ultimate resistance band set soon, as I feel I reached a plateau for this set.  Though it is kinda hard to upgrade, when this thing still works well.

Went on 2 week end trips since I got my band set, worked out both times. These things take up no space, easy to pack and go. My work out set is in the basement so I leave my bands in the bed room, that way if I miss lifting down stairs I do it with the bands before I go to bed, works great for me.

I couldn't ask for anything more in resistance bands.  Adding multiple bands to increase weight is a snap.  The door jamb accessory works perfectly and fits very securely to the door...I can pull on on the bands as hard as I want without fear that something is going to snap.  The handles are comfortable and the bag is great for easy transport.  I really can't think of anything bad to say about this product!

i have a health club at home - and use it several times a week. But I bought resistance bands for a trip we were taking that lasted for 2 weeks. The band set was easy to pack, light, and provided a pretty good workout when used in a motel room. They are also useful at home for the days when I don't have time to go over to the club for a workout.

I was looking for something light weight, but would give me a great workout when I travel and the Black Mountain Resistance Bands do just the trick. They make it so I don't have to spend a lot of money when I am not at home with my barbells and pull up bar. They are of great quality and I can just feel the results. This is a product you will not regret.
summary: Work you're body and love it

reviewText: I'm very happy with these resistance bands overall. My only concern that the door anchor, which is a strap with something inside of it to create a bulge, could stand to have a larger bulge to prevent it from coming through the crack. It might not ever slip through the crack of the door but it makes me a little nervous.The bands and the handlles seem to be sturdy and high quality.
Great Product! Portable, easy to used and very durable. Multiple bands give lots of options for resistance. I highly recommend this product.

I bought these for P90X3 and they work perfectly! Excellent replacement for free weights and and great alternative to the pull up bar. The ability to adjust the resistance level is an awesome function.

I was using these with P90x, and they were great in the beginning. However, the bands start developing small, hairline splits that eventually widened up into full blown cracks. I noticed that these splits would appear at points where I stepped on them often, but band exercises require you to do so so it's really no excuse.Also, they only come with one pair of the palm grips, so changing them from one band to another during an exercise routine is a chore. I would say shop around for some higher quality bands.
summary: Good for a while, then starts to tear.

reviewText: I'm a 5'3" woman, just beginning a strength training routine.  The bands are plenty long for me and the assortment of band strengths are appropriate for the exercises I'm doing.  I've used the bands three times this week, and so far they seem fine.  The bands, handles, and ankle strap are all good quality and comfortable, and the door anchor works well. It would have been helpful to have a "parts list" in the instruction manual.  It took me a while to figure out what the ankle band was for. So far I'm very satisfied with the product.

I have used these regularly for about 2 years. I used them through a round of P90X. I continue to utilize them as part of my workout regimen. I attached an I-bolt to a beam in the basement to attach the cloth strap that came with it. All of the bands, handles, loops, etc are still intact and working. I would definitely recommend this product.
Great system for on the go workout. Excellent for getting toned fast. Wish bands were wrapped in a protective fabric.

The B.M.P. bands are top quality, My wife got them for me couldn't ask for a better set comes with everything you would need for a good workout. To top it off you get a nice storage bag that could hold some of your smaller work out gear like gloves, ipod, sweatbands etc. I will defiantly be doing future business with B.M.P. Thank you for such a great product
They are tougher than I thought, these are good bands.  Came as  a set for beginner (1 band), intermediate, (2 bands), and advanced (all three).  Great product.

I was hesitant because the cost was so low in comparison to some other items that I was looking at in this category.  Although when I received the bands I was very impressed with the quality, durability and array of options/resistance that I had.  I use the bands everyday and there are no signs of wear or loss of resistance.  Better quality than other band sets that I have purchased in the past that have cost much more.  I highly recommend this product for anyone on the fence, especially those who want the option for a thorough workout without having to purchase/store free weights in their home.

My wife and I both use these, and they are great.If you have a good DVD routine or even check out YouTube you can use these to their full advantage.You're not going to get super bulky using these, but they do work you out.I've found that I can double up on different bands to get more resistance,and my wife can just use one or two at a time to get less resistance.We really like them, and I'm sure you will to.

Overall the quality is good.  The only complaint is the band length is a little short for me, but I think it's OK for some workout.  Shopped at Walmart the other day, I saw another brand of band set, and bought it.  It is longer than this set.  Now, when I travel, I bring both and so I can use long and short as needed.
summary: Good quality but seems a little short

reviewText: These bands are some of the best constructed on the market today. The handles and connectors make it fast and easy to change weights so that you can move from exercise to exercise with minimal rest time. I am 200 pounds and there is plenty of resistance for most of my body parts.
summary: the best way to work out

reviewText: This is the second set I have purchased and the hooks for the bands are not as nice as the first set so I am only giving it 4 stars so far. Hopefully they last longer than the last set (lasted about 6 months). But at this price it is still cheaper than a gym membership.

So, me and some friends unintentionally all got exercise bands for or after the holidays. We all got different products. All of my friends got products that were substandard in quality, more expensive, and in one case wasn't even the appropriate length for resistance bands. Not this product.The bands, handles, all of it felt premium. The best that the local chain sports store paled in comparison, and you can only get 3 bands and 2 handles for the cost of 5 bands, 2 handles, door anchor and ankle supports and a warranty from Black Mountain.I love that these can stack, again the local sports store had nothing like it. Want 50 lbs of resistance? got to buy a 30 dollar band just for that at the chain store, all I have to do is stack a few bands.  Need any higher? Local store doesn't even offer it. The only downside to the stacking? the clips have a habit of clipping to each other in crossover exercises, definitely can overlook that.It is definitely the best option for those who can't afford gym machines or or have no where to store them, heck it's probably better than the machines altogether.Final remarks? Only buy this set if you can afford the Deluxe.
These bands are very well made, more so than others I have seen. They're light weight, which makes them ideal for traveling. I highly recommend them as a far more affordable alternative to dumbbells.
