Just wanted folks to know that these are some top quality bands. I am usually skeptical and figured these would not be that great for the price, you know, the whole " You get what you pay for" thing. These were not the case at all. I have a friend that bought the expensive "name brand" ones and they are actually a little better in design when compared side by side. These also came with all the necessary attachments and a handy little bag. Definitely a worthwhile purchase.
summary: These are awesome at a fraction of the cost!!

reviewText: Got this product a few weeks ago with the new P90X3 knowing I would be on a business trip and in a hotel for a couple weeks.  Product was easy to use and the door attachment made resistance style pull ups and chin ups easy to knock out.  My only problem is the same I seem to find with all resistance products, I'm 6'3" and these clearly aren't designed for anyone over 5'8" or so.  Trying to do any kind of over head shoulder press while standing is nearly impossible even with the smallest resistnace because they simply aren't designed to stretch that far.  Otherwise a great easy to use product that my kids even like to break out to do some exercise with me.
summary: Great for Workouts away from the gym

reviewText: I have begun working with these bands and find them of excellent quality, sturdy and easy to use,  delivering the promised benefits.Most importantly, when calling this company for additional information and assistance, I found them exceptionally courteous andhelpful. Their claims of being "a small, family owned company that cares" is not understated. Great value for the money.Jay Forbes  Croton on Hudson, NY
summary: BMP Resistance Bands and Company Service

reviewText: Worth the price.Lengths are good.Can do alot of exercise with those resistance band.Dosen't seem to break easily.Have no problem using them for various work-outs
Feel very well made and like the fact they have a lifetime warrenty.  Also the way you can add as many bands as you want is a great option to have.

Found these bands on Amazon and thought the price was too good to be true and in fact it was.  I've had two different bands snap on me the second which caused me injury.  The first time a band snapped I thought nothing of it and called the company and they promptly sent me another.  Great I thought until one of the thicker bands snapped on me lacerating and badly bruising me.  If your only going to be using these bands every now and then then their ok, but for more frequent use they are no good.
Good stuff but it's kinda hard to use, got to get used to it. Great variety and good price. Happy with the purchase and do reccomend if your traveling and you don't have dumbbells.
I picked up this product to work out an injured wrist. It has done the job quite well and seems to be a quality product. Excellent customer service as well.

Really glad I got this. Tons of versatile possibilities, especially for the price. Comes with just the right attachments: handles, door stop, velcro leg wrap.. also a clear instruction guide, and I especially LOVE that it comes with a perfect bag to carry everything in and that the bands all have strong clasps that will obviously last quite a while. Tension seems like it will last in all these bands, as well, as they are high quality. It's useful for private clients if a trainer travels, and even for training myself on my travels! Definitely worth the buy.
summary: Great package of useful fitness tools!

reviewText: Both myself and brother-in-law had been looking for a variable free-weight set to use for workouts and P90-X exercises. However, being on a budget and seeing the great reviews we decided to give these resistance bands a try instead.  And Wow! these things are great, we're extremely happy with the bands.  They seem to be of good construction and thus far (about 2.5 months) they've held up without fail.  The door exercises have been especially brutal (good brutal) and leave our arms feeling like rubber.  You might find a couple exercises will require you to play around with the bands to accomplish the same workout as with free-weights, but a quick search on YouTube and you'll find good exercise videos using resistance bands.  This aside, and regardless of price, if given the choice between these and the free-weights again I'd pick the bands for simplicity, convenience, and greater versatility.  While you may not know exactly how much your "lifting", the bands help you to focus more on pushing your muscles to their breaking point and less on what weight you are using.  Additionally, with the bands you're able to accomplish many many more exercises than you ever could with free-weights.  So, if you're debating between these and free-weights I highly recommend giving these your consideration before dropping a couple hundred on a set of free-weight.
summary: GREAT Alternative to bulky and expensive free weights!

reviewText: These bands work very well. I've been using them with P90X and so far they have been great. They seem very durable and provide plenty of resistance. I love that you can easily stack the bands to create more resistance. The only thing I would have done differently would have been to order an extra set of handles so i wouldn't have to pause the DVDs when I need to change bands...but that's my fault!
Love them! exactly what I need and if you call you get a free orange band for the collection as well!

I have been working with the bands for two weeks now and find it to be as good a workout as at the Gym and without the wait. Quality is excellent. Needed help on a missing part. Part was shipped same day and with a sincere apology for the mistake.
These bands were very nice. I used them on many occasions and they worked very well. A very good product.

I bought this set of resistance bands to help me to a basic workout when I'm on the road and stuck in a hotel somewhere.  Its a great solution, packs small, comes with a nice carry bag.  Shipping was basically next day delivery.  The straps are very solid nylon with good double stitching and the bands look like the will handle the usage I'm planning.  If I were doing a strenuous workout every day, I would probably have to invest in something more expensive and rugged, but for my needs, this is a great product.
summary: Exactly what I need to travel exercise

reviewText: I've been using these in my workouts for about a month now, and I have nothing but good things to say about them. They're easy to use, convenient to store, and well-built. And the price is lower than many comparable products online or locally. I would definitely recommend these bands.
summary: Quality Interchangeable Bands for a Good Price

reviewText: I ordered the bands for P90X and for when I'm traveling. I've used many of the bands several times and they seem great. I guess time will tell if they hold up. Easy to add and remove bands to change the resistance. Great quality and work great so far with P90X.

Great resistance bands. I believe the chart with the resistance is somewhat off. The bands seem much lighter than what they suggest. Still, great quality. There is that unavoidable rubbery scent that stays in your hands for a while, but oh well.

These are definitely worth the very reasonable price tag. They work perfectly when tied against a bed, dresser, or door.It's very easy to change out the bands (fast clips) and when you combine the bands in the order they suggest (included resistance pamphlet) you really do get a good deal of resistance.My one complaint is that the bands are a little longer than  I would have liked. I know many bands allow you to hold them hand to hand around your back and do push-ups with added resistance or other chest exercises. I'm not a small guy and these bands are too long for me to get any resistance hand to hand around my back. It's not a big complaint, more of an annoyance and I guess the length has it's purpose somewhere else.These bands are durable, have comfortable handles, include a door and poll mount and a carrying bag. These are a great bargain, and still worth it.

These bands are a great way to exercise and highly portable.  I can shut the door to my office and do some sets of curls or squats, or exercise while I'm on a conference call.  Seriously considering cancelling my gym membership...The bands cost less than one month at the gym.  Very easy to pack in luggage and take with you anywhere, although I'm not sure how TSA would react to seeing these in a carry-on.  Another great thing about bands in general is that you get the negative rep in addition to the positive rep.
summary: Great way to exercise on the quick.

reviewText: These bans are wonderful!! I have been using them for the past month and they are holding strong. They are easy to use and come with everything you need to strengthen you muscles.I recommend these to anyone that needs a personal set or to someone opening up a studio.Great products made by great people.
High quality handles and easy latches for removing handles, switching bands etc. The door anchor is great.  Overall terrific quality and value.
Product met all my expectations.  I have enjoyed using the bands.  They have increased my strength and mobility and provide a good workout.

My arms are burning as I try to type this review. I wasn't looking for a muscle building as much as a muscle defining device and this is the best on a budget with not much room to put much else. Between these and a jump rope you have everything you need to tone up and stay in shape! They seem well constructed but only time will tell how they hold up. I'll revisit this review in a couple months to give a accurate update on exactly they held up.

Been going to PT for shoulder and elbow rehabilitation. a large part of the therapy involves using therabands and a set of exercises. Therapy session limit expired so I was instructed to try and do the same exercises at home. Advised to buy a theraband and tie to a doorknob. Two problems with that. First, you only have one level (plane) of motion possible and two, and no small problem, is a tendency for the band to fly off the door know and smack you like an angry thug. Who knows what it does to the door handle over time. Anyway, saw reviews of this and decided to give it a try. WOW! Exceeding my expectations-the door anchor works great and at any level you want to set it at. The bands are color coded and correspond to the PT bands in terms of strength. Except for an upper arm bike (I don't have a few thousand bucks lying around to spare), there is nothing I did at physical therapy that I can't do at home. Even better, PT didn't have handles for their bands and wrapping them around your hands gets old real fast. This product has handles to hold instead of strangling your hands. In every way a winner. Easy storage is icing on the cake.
summary: Terrific in place of physical therapy bands

reviewText: Great value, good quality. I love the bag it comes in to keep everything organized. Bought this to use with exercise dvd's that only come with 1 size band. The door & ankle straps just add to the bang for your buck.I have been using these as opposed to the ones that came with the ones that came with the expensive workout I bought I like them a lot better.

These band are a great deal, cant beat the price for the amount of stuff you receive.(Includes ankle band and door anchor)I really like how the bands work with each other, so you can mix and match resistance.I would recommend these and I will be a repeat customer.

I purchased this resistance band set a month ago to use with P90X workouts. The bands are great quality and work very well with the door anchor as a substitute for a pull-up bar. The set comes with just one pair of handles, and it often would be nice to have two or three sets so that you could switch from one band to another quickly and easily without having to pause your workout. Still, I would highly recommend these to anyone considering the purchase of a resistance band set.

After working with a physical therapist for 8 weeks to strengthen my shoulders to prevent rotater cuff surgery these are just what the doctor ordered. When they were done with me they sent me home with some cheap latex bands to continue the therapy at home. These are much more robust yet still have the same light resistance...and the wife uses them in her workout routine also. Great product.
summary: Cheaper than going to the Physical Therapist

reviewText: I shopped around quite a bit for resistant bands (I am a personal trainer), and thought I would try these out (given the price point). Let me just say they do not dissapoint. Product showed up quickly, high quality packaging and product. Female clients use the red and or black band independently, and for males I "marry" up the red with black for added strength... I use these for upward rows, seated rows and shoulder flys. I am 6'1" and they are fine for me.Truthfully you can't go wrong with this product :) Ben.

A colleague who also spends a lot of time on the road recommended these to me. If I'm lucky, I have access to a gym only once in a while (I travel in developing countries). With 15 minutes of the Black Mountain bands in the morning while listening to a podcast, I'm ready to go.
Great set of resistance bands. I haven't had any problems with them. I use them with P90x and they work great.Cons: None

I purchased this to have an easy way to workout at home and supplement a gym membership.  I did not want the bulkiness of free weights.  They take a little getting used to but the quality seems great and they are easy to use.

I purchased this to supplement my workouts when I was outside of the gym or away from my own home gym.These things are great! When I first got the bands, I noticed that the construction on these is great. They use metal pieces to reinforce joints and stress areas. I've used other resistance bands but the joints on those are entirely plastic. These feel sturdy and are great.These work as intended. The bands are exactly what I expected and more. No issues here. The resistance is going to be a bit different than using free weights, but that was expected. These are great for moving from exercise to exercise quickly, thus keeping your heart rate up.Customer support is great and prompt. Bonus star for being a family owned company!

Got these two days after I ordered them with standard shipping. Handles are super comfortable and bands are well made. The door attached is nice because you just put it in the door frame and close the door. Nothing permanent. Probably not the best product for someone looking for some serious heavy weights because the strongest band goes up to 35 pounds. But perfect for me to work on toning and slimming.
summary: Super fast shipping and really sturdy bands.

reviewText: these arrived quickly with no damage. i am still learning to use them and get in better practice but they seem to be well made and come with a bag to put them all in. good buy

This is a great product to use not only at home, but also at work.  I mainly purchased this product so I could workout at work in my down time.  Easily fits in my bag I carry with me to work and there are numerous exercises I can do while sitting at my desk.  It's convenient and provides me with a workout when I would normally just be sitting there.  I find myself using it at night as well while i'm watching TV.  Easy to change tensions and would recommend to anyone that would like to fit in a quick workout when you would normally be doing nothing.
I have used it almost everyday and it works great.  When I dont have time to go to the gym I use the resistances bands.  Easy to use and change out bands.  Would r3comend to anyone who travels.

This is a good product since you can increase and decrease the resistance easily.Easy to modify the muscle groups by raising or lowering the anchor point.Takes up very little space and does the job.Make sure to utilize the negatives.(Up can be fast but down should be slow....)
I have been very pleased with this product. This set has everything you need! I would buy this again in the future.

I purchased this product so I could easily get a workout in at my dorm room at school and I couldn't be happier.  The set is perfect for easily doing a workout at an area that is convenient for me and having a busy schedule it's exactly what I needed.

Perhaps I have a bad set, but these bands have repeatedly broken on me.  The handles come off from the band.  Today, one of the handles detached mid-exercise.  The band snapped down on my leg which immediately bruised (badly).  I'll be looking for a set that already has the handles attached. (one star)UPDATE: Immediately after posting this review I was contacted by Black Mountain Products.  They replaced the product.  The replacement will not have the problem described above.  This was EXCELLENT customer service.  Based on that, I will definitely consider and recommend their products. (updated to 4 stars)
summary: Safety Hazard **(UPDATE - issue resolved with excellent customer service)**

reviewText: I'm mostly using the black and red bands. The lighter strength ones are pretty much useless to me. Maybe at some point I'll add them to the black and red. The door anchor is ingenious though.
VERY nice, and easy to use - even for someone with mobility problems.  I wish there had been a few more exercises described in the booklet (I'm not very imaginative on my own.)

I love your product.  The bands are perfect for people (me) that don't have much room to work out but still want to keep in shape.  I would say in my opinion doing bands are equal or surpasses dumbbells in terms of having proper form, and they really give me more resistance when I need it. I really love how there are so many bands that I can gradually move up into, and even mix and match bands so I can always find the perfect weight for me
These are great quality bands, and you cannot beat the price. Have been searching for good quality bands to add you my gym and by purchasing these i got excellent value!!!

I bought these so that my wife and I could do P90X together.  She uses the bands while I use a pull up tower.  The quality seems very good and I haven't had any problems with the bands or grommets other people mention.  One thing to note about using the bands for pull up exercises is that the height of your ceiling matters.  We are in the basement and the ceiling hook I installed is only about 7'8" off the ground, which means that my wife has to sit back a bit from the mount point for the bands to be stretched enough to give a good amount of resistance.  Fortunately the free orange band (35-40lb resistance) promotion should help tremendously with this issue.I would definitely recommend these bands over other (more expensive) kits.  I just don't see what they could possibly offer that these don't.
summary: Very nice bands at a great price

reviewText: I bought these after looking at local sports stores and they wanted to charge 10 per band and per handle.  It does what I need it to do and nothing more.  Great alternative to expensive bands.  Carabineers could be upgrader to a higher quality and I wouldn't complain but over all they are good bands.
I was looking for an easy exercise option due to a medical problem.  The resistance bands are perfect for a workout while sitting in a chair.
This is a great set of resistance bands! Can choose from multiple resistance weight types. Durable, quality material. Great customer service too

I was very pleasantly surprised with the quality of the bands and attachments in this kit - mostly because this was nearly half the cost of some of the beach body products that I had considered while doing the P90x program.  Well - have no concerns with this set - it has quality handles and attachment points, is easy to add bands and multiply resistance by attaching multiples to the nicely produced handles.  It also comes in a nice bag which makes it easy to take on the road for travel (though it is a LITTLE bulky if you are flying - car trips, no worries).  All in all a great product which I have used almost daily for a month and a half with no problems.The ONLY thing that I think they could improve with the product would be to laminate the resistance reference chart.  As it is just paper - it falls apart quickly if you pack the kit in your suitcase and it can be a bit of a challenge to remember which bands are what when you are trying to achieve a particular resistance, or trying to chart your improvement like you do with P90 programs.  In hindsight - I wish I would have laminated it myself.  I would recommend using some labels and marking the resistance of your bands yourself if you get the product.

These bands are a perfect replacement for the dumbbells in the P90X exercise system. I've had them for about a week now and in that short amount of time, I really put them to work. They are very easy to use and portable making the set up and clean up for my workouts not much of a hassle. I love that you can add bands together to create more resistance, i.e. heavier weight. I'd recommend this product to anyone.

Great bands that I have had no problems with so far.. Included in the package is a promotion which you can get a free Orange Band by just calling Black Mountain Products. I spoke to Justin of BMP and he was excellent and informative of what I had to do which was just to write them a review to help them out.
The set was well worth the money and the service was excellent.  I would recommend Black Mountain with out any reservations.  They have a quality product and quality service.
summary: Total quality both product and service!

reviewText: Use it across many different platforms of multi targeted workouts. Absolutely love them. Would recommend for arms and back workouts!
I'm so happy with this product. Has been so super useful. One of the best purchases I've ever made. Shipped quickly and packaged well. Very happy!
I bought these to train with since I can't actually do a full pullup. They work great and do not damage my door.

I bought this set because I wanted something I could grow with. It had good reviews, so I figured for the price, I'd give them a go. And they are AWESOME!  I love how the bands have sturdy reinforced clips at each end to hook to the handles. They are all interchangeable and so well made.  You will only be pleased with this set!
summary: The best set of resistance bands EVER!

reviewText: Great product as described.  Seems durable.  I like the carrying case that it comes with, it will probably be very easy to travel with.  I get a little concerned when I do pull-up type exercises with the band snapping, but no issues so far -- I will continue to check the bands before working out to make sure they are in good condition.

Just like the ones at the gym, only these are better because I can attach extra tubes together for more resistance with the supplied carabiners. At the gym, I would need to hold like two or more extra handles if I wanted more resistance..

I got these bands a few weeks ago because I didn't want to buy all the different weight free weights and have to find somewhere to put them when I wasn't using them.  Originally, I wasn't sure if I would like the bands or not because I have never used them, but now I love them!!  They are so easy and convenient to use!  Even my 5 year old uses them to work out with me.  I can really feel them working and I can't wait to see the results after a few more weeks.  The only thing I would change is I wish the set came with 2 sets of handles instead of just one.
This resistance band set is well-made. It seems like it will last a long time. It comes with several bands so you can customize your resistance.

I love these bands and Iove the part that can be put in a door way so you can use these bands up high.  These are perfect and you get so many of them.  I would suggest this purchase to anyone.  Shipping was really speedy as well.
I am blown away by this product. The amount of weight resistance you can make up with combining the bands is awesome.

I was skeptical at first using bands when i have always used weights, but I love these.  Quick on and off with these heavy duty clevis connections.  I have stretch them to the max and they have held.  Great product at a great price.  Excellent for P90x workouts.  I purchased 3 for my 2 sons and myself and they love them too.  A lot easier too carry than weights and take up much less space also.  Highly recommend them

Surprised by the way they worked. I have weights I've been using at home for a while (light weights, high reps)and have been looking for a way to get a similar workout while traveling in my motorhome. I had always thought the "rubber band" workout wouldn't do much but I needed something while on the road so I ordered these and expected a minor workout. Then the surprise. I started using these bands off the ladder on the back of my motorhome and was impressed by the resistance and the workout I got. Been using them 3 to 4 times a week for the last month or so and can see results.  Just ordered another set (5) so I can hook them up in different configurations so I can go from one exercise to the next without stopping. VERY pleased with them and would recommend them anytime.

Excellent product, does what it's intended for and has great hookups for alternate stretches. Not much else to really say though, so far my experience with them has been great, and my girlfriend gets a good workout on them too.

These bands work great to provide a variety of resistance exercises.  I did recently experience a problem with a couple of the bands, and contacted Black Mountain's customer service about it.  I received a response the same day, and the issue was resolved within a week.  Needless to say whenever I will be looking to purchase a product this company sells, they will have my business with no shopping around.

Product came as described and actually better than thought it would be. I think it's well work the money. Haven't encountered any problems yet, but have only put it under mild use so far. So far though, I would highly recommend for the price.
Simply worth buying, do not think is a good option. They come in different levels from a low level that still allows you to strengthen your muscles.

I'm using this to work out my hips for an IT Band issue.  I tried using it for a full workout, but just don't like a resistance band workout for my full body.  But for my hips, the door peice is awesome.

I am very impressed with the quality of these bands and handles.  The bands have metal clips for a solid connection and easy removal of bands. Everything about the product says quality. I expect it to last a long time.I have only had the product about a week so have yet to try out the door and ankle attachments.

There are a lot of exercises that I can get out of this resistance band set and because its resistance is so high, I can challenge myself more. I would have been worried that it would break, but now I can see that I don’t need to worry about that.
This is an excellent product.  I purchased for my wife and she loves to use it.  A great workout in a small package.

I previously purchased another set of bandsBlack Mountain Products Resistance Band Set (Five Bands Included)in January of 2011 for P90X.  They worked very well for the last year but I had to purchased a more heavy duty band in the middle of 2011, there just wasn't enough resistance.  I tried using multiple bands at once, this is difficult if you do not have large hands since you need to hold multiple handles at once.When I started my second pass through P90X I decided to purchase these and I am very pleased with the results.  Using a combination of the heavy duty bands the resistance is ample.  Also my original set is still in good condition so I expect the same quality from these.

I was really impressed with product. I found the bands extremely convenient and useful to get in better shape. Their small size made them extremely easy to transport. Furthermore, the ability to stack bands allowed me to work with greater weight. The customer service was also great for this product, addressing any questions I had.

Disclaimer: This is my first set of exercise bands, so do not consider me an expert on all things resistance bands. WIth that said, I am very happy with my purchase thus far. I purchased these bands a little over 3 months ago and have been using them with the P90x exercise videos among other workouts. The bands feel sturdy and well-made. I admit the first few weeks using the door anchor I half feared the bands would break anyway and snap back to slap me in the face (paranoia anyone?), but they held up beautifully. I find myself putting more and more stress on them now (getting further back from the anchor creates stronger resistance) because I know they can take it. I love the option to stack bands on the handles - there are several leg exercises I do that simply require more weight than a single band in this set can give me. Thankfully, the stacking option works great - the bands feel balanced and like I'm getting even resistance from all of them. I would like it if it were easier to attach and detach the bands from the door anchor, but at the end of the day, I'd rather have an anchor that I know will hold up.There are certain exercises that free weights really are better for, but for the most part, I've done great with these bands and just some 5 lb hand weights as a backup. It is also really easy to switch between bands during a workout, which I appreciate since my workout routines tend to move through several muscle areas and then repeat, and it involves a lot of weight switching. All in all, I recommend!

The band's came on time and as described.  I have been using the bands 6 days a week for over a month now and did not want to write a review until I had a chance to break the product in.  I am impressed at the overall construction of the bands and there are no visible signs of break down of the material even after continual use.  I would and actually have recommend these bands to anyone looking to purchase resistance bands.  Also, their customer service was outstanding when I called to inquirer about higher resistance bands.  Quality product!

Very good product.  I ordered the bands to complete the P90X workout.  The product came very quickly and works well with P90X.  The handles are comfortable and you can quickly change out the bands. Another nice feature is that you can combine two bands to increase resistance/weight.  The bands came with a small storage bag that fits all the equipment for easy storage.  I would highly recommend this product.

This set is a great offering from BMP! It comes with high quality clips, tubing, foam handles and accessories. I travel a lot and this set is the perfect travel exercise option. It's light weight, portable, and comes with a travel bag. I like the idea of combining units to increase resistance, some other product don't allow for this. I don't agree with one commenter stating that they did not like this option. This should not be counted against the product and BMP as this is the nature of resistance bands. It's still beats carrying dumbbells in my luggage while traveling! I recommend this product from BMP.

I bought these bands to use with Tony Horton's 10-Minute Trainer.  For the most part these are great until you have to do a military press or an overhead tricep curl.  These exercises require you to stand on the middle of the band and push all the way up until your arms are fully extended.  For these exercises, the bands are too short for me and I worry how long they'll last if I keep stretching them that far.  I'm 6'0" tall, so someone shorter might not have any problem.  If you're 6' or taller, I would find something longer because these will disappoint.  The B-Line bands used by Tony Horton for P90x and his other videos appear to be roughly twice as long as these.These are good quality bands though.  The grommets are strong and the clips are metal and thus, less prone to breaking.  The door attachment and ankle accessory work fine.  The "instruction manual" is a little sparse and simplistic but you can't expect too much there.  Suspiciously, I noticed that none of the exercises show the bands being lifted any higher than shoulder length.EDIT: I increased my review to a 4 star after using the bands a while longer and speaking to their customer service.  I also got a free orange band for my call.  According to customer service the bands can actually stretch safely up to 5 times their original size  (their max stretch is about 40 ft. although this makes them unusable).  After 3 weeks of overhead use they still show no signs of wear or tear.EDIT: Still on the fence about these.  After 6 weeks of use I had to get the red band replaced after seeing several tears appear.  Now I'm seeing tears in the black band and one tear in the new red band already.  As far as I know I'm not using them inappropriately but I may have to go ahead and return the whole set.
summary: Started great but beginning to disappoint

reviewText: Had the bands delivered two weeks ago the bands seem durable and the quality of the handles and the hardware are impressive for the price.Did'nt give it five stars since the set is only two weeks old.
summary: Had the bands delivered two weeks ago the bands seem ...

reviewText: Have no complaints so far, they work like they're suppose to. They seem like the bands are very durable and will last for a while.

This is a high quality set at a very reasonable price.  I use this as a modifier for P90X.  Black Mountain Products customer service is exceptional as well!  You won't be disappointed with this purchase! Good Luck!
summary: Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor and Ankle Strap!!

reviewText: Friday, Oct 4, 9:15AMAs I was using the bands to work out one of the floor examples, I stood 200 lbs. up on a band handle and cracked the darn thing. Clumsy me. I immediately got out the paper work that came with the band set, easily located the phone number and called.Within 2 rings Dan answered. NO PRESS 1 or ANY MADDENING MENUS!Dan was extremely concerned that I didn't hurt myself in anyway. Once we had a good laugh about my awkwardness he told me he was putting an order in the system and with in 2 hours a new set of handles should be delivered to me Monday via USPS.He provided me with a tracking number.I received this product by-way-of Amazon Prime on the 3rd of Oct. and used with out mishap 2 times and on the 3 workout (on the 4th) is when I blew it.This product with the door anchor is just what an in home body toner work out system should be. No heavy weights and I anticipate positive results once I start again on Monday. Dan also assured me that the new handle design, strengthen by at least another 30% should not succumb to the same demise if I stand on them accidentally again.Good product, great price, and customer service. All ya can ask for.

I use these 4-7 a week.  They are holding up fine.  I use them for almost all my work outs upper and lower body and I run sprints against them as well.  All you need is a door to get a full body work out.  This is a great value for your money.  I also appreciate its portability as well.The included door anchor, ankle strap and handles are more than enough for 99% of people I'm sure.  I would have liked a carabiner clip to make it easier to move the bands around so you can use just one large clip instead of many smaller ones especially if you are using a great deal of resistance.  The other thing I would like is some sort of larger anchor where one could tie a slip knot around a tree for work outs at the park.  However, for the money, I couldn't really demand these things and these are merely suggestions to improve the package.  Overall, this does give you your money's worth.
summary: Does what it's supposed to.  Great value for money.

reviewText: I wish I would have taken the warnings I read in some of the other reviews seriously!I purchased these bands and loved them the first 2 times I used them. The handles make the bands very comfortable to hold. They seemed to be high quality. I am 5'3" and the stretch was plenty for me, though if you are tall I'm not so sure this set of bands would work for you. After my first 2 uses I would have given these bands 5 out of 5 stars, but after today's workout there's no chance!While I was using the yellow band the hardware snapped and hit my leg. Thankfully it hit our concrete garage floor before hitting my leg. I've attached photos of the hardware issue--  as you can see one of the handles becomes disconnected even with the slightest amount of pull. It seems that the peg that keeps the clip attached to the band is too small for the hole.All in all I would say don't waste your money! I'm going to cough up a little more money and buy actual dumbbells.
Broke in week 6 of P90X.  The blue band snapped back on my foot.  I thought I broke a toe but it's just black and blue.

This set provides workout versatility and diversity. It has enabled me to increase the resistance by simply adding an extra band to the ring. It is not the cheap set that includes one band with each handle, but includes the tier of different bands that can provide increasing resistance. If you want to get stronger and break plateaus, this set is for you.

I bought this to help me exercise while recovering from an injury which kept me from my usual routine. I didn't expect much from some elastic bands.  However, I found that I actually really like this product.  I use it every day at work and at home.  I hook up the band under my desk at work and workout my legs while sitting at my desk.  At home I get a very good, full body workout. I like the handles and the ankle band... I only wish it came with two ankle bands.  I don't suppose there is much difference between brands but, after using it every day for about a month now, I have to say this product is exactly what I was looking for.
love the product! Great to work out at there are many different ways to use this bands. The quality of the product it's also great I can recommend them to anyone.
Absolutely love these bands!  So many exercises all for one affordable price!  Would recommend for anyone just starting to work or or the seasoned fitness guru!

For the price and what you get i love it, bands like this shouldn't cost you an arm or a leg and should last and not rip when you put strain on them. these live up to my expectations with repeated use. good buy

I can't begin to tell you how impressed I am with this company!  The order shipped sooner than expected and I can't speak enough about the quality of this product.  When the product arrived I decided to order an additional set of handles.  I spoke to "Danny" and he could not have been more helpful!HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

The Black Mountain Resistanace Band Set with  the Door Anchor, and Ankle Strap arrived promptly to my home. I like the fact this product can set up quickly and various bands can be added for increase resistance. The other advantage I find favorable is the ease to take the bands with me while I am traveling. The set-up is simple to use and gives me a good workout.
summary: Black Mountain Resistanace Band Set with Door Anchor, and Ankle Strap

reviewText: I purchased this because with my crazy schedule lately it is hard to get to the gym. So I saw this on one of lighting deals and it was a great price so I thought I try it out. If your looking for a intense workout with high resistance this may not be for you.  But if you want something to use when you can't to the gym this is excellent.  On a side note after I purchased this we had all of that snow so I had a chance to really use it for a few days in a row and it was good.
These bands are awesome. The leg strap and door anchor work well for me. I'm only using them a couple times a week, but I'm definitely happy.

I really like the BMP bands.  The seem to be very high quality, especially for the price.  They are a great way to get a quick workout with great flexibility.  You can stack multiple bands if you choose to really add resistance, which makes this useful for stronger men and women.  The door anchor holds surprisingly well and does not cause any damage to the door or frame.  Even with multiple band (stacked) exercises.  The only improvement I would like to see is the padding on the hand grips improve.  They are absolutely fine if you are performing lower resistance (1 band) exercises, but when you stack the bands you can notice the padding compressing.
summary: Great quick mobile solution - easy to use

reviewText: I was looking for an alternative to dumbbells since I travel a lot for work.  These bands provide the resistance I need and they easily fit in my luggage.  I was a little concerned with using the door anchor with the heavier bands, but I have had no problems so far.  My only negative about this set is that it only has one set of handles, so switching between exercises that I use different bands takes longer.  I will be buying another set of handles soon...
summary: Exactly what I was looking for

reviewText: I've been to different sporting stores looking and trying different bands. None of them are constructed as well as this set and none of them gives me this much bang for the buck.

These resistance bands are a must for home fitness.  The product quality is excellent, and the range of weight resistances allows for versality in home excercises.  I do nightly workouts in front of the TV, and when I am done, the bands stow away nicely in the bag.  As with any resistance band, there is a concern for breaks.  So far I have had no issues or any indication of potential issues.  I do wear eye protection in the event a break occurs and regularly inspect the bands prior to using them.  The fittings and nylon straps are sturdy and the clips are a carabiner style clip that is easy to change.  My only complaint is that there is only one set of handles (perhaps unreasonable).  I like to work opposing muscle groups quickly for circuit training purposes, and I find that changing straps and handles out for different levels of resistance for different excercises slows me down.  The handles may be bought separately which I will probably do in the near future.  All-in-all, a great product that I am very happy with.

in shopping around for resistance bands the Black Mountain product offered the best value I came across.  Their packages offers the greatest number of bands and accessories and the quality is excellent.  Every other set was at least 1/3 more in cost and most looked to be of inferior quality with reviews listing their bands wearing out.  I would highly recommend the Black Mountain Product.

I travel a bit and find these very useful in getting some exercise in during my trips.  The bands seem sturdy and the door attachment works great.I like that the handle can be used for different bands as this cuts down on my baggage weight.  I'll probably end up buying another pair of handles because sometimes I need to switch bands quickly (circuits).
Use this daily and I love it thought the price and product are great. Very easy way to keep in shape.

The bands are very durable, and the material does not irritate the skin if you are doing a move that the bands would make contact (e.g. overhead press). The door attachment definitely works well especially with heavy doors like your backdoor.  I don't have any worries that the bands will slip and hit me.  Overall, worth the money and glad I got them.
Im in my 3rd week of p90x and it has added another level of intensity. These are great bands and I recommend them to everyone.

For the price, these simply can't be beat.  I purchased them for the p90x program.  I'm now on week 5 and they are still going strong.  My one comment on these would be that it can be a pain changing the bands.  Some of the clips can stick on the cloth straps.  However, this is more of a convenience issue than a problem with the product.  So, if you want an economical solution to bands, this is a great choice.

I travel quite a bit and, due to the nature of my work, live with only the items I can keep in my car. It is a compact set; it is smaller than a basketball when all of the items are inside the carry bag.The accessories allow a wide variety of exercises. The included guide has several pages of exercises, but many more can be performed with this set if you are willing to do a little research.I'm an average guy (not a bodybuilding enthusiast by any means) wishing to keep in shape. Regardless, I found that in order to find a challenging level of resistance for the majority of my exercises, it was necessary to combine several resistance bands. This is nothing more than an inconvenience, as there are enough bands to do essentially any exercise you may want to do unless you have an advanced level of fitness and strength. The upside to this is that you can achieve a range of resistance levels to challenge your specific ability by adding/removing bands as necessary.For beginners, "average" people, and anyone who travels, this set provides plenty of challenge and variety to stay in shape while travelling or or in a living space with limited room for storage.
Worth the money. A great travel tool.I recomend it to anyone traveling or to someone who can't get to the gym.

I can't afford the adjustable dumbbells just yet, so until I can, I'm stuck with resistance bands.  They're 1/8 the price and can work just as well in some instances.  These bands have held up for about a month now, but I'm starting to notice some slack in some of the bands and my black band has begun to develop micro tears.  I don't know if this is from my stepping on them to increase the resistance or just from wear and tear, so I won't fault the brand itself so much as make an observation.  I have used other bands and prefer these of all the bands I've tried.  Good amount of resistance from light to heavy and sturdy, metal clips that won't come undone at the apex of a rep, (had that happen before and slam into my foot... not fun).So, for under $30, these bands are worth a shot.  I'd recommend them to anyone who can't just yet afford the adjustable dumbbells, but as soon as I can, I'm switching over.
summary: You get what you pay for...

reviewText: I bought these to use with P90X and they work great. I have heard stories about bands breaking, but I have pushed these to the limit and they have held up. The handles are comfortable, the clasps are durable. I recommend these bands!
summary: High Quality, Stable and Sturdy Bands

reviewText: Simple product I use to support rehab and some basic home exercise.  Handles and D-rings that attach to the bands appear to be well made relative to the price.  Small improvement could be made by filing down the edges on the D-rings where the clasp comes together.  The edges there are fairly sharp, left over from the stamping process during manufacturing.
The B.M.P Resistance Bands are great and very durable and give the best alternative to not having a weight set at home. Also made of high quality tubing.

These bands are impressively well-made for the price. The clips are heavy and over-built. The attachments have a ball-and-loop design that looks quite durable. The handles are comfortable and well-padded. The bands are easily "stackable" and will provide as much "weight" as most people will be able to handle for most exercises.
summary: Well-made exercise bands, attachments, and accessories

reviewText: They work. And work me. Just what I wanted. Five stars if instructions were better and if bands were weight-labelled in addition to color-coded.
I love these bands, they work so well, and I love working out with them, the bands are well made, and easily used enough said.

I have been using these resistance bands for a month and I have pleasantly surprised with how well they work. I figured they would be a supplement to a more traditional workout, but I have found myself using them as a replacement and seeing results. The Black Mountain bands work very well, the grips are of good quality, they are the perfect width to fit my hands and don't slip, no matter the exercise I'm doing. The Bands themselves are of good quality and have mostly held up to continuous use. The only issue I have is since I mostly use the red band, it has become damaged and I would have liked for it to ship with two ankle straps. Other then that, its a fine product and I would definitely recommend it.

The Black Mountain products arrived on a timely manner and i used them right away. I have a wall station I hooked it up to and its great for the shoulder complex. I also ordered another set so I could use both at same time for both shoulders. Great for Internal/External movements plus many more exercises.
They are just what I wanted!!! They work very well I am very impressed with Black Mt. Products they do a great job!

Never used any bands before so you can take me as a newbie here. But being familiar with what they can do is what made me order! I wasn't sure about their actual result but when I began using them in accordance with proper instructions, I found them to be quite useful. I have to say that I'm impressed! They are quite easy to setup and can be used when and where you want. Many different exercises can be done if you know how to do it! Don't expect them to replace your gym! I would like to add that a detailed manual showing more exercises is needed!My only worry is the product getting snapped after usage, as others before me already pointed out!Keep up the good work!
summary: Works like the way they should!

reviewText: i didn't get a door or ankle strap  I didn't reseive either a door anchor or a any way to hold bands to a door

Having used barbells and dumbells for 30 years, I was skeptical in getting bands.  But I didn't want to buy or store 100's of pounds (and dollars) of weights.  I was amazingly surprised with these bands.  Very easy to use and set up--able to keep up with the exercise change over in P90X--and also very durable.  I highly recommend!
I used to be a personal trainer and I needed something to fill in on the days I couldn't make it to the gym.  This was great quality esp for the cash

I bought these when I began doing rehab at home on my torn rotator cuff, and they've worked great. There are enough different resistances so that if you're doing low-resistance training like therapy, they'll be perfect. None of the weights will be challenging enough for actual resistance though, in my opinion.Further, the door-stop is pretty weak, and I once had it slingshot into my chest after it got pulled out of the wall. Not the most fun I've ever had.I still give this product 5-stars because 6 weeks later my shoulder feels usable again, and this is after about 8 months of being completely sedentary and doing nothing with it. This is more of a testament to bands in general, but as far as the bands themselves go, there is very little to fault these guys on.

I don't usually review Items. But these are great. Its a whole gym you can fit in a bag that weighs very little and costs less than a month gym membership. They included a promotion in the package, to get an orange band, 35-40lb, more than resistance than any included bands. So I called them up, expecting to have to do a survey or something. There only question was "Do you like it?" I said yes. They asked for my address and sent me the additional band. Bought this to do leg extensions as physical therapy and have ended up doing full workouts. Very pleased.

I’ve owned a set for a few years and recently purchased a second to have more resistant options.  You can quickly change the band option to adjust for your exercise.  I travel often for work and take these bands with me.  They are very light weight and don’t take-up much room in the suitcase.  I had never used bands for working-out before, and I’m impressed  with their versatility.
summary: Very versatile and convenient to travel with

reviewText: Great product for vacations and traveling.  As advertised, but could use a more extensive workout guide -- I guess that's what YouTube is for.  Buy this set, not something cheap from sporting goods stores.

These are good. Idk if I'm too strong or if its the fact its adjustable weight but its hard for me to determine necessarily the struggle but they work. They work as a perfect replacement for heavy weight. I don't feel like my body is rocks. The only complaint I have is that these come with interchangeable cables. I bought it trying to conserve room but when in the moment coming to work out with only a one minute pause its a lot to change the cable with the handles. Other than that I definitely thing these are some od the beat band for then best pricing you can buy. From this company in general
summary: Goos Company, Good Bands, Minor Issue

reviewText: I use the bans to  strengthen my torn rotator cuff, and do various extercises every other day.I have a choice of 5 bands to use.
summary: black mountain products resistance band set

reviewText: Black Mountain Products places a lot of importance on customer satisfaction and it shows.  I called to redeem my free orange band and was immediately greeted by a friendly person.  Something I'm not totally used to.  He helped me out and had the band shipped right to me.As for the bands themselves, they are of excellent quality.  No complaints here.Thanks!

I've been using the bands for about a week now and I'm impressed.  Good quality, easy to use, and great value.  The bands work muscles differently than traditional weights and I can already see results.  I'll probably rotate between bands and weights just to keep it interesting, but so far I'm loving this purchase.
fantastic product with the ability to work on different body parts due to the door anchor, ankle strap and different level of resistance bands which is great for begginers to more experienced lifters

Makes muscles burn when using. Have to wait to see how long rubber bands last with me using them 6 days a week twice a day. Makes working out easier. Just stand on bands and start pumping while you watch tv.  Close strap in door and work out that way also.

Definitely appreciate the level of flexibility in terms of resistance.  Combine different color bands to vary level of resistance.  Shipped on time and received all items displayed in the description photo.
summary: Good product for beginners and intermediate users

reviewText: I initially bought this product for some shoulder rehab exercises, and it is just what I needed.Now that I see all the other exercises you can do, I can get a lot of workout at home without having to go out to the gym as often.The rugged construction is top notch, and the metal rings and connectors should hold up better than plastic ones.They way you can mix and match different bands together gives you far more flexibility than sets where the handles are permanently fixed to the bands.This is a great price for something that I'm sure will hold up a long, long time.

I was a bit skeptical about exercise bands having never tried them. But my trainer at the YMCA thought it would be a good change along with my dumbbell set at home. So I read a lot of product reviews and these were rated highly by people. I like them. I printed off a ton of exercises my trainer gave me and am learning how to do each one. I do wonder if the bands couldn't be longer as the set at my YMCA is considerably so but I guess I get the same workout. I am still playing around with what color (or weight resistance) to use for each exercise. And if I travel on vacation I can take them with me which is cool. So far I have had absolutely no problem with any of the bands - they all seem to be high quality and durable. Let's see where I stand 2 months from now.
summary: A different kind of workout but workout it is!

reviewText: Got these to supplement the body weight exercises I have been doing and they have been a great addition to my workout.  I especially like how you can add multiple bands together to create a huge variety of resistance.  And it really is a complete package for a great price.  The quality seems to be there as well so I am hopeful they will last me a long time.
I like that all the accessories are included in one low price and all wrapped up in their own drawstring bag.  Good quality hardware.

I bought these for P90X workouts and they worked ok at first, but like another reviewer said they are a little too short for over head exercises that require you to stand on it.  Also they have worn down really fast an yesterday one of the bands snapped on me and I now I have to replace it after only using them for 3 months. If you are using them for rehab exercises than they are good but if you plan on using them for any real exercise program then I would get something else.I will say though that the company as a whole is great.  When I called them to let them know the band snapped they sent a replacement no questions asked so that was much appreciated and tells you what type of company they are.  So 5 stars for company but 2 stars for bands based on my use.

Our trainer told us these were the best resistance bands and she was right!  They came with all the accessories we could want, even with a bag to keep them all in, not that the bands ever go back in.  We use these every day as part of our home-gym workout and are very happy with them, including the comfortable hand grips.

i purchased these to help with a shoulder injury and now that that's healed up they're great for everyday training/ traveling. Just throw them in your bag and you don't have to worry about the hotels gym.
I got this for work and it has been awesome!  Good way to sneak a little extra exercise in your day. Great value too!

These resistance bands are incredibly versatile. Easy to connect and disconnect, or reconfigure for using with your foot or a door. The handles are designed so well you don't feel any twist as you rotate through your pull. With five bands you can get just about any resistance you want. And to top it off it has a lifetime guarantee? WIN!
summary: Great product at an unbeatable price

reviewText: Overall a positive experience with this product.  Fast shipping from Amazon, great interchangeable bands allow flexible workout solutions without a ton of equipment, and great customer service from BMP after the purchase.Stackable, interchangeable bands enable resistance levels from light physical therapy resistance to very heavy resistance.  The door support and ankle strap provide for plenty of workout variations.  Workouts are only limited by your imagination.
Exceeded my expectations in everyway.  Being a heavy lifter, but not having the time, these bands have allowed me to still be active at home.  Quality at a good price.
Work as advertisedGreat for stretching and toningIf you need more weight, try a gymFor quick convenient workouts, it does the job
This gave me an alternative to doing nothing when I was forced to be away from the gym and my home weight set. It carries easy. Does not take up space and is easy to use.

This product is working great with our P90X program.  Having a second set of handles would be very nice but great all around.  Bands are durable and the door anchor was exactly what we needed with our lack of a spot for a pull up bar.

I have had these bands for a short while after seeing a friend of mine with it on a trip we took to vegas. Being able to get a quick workout in the room without having to go to the gym was a big plus! only problem with my set was having one set of handles and taking the time to take off the band currently on it and to adjust accordingly to each workout. But buying another handle set will remedy this quickly.
summary: Great bands for wanting to workout while traveling.

reviewText: The ability to adjust the resistance with combinations of different bands is awesome. I was a little worried about doing shoulder exercises as I was not sure if the bands were long enough. But I am 5'11", and these definitely work awesome. Thanks!
summary: Very good purchase for the price

reviewText: Love these resistance bands. Great addition to any work out routine and very good quality.
very light weight.  good attachments for the ankle/door anchor.  very smooth pull. easy to stack up for more weight, but still rather light overall.

I'VE BEEN USING THESE BANDS FOR A FEW WEEKS NOW AND THEY HAVE FAR SURPASSED MY EXPECTATIONS. EASY TO USE AND CHANGE FOR ONE RESISTANCE GRADE TO ANOTHER. THE ANKLE STRAP IS A GREAT BONUS. I'M VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE AND WOULD RECOMMEND THESE TO ANYONE WHETHER YOU WORKOUT FOR FITNESS OR TRAIN SERIOUSLY.
They are sturdy, and ready to use right away. I use them 3 times a week at home when I cannot get to the gym.Also easy to pack if you travel.
I live a life on the road and these are light and portable.  Finally a workout I can take with me!

At 49 with a just arrived new born I decided to get more serious about getting back into shape so that I could chase after the little bugger & his 2 year-old sister. After many wasted monthly gym memberships over many years, this resistance band kit is the perfect workout any time of day or night at my convenience. I travel for work internationally often & with this fully loaded kit, especially the included door stop & carry bag, I quickly pack it into my suitcase & take my home gym on the road with me! Now when my day goes pair shape & I can't get outside, I have no excuses because the BMP Resistance Bands are waiting for me & calling me out every time I walk by them.The value ($$) / benefit exchange is outrageously the best feature!Also great to explore their website and get a quick intro to your basic exercises for anyone new to bands, as was the case with me. [...] Black Mountain Products has thought of the best practical solution to get you quickly started! :-)Highly recommend this product to anyone wanting to get in shape / back into shape at your leisure, especially busy executives / travelers!
summary: Way more than what I expected :-)

reviewText: These bands are awesome, Works great with p90x.  Easy to use in combination with each other, these bands use a clip attachment with makes it easy to mix and match bands, red band black band ect.  Somes with the door attachment and leg attachment. Worth the money
summary: Awesome Product, works great with p90x

reviewText: I am so pleased with this product that I am buying another set.  Not because of wear (they are still as good as new after six months of heavy use) but because I worked through all of the bands and I need to add more resistance.  Having extra handles and anchor will be a plus for supersets.  Clips allow for fast transition between sets.  Strongly recommend this product.
summary: Very durable after six months of frequent use

reviewText: I just started using these a few weeks ago, and so far so good. The bands, grommets and accessories all feel very tough. The grips are wonderfully soft. I would say, though, that although they haven't shown any signs of wear yet, the grips do feel like they might deteriorate over time. Commercial strength workout equipment typically uses super hard plastic or even grippy metal for their grips. Overall, you end up trading blisters for durability though. I'm also a little concerned about some of the reviewers' issues with tears, but so far my bands have held up swimmingly. I'm also impressed with their customer service. They seem like a very honest company, and how can you beat that price? Really!?
I like these bands. Really works well. Just wish it came with some more exercise ideas or a video dvd. But you can just google search for it. These bands get the job done.
I am a beginner, and having been using the bands 4 x a week for the past 2 weeks. The quality is excellent, very easy to use with the door anchor. Very pleased with the product and speed of delivery.
The resistance bands worked great!  The quality is very high and liked the packaging.  My only complaint is that it took longer to get to me than I would have liked.  Thanks!

These bands have given me a new way of exercising.  By standing at different places, I can move from easy to difficult.  The exercises given are awesome for someone who needs an alternative exercise at least once a week.

Convenient and easy to set us.  I can get a workout without bulky machines and they take up little space.  Wish they came with more than one door anchor so I didn't have to switch it around, but love them overall'
Their customer service is excellent. The bands are easy to adapt to whatever range you want by clipping them on and off. They have a great guarantee at a great price. What's there not to like?

I don't use these bands regularly, I mainly use them when I travel or don't have time to go to the gym. These bands are great and definitely do the job for me. I traveled to Hawaii and didn't have time to go to the gym so I brought these with me and worked out in my hotel room. I definitely recommend these!

I am using this product as a rehab. I injured my shoulders doing powerlifting and just started to train using this product in my home. I like the quality of the product and have found it to be strong and durable. Also when I received the product it mentioned a Orange band which was not in the shipment, I called Black mountain and spoke to them, then told me the Orange band was not part of the set, but would be more then happy to send it to me for free, and I received the product within 2 days, I was also provided information on a heavier band coming out, it is a Purple band, I will be buying this item as well.

This seems to be a very nice set.  I've bought their previous set and these new ones have heavier duty carabiners than the previous plastic.  Good padding on the handles.  Nice carrying pouch, too.  The previous pouch was pretty wimpy.

These are pretty good. I am seeing a benefit in my muscle strength from using them. I have not had any trouble with them breaking. But I am a mild user. They are perfect for what I need them for. Very low impact as I have joint issues. I can literally see and feel my arms getting stronger and my upper back muscles. I will continue to use them.

I bought these exercise bands about a month ago as an alternative to dragging out the iron weights or when I did not feel like making the drive to the gym.  So far so good. They provide a good amount of resistance, although you will need to use multiple bands for larger muscle group exercises (chest, legs/squats, etc.). Even woke up with sore biceps on the second day of use.  The bands are somewhat long but you can adapt to this depending on the exercise/muscle groups you are working. I have not experienced any problems associated with the quality of the product.  The smooth or almost slippery feel has begun to wear off and the light rubber like smell is fading as well.  Good product.  Would recommend this product/manufacturer to anyone.
summary: Great alternative to going to gym/dragging out the iron

reviewText: I purchased these "tools" while in recovery from a hip operation and for those who've had a hip replacement or revision surgery, it's no picnic! It requires a lot of hard work in physical therapy, but these tools are perfect after you "graduate" from PT and need to continue your exercises at home. They're solid, adjustable, well made, and durable and you don't need any special equipment to enable you to get a workout. Very well made and I've had no problems at all.

I absolutely love Black Mountain Products.Some background - I am a fitness buff, but hate going to a gym, so I prefer to craft my own exercise programs and work out at home - usually body weight exercises with an occasional dumbbell used. I had previously owned a set of BMP resistance bands, but I misplaced them during my divorce about a year ago. I decided that I would like to add resistance band training back into my routine and ordered a new set of the BMP bands. I could not be happier with them!These are clearly a quality product. The bands are well made, as are the anchors and hand straps. These have seen nearly daily use for the past month, and probably will for a long time to come.I mainly use these for chest, shoulder, and arm exercises. I stand on these, anchor these to the door, and use 35lb dumbbells underneath my bench to hold them in place for the chest exercises.Anyone thinking about getting resistance bands, look no further - these are the bands you want. I've used cheaper versions that stretch and tear after a few months of moderate use. These have been getting heavy use, and look as new as the day I bought them,

I purchased the Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set for a series of core exercises to rehab a pelvis and low-back injury. I had previously used a more expensive set of bands made by Gold's Gym. I would certainly recommend the Black Mountain set based on quality, price and ease of use. I really like the door anchor attachment, which comes in handy when doing two handed exercises. The handles for the bands are sturdy and sized well. And the bag, while cheap, is nice to have for travel and just to clean up after a workout. The only reason for a 4-star instead of a 5-star rating is the carabiner clips are a little trickier than I'd like and do not swivel in the straps the best. It does not impact exercise movements or safety, just me being picky.

I ordered these to use with p90x and did not want to buy a lot of free weights, and I'm glad that I did.  Compared to other bands, these are clearly superior.  I love the clasp used to attach to the handles.  You can tell that they are well made and will last a long time.  I've been using them for about 3 weeks and have no complaints.  I just wish that there was an option to buy another set of handles; I find myself switching between two bands frequently and would like to set them up and just go.Overall, I would recommend these to anyone looking for resistance bands or starting p90x.

Very satisfied with my Black Mountain resistance bands.  I bought two sets, as I also ended up purchasing a resistance band door anchor and didn't want to have to always change out bands.  Having two sets has also allowed me to increase my resistance options and to do things like simultaneous biceps curls, etc., using heavy resistance.The Black Mountain resistance bands have been great.  There's a great assortment of resistance weights.  The pamphlet that comes with the product not only has some great exercise illustrations, but also lists all of the weight options on the cover (for ~10 pounds, use this band, for ~60 pounds, use this combination of bands, etc.).  Prior to my Black Mountain order, I had purchased a set of resistance bands from a different company and was very disappointed in their product.  The bands from the other company simply stated that the bands were "easy, medium, and heavy."  I had no idea what the bands roughly equated to in terms of weight.  Additionally, the previous bands were cheap.  The grips were poorly made, and all of the attachments were plastic.  The Black Mountain resistance bands are definitely a high quality product.  The grips are all of good quality and all of the attachments are solid metal.  It's nice not having to wonder if the plastic is going to break on me in the middle of the exercise, resulting in an elastic band to the face.I would definitely recommend this product.

I've owned probably over 3-4 sets of resistance bands in the past 2 years, and these by far are the best quality...- They seem to be made of better & stronger material- Cheaper than most resistance band sets (that I have purchased at sporting good stores or other places online)- Comes 5 levels of resistance bands, door anchor, ankle strap, and a carrying case...other sets I bought did not come with anything besides the resistance bands...- Customer Service by far the is the best - I didn't have to send an e-mail and wait a week for a response!!  I was not put on hold...And I got to talk to someone right away...- They were very helpful in describing to me the contents of the shipment and what each piece is used for.I definitely recommend Black Mountain Products and will buy from them again!!I hope this was helpful to people who are seriously looking for products they can use and ones that will last a very long time...Thanks!- JT
summary: good quality products and awesome customer service!!

reviewText: I use other resistance bands before i get the Black mountain Bands. I am really happy i bought this ones. Great to work out :) .

I bought these band so that I could use them with P90X and they work great. Great sturdy feeling that dont make me worry much about them snapping on me. They offer great resistance for the pull-up portion of the workouts. I like who you have to ability to combine the bands to offer greater resistance while I improve my back muscle strength. YES THEY WILL EVENTUALLY BREAK!!! But they dont pretty good after one month of usage. When and if they break ill just purchase some replacements.

Ordered these bands to increase my workout with P90X program. They are fantastic! I really have noticed the difference in the intensity of my arm, chest and back workouts.  I can't do pull-ups but using these bands gives me much the same workout by using the door anchor.  Great product!

The bands are great if you have multiple people with different weight needs for working out - my husband uses the heavier, and I use the lighter resistance. This set allows you to double or even triple your bands, which is a feature many other brands don't have.

Shipping: Was great, The bands arrived in proper time and packaging.Band Storage: Included is a bag to fit the bands. When I saw the picture I thought it will not be big enough to take the bands out and put them in, but was I wrong. This nifty bag was a nice size and addition. Great for traveling or storage, but why will you put your bands away? WORK OUT lol.Bands: Bands are great, I have been using them for over a week now and I have no complaints. The hooks are metal and the construction is tough. I have no base to compare but this bands still look beefy and tough.Band Handles: Well the handles will not brake, at least the material. The padding for the handles seems to be of OK quality. They are used using the backpack-strap-nylon-material. They are good quality as well.Door hanger and other accessory: Well, I am using the door hanger and it works great, however, the other accessory, I have not even taken out of the pack as it seems to be an ankle strap. They are both built to last and seem good quality.Overall: I think this product has a good build quality. I am enjoying the easiness to add or subtract tension from your configuration. However, when using all the bands, the rings on the handles get a little crowded.Cons: Well, nothing is perfect so here we go. While I am very satisfied, with the product, considering the cost, I have to also point out some short comings for potential customers and also for the manufacturers own desire to improve a product. The band handles could have some better grip. I think the material could be improved on that area (I am talking about the foam part that keeps you comfortable). This is now issue for me, and if you are working out, and all you can think of is that the pads could be better, then your muscles are not burning enough add another band. Another thing that I noticed that could be improved is the hooks on the handles. Then again, these are easily available at any hardware store. Also, do not expect an exercise booklet with this package. All you get is a guide to see how much resistance each band has and what combinations you can get.Conclusion: I think this is a great product and I will recommend to any of my friends or family members who need a work out solution. I use these bands with P90X and are amazing.
This is my first resistance band set and I give it 5 stars because of those little extras that come in the pouch. Read all the included section of the product description.

Review edit 10/16/13:I just ordered a third set of these bands, so I could give at set to my brother. I don't know why in the world someone would make the comment that these bands aren't good for serious bodybuilding. Who EVER thought resistance bands were for serious bodybuilding? Come on. These bands do exactly what they are supposed to do, and do it well, at a good price.----I have purchased two sets of these resistance bands because I like them so well. They're a great tool to have for home workouts.The different attachments and handles make it easy to adjust and to be very creative with my workouts. I've attach the bands at all different heights in a doorway, to a bench, or just used the handles.I'm impressed with the quality, especially for what I got for the price. I've used these for travel and for a small workout space in my home - great for both.  I have no dislikes.
Great set of resistance bands for the money. Others cost more and come with less.  I use them daily and they work amazing and are very durable.

I use these bands for my P90X workout about two weeks ago and have been using them ever since.  So far they are great!  The bands are very high quality for the price. I like that you can clip on as many bands as you want to the handles, so you can add as much resistance as you want.  The carrying bag that it comes with is really nice to keep the bands in and any other work out accessories you have.  I would definitely buy from B.M.P. again.

The Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set is a great addition to my home work out kit. I have definitely enjoyed them thus far. They are quite easy to set up and do not occupy much space while storing. The only thing I would suggest in order to upgrade the product, is to write down the resistance range of each color band in the handle so you don't have guess what resistance you are using. Secondly, covering the handle (material between the foam / plastic handle to the D-Ring) with a less rough material to prevent the handle burn created during the work out session.
summary: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set is a great addition to my home work out kit

reviewText: Highly recommend buying these if you want to get a quick workout in on your lunch break or before work. They are easy to tote and store away in the carrying case.They give a high amount of resistance and last forever. I have yet to have one crack or break and I doubt if they will.
Seems very well made for the price. Bands are sturdy and simple to attach to the handles. Able to mix and match bands for wide range of resistance.

Had these for a week already.  So far, they are holding up well.  I am admittedly afraid of the damage the metal clasps will do to my feet or apartment, should they ever break.  But overall, I think the quality is there and I am getting more confident with each use.  I think the resistance is fine for anyone who is looking to get in shape.  For those of you who routinely work out and are looking for a portable workout set- get something more difficult.  This is great for beginner/intermediate and is GREAT for doing PT at home.

great price and much better than the set I will not mention brand name but you are pretty much paying for the brand names when over paying come in play. Everything I need is in this package I recieved a week ago. when I have time to use them they deff give me a good sweat to start the day!
