Arrived swiftly and in good condition. So far, everything is still in tact. Very sturdy and well built. Would definitely recommend as it is very user-friendly.

The resistance bands are an excellent tool for the average person looking to get in shape and to stay fit.  I would not recommend this to professional athletes, per se, as a substitute to lifting heavy weights for body building.  Stick to the gym if you feel the need to bench press 200+lbs.  That being said, the versatility of the band set offers users nearly the same range of exercises found on a BowFlex PR1000 Home Gym for a fraction of the cost.  I use the bands as part of my exercise routine 3-4 times per week.  I've been using them for about a month and, so far, the bands have held up well to the stress of the workout.  The door anchor is simple to use and will not harm your door or the doorframe in any way and the anchor holds up remarkably well to the stress placed on it during the workout.The exercise chart that comes with the product is simply a pamphlet that illustrates a few of the exercises that the bands can be used for.  In my opinion, this pamphlet is not necessary; however it could be better designed to include more detail on the exercises themselves while also giving advice on daily workout routine schedules and a prescribed number of sets/reps for each exercise.  Using a bit of creativity, you will likely find exercises that the band set can be used for that are not even illustrated in the pamphlet - such as leg extensions and leg curls.Final verdict: This is an excellent product and, if used properly, it will give you the solid workout you are looking for. A++

I am using the bands for P90X work outs, and they work great for the program.  The price was great compared to other similar products.  BMP ships fast and seem to be a very reliable company.  I will definetly order products from this company in the future.

I bought these resistance bands to use along with P90x, and so far they are holding up well. It's been about 2 weeks since I've started using them and none of the bands have broken yet (as some reviewers have mentioned). I don't yet know how they will hold up in the long run, but I'm not too concerned about them since Black Mountain Products has a great warranty on them.They come with 1 set of grips that attach to each of the bands via a metal clasp. If there isn't a weight that you like in each of the bands, you can combine multiple bands and customize the weight yourself.I really like these, and assuming they hold up - I give it 4 stars.

BMP is a family owned company, and they are really trying to send out a quality product for a reasonable price.  I am so happy with the bands that I bought.  They are high quality, and I love the fact that the handles can quickly separate from the bands.  It makes it easy to add bands together without having to hold several handles.  The bag that it comes with also makes it easy to pack away in luggage for trips.  Great company to deal with!

I use this as a therapy device for workers comp patients to perform rehab.  I love that it comes with the ankle strap and the door mount which allows for greater diversity for use within the clinic.  The bands are much more durable than others I have previously purchased.  It is great that I am able to combine multiple bands to be used so that the patients can build their strength and endurance with the use of this equipment.

I've been using the bands for a couple weeks for P90x.  Works great for the back exercises.  The door anchor works well for doing "pull ups".  Only downsides so far:- Takes a little while to switch the handles between bands.  There are other bands out there with handles that are built on to the bands, but from reading the reviews it sounds like those break more often.  It doesn't take too long to switch, but if you're switching bands between every exercise you'd probably want to pick up another pair of handles- The highest resistance band is not that heavy.  I saw some people mention an orange band at the top end of the resistance spectrum but my set did not include it (or a coupon for it).  I'll probably need more resistance than this set offers for a few things, but it's great for most of my exercises.

The product arrived on time and in perfect condition. The packaging was very small and compact and there was no wasted space or unnecessary packaging. I have been using the bands every other day for about three weeks since I received them and I feel that they are providing me a great workout for my fitness level and it is definitely a great value. I am already feeling strong from using this equipment and I'm very pleased I purchased them and will continue using the bands.The bands are very high quality, the grommets are strong, the handles are comfortable and sturdy and the stitching is high quality and strong and I have not worried one bit about damaging the bands when I have been using them.

I ordered these bands for my Home workout and when I received it, the packaging was very professional and compact. Quality of bands extremely high. For now I have worked out twice and the bands have provided enough resistance. I had to use a combination of bands to increase the weight component and all the single bands felt very lite to me. Love this new product.

These resistance bands are great. I have been using them for last couple of weeks, 3x for 40 minutes per day. It is great to work out with these bands at home. Delivery was on time. Customer service was excellent. I would take exercising with these resistance bands over gym membership.
The product  arrived quickly and it is great. I have been working out with it everyday and believe I am getting desired results.

I purchased these for my husband for Christmas and 1 has broke a little over 2 week into him using them. The break happened near the end of the band, but not at the junction with the ankle strap. I think these are best suited for a lightweight lifter, but that should have been indicated in the description.
summary: Not as durable as I would like...

reviewText: These have been a great addition to my home gym.  Well made and durable.  Easy to follow instructions for various exercises. I also take some of the smaller bands to wrok with me (desk job) so I can do some reps under my desk at work.  Great product
summary: great addition to your home gym

reviewText: These are excellent quality. I love the fact that you just snap or unsnap them..The hand grips are cushioned just right.  I hope they last awhile before the rubber oxidizes,, time will tell..

This bands are great for tennis warm up before a match, the carabineer makes it easy to hook it to a chain-link fence.  I've been using them also for strength conditioning with out putting strain on my joints. Having to carry equipment on court can be a hassle, and switchable handles makes this very portable and light weight.
Great quality! I am very pleased with my purchase. The bands seem very durable-- just as good as others and for abetter price!

I have been using these resistance bands for a couple of months now and have been very satisfied.  I love the number of options I have with the various bands that come in this set.  The interchangeable handles make it very easy to switch between bands and/or add more than one band at a time.  My favorite accessory is the door anchor which is a great alternative to using a pull-up bar (which I do not have and is recommended in some of the workout videos I do).  I believe that this product is a great value and have been very satisfied with the quality and versatility.  I would recommend this product to anyone who would like to add resistance training to his/her workout regimen.
summary: Great product for a great price

reviewText: These resistance bands are a great way to incorporate resistance into your work out.  I can't lift weights because of a medical condition, but I can get great resistance training with this set of bands!  You can buy handles separately if you're using all 5 bands every time you work out.

Bought this for my workout with p90x3.. I mainly bought it just in case I travel, I wanted to make sure I had no excuse to not do my workout. I tried them out just last week and they're great! I ended up using them at home every time I worked out. For pull-ups they work great, just toss the door latch over the door, close and lock door, and get in a good stance to do your pulls / reps. There is so many options as to how much weight / resistance you want with the different bands. Comes with a chart with very detailed instructions as well as how to do different work outs with them. Great product and for such a low price, you can't beat it!
again I steer away from add ons to purchases but this is invaluable - and it travels so well.  Great

After curing my ulcer and quitting smoking using books from Amazon, I thought it was time to get back into shape (the best I can, anyway.  I'm 71.)  I was a gym rat for many years, but I'd feel silly going into a gym at my age, so the bands were an excellent alternative.  I've always liked the weight machines, and these are a close copy and a nice way to get in shape at home.  The handles are very sturdy with strong attachments, as is the Velcro ankle band.  And it comes with that little gizmo so you can hang the band from the top of a door for overhead work.  All in all, I am very pleased with this product and highly recommend it.
These exceeded my standards for what I expected in a workout resistance band collection.  I have been using them alongside my P90x workouts and they work phenomenally well!
I have been doing P90X for a few weeks and did not have a suitable location for a pull up bar.  These work great!

These seem to e of good quality and I can definitely feel the workout. I never have time for the gym and these bands are great I have had no issues and am very happy with my purchase. Also I saw reviews that there are no instructions I received an instruction book with a lot if good exercises.

I bought this set a little over a month ago and use the bands several times a week.  This is by far the best deal I have found for bands and I am totally amazed with the quality and the good assortment of bands provided with the set.  Love it and really cannot say enough good things about this item.
These bands are awesome. Got them for P90X3 when I travel.  I could not be happier. The door anchor and versatility of bands offers a great range of possibilities.
Product is of a great quality. I am 56 years young and I do all of my work out in 10-15 minutes everyday and don't have to go to gym anymore. I highly recommend this product. Thanks

I needed some bands to rehab my shoulder and these are perfect for the job.  The quality is excellent, they arrived very quickly, and the price and flexibility are outstanding compared to the alternatives.  I'm now considering incorporating other exercises using these bands into my regular workout.

I have been using these faithfully every day since I received them. They work, they're easy to use and effective. I feel the burn the day after and am very happy. I have a small studio apartment and have to be conscious of which workout equipment I purchase. This was worth every penny and I am looking forward to seeing the transformation in my body over the next month!
This is a really great set with good quality materials and the bag is a nice method of storage. It's definitely a great value.

I've had this set of bands for nearly two months now and I must say that they've been great.  I really like the clip-on system for the bands and don't find it a problem at all during a workout to quickly change the resistance.  I've also used the door-jam accessory for doing pull downs and it work perfectly.  Buy with confidence!

I bought these since I live in a small studio apartment that doesn't have room for weights. They offer great resistance and works really well with home workout videos like P90X. These effectively get rid of the excuse of not having the right equipment to get fit.On another note, their customer service is awesome. One of my bands was starting to show signs of tear from continual use, and after contacting them about it, they promptly sent me a new one since they have a lifetime policy of replacing the bands. How cool is that?!

I'm using these for P90X, and they work great.  I still think free weights are better, but these definitely get the job done.  Took a little while to get fast at switching between the different bands during the fast paced P90X workouts, but I can usually get it done without having to pause the video.

I have used these resistance bands for a little over a month now.  They definitely give you "resistance."  I have used them with P90x routines and to me they even feel heavier that dumbells.  I have done the exercises with dumbells and the resistance bands.  I feel I am actually getting more of a workout with the bands than the dumbells.

I bought this to continue my rotator cuff rehab. The door anchor works much better than trying to shut another band in the door. while I bought this specifically for doing shoulder exercises, it has many more uses and will go with me on the road as my travel kit.

I am new to using resistance bands so take this to mind in understanding that I was not quite sure on how exactly to use the door anchor and ankle band.  Sure it has a paragraph explanation but I really just needed more to make sure I was doing it correctly.  Wish also that they illustrated more than just 6 ways to use the bands, a nice wall chart demonstrating a few more with a bit more detail would have been worked nicely.The resistance bands themselves are very sturdy, they look to be extremely well made so that I am not fearful of them breaking or coming apart.  Overall a lot nicer set than I expected.
summary: Love bands but need more detailed instructions

reviewText: I love these. After reading many reviews on competing products, I decided to go with the BMP and have not regretted it.  I love how portable it is as I travel from time to time and how I can squeeze in a workout anytime.  It is amazing just how well they work and the results I am getting.  Love it.
They seem strong and well made.  Good instructions!  Just lost them (husband unpacked them and they were found later).  Quality bands and company!!!
summary: excellent product and instructions !!!  Fast shipping

reviewText: This set is a good value. You may want a more heavy-duty set for your daily home regimen, but these are well-built and a very good choice for travel.
These bands are exactly what I was looking for! I use different bands for different exercises.  Very helpful and durable!

I purchased these bands because I wanted to get in shape. Fear of a huge investment with expensive free weights caused me to look into bands. I chose these because of positive reviews on amazon. They arrived promptly with all featured accessories.Unlike other bands I've seen, these have detachable handles which allow you to stack the bands increasing resistance. This feature is fantastic and adds great versatility to the product. The handles are sturdy with a firm grip. The door anchor works great. All the bands and accessories fit into the included tote, taking up about as much room as a purse. I have been using them for about a month and really like the results I am seeing. I have one issue which I will discuss below, but customer service got back to me and corrected the situation immediately.After about a month's use, I noticed small tears in the black band (2nd heaviest level of resistance). I use the Red, Black and Green the most frequently and did not notice any damage to the others. I contacted the customer service department by email after business hours and received an email early the next business day. They are replacing my band and immediately shipped it with a tracking number. Things can go wrong with any product and I am very satisfied with how willing and able BMP corrected my problem. I would happily purchase these bands again.

I ordered these recently from Black Mountain because of some pinched nerve issues I am having in my shoulder and the bands they gave me at physical therapy were pretty inferior. These are very well made, excellent quality, easy to take with you when you travel, plus you also have the satisfaction of supporting a small business (located in Illinois). I would highly recommend getting the set as you start with the smaller weight bands and then progress up. They also have a website were they have many additional exercises that you can do.
Best resistance  bands on the market. Rest for when you're traveling doing P90x or whatever it is you need bands for.
summary: Great for P90x and the asylum.

reviewText: This set of bands is great, comes with a key so you know the equivalent dumbbell weight of each band, as well as how to combine them for even more resistance. The bands were very well constructed, but I must have gotten a defective yellow (the lightest resistance) band, because it snapped at the connection to the hook at the end the very first time I used it. I called the company, Black Mountain Products, and inquired about the 90 day warrantee listed on the booklet accompanying the bands, and was pleasantly shocked at how easy it was to obtain a replacement. An actual human picked up the phone, and profusely apologized for the faulty band, and had a replacement shipped to me within 2 days. It was absolutely zero hassle, and extremely comforting to know that companies like this still exist.
Have not had the opportunity to use all the accessories so far but what I have used meets my expectations.  Nice product.

I love my BMP resistance bands.I'm not a very tall guy, so these bands work more than perfectly for me to stretch above my head without worrying about them snapping or anything.You'll be using the door anchor (which is provided to you in the package) more than you know. These bands are great for non-training days, too.Get em! Good stuff.

I been using this set for about a week and so far it has lived up to my expectations. Basically I chose this set over the other ones because of the rating and the amount of reviews for it.  When I received the set, I automatically started using the "black" band which provides a good amount of resistance for me.  I use this on the days I don't want go to the gym to basically supplement my workouts.  The bands are a good length for me, I am 5'9 and I feel like I can do most basic exercises with this.  The bands feel sturdy and not like they're going to break on me.  However you can use some common sense and if you feel like your extending them too much then just refrain from doing so.  The black nylon bag is feels "cheap" and thin, not something I would show off in public but that's just me. Maybe if the logo was smaller I wouldn't mind, however it serves it's purpose for storage.  I have not used any of the attachments yet but when I do I will update my review.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants to workout at home for strength training, there are many videos on YouTube that provide workouts if the simple workout manual is not enough for you.  Hope this was helpful.

Resistance bands work well, and are a cheap trade off to buying sets of dumbbells... My only issue was with the velcro strap they provided to fix your bands to a structure.  Mine snapped on me and shot back slamming into my chest and knuckle (fractured my one knuckle!).  For as much force as you are using they should have NEVER used velcro, rather a buckle would have been better.Also, it would have been nice for a second set of handles so you dont have to keep switching between exercises, but thats just me being picky...
summary: Works well, except for the velcro...

reviewText: Lots of cables and cords. Can mix and match as needed. I use them for p90x in a small house without weights. They give you lots of options, you can affix them to the door, hang them up high, down low, etc. Very versatile.

I would recommend these bands to anyone. My wife and I use them for P90X3 since we don't have a pull up bar yet. They are comfortable, I love the D-ring with handles. The door anchor takes my abuse during all kinds of pull ups and exercises. No signs of wear and tear yet. They appear to be shorter than other bands but make up for it with stretching and that creates more tension, which is perfect for resistance training.To summarize, you can't go wrong with these bands!
One month without problems so far. Works great, really strong bands. I've bought 2 different brands before but this is the best one. I'm 5'8"

These resistance bands work very well. I especially like that they are so modular, so I can hook them up in many different configurations to vary resistance. They are quick to attach to and remove from the handles, and seem very sturdy. I only have two minor complaints about the product itself, neither of which justifies removing a star. The first is that the D-rings on the handles tend to sometimes shift around, which can result in a sudden shift in resistance as it slips from one position to another, and seems like it could harm the long-term durability of the canvas. The second is that, since this is uncovered rubber tubing, I have noticed a few punctures in the tube from normal wear and tear. These don't seem to be weakening the tubes yet, but over time I may have to replace a couple of the more heavily used ones. To be fair, I may be using them in some slightly unorthodox ways. I figured out that I could use them to do assisted pullups by attaching both sides of the bands to the ankle strap attachment after looping one side over my pullup bar. Then I can use the ankle strap as a stirrup and stand up on it so I can do the full pullup motion without having to support my full weight. This is a little awkward, but works well, and the strap and tubes seem durable enough to be able to handle it.And now on to the customer service of Black Mountain, which I found to be outstanding. It seems that this is a small company run by two brothers, and they really want their customers to be happy. When I bought the set, it came with an offer for an even heavier orange resistance band for free. I called and they were happy to send it along at no cost given only my shipping address. When it arrived, they had accidentally sent the model with attached handles, which would not clip on to my handles. When I called to discuss it with them, they were apologetic and very quick to ship out the right product, allowing me to keep the other one that was sent by mistake. I also mentioned that the stitching on one of my handles had started to come apart, and they sent along two replacement handles with new and improved stitching.Overall, I was very satisfied with my experience with this company, and would definitely purchase from them again. The product may not have been perfect, but they stand behind it and make things right if they aren't. I have recommended these to two friends, and as far as I know, they are also very pleased with their purchase.
summary: Good product and great customer service

reviewText: The product arrived promptly and I am very happy with it so far. My son uses these for his pitching workouts.

This resistance band set is great. In fact, I like it so much that I'm ordering another set! I love the ability to add weight by attaching another band, instead of having to deal with two handles in my hand (like the bands that have permanently attached handles). The door anchor, and ankle strap work perfectly, and the carrying bag is a nice touch, as well.

I am about half way through the P90X workout and have been using these straps.  So far they have held up well.  Clipping straps onto and off of the handles is quick and easy, so I can move from less to more (or more to less) resistance without hassle.  There is a short guide which tells you the relative resistance of each color band, so you can add up or subtract down to the resistance you want.  While I am sure there are better bands out there, I am also sure you would pay more for them.  This is a good product at a reasonable price.

If you are in the market for some sort of weight training, I would certainly recommend trying these out. While they might not be as easy to use as free weights since they are resistance bands, and thus have to be secured to something (whether that be your feet or door, etc). That fact would seriously be the only negative thing about this product, and its not even the products fault, its the nature of the device, on top of that with free weights you have to change out plates which is far less convient than how you change the resistance on this. While I cannot attest to the longevity of the product, they feel well made and are comfortable to use.  This set may not be the most serious of "workout sets" out there, but for the price and the convenience of not having to have to change weights all the time, I'd certainly say you can't go wrong with trying this first and then if it doesn't fit your needs moving on from there.

I injured my back and was sent to physical therapist.  Some of the exercises she assigned required bands.  I bought this set because of the variety of bands included and the favorable reviews.  I've had the set for almost a month and I use them 5 or 6 times a week, I am very happy with the purchase.  The bands are made well and, again, I appreciate the variety of resistance which matches the variety of exercises I need to perform.
Works correctly, priced right, and surprisingly versatile.  The perfect piece for the minimalist or one who travels or is short on time.

Ok, so I have been using these exercise bands for a while now I must say that I like using them very much. The price and the quality of the material is unmatched by any other seller. I like the fact that it is very easy to clip on different bands to the handle however I do not like the width of the piece that connects the band to the handle, I say this because every now and then when I am exercising this part brushes up against me and I find it irritating. These bands are very durable I do p90x and they get used quite a bit. I rate this product a 5 out of 5 because the price, material and the bundle that you get from this company is the best.

I am a 25 year old 6'1" male, and was always a little skeptical of resistance bands, but decided to try them out on recommendation from a friend (a physical therapist). Couldn't be happier. I have been using these 4-5 times a week for a few months, and they still look and feel brand new. Shoulder presses (lifting them above my head) haven't been a problem. I talked to customer service (who picked up after two rings) and talked to them about proper use. They said wearing running shoes and a stepping on a yoga mat while using them was perfect.Something to note is that these do not replace dumbells if you are trying to bulk up. But if you are just trying to get/stay strong, lean and toned, or do a lot of traveling (or just don't have a lot of time to hit the gym), these are for you.Overal a solid product that does what it says. Solid customer service to boot.
summary: Good to get/stay strong, lean, and toned

reviewText: If you are suffering from sports injuries or can't lift heavy weights for any other reason, these will allow you to stay fit during recovery. Plus they are awesome for traveling when your hotel doesn't have a fitness center. I think I actually prefer these to most free weight exercises to be honest.
My son ordered this item and he uses it everyday. he's training for a fight which helps him keep in shape.

I recently bought the BMP resistance bands set and so far it's been great! You can arrange different bands together very easily to get a full range of resistance. The ankle strap is of course a nice added benefit. From what I can tell, the bands seem to be pretty good quality and have yet to show any signs of wear. The only thing is that it might take a little time to adjust to this kind of resistance workout if you are used to weights and benches, but that isn't much of an issue.Overall, I would say this is a great workout option, especially considering the reasonable price.

My job has me away from home often.  I bought this set because it is compact and fits nicely in my travel bag.  Once I started using it, it quickly became an essential part of my workout plan.  It is sturdy and adaptable and easy to use.  I bought two more sets, one for my daughter and one for myself for home.  For the price this is the best fitness purchase I've made.

I was really pleased to see the quality of connectors and bands used in this product.  The bands clip solidly into the different accessories and the kit contained everything I needed to do the exercises that fill in the gaps between my dumbbells and weight bench.  Having the included door anchor is very nice and allows me to do overhead exercises that require me to pull down instead of only being able to push up with my dumbbells.

What a great product!  I equipped my home with some of my favorite gym equipment, but also with items that I could take on the road with me when I travel.  I ordered these bands because I needed something for weights and chin ups with an exercise DVD series I had also purchased.  The bands were here THE NEXT DAY even though the shipping time was estimated for 2-3 days.  The bands are really easy to use, and there is a great instruction booklet to go along with the exercises and how to set up the bands in a door frame for travel.  Very good quality, and I LOVE the variety of sizes - this was an amazing value for the money!!!  I want to order some additional handles so that I can use a band in the doorway and then also use as floor weights without having to take down the handles on the door.  I called the company to ask them about ordering handles and this really nice guy in customer service helped me.  Turns out he is ONE OF THE OWNERS so I was able to talk to  him one on one about how I was planning on using the bands.  I would VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND these bands and any other products from Black Mountain Products!
summary: A fantastic addition to my home gym!!

reviewText: I originally purchased the resitance bands for myself, but found them a little long...I am very short at 5' tall.  My husband, who is 6' tall, usually works out every day at the gym, and decided to take these with him when he has to travel for work.  He prefers the gym, but when one isn't available he says this is a great alternative.  He uses several of the  bands to get enough resistance and says a little more would be better, but he is used to lifting heavy weight at the gym.

I like the flexibility that these bands offer by having the handles separate. You can change up the resistance easily. However I'm not to thrilled with the length of the bands. They are too short to perform certain exercises.

I ordered these without shopping around because when I searched for "resistance bands" here on amazon these came up with SO many great reviews that I decided to go for it. This is such a great set! It's basically an entire gym in this small little bag. I usually use a door (with the included door stopper) to do all of my exercises but you can get so creative with these and use a couch, desk, etc. I'm not sure if these would work for a guy who is used to a lot of weight (only goes up to 75 pounds) but for a woman looking to get in shape and tone up, these are wonderful! I highly recommend!
I am doing P90X and really needed bands, these shipped fast and seemed to be a great value. They are strong and are perfect for my workout!

I bought these resistance bands after using a similar style of bands at a health club.  They are easy to use and the resistanceoffered by the bands is perfect for my needs.  It is nice to have the whole set even though I am more of a light to medium resistance gal.  I am sure I will get use from these bands for a long time.
Nice packaging. Great band options. Great extensions for door and ankles. Instructions good too. I am very pleased with this product.

I just received this product and am very pleased with the quality.  They have recently upgraded this product and its durability, and I was one of the first customers to receive the new 2011 Resistance Bands.  I like the design of the small easy to use latches that enable you to switch quickly from one band to another, or to add multiple bands.  The product overall seems to be high quality and the price is great.  Family owned business with high standards.  I talked to their customer service line and the person was very friendly and they answered the telephone quickly.
summary: Excellent Quality for a Great Price

reviewText: This product works perfectly for continuing my rehab after surgery.  Much more versatile than the flat bands provided by my physical therapist.
summary: Great for rehab after rotator cuff repair

reviewText: I am able to replicate all of the exercises that I did on the physical therapy machines by using this system. It saves me time and the expense of joining a health club to continue on my home program. I would recommend this equipment if you want to avoid buying machines or going to a health club.
I have used other brands and they all break within a few weeks. These have lasted and don't show any sign of wear.

I bought these for my dad who is now a senior and is currently feeling a shoulder pain/soreness.He really enjoys them and commented on the good quality as well.Overtime there will be wear and tear but that is inevitable with any mechanical object. When these wear out (i'm guessing in 2-3 years) I will just buy another set because they are inexpensive.I bought it along with an instructional booklet and there are a lot of exercises that can target every muscle group.
They work well.  I really feel the burn. I use these instead of hand weights and they get the job done.

I have belonged to health clubs most of my life. Black Mountain has definetly created a product whose quality and materials are equal to any other commercial grade resistance bands. I purchased these bands for home use to help facilitate my rehabilitation post shoulder surgery. Black Mountain's customer service is also very dedicated to ensuring your complete satisfaction. I will certainly explore additional products sold by Black Mountain.

I am an older person who uses bands for stretching, injury prevention and rehab. I appreciate the choice of resistance bands as my strength level varies. Currently I am rehabbing a shoulder injury and hip bursitis. I have doctor directed exercises. I also appreciate having a nice neat bag in which to store the bands. I have access to a gym, but like to have something at home. The price is right and this appears to be quite sturdy.

I ordered these based on the good reviews and have not been disappointed.  The resistance bands themselves are well-constructed and seem to be very durable.  I have only had them for a few days, but their quality construction is impressive and I believe that they will provide high performance for an extended time period.  I am very pleased with this purchase and would not hesitate to buy additional merchandise from Black Mountain Products.Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying Case
Great set of resistance bands and the best in customer care from the company. All you need to get into shape, or for back pain therapy.
summary: Great, Complete Set of Resitance Bands

reviewText: I have been using this set for the recovery of my shoulder surgery, rotator cuff repair. It comes with only one pair of handle which needs to be exchanged between bands. But it is easy to exchange them. I believe it is a quality product that can be utilized to any strength training.

The BMP Resistant Bands is a great product for resistance/isometric form of exercises.  The resistant bands allow you to tone the muscle groups as well as provide the stretching necessary to maximize performance.  However, I was disappointed in the limited literature provided.  There needs be more illustration material provided to the user that show the various exercises that are available.  So far I am not disappointed in the product as the bands are sturdy and the accessories are easy to use.
summary: Great Product but Needs Improved Exercise Charts

reviewText: My name is JT and my wife got this set of resistance bands for my birthday.  It is a good set of equipment to have if you decide to workout at home rather than the gym.  I also use the resistance bands for shadow boxing. I use the ankle strap to hold all the resistance bands in place and put in my back for stability.  The ability to add or take off resistance bands has given me the opportunity to practice my punches with more or less resistance.  It works well but it will be awesome if B.M.P design a resistance product for boxers.
summary: Really good set of resistance bands.

reviewText: I am trying to lose baby weight and working out at home. I had other bands, and they broke anytime I tried to anchor them. I bought these bands because of the versatility they could add to my workouts. They have held up through lat pull downs, rows, etc. The anchor and ankle bands are an added bonus. They are easy to use, sturdy, and have really stepped my workouts up. I definitely recommend these bands.
summary: These bands are an amazing value for the price!

reviewerName: K. Pittenger "Maybe, just once, someone will ...
reviewText: I bought these because the price seemed good and other reviews I read.  They have held up as expected for the few weeks I have used them.  I used these for about a week when the red band started to tear.  I called them and told them what happened to the band and they sent out a new red band, no charge.  The person was very friendly.  He told me to be careful of little rocks in the sole of your shoes that could tear the bands.  I would highly recommend them.These only come with one set of handles, which I like so I can up the resistance higher and not have to hold 2 or 3 handles.  If you don't want to change the handle to the different bands, they do sell bands that have handles on each band.NEW Set of 5 B.M.P. Resistance Bands for Men And Women.

I worked at gym for a year during highschool and worked out after every shift I worked. I had to quit my job because of college and I stopped working out for a year. Recently, I wanted to start working out again but I commute to school and the university gym is full of athletes. I like to to be discrete so I wanted to get some free weights. Unfortunately, free weights are really expensive and way over my budget. I started to think about what else would work and remembered how amazing using resistance bands was while I worked at the gym. I did so e research and decided on BMP. After using them for a few days I can say they are gym quality bands that can give you an amazing workout. There's no "cheating" on curls like there is on free weights and it very difficult to hurt yourself. The bands themselves are really cool looking and the fact that you can attach multiple together gives you so many options. This product is great for people who want a full body workout for the price of a month gym pass with great portability.

This set is a great value for the price. The bands are strong and sturdy, and the handles especially are well-made, with high-quality yet squishable material and solid metal connecting hardware. I only wish there were a set of handles for each band, but obviously the price would be considerably higher. I was able to get a good strength workout using these bands.Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying Case
The product is superior to any other bands I have used, more durable. Also customer service was excellent and they offered a free heavy duty band with the purchase!

These bands have been working well for months now. Unlike other types the ability to change/add different and multiple bands to the handles - yes takes a moment to do - but allows the use of multiple levels of resistance while keeping only one handle in your hand. I really like this feature. It comes with a few basic exercise suggestions for different muscle groups. The door hanger band fits in any of the doors I've tried, quite well. (not too thick like others i've had in the past).They are convenient for days when you can't get to the gym and also quite light. I've taken them in my luggage when I travel.Good set for the money and the interchangeable feature is really worth it.

I bought this product and the ground shipping from Ensenda was awesome. I got it two days before. So far as the band I have one from walmart and this. When I do compare I see big difference. These are perfect and they are not sticky while the one from walmart are sticky and cheap and always tend to stick in hand or in your body. I always felt that I am doing workout with stickers or post it ;) . The one from BMP are totally perfect and gives a feel of quality. The best thing was on purchase of this item you will get one orange band having resistance level 34-40 pound. It's a huge advantage. All hooks are of metal which provide more durability than it's competitor.It's door fitment is really an added advantage. By adding this you can give work to your chest muscles. Overall I am satisfied with the product and will recommend to others who don't have much time to regularly go to gym. Just by adequate warmup you can keep your body in shape with being with your family.

I have been using these bands for a few months now, and I like them.  They seem to be high quality, though I'm not an expert.  They have been easy to integrate into my fitness routine.  Any cable machine exercises are easy to adapt to bands.  The bands are compact, and portable.The only real negatives: The door anchor isn't as useful as it might seem.  You need to have a strong door that closes well, but leaves some space - there is no real place for me to use it in an old apartment that's been painted many times.
summary: Bands seem good at a reasonable price

reviewText: I was a little skeptical at first wondering how I could get a real good workout with bands but that skepticism has vanished after just one workout with these. I was always in the mindset of you have to have barbells,  dumbbells and machines for a workout but now my whole gym fits into a bag.

Great product. Works great. It could be a little bulky to carry them all together in a travel bag - but i am sure thats the same for any similar product. over all seems very durable in my 1 month use. i use it once every 3 days and trying to use this as a complement to my regular workout routine. Strongly recommend the product, service is fantastic. Dont forget my free Orange band is on its way as a promo as well.

I love it! I ordered it while I was in Afghanistan. I used it daily for strength training. The only thing I would change is the material of the storage bag. Its cheap and weak, it started tearing about 2 weeks after I received it. Overall, great, and I do mean great product..

I feel like this product is great for the occasional workout use but if you are hardcore and plan on using these on a daily/weekly basis then this product may not be for you.The bands are a bit flimsy and you need to have the right shoe sole for the band to stick under your feet and stay there. Worth buying for the price compared to actual weights.
Does the job while traveling.  Lot's of flexibility in configuration.Downside is that the handles and clips get tangles easily.Guess that's the price you pay for flexibility.

I like the fact that you can stack the bands quickly. It makes for a good fast paced workout. The materials and construction seem to be of high quality, but time will tell. My only gripe... I have large hands and I wish the handles were wider.

I picked these up after reading the good reviews and I am not disappointed.  Seem very well built and are easy to use.  I really like how you can just throw them in the included bag and take them with you where ever you go.  Makes it nice for those weekend trips.  I would recommend purchasing these items.
These are great to workout with. I love the whole putting the bag in the door way for resistance thing. Because I could never use a pull up bar.

Like most everyone, I bought these bands for use with the P90X program.  Unlike most users however, I have free weights in my condo's gym.  The building is an old cotton mill and I was unable to find a way to secure a pull-up bar on the 16 foot ceilings.  I did not want to use the door based pull up bar as it was awkwardly positioned for my workouts.  I stumbled on to these here on Amazon and I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.  I highly recommend these as you are able to change out the resistance bands as you get stronger and need more resistance.  So far I am 4 weeks into my workout and the bands have all retained their structural integrity.  I will say, I would prefer to have the option of buying an additional set of hand grips so I can leave some of the bands on the door and continue my workout with the additional bands for other exercises.  The carrying case is a nice touch.  While RMP makes other resistance bands, these are the most versatile for the P90X workouts.  The fact you can carry them with you when you travel is just an added bonus.  Also, to end, unlike previous posters, BMP is now including a notation with the package indicating the strength of each band.  While they may not be labeled, all you have to do is refer to the manual.

I like the bands alright, but given the level of resistance I use (which is high), I broke the handles doing bicep curls.  I had to order another pair.  If the next pair breaks, then this is a cheap product, and money would be better spent elsewhere.
I have just started using these bands in my daily workout.  They are durable and do what they are supposed to do.  I will update if anything gets better or worse.
I wanted to up my game. Bought these, shipped super fast and used them this morning. I definitely took my work out to the next level. Good quality and great to use.

Got mine about 2 months ago, a great little workout supplement if don't have time to go to the gym.  These can get pretty heavy when combining bands, so it should keep you busy for a while.  Material seems pretty durable as long as you take care of them.  The list of workouts you can do with resistant bands is endless.  Plus, it is said that using resistant bands works out your core as opposed to using traditional weights.My only caution:When using the door strap be extremely careful.  If you have an older style door, it will pop out when enough resistance is applied.  This is not due to a faulty door strap but rather the door in your home, it depends on how tight your door closes.  I about took my head off when I tried using the door strap.  I stretched the band for the first repetition, the door came flying open and the metal ball door strap came whizzing past my head at about 100 MPH!  Close call!  Also if you must use it, make sure no one opens the door when you are working out.Overall:  5/5 stars!Get these if you want to sneak in some quick workouts, try a different exercise method, or have something portable enough to workout while traveling on the the road.

We just bought our 2nd set of BMP resistance bands after seeing the quality of these bands compared to what else is out there. My wife was using another band, but when the inferior band my wife was using slipped out of the grommet and it almost hit her, we decided we needed another set of the "good" bands.We are using the bands for the P90X exercise routine mainly for the pull-ups part since we are not ready to do the full fledged pullups yet. It is a nice workout and you definitely feel it later (Good hurt!).I have used my first set of bands for about 15 weeks so far, almost daily. The convenience of easy clip on/off band changes and the soft handles is nice. We use the bands in the doorjam, so the door anchor was a must.For both purchases, it has been a great experience. The purchase lived up to what was expected and it was shipped in a timely manner. The quality of the product along with the good price cannot be beat. Thanks BMP for helping me in my fitness goals!

This set is made of good quality material.  Easy to change out bands from the handles or add extra bands for more resistance.  Door anchor works great.  There are exercises shown in the booklet and there are more you can find by searching online.  These work great for doing super sets!
Very need. I use almost every day.

This exercise band set is really great!I recently moved and am no longer close to a gym. So I purchased the Black Mountain Band set and was pleasantly surprised as I now do all the exercise sets that I previously did in the gym. Only now I find that I can do them much faster, therefor saving myself a lot of time.
summary: Exersise is now easy and complete!

reviewText: I bought this for myself and when I was talking about it at work and I wound up purchasing 3 more for fellow employees.
Great product. You are able to get a full resistance work out using this product.  I would highly recommend this product.

This set is an excellent value.  5 bands from 2 to 30 lbs of resistance, a set of handles, an ankle strap and a door jam attachment.  The clips for the handles are metal, not flimsy plastic, and the handles are very comfortable too. It all comes in a carrying bag which is perfect if you travel a lot and still want to get a workout, and at home it's an easy way to keep everything together in one place so don't lose things.

Package delivered on time and was  as expected, while, in my opinion, their instructions could and should be more detailed and a bit more explanatory , I believe that most persons after a few minutes wil, understand. The bands are well madex and appear to be able to withstand a great deal of use. I also think that the bands are a bit too long to give a taller person with longer limbs the necessary thrust and pull that bands can be utilized to their fullest effect.1. I am satisfied2. Would recommend to others, especially w ithe the improvements I noted3. Bands are a great adjunct to other exercises for ALL AGES AND THEYMSUPPLY A RANGE OF BANDS FOR THE NOVICE TO THE BODY BUILDERNJUST LOOKING FOR A  QUICK TUNE UP4. Took off a star for the instructionscm which if upgraded would make it a 5 star
summary: As promised, delivered on time and as EXPECTED and THERFORE  satisfied

reviewText: I am doing p90x 3 and I needed avarierty of bands, great buy for all you get.No complaints and great quality.

These are a great addition for your home workout equipment.  These are very sturdy, and high quality.  I love the door anchor and the bag to help organize your bands.  I have used a few times and these are my favorite fitness tools so far.

Super good quality, detatchable hadles allow for twisting motion withought rubbing your wrists or hands. Love this product and cant wait until I am strong enough to go up in weight. No answering machine for sellers though. Had to call a few times to get a hold of them for the free product offered with my purchase. Once I had them on the phone, very nice and prompt service.
I travel with these and it don't add a lot weight like dumbbells do. I go online and get workout ideas since the pamphlet that came with it is not that great. Overall great product.

Bought these to supplement the other Black Mountain set with attached handles. I blew out the strongest weight on that set, so I picked up this one with interchangeable handles to mix and match bands and increase the weight as I progressed.It can be annoying swapping out the bands between exercises, but it's worth it to avoid the expense and storage of a weight set. Black Mountain has great products, but I would recommend the set with attached handles.

The bands appear to be of good quality, but the weight each band is supposed to provide is not accurate. I bought them to avoid having several dumbbells laying around the house, but now I've decided just to continue using free weights instead of these bands. These are fine for someone wanting only 5-10 lbs of resistance but not for the heavier weights they claim they are.
these things are great for helping tone and get muscle back.and the bag to throw it all back in when your done is a nice little additive.

This is a nice assortment of workout bands--the first I've purchased or used.  They connect to the handles quite easily and I love the bag that stores everything nicely.  The single most important item in the kit is the paper that tells you what strength the bands are!  It would have been nice if they included a laminated card with this information, but it's really no big deal.  I am at a lower strength band am anticipating working my way up to the stronger ones eventually.  NOTE:  I have not used the ankle strap or the door anchor, just the handles.
summary: Resistance Band Set - Black Mountain Products

reviewText: Just exactly what it states. This product was ready to use and comes with some great exercises to start. Very versitile. I would buy there products again and again.

I recently bought a replacement set of my BMP Stackable resistance bands (before realizing they are guaranteed for life).  I am not disappointed about this though as this is a great product and I am very pleased with how long my original set lasted me (~1year of use with The Asylum and Asylum 2 workouts). I am happy to support a company with a good product at a reasonable price.  Eventually I had to replace them though because 3/5 of them had snapped over the course of the year.  The resistance that they provide is adequate for me, though I am considering buying the extra orange and purple bands as I have recently had to use multiple bands for increased resistance as I am getting stronger.  But thats the beauty of stackable bands. I would buy these again and again and will look for this company when buying more fitness equipment.Cons:- I do not think that the basic set by itself is heavy enough for a man who is relatively fit.- The new set of bands appear not as well made as my originals.  The carabiners seem lighter and less sturdy. And the bands used to be mounted on a swiveling clip, so your band never got coiled.  Now it is secured by a thick loop of fabric on the carabiner, which seems too big and they can now get twisted during your work out.- The new handles are much larger than the first set and for certain exercises are cumbersome for a woman's hands.

These bands are some of the most well constructed I have seen.  They also have clips on the ends which allows them to be used in tandem, so the red, black, green, blue, and yellow can all be used together for extra resistance, which is a major plus for athletes who need more resistance.  The door anchor included is a very simple design, but it works well.  All of the bands also have a lifetime warranty, just call them and they will ship you a new one (you have to pay shipping though).  The handles are well constructed, and the wrap around handle is pretty standard universal gym type stuff.  Will buy from this company again.

Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying CaseI was very surprised how sturdy they are for the price.  I am doing a 90 day work out program and my weights were too light.  I didn't have the money for a full set of weights.  These worked great and were affordable.

I was very pleased with these Resistance Bands.  I was concerned that I would get something cheap that would break easily, but that is not the case.  I am a fairly big individual and I put these resitance bands through a pretty good workout, and they still look as good as new.  I am very happy with my purchase and I would definitely recommend this product to anyone else.

I'm working hard to change my sedentary lifestyle and live a much more heathy lifestyle.  After a year I have lost almost 100 lbs and feel great thanks in large part to strength training.  It's still hard to keep motivated and on track.  As my work schedule ebbs and flows there are periods when I just can't get into the gym for a few days or even weeks.  After missing  workouts during these periods I see my muscles reduce and strength/mood deteriorate.After my trainer started adding resistance bands to my routine for variety at the gym, I thought that I could use similar bands at home for those days I just can't make it to the gym.  I bought this set as a lightning deal and I am really happy I did.  The probem I have had with bands like these in the past is that the available bands would only go up to 15-20 lbs of resistance and you could not really stack them.  Thanks to Black Mountain, this is not a problem with this set.  I can add or subtract as much weight as I want and still use the same comfortable grips.  I actually bought a second set so I had a much wider range of weight.  The quality is high, and the door anchor is a great addition.If I changed anything, I would like to have a door anchor that distributes the weight more across the frame.  When I use 70 lbs. or so I am worried the anchor might dent the door wood.  It has not happened yet but it would be nice to not to have to worry about that.  I would also like a way to secure the bands in the middle so I can shorten the stretch length when using a single hand.  Currently I just tie the band in the middle but sometimes it can be difficult to untie.One fantastic bonus of using the bands at home is that now my teenage son, who can't workout at the gym, has a way to build muscle for swimming and football.Great product!
summary: Great product for those off gym days

reviewText: These bands provide enough resistance for my needs. I hooked up black and red and I do bicep exercises for holding both down and triceps by stepping on just one. Reading these reviews, I have some expectation that the bands will get worn out, and they do seem to be losing some elasticity. I guess that's to be expected.FYI:When I called to get my orange band, they told me to leave a review first (not necessarily 5 stars). Is this against Amazon policy? I don't know. Is it hassle I didn't know about? Yes.
Killer~

05/08/2014Prior to buying this product, I had never used resistance bands. I had to travel abroad and used this set to replace my usual dumbbell-based workout and it worked out very well (no pun intended). I did chest and shoulder presses, lateral raises, biceps curls, triceps pull-downs, among various other exercises.I can say it worked out very well, so much I have added band-based training to my regular workout. Although these are positive points about using bands -- and not about the product itself -- I found it worth mentioning, since many folks that will be browsing this sort of product might be seeking a substitution to their regular apparel.Regarding the set itself, it comprises a number of bands conveniently colored per resistance level. The kit is inexpensive, it includes a small bag and a nice booklet with sample exercises, straps that let you hook the bands to doors. It also includes a leg strap that I haven't yet used. The rubber does not smell much and the hooks appear to be reliable (I've been using it only for 5 months so far, but 4/5 times a week very consistently). Keep in mind that this may not be good for everyone; the "heaviest" band offers an estimated (by the seller) resistance of up to 30 lbs. Just to give an idea, I currently bench 50lb per hand and it works for me. The only potential issue I find is that the handle foams may wear out with regular hard grips. Still, I can see this product lasting long enough to be worth the 30 bucks I payed for it.To finalize, this is the second set I have purchased; the first one I gave to my dad, who got overall impressed with bands as an alternative to strength training. He has been using it and I haven't heard any complaints.
summary: Great opportunity to try using resistance bands as an alternative to dumbbell/barbell training

reviewText: I've had theses bands for several months now and consider myself an active athlete. I take the bands to the gym with me to change up my workout with free weights. So far they are withstanding the stress I put them under on a weekly basis. The handles and attachment rings are sturdy and well built. The only downside is the handles at times cut into your hands if you're not wearing workout gloves. But for the price, these are great and have outlasted anything else I've bought. Everything else has snapped within a few months of purchase.

My husband was looking for some work out bands for us to use for P90X. We chose this brand because of the great reviews and because it came with a case and attachment for your door to do pull ups. We live in an apartment and our doors are pretty close to the ceiling, so we can't get a pull up bar. Also, we wanted to get weights, but because our apartment is small we wanted to save some space. We have been using these bands for a couple of months now and we totally love them. If you are interested in a solid product that is easy to put away I recommend this brand. We are pleased with our purchase and are getting a great work out with these bands.

These bands have been great thusfar. I've had them for around 2 wks and have used them daily. I'm a new personal trainer, so I've used these bands in various settings, on the beach, in the gym, on concrete, resistance is good and even after doing sidesteps on the concrete, there was no noticeable wear. I got this set to literally try to destroy them to see if I want to get more sets, which I'm already leading to. the nodules at the ends of each band are great for hand holding (sans the handles). The door anchor works great, I've used it on the top of my door and on the side, I'm loving these. The use of bands is new to me and I got them mostly for my clients, I have a couple special cases, and they've been great in providing a load without the load bearing stress on the joints. The only thing I wish (hint hint) is that they sold the sets in a bundle like 4 sets for a $100 or something. I plan on doing beach group sessions and would love to have that option to buy multiple sets at a time.
summary: Great Bands (even for an iron freak like me)

reviewText: First a little background info about myself: I am 23 years old and have been lifting weights for the past year and a half. I have seen great results mainly due to my diet and my discipline, without those two factors, you will never get the results you really want. I recently moved back home after completing my degree, and while searching for a job, I haven't had the time to enroll in a gym membership. A friend introduced me to resistance bands and I liked them so much that I went online to search for one. That's how I came across BMP resistance bands here on Amazon.I must say, I absolutely love these bands, they are quite easy to use and provide around 85% of the workout routine I need (the rest are either free-body exercises such as push-ups or other instruments such as pull-ups) I am really satisfied with this product and would recommend others to buy it!
summary: Resistance bands, an effective alternative to weights!

reviewText: I'm using this on the way to living a healthier lifestyle.  Great way to work on form and get a workout.  Love the flexibility of this for my space and my limited time to exercise.  Great product.
Fun for the whole family. Easy to use and store. Lots of great workouts you can use the bands for. We enjoy the bands. Would recommend.

These bands are great; I love all of the variety in weights and different combinations you can use.  The versatility with these things are amazing and they work perfectly with the P90x program.  The build quality is phenomenal.  I would recommend them to anybody, these are the real deal folks!

I purchased the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set to allow me to do strength training when I travel.  I had previously purchased another name brand set of resistance bands, but they had plastic “D” rings that would slip under strain.  The metal “D” rings and “O” rings on this set is a much improved upgrade for me.  The door holder and foot strap completes the accessories.  The set is easy to use and the bands are strong enough to meet the workout needs.  This is a high quality set or resistance bands.  The only negatives would be the work-out instructions are weak.  I downloaded a more comprehensive work-out guide for resistance bands that have better diagrams and more exercises.  Also, using multiple bands can be tricky.  It would be nice if there was a sleeve that would gather the bands when using three or more for safety and ease of use.  Overall, the quality for the price is outstanding.  I would recommend these to anyone who would like a good quality set of resistance bands.

Bought these bands recently cause I couldnt afford a gym membership and have been using them just about everyday and I love them so far,the bag is really convenient I can take it with with where ever I go,the only thing I wish they made more heavier resistance bands other than that I love them they work for me

Had these for many months now.  Love them.  They have worked as described.  I use them fairly often in my workout routine and they work.  I combine bands as prescribed to get certain amount of (high) resistance.  The rubber used seem of good quality so far.  I check them before each time I use them and so far so good.  No cracking or obvious weakening of the item.

I purchased the bands to use for p90x back in January. I'm a petite 5'2" female, so I haven't had any issue with the bands being too short. Usually I work out at the gym but this year with my tight schedule and how much more expensive free weights are, I thought I'd try out these bands. The bands have been working great so far and serve their purpose for the most part.Pros-durable-affordable-the carrying case is handy for organizing/travel-good grips-door anchor is nifty-nice alternative for free weights-called customer service for a question, there was no machine/menu in the way and they picked up quickly. Person I spoke to was helpful.Cons-limited instructions: At first I didn't know what the door anchor was or how to use it since I forgot it came with the set. (On the other hand the fact that they cut down on packaging clutter is nice too and I figured it out eventually after giving it some thought.)-only one set of handles: For p90x, I alternate between band strengths and sometimes it's difficult to keep re-clipping and switching bands between sets. I plan on purchasing another set of handles when I can fit it into my budget.-For some of the exercises, where you have to loop the band and step on it with your weight to shorten and increase resistance, since I'm petite, I've had some difficulty utilizing the bands properly. This isn't a complaint of Black Mountain but for bands in general since this would not be an issue with free weights. Nonetheless, I make it work one way or another.Overall, I'd buy the product again and have not regretted the purchase.
summary: Happy with bands for p90x use

reviewText: The variety of the resistance bands allows me to incorporate a good selection of different exercises during my session.  The kit comes with a booklet of suggested exercises, and includes a wrist strap as well as a door anchor to assist in the exercises.  The bands are durable, and the handles are comfortable.  I bought this set not just for me - but a set for each of my daughters as well.  It's a great investment!
A very different product and worth the purchase.  Makes you want to try something new.I would definitely recommend it to anyone!

I travel for my job, and "live" in hotels 4 nights/week. I workout every morning with DVDs (P90X, Jillian Michaels, Bob Harper, etc). These bands are the PERFECT addition to my daily routine. The door anchor is super easy to use, and I feel very comfortable that it is strong enough to stay in place when I am doing my P90X pull up moves. The construction of the bands and handle hardware is much sturdier than I anticipated. I placed my order on Saturday, and with the free shippiing option, the bands arrived on my doorstep on Tuesday. I am very pleased with my purchase, and will certainly purchase from this company again. I wasted no time in sharing my purchase info with my other travel/workout buddies also!

I primarily use these attached to the door, I am emulating pull ups, trying to gain strength. I use them all at once, figure if I do 10 or so a day it will help to gain strength in those muscles. I have a different set I use for workouts. Only because of the handles, they are great when you want to use several different bands together to increase the resistance, but for a workout you want to be able to grab something quick, not have to to stop and put the handle on the right band. Great product and it does come with the door attachment.

Buy it, period. Don't even look at another set.It's rare you find a product that is of incredibly high quality and yet still affordable. Yes, I realize these are basically rubber tubes...but the quality of the stitching, hardware and padding on the accessories (handles, ankle wrap and door hang) are second-to-none and make a huge difference in the comfort of your workout.We bought the first set, and were incredibly happy with it, so bought a second set to increase our weight capacity and enable us to transition while circuit training quicker. Really, REALLY excellent set, and the basic exercises sheet that comes with it will give you a great overall full-body workout.
summary: So awesome we bought a second set

reviewText: For 30 bucks, and all the different options and quality of the bands, I would buy again in a heart beat but I'm not sure ill have to for a while, I use them everyday and they have retained their tightness with no tears. I recommend to anyone wanting to add bands to their workout program.

Can't always get to the gym because of work schedule so this set is great for my husband and I to use at home to keep up strength and muscle tone. And getting the different resistance bands plus handles, door anchor and storage bag for a great price was an added bonus!  Definitely will buy from Black Mountain Products again!

I purchased these bands to use with the P90x3 workout series. I have only had them 2 weeks, but they seem to be working out just fine. The door anchor works well & the storage bag is a nice way to keep all the bands together without damage. The bag also makes it convenient to take the with you when traveling.
summary: Good alternative to pull up bar

reviewText: This product is easy to use.  I travel a lot so it makes exercising fun and convenient on the road.  Great price for everything it comes with.

I received the product for Christmas and it has worked exactly like I was expecting.  The item is very good quality and easy to use.  I love all the various attachments that came with it and the chart to explain the color weights.  Thanks.

Goodbye boring workouts! Using my resistance band set is like having an adjustable weight machine at home. I can customize my workouts by using a heavier band or combining bands to give me a more strenuous training session. With a weight machine I was limited in the muscle groups I worked and the direction of the movement. These resistance bands afford me the flexibility of moving in all different directions. I can use them to deepen the strength of just about every muscle in my body. I can get very creative with my resistance bands and use them to both strengthen and stretch my muscles. I'm so happy I invested in this product because I'm already starting to see amazing results and would totally recommend them to my friends and family.
summary: My new BMP Resistance Band Set ROCKS!!!

reviewText: I've only been using these for a few weeks and I love them. Has everything you need. I bought an extra pair of handles so that my husband and I could use them at the same time. I love how you can adjust the weight just by adding bands! Now I don't have to buy different size hand weights!
These bands are great and easy to use.  I only wish that each one had the resistance written on it instead of having to rely on the guide.

I like to use resistance bands, they are easy to use and I pack them with me when I travel. This set includes everything that I need for a quick workout. I'm 5'3" and the resistance bands work out for me.

I bought these bands to take with me on on business trips. I can't attest to their durability yet, but so far they've been great...and pretty easy to fit into my luggage. It feels like a good quality product to me and I'd be pretty confident recommending this to a friend.
love the set up i can't get to the gym at 4 am like before two loved ones in the hospital but this gives me time just before bed time i love it

I'm 69 years old and use these everyday. I like the way I can mix and match the band strengths. My only complaint is that they do tend to break easy because of the sharp angle when using the door hanger. I cut mine in half and square knotted them together with a 12" nylon rope. No signs of breakage now.

I needed to set up home therapy to defer the cost of going into PT 3 times a week.  I purchased 2 sets of the bands.  One set was missing the leg strap.  I called the company and they are sending me one.  The person on the phone was helpful and caring.  I have been doing home therapy twice a week and twice at the doctors.  I am in a temporary area as my job moves often.  These bands have helped me set up a home therapy so when I am on the road I can continue to strengthen and heal.  With their caring attitude and great customer service, I plan to check on other Black Mountain Products for therapy.  Thank you.

I was very excited to receive these resistance bands in the mail. Prompt delivery thanks to Amazon. The resistance bands themselves are very nice and the fact that they're stackable makes them even better. The customer service is exceptional and I would not hesitate to buy these bands again.

Upon receiving my exercise band set I immediately tore open the packaging and got to work. I had been rehabbing a shoulder tear and had noticed that the exercises I was paying to perform could easily be done at home with this set. I quickly attached the included hang strap to my bedroom door and began working that shoulder. I got exactly the same burn and muscle work that I had been paying for 3x weekly at the PT place. I am very pleased with this set and see that it is very well constructed and will give me exactly what I needed to rehab at home as I watch my big TV!!! Dont hesitate to buy, you cant beat a set like this at such a great price!!!
Bands being used to increase my muscle mass and full body strength. I have not completed program yet but improving..
I got these black mountain resistance bands because I wanted an economical way to do the P90 program.I have used the bands for a few days and they have worked really well so far.
These bands are great - the best I've tried!  Good value.  My husband, who usually only likes lifting weights at the gym, even likes using them for quick workouts at home.

I ordered this set to incorporate some 'weight' training into my day, and have not regretted one second of my time using these bands. Lightweight, easy to use and with minimal set-up; plus you do not need any more space than your body would take up anyway, so even those with extremely small homes/rooms can enjoy the benefit of building up strength.

Honestly when I first ordered this product I was a little skeptical of the overall workout and the amount of resistance this product would provide. Well I just received this package a little over a week ago and was really impressed by the overall quality and the resistance of this product! I work about 75 hours a week in an office environment and brought these to work with me. Great for the office! I can store them easily in my desk and have the ability to do a quick 10 minute workout when ever I want, it's pretty awesome!

I bought the product several months ago not fully trusting these cables but A friend of mine who's a personal trainer at a gym recommended them to me.  Was surprised at their durability as they have no signs of wear after being used on a near daily basis for the past 5 months. Very satisfied with durability and practicality as well as results. This product was recommended to me and Id recommend it  to anyone interested in getting into shape
High quality! i have a time using these bands and are so goodvery good prodcut and service.thanks ! !
summary: High quality! i have a time using these bands and are so good

reviewText: I had bought these to replace a worn out green one that I had been using for some time.  I did not need the Yellow and Blue, needed more resistance thanthese provide.  I want to do more with my legs as I am recovering from double knee surgery.  I like the fact that I can tie knots to shorten and use over my doors and sit for some exercises. I like the bag and the workout instructions. I wish there were another set of handles so I am not always having toswitch.  I am a senior trying to keep my upper body strength and I am pleased with these replacement bands so far.
summary: Black Mountain Producrs Resistance Band Set w/Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart and CarringCase

reviewText: I have been working these elastic bands hard! Still durable and very useful. I love that their so accessible. Buy it!

I received these bands a couple of days ago. I actually bought them for my wife who will be starting to do "10 Minute trainer" since she doesn't want to do another round of P90X with me. Just a little background, I've gone through P90X once, and Insanity, and now am back to another go around with P90X. I've always used free weights, I have the adjustable weights made by bow flex which are great, but that's another story.I've bought and tried a few bands from sporting good stores and they where never really any good, they where poor quality and never seemed durable enough to actually use on a regular basis, which they weren't because of the 3 I bought at the stores, 2 broke.Now for these bands, what can I say but that I am beyond impressed. For the price of two bands from a sporting goods store, I got 5 bands. The quality of the tubes are great, all the inter connects are good quality. I like the setup of these bands better than the bands with the handle permanently for the fact that you can adjust the resistance to your liking. I decided to give these a go one time on P90x, and they worked great. Nothing to complain about, gave great resistance, and a great workout over all.The ankle strap is of great quality and the bag is good for when traveling and don't have access to weights. I definitely would recommend this for anyone doing any of the Beach Body workouts. My wife likes them even though she hasn't really worked out with them, but the grip is comfortable for her and being able to adjust the resistance is a definite plus for her.
We use this bands every morning with my personal training.  They rock.  They variety of strengths permit you to vary your exercise according to your needs
summary: Best set of bands we have bought
