reviewText: These resistance bands are really versatile, you can mix bands and they also don't take a lot of space. They are everything that was advertised. And it evens come with a little exercise book !
summary: Great product for a great value

reviewText: Great product! Extremely easy to assemble and not too many loose parts! Fast and easy setup!! Easy for anyone to use

These bands are awesome.  I've had a set for approx 6 months and just decided to get another set for the wife. My wife will be using the new set for her first round of P90X. Great quality and work perfectly with P90X. These bands give results.
Overall, the quality is very good, the price was reasonable and the value excellent.  I could not find any comparable product.  I am happy I selected this product.

I like this product and use it 5 times a week.  It has a lot of different features and exercises.  The only bad thing is the instruction booklet is lacking.  Just a pamphlet really.  Otherwise it is an waesome product

The Black Mountain Products resistance band set has been a great addition to my workout regime. There are no shortage of weight resistance with these bands, they are easy to configure between sets and combine to create the resistance needed to perform wicked workouts! The soft ankle strap is one of the best on the market that I have used and has aided in the rehabilitation of my hip! I recommend any range of athleticism from beginner to expert to use this and any other products offered by Black Mountain Products!!
the best home training adi use them all for each kind of trainingand i will buy new stuff from Black Mountain

I've tried using numerous bands to get the overall workout I wanted to accompany my P90X routine, and compared with other resistance band products being sold right now, this band beats them out -- as far as quality, durability, and pricing too. I've moved up a lot of my intensity recently, and whereas I am always a bit hesitant with a band's ability to 'handle the heat', these things hold up like a charm.  I think they stretch me more than I do them!  Perfect for what i'm doing right now with p90x.  The reinforcement of the weak places in the band are also key, as most producers just strap them into the handle automatically.Very pleased with the quality, customer care, and overall results I'm getting.  Highly recommend these.
These chords are great! Maybe a little more than some other ones on the market, but they are good quality. Great for physical therapy, stretching and and muscle building. Highly recommended!
summary: Great exercise equipment  for all athletes!

reviewText: These bands are well made and come in a convenient carrying case.  My whole family shares them.  They are versatile and great for all with the elasticity variations.
As a beginner to the fitness world, I found these are such a great way to start. I love that it comes with a small booklet with exercise suggestions! So far so great!
It is wonderful for travel and is great to use at home! It works great, and the set can be used with the P90X workout! This is my 2nd set, now my husband and I have a set!Satisfied!

Great set of resistance bands, you can feel the quality!  And made in the USA!  Very versatile, can be used for many different exercises.  I would love if this set included a ceiling mount.  The included door frame mount is very study, however, I just don't have a door that closes in an area where I'll use this.

I have been using these for a few weeks now and I really like everything. The bands are made of good quality and they do exactly what you need them to. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a set of resistance bands
This is a excellent product, it is really worth to buy it. I use it everyday for mu rotator cuff joint before any weight lift.

My son bought this and really liked it, so I purchased this also. The quality of the bands are exceptional and ability to put this entire package in the small travel bag makes it easy to transport while traveling.

I have recently just been doing bodyweight workouts at home, but missed lifting weights and resistance training - but I didn't miss the cost and hassle of going to the gym. I was also hesitant to purchase weights for my house due to cost, space needed, and possible damage to floors.I initially thought working with resistance bands would not give me the level of exercise I needed, and equated the bands to workouts for old people and physical rehab. After some research, I decided that this may not be the case and decided to give them a try. I decided on this Black Mountain Products to try it out, and after the past month or so, I've really been happy with the level of work out I get.Pros:- For a full set of bands like this, the price is really respectable- The levels of resistance, coupled with compact storage, trump having to get that many levels of dumbbells- The door anchor and ankle strap exponentially increase the number of exercises you can do, opposed to bands alone- The cable and hook designs are durable, and also allow for quick changes between sets and exercisesCons:- For the price, the value of this set is pretty awesome. Any minor issues I have at this time are most likely used to inexperience with resistance bands and definitely not worth mentioning at the price I paid for this set. My only bit of advice for the manufacturers may be to provide some links or suggested reading for exercises beyond the basic ones they present in their starter guide.
summary: A complete home workout at a good price

reviewText: I've been using the resistance bands for about a month now and I like them.  They are easy to use, and can be used in combination for any incremental resistance that you want.  However, if you are going to use them for a variety of different exercises, it can be a little time consuming to adjust the tension by clipping and unclipping the bands to adjust the resistance.

PROS:This product works great for me. You can mix bands acording to the strenght you need.A great advantage is the possibilty of carrying the pouch everywhere you go.Great concept.Cons:Product includes a guide with some basic exercises (not the big thing)Guide mentions a Website and doesn't have any content; i would be great if you have a place to know new techniques and exercises
Just used the bands and fury are really good quality. I like the assortment so you can build up to whatever you might need. Thanks so much for the speedy delivery as well.

Have been using these for about a month now and I can definitely say that I am happy with my purchase. The bands seem like they are sturdy, so no real concerns on if the bands will snap back in my face haha. Also very easy quick exchange to change resistance up, this is key to me as I had shoulder surgery so I do less resistance on one side. This also comes with velcro to attach once side of the bands to really anything... I use our stairs railing, but any sturdy poll would be easy to attach to.
I liked it but I think it could use and extra ankle strap for more variety of exercises and faster transitions.
summary: Could use an extra ankle strap

reviewText: I've had this set of bands for about a month, and they've served their purpose quite well. I travel a lot, and the light weight of the bands and the ability to attach them to any door makes them quite handy. I'm still finding new ways to combine them and to make other exercises harder (if anyone tells you it's impossible to build muscle with bands, tell them to try band push-ups).
Very good quality, until now everything works perfect! I recommended for all the people who want to train from home

I purchased these bands over a year ago and then took them to Afghanistan with me. For the entire year I was there I used them as my primary means of weight/resistance training. In the confined space that I had to use them, they were great and the results were amazing. For the travellers out there, this is an amazing product.

I purchased the BMP Resistance bands after spending some time researching what would be best for me as I started P90X for the first time.  They seemed to get very solid reviews and after 1 1/2 months of rigorous use they are holding up great.  The handles are comfortable and the bands show no signs of wear.  I am a 215 lb. male and my wife is 115 lbs.  The kit is able to take care of both our needs.  They are very economical and perfect for home use.  I highly recommend them.

I love this product. The tubes are sturdy, as are the clips, door anchor, and hand/foot holds. I purchased it to continue my PT at home but now am using it for many other exercises, as described in the pamphlet. It doesn't take up much room, and comes with a handy zip storage pouch. The door anchor is very stable, and doesn't harm the door. I am happy I purchased this product and would not hesitate to purchase more of the same from this vendor.

Becoming a bag very well packaged and easy to carry with you for traveling.  It makes it easy to maintain your strength training while on the road or at home. I agree with other reviews. It could be a bit more sturdy.

I love these exercise bands.  I have always used free weights in the past, however they are very difficult to carry on business trips or vacations.I can carry these with me everywhere, work, vacation, business trips, etc and I use them.  Great variety .  I am very happy with this purchase.  Thank you
These resistance band are crap!! They broke one week into my workout (and I'm not a heavy lifter, heavy workout kind of guy).Do not waste your money on this.
summary: It broke one week into my workout!!!

reviewText: I bought these bands to use in conjunction with the P90X program and as a cheaper alternative to using free weights.  They work great!  The interchangeable handles are a wonderful idea in that you can add two or more bands for higher resistance if needed without having to buy higher resistance bands.  I've started to see really good results in only 5 weeks.  The door anchor is really helpful as an alternative to the pull up bar which I have yet to master.  All in all a great product at a great price.
Is as advertised.  I have no complaints.  Easy to use anywhere and any time.  Just need to use it more!  LOL

This is the second set of bands I ordered from Black Mountain Products.  I'm still using the first to replace a set from another manufacturer that dangerously separated and snapped off between the handle and the strap after only six months.This second order is for my personal trainer who liked them so much that he is now using it with his other clients!The reason:  they are made with high quality rubber, and in the design were manufactured to guard against dangerous high tension breakage.  With this set, you can customize the tensions and combine them to get as tough a workout as you could possibly want without ever going to the gym.There is an included instruction booklet included, which makes understanding how to get the maximum benefit from exercise.Whether on the go or at home, this is the only exercise band set I will ever use.Lastly:  customer service.  You can speak to the owners of this business who really care about their products and will go the extra mile to personally assist you in explaining what you might need, or if you have a question.  I haven't reached the need to call with a problem because in almost a year, I've had none.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
summary: The Only Exercise Resistance Band Set You Will Ever Need

reviewText: Was looking for exercise bands to use with P90X rather than buying a complete dumbbell set. I'm very happy with this product. I don't seem to use the yellow and blue bands at all since they don't provide very much resistance. The other bands get used and work well. I like the fact that the bands have clips for the handles. I bought an extra set of handles to avoid having to swap out frequently between exercises. As it turns out, a lot of times when I'm working a smaller muscle group with a single band, I won't even use the handle -- I'll just grab the end of the band near the attachment. I also really like the fact that it's easy to combine the bands to increase the weight. I haven't used the ankle strap and I'm not sure if I ever will. I have used the door attachment and it works well when used as instructed. I think I'll attach a carabiner to the closed nylon loop on the door attachment which will make it even easier to use.Overall, this is a great product. Very pleased.
summary: Quality product at a reasonable price

reviewText: I found this product to be superior in the ease of transport (compared to weights).  It comes with a good set of instructions of exercises and how to combine the cords to have a more versatile workout.  Also I've found that it is easy to come up with alternative exercises as needed for special purposes.  This product is very durably made as well.  Well done BMP!!

Were these the cheapest resistance band on the market? No. But they are definitely worth the extra few dollars. The company is a small startup and they have great customer care. What's more, they are sending me an extra orange band with higher resistance simply by making the initial purchase. Awesome sauce!
The buckle snapped while my son was using these. He is now blind in one eye. I don't want this to happen to anyone else. It is a nightmare.

I bought this 6 month ago to strengthen my shoulder capsules, which tend to get weaker and injured pretty often.  Since I had been in rehab for the body part and elbow before, I already knew how to use this tool, and also was sure that it would work as before.  I wanted to save money and time on physical therapy by having my own training equipment, and I was not disappointed.  After 6 month of continuous workout, almost 3 times a week, now my shoulder capsules don't jerk any longer, and I don't feel pain there.  Having achieved my initial goal, recently I began different routines to tone other muscles as well.The only issue with this product is that it would have been better if it came with more attachments and easy-to-understand instruction for them.  Sometimes I find myself trying hard to find a way to fix an attachment to the door for a specific exercise, since it doesn't seem to maintain its position.  I still manage to work out, but not in the way I want to for safety concern.  Not that I had any incident, but better safe than sorry.
Excellent product for the investment. High quality. Especially like the metal clips to easily change bands. Order extra handles for more versatility.

Excellent product, especially when the bands are combined. It's hard to believe that a bunch of light rubber thingies can actually work out your muscles so much, especially when you combine them. I recommend you check out Google or YouTube for some workout routines, even though the package has some of its own.
I reviewed quite a few different sets  before  I ordered  the  Black Mountain Resistance Band set. I am completely  satisfied and would definitely recommend to anyone
Love the Bands.  They are great for a home gym and can be used by anyone.  Would recommend to anyone.
summary: Great Bands.  Good for home gym

reviewText: love that i can switch the band sizes easy to adjust my workouts. the carrying case makes it easy to keep all the part together.

Got them today and did my athleanx program as soon as I got them. Quality seems great handles are comfortable and great accessories with it. I would definitely recommend these for anyone needing different strength bands for various exercises.

This person is into fitness but can't do his regular workout at the gym while his shoulder impingement  is healing.  This allows the perfect  interim exercising and he is very pleased with it, so much so that I think I'll get one for myself.
summary: Gift for someone with a shoulder injury

reviewText: This is a family owned company and their products and customer service are second to none.  I would definitely order from them again, and again.

Product arrived very quickly and I was impressed by the quality. Instead of the weak looking clips from the picture it came with small carabiners that, if ever weakened, could be easily replaced. Nice product especially for the price.

I have been using them for 3 weeks now. I love the variance of resistance. I use them when I am not feeling up to the heavy weights, or it is before I go to bed. It would be nice if they would include a 2nd ankle brace for speed purposes.

The reviews I read before I purchased were correct, high quality and worth the 29 bucks by a long ways....Perfect for my close quarters here in Afghanistan and a great match with my P90X workouts.....5 starz from Marz
Outstanding product for use as a Fitness Pro.

This seems to be a sturdy set at a good price. I bought a set for myself and my wife based on the favorable reviews on Amazon. Used them so far in a few workouts and they perform well. Only gripe that I can think of is that shoulder presses (pulling action from below the shoulder line past the shoulders above the head) occasionally scratched my lower arms during the upwards/downwards motion. The nylon attachment between the tube and the handle is the reason. Need to adjust my motion I suppose and/or wear a long sleeve shirt. Otherwise I would give five stars. Feels quite different working out with the bands compared to dumbbells but I enjoy it. Free orange band promotion is certainly appreciated.

Great Product! The bands feel thick and sturdy...most importantly where the bands connect to the clips feel really secure. During use I had no fear of injury by way of breakage. I've only been using it for a few days so I can't comment on longevity.The only problem I had was the blue band came damaged. I called customer service and they shipped a new one along with a free orange band that same day.

I was looking for something that I could use at home and easily take to the gym. I bought these bands about three weeks ago and am very pleased with the quality.  The bands are very high quality and the carrying case works great for throwing everything into my gym bag. I only wish that it came with another set of handles or that BMP sold the handles individually because sometimes I am constantly changing the bands back and forth. Overall, I would recommend this set of bands to anyone looking for a good set of resistance bands at an affordable price.

Love these bands! I am new to using fitness bands, but these seem really well made. Good solid stitching, heavy fabric, hefty metal fittings. These look like they will hold up well. I feel secure using them.The company is also VERY responsive. I ordered these in the morning and got the notice that they had shipped shortly after lunch. Can't beat that.
If you are looking for a set of starter bands on the cheap these are great. The quality of material was beyond my expectations.
Clearly high quality. Really helped with shoulder problems. Having one handle shared among the straps saves room when traveling. X

I got this set for P90X and am glad I did. I was hesitant since I've never used bands for weight training but didn't want to shell out the money for a home set. Luckily these are of solid construction and quality along with great customer service. I am 3 weeks into P90X and am having no problem substituting these for weights. There are only a handful of exercises so far that I would prefer weights over bands just because it'd be easier to measure progress in strength gains. All in all this is a great buy and alternative to weights.
I have recently purchased these bands and am very pleased with them so far.  They come in a nice carrying bag that holds everything together.  I look forward to continue using the bands with P90X.

Black Mountain products delivered exactly what I was needing.  I can say that I have not experienced any problems with the bands.  I am doing P90x and these bands are ideal for this exercise program.  I think these bands are offered for a great price with outstanding quality.  I am excited to continue using the bands and see what more they have to offer.  Overall I would definetly recommend this resistance band set.
summary: Nothing but the best from Black Mountain Products

reviewText: I am new to exercise bands, so when I decided to try some out I was looking for a kit.  I am happy that I purchased this kit because it has everything to get started and it was very affordable.  I really like how you can clip multiple bands onto one set of grips because holding multiple grips (with other brands) when mixing colors can feel unsafe for a clutz like myself.  I also really like the soft texture grip that these have opposed to hard slippery plastic.
It was everything I expected. Very easy to use and provides for a challenging workout. I would highly recommend this product to anyone at all abilities!

These bands are high-quality, durable, colorful, and well-made. They come in a closeable pouch made of lightweight material. With the bands folded easily into the bag, it can be tucked away in a suitcase or even a carry-on. The whole package weighs very little and takes up very little space in your bag.Using the bands themselves is a simple task. Simply clip the bands of your choice onto the supplied handles and get to work. There is a simple set of workouts supplied by BMP. There is also a chart that details each bands' strength, along with a few combinations to achieve different weights. These bands stretch much further than you'd think while still maintaining their strength. They haven't ripped, over-stretched, or torn. The handles are comfortable to use, with foam grips that keep your hands from hurting after a tough workout. The bands can be used individually, or combined for an almost infinite (well, not quite) combination of weight for your workout. The supplied accessories -- Ankle strap, door anchor -- also work well. The door anchor can be mounted low, high, in the middle, or above the door for any number of workout positions.All in all, these bands are the perfect light-weight accessory for the on-the-go traveler, or for use at home just the same. Highly Recommended!!!
Very satisfiedBeen using for several months and have noticed to wear or damage in the productCan save a lot of money and alleviate the need to go to the gym
The equipment arrived promptly, and are easy to add and change resistance. They were great to talk to when I called for free heavy bands as part of a promotion they were offering!

I have bad knees. They often hurt a LOT and I have a hard time walking for long periods of time. I saw the doctor and to avoid a long and unnecessary story, therapeutic exercise was the best suggestion. I compromised on what exercises I was willing to do (I was given a list of knee exercises 3 pages long) and selected four.I already exercise so I added the four knee exercises to my lower-body days. I use only one band (the red one) to basically move each leg in all four directions, exercising the muscles around my knees. My knees have been MUCH better.Another ankle band would have been nice. I had to buy one from another vendor. Switching the hook from one band to the other is much faster than taking off the cuff and placing it on my other ankle constantly.I like the bands and they are a great price. I recommend them to anyone. I just haven't used them for enough different exercises to know how well they work for other things.
summary: Works great for my needs, but they are minimal and I can't completely evaluate the product.

reviewText: Very good quality bands for the price. Easy to use and change/replace them.Easy to carry and store.Door mount is very useful.

Just got done with my first workout!  I've been looking for a band system that'll allow me to workout at home, on the road or where I may be.  I discovered this type of product from my sister who had a different version of these.  I showed her the set I purchased from Black Mountain and she's overly jealous!This product works just as many of the other types of resistance bands on the market.  However Black Mountain took this product up a few extra notches.  First, that quick connect system allows you to quickly change weights in and out on the fly.  This is also a great design because you can couple the different tensions to create weights that goes beyond 70lbs!  Another addition that I value is the door anchor system and ankle strap which enables you to have all the necessities needed to work out virtually anywhere!I rate this product 5 starts and A+++.  Customer service is very friendly and helpful.  Plus they back all bands with a lifetime guarantee, you can't go wrong!
summary: Buy this product with no regrets!

reviewText: I received this product quickly and I love the resistance bands. The reason I am rating this product 4 stars is because the pouch handle that came with the bands was ripped and unattached. Other than that I am completely satisfied with this product. :)

Recently bought two sets of these bands to do P90X.  I'm doing the workouts with my husband and needed an alternative to the pull up bar since there's only enough room for one of us to use our super cool Black Mountain pull up bar at a time.  I purchased the bands for the pull ups, plus I wasn't sure if I had enough weights to keep me going through the process AND I have a vacation planned so I needed something I could travel with.  The bands are great and customer service is amazing.  My cat chewed the handles on one set so I couldn't use them and they were incredibly helpful, they're also available to answer questions you might have about strength and use of the bands.  Best company I've dealt with in a long long time - thank you!!!
good all aroundHigh qualitygood customer servicegood packagingwould recommend to othersvery good value overalla few extras were included

My wife recently bought these for me after she got fed up hearing me complain about going to the gym. As you can see in the picture, you get a very complete set of bands, and my personal favorite, the ankle strap.If you can find a good resistance band workout (online or via Black Mountain Products' website) there are endless possibilities of different exercises. What really surprised me was the way they provide a full body workout. Just by doing bicep curls, with the bands beneath you feet, you core will really work to keep you balanced.I do a 30 minute workout with these bands and although during I 'feel the burn' the release of energy I get afterwards is incredible. They definitely leave me feeling energized and after only a couple of weeks I can see a difference in my body.The fact that you can do the exercises anywhere and in a small space means you can do them all in front of the TV (maybe slightly against the point of exercising but for those days when it's dark outside and you don't want to leave the house, you now have no excuse!)I think these are ideal for anyone as the bands vary in resistance and you can couple several together to increase the resistance further.Overall, a great product that I would (and have already) recommended to friends.

I got these bands for Christmas and I've been using them a few weeks now and I think they are great so far.  The bands feel sturdy and door mount works fantastic.  I called the office about a promotion they were running and the gentleman working the phone was kind and helpful.  Great product and great customer service.  I would recommend these to any person who was looking for such an item.

I bought these because I managed to lose my TF bands when we moved, I thought I read somewhere in the description that they could be used with TF, I might be wrong here, so double check me on that. The bands are great, very sturdy and well built. They come on and off of the handles easily and the book that comes with the bands offers a great many exercises you can do with them. As I said, I wanted to use them with TF though, so I'm going to concentrate on that.The bands are shorter than what you get with TF by quite a bit, I can't say specifically how much as I no longer have my TF bands, but I would estimate 12" - 18" shorter, this is a big difference as far as intensity of exercise. I ended up switching to the green band where TF uses the red band because it was simply too much resistance. Also, where the TF bands are a continuous unit, this set of bands, since you can remove and replace for different intensity, is not a single unit. The metal portions of the bands (where they clip on and off) can rub against your arms during your exercises and it can get quite uncomfortable. I don't know how to fix this, I'm doing the same exercise I was doing with the TF bands, but it's noticeably uncomfortable and I generally have marks on my arms when I'm done because of the metal rubbing against my skin. If you plan to use the bands with something like TF, you might look into bands that are not removable/interchangeable.All of that said, this is a great set of bands and I am glad I have them. I will continue to use them until I find a suitable replacement and even then I'm sure I'll continue to use them, just for different exercises that don't lend themselves to having the band draped or strung tightly across a body part.
summary: Great product - review of use with Turbo Fire

reviewText: This product is excellent. The bands are great and I like the door anchor as well. The company is excellent. They shipped quickly and I had a small issue with one of the handles and I set an email inquiring if I had an recourse, keep in mind I've had these bands for 6 months now, and they replied with just asking for my address and the exact product. I received them two days later at no cost to me, either for the replacement handle or the shipping costs which I feel is outstanding. The only question asked was my address.The bands themselves are great and you can combine them for an even better workout. I can't really speak to the ankle strap as I don't really use them for that purpose but the bands themselves are excellent as is the customer service.You can not go wrong with purchasing these.
It's good for home exercise. Anybody can do biceps , triceps,  cardio with it at home. It's really good whom no time to go to gym.

I'm using this product with the T25 workout program. It is a great product and it is very easy to change bands. I love the fact that you can double up the bands to get serious resistance. I really love these bands.
Alright but just a little overpriced. They've lasted long but not my favorite exercise equipment at all. Couldn't use it because the bands are slippery and your feet won't catch hold at all.
I was looking for a way to supplement my boot camp type workout without paying for gym membership. These do the trick!
summary: I was looking for a way to supplement my boot ...

reviewText: I bought this little set of bands when I was going on a trip, mainly to keep active and they did the job. The handles are so easy to attach to the cords and the quality of the product is really good. I've bought resistance bands before and none come close to this product. The clips are a smart way to make them space efficient. This way you can put on multiple bands on a handle increasing the resistance without having to hold more handles. Just an awesome product.
The door attachment and ankel attachment work very well. the handles are comfortable. there's a little work book included that has a couple of exercises in it

I have started p90x and needed bands I could take on the road with me since I travel a lot.  I bought these and couldn't be happier. the handles are comfortable in my hand and the bands seem to be made of good quality that will last. The clips on these are well made and are easy to connect and disconnect quickly. If you are much taller then 6 ft you will really have to stretch these, but anybody shorter then that I think these will work out great. I don't really think you can get much better bands then these for the money. I highly recommend trying these out if you need bands.
I guess it's an ok substitute for when you cannot make it to the gym... but there is no comparison to free weights.

First off, I am 23 y/o male and have had issues with my wrists and knees for about 6 months, which has prevented me from working out (damn desk job!). After wasting tons of money at physical therapy I decided to take matters into my own hands and workout on my own. For 30 bucks these bands are excellent. I am able to exercise all parts of my body without having to worry about tweaking my joints. I combine my workout with a stretching plan, and I'm feeling much better than I ever did during physical therapy!My only qualm with the product is the door anchor. I have about a centimeter of space between my door and the carpet, and the door anchor would slip out every once in a while. My solution: wrap it in duct tape to increase its size - haven't seen a problem since.
summary: Great to ease into a workout

reviewText: I love this product soo much! Im able to  hook the bands onto different objects in my room and do great work outs. I love how im able to increase the intensity of my workout simply by changing a color or combining them :) Im trying to gain muscle mass in my glutes and with this i can get better muscle activation when doing deadlifts, donkey kicks, etc.
It has hold well for the past 5-6 months that I have been using it continuously. It is perfect portable workout equipment

I'm a travelling consultant and I normally encounter a hotel workout room that has little more than a treadmill.  Getting in a workout while on the road has been a challenge for years.  A buddy of mine recommended I check out resistance bands so off to amazon.com I wandered.  There are numerous brands of resistance bands/cables but the Black Mountain set were highly recommended on various resistance band workout sites.  The price was right so I ordered them.  I am soooo glad that I did.  The package is small but the 5 cables are more than ample to give you a nice burn and a nice workout.  The handles are padded which is a big plus and the enclosed workout book gives great tips.  Their website also gives you extra suggestions on workouts.  A++++!!!

First of all, these are great bands for the price. I had previously bought bands from a Chinese supplier and the cables all snapped after a few months of use. These bands were cheaper, came with the carrying case and exercise chart, and the quality much better. The connection between the band and the bracket/strap is the key, and these are well-designed and shouldn't break.The only issue I had was that I received 2 handles of different designs. One was smaller in girth and length, and had a smaller ring on the strap. It also didn't have a brand logo on it so I assume it was a previous revision/design. It is annoying to have 2 handles of different size (and strength - I'd rather the newer, stronger version). So I contacted the supplier, and they just offered to return the item for full refund, and I would need to re-order. I was travelling soon and taking these bands with me and I didn't have time to do that. They couldn't send me the proper handle directly, so I was quite disappointed with this.See customer photos to find a picture of the different handles.Good product, but the customer service wasn't above and beyond...
summary: Good quality product, different handles received

reviewText: They are everything advertized. They have been very effective in recovering from cancer treatments, They do not require a lot of space nor additional expensive exercise equipment.
best bands, awesome workout! use bands weekly or every other day. Start off light then gradually increase your weight because the resistence feels heavier as you move on.

I got these based partly on reviews and partly on price (more expensive than the cheapest option, but still under $30)).  They're great.  I get really frustrated by cheap products, so I'm mainly happy that these are well made.  If or when they go, I won't hesitate to replace them (I might even buy a second set for the office).  One of only a handful of Amazon purchases I've even bothered to review!
Good quality, but the bands were too short.  I would not reccomend them to my friends.  They need to make them longer.
This is a gym in a bag. Highly effective strength training and very convenient. I use it at work during lunch.
summary: Great convenient gym in a bag.

reviewText: Since you can clip numerous bands to the set of handles it makes it very easy to get to higher resistance levels.  I bring these to the gym and use them in lieu of the gym's as those tend to be use so much that they are stretched out and I cannot get the level of resistance I want.  Great product so far.I do wish that they had the lbs equivalents stamped on the bands.  I added them in marker to make it easier for me to remember what the sizes are.
summary: Excellent Bands for Higher Resistance Levels

reviewText: I bought these to use with my 10U softball team.  They are very versatile with their quick attach/release ends and handles.  I use them in stretching, strengthening, and quickness drills and the girls love to use them.  The carry pouch is a good size, making packing them up easy.  The pouch drops right into the equipment bag so they never get lost.

My girlfriend and I were seeking some resistance bands for our workout. However, we are very different body types with different requirements. I am 6' with previous powerlifting experience, and she is 5'3" with little to no resistance band/free weights experience. We ordered this product for its flexibility in allowing us to not only work with the resistance suitable to us, but also the resistance suitable to the exercise (i.e. the same band wouldn't work for hammer curls and overhead shoulder presses, mostly because of the length the band would have to stretch).Upon receiving the product, the first thing we noticed is that the bands were of very good quality. These things have withstood our rigorous workouts and should last forever. The handles are also of very good quality, with a padded insert and strong nylon. The resistance bands are hooked up via latches that connect to a D-ring on the handle. I was thinking it might be difficult to quickly change out bands, but the latching action is very smooth and quick. This is important for us as we do high intensity exercise and want to move on to the next exercise as quickly as possible to keep up our heart rates. As another reviewer pointed out, the cover on the band before the latch will rub against your shoulder when doing exercise like overhead presses, but this is a minor inconvenience.The accessories included are a storage bag (very convenient), a door anchor, and a leg strap. We won't be using the door anchor or strap, but I did try it, and both worked very well. I was impressed by the comfort of the leg strap. There is also a convenient chart of the band resistance and common band combinations which comes in handy.We have greatly enjoyed using this product and are very pleased with it. The only thing we might suggest is including another set of handles to make switching between different exercises even quicker, but this is small beans compared to a great product at an even better price. Don't waste your money on the other overpriced options on amazon.
Excellent Product, Better qualify than bands you will find in brick and mortar stores. Definitely would recommend for daily exercise.

The band set is well-constructed and of good quality.  I like the versatility of BMP resistance bands.  I can get a large variety of work in a very compact space.  With the stackable band setup, changing the level of resistance is a snap, literally.  For anyone considering purchase, I would not hesitate to recommend the BMP Resistance Band set.

This product is very useful in your exercise workouts. It definitely allows free of motion movements and has a perfect set weight equivalence for when you would like to increase your weight load when wanting to receive more gains. Weight load goes accordingly to the color band that you want to use. I never knew resistance bands were really useful until now. I highly recommend purchasing this is using dumbbell weights are not your fortay.
summary: Great resistance band product that I've ever used.

reviewText: These bands are awesome. I have 4 kids under age six so I didnt feel comfortable having "real" weights in my home anymore so I switched to bands a few years back while a continued to use free weights at my gym.  The bands I purchased years ago didn't seem like they provided the stated resistance and wore out relatively quickly and left a bad impression.  Fast forward to today... on a friends recommendation, I bought this set and was totally blown away by the difference between these and the ones I had previously.  The resistance feels right and the bands feel solid.The best part is that my wife and I can both use this set because of the great range of band resistance and when either of us finishes, they go right back in the bag and in the closet. No need to worry about one of our little ones busting their head on a dumbbell. Even my 17yr old nephew was impressed by these.  As a self professed fitness nut, I recommend these bands highly.  Bands in general allow you to do things that aren't nearly as safe to do with free weights in regards to range of motion and are excellent for flexibility work... the key is to have high quality bands, and these are the best I've used.  The ones at my gym are downright terrible are probably the same ones they had 15yrs ago.These bands are not going to have you looking like old school Arnold (you'll need steroids for that), but if you want to get a a GREAT set of resistance bands at an even greater price, look no further.
summary: Family weight room in a bag

reviewText: I just ordered these and was a little skeptical at first. I wasn't sure if the quality was good but when I started using them everything was great. The bands have a very nice foam handle. The metal clip ons are strong. The door attachment works well and doesn't move up/down. It even comes with an ankle attachment to work out your legs, groin, hip, etc. Also comes with a carrying bag!!! Overall, they're great quality, super convenient for P90X, and are very durable. Definitely recomment this product!

Easy to set up and use. My wife and I used them when we traveled and they worked out great, especially when it wasn't convenient for us to find a Planet Fitness. I only wish they came with a manual to suggest different exercises. I mean, it wasn't a problem, since we could pretty much figure things out for the most part. But we felt as if maybe we were missing some good exercises.

For isometrics this is almost a perfect set. It would be perfect if it had two ankle straps instead of one.I have had this set for quite a while and all of the bands are still intact and not stretched out.If you are thinking of using this for leg isometrics (sprint training) then you will need to use all of the bands together to get the required resistance.
summary: Much more reliable than the flat bands

reviewText: These bands are portable and are good for certain motions that are more difficult to replicate using free weights (I'm using them to strengthen my draw for archery).  Straps, handles and bands feel sturdy and well constructed.

Well worth the price! I was looking for an alternative to going to the gym because I was tired of the environment, & the gas & time it took going back & forth from the gym. When I saw the price for these resistance bands I couldn't pass it up.I use them in combination w/P90X3 & they're great. They can give just as much resistance as dumbbells I use at the gym. I'm not a competitive athlete, so there's no real need for me to lift heavy anyway. This is great for getting toned & ripped. The constant resistance you get from a resistance band really taxes the muscles. I would say the greatest thing about these particular resistance bands is the quality of the bands themselves. Plus, the door attachment accessory allows you to do several back and triceps exercises like pull-ups, & overhead tricep extensions.If you're looking for an at-home workout alternative I highly suggest you get these resistance bands.
We could never get this to work worth a darn.  It was a waste of money and has sat in a closet after numerous attempts to make this work.

I bought these bands a few months ago as a way of diversifying my workout - I'd been a dumbbells and chin-up bar guy until then.  I find the bands to be well-made and sturdy, and I like the design of the clips and removable handle.  It means that I'm dealing with less bulk, of which I'm always a fan.  Plus, because the clips swivel, there's never an issue with "going against the grain" that I've felt with other bands.  Ultimately, though, these are better for someone needing a lighter workout than I.  Thus, my girlfriend loves them, but I have limited use for them.  This is probably my own fault, though, so I will get a band of higher resistance from BMP and I think it will have greater utility.
summary: Great for my girlfriend, good for me

reviewText: These are super easy to change the resistance and to do exercise with. They're great for bringing on vacation or when my husband deploys he plans on bringing them to continue to work out.
I love this. I use it to work out all the time. Good with the strength, material is good. Everything fits well in the bag also. I would recommend this.

I have to give them 5 stars because I have been using the bands without a problem for a month now.  Let me just say that these are well made and connectors are made of metal, not plastic like some other sets.The only thing, which is my problem and not theirs, is that I needed more resistance than the heaviest of bands in this set so I just double them up.Also, just to point out to anyone who left a 1 star review.  Any work out that says use bands also tell you to check the bands before using them.  This company says they will replace any band you have a problem with.
summary: Everything I expected the prodcut to be

reviewText: Of course I'm still working with the lighter-weight bands right now, but the set is really well made and sturdy.  I like that the handles are easy to switch from one band to another.  I'm still learning exercises, but the shoulder exercises I learned in physical therapy after surgery are easy enough to do by having my own set of bands at home.
I enjoy the different bands and the ability to use them in combinations to make them stronger.  I wish there were more bands to choose from.
Bought these as a recommendation for a easier workout for my condition. The concept is great but don't really have a place where I can use them on a regular basis.

My wife and I are quite active, with both aerobic activities (running & cycling) and strength training (free weights) done daily.  We bought these bands to supplement our strength workouts, and have been pleasantly surprised.  They are well designed, especially with strong carabiner clips at both ends of each resistance band---which is a huge deal as it allows you to set some many different configurations, and to do it quickly.  The quality on the cables are good, and if you use them properly, they are sturdy and long-lasting.  One thing that a few reviewers have never understood about resistance bands, is that you do not stretch them to their absolute limits.  Each band is designated with a comparable free weight resistance level, and it occurs in the 50-75% of the band's stretch.  It is not occurring at the 90-100% of the stretch limit.  Most people don't realize that when they use any mftr's resistance bands, they are going way harder than they normally would with a similar free weight.  It seems they can't believe a band is giving them a workout as would a free weight (i.e. dumbbell), so they stretch them past the limits of what they should be doing.  This is akin to cranking down on your toothbrush and brushing; toothbrushes quickly degrade and can't clean your teeth if you do this.  We also want to say that BMP bands are of the same quality as other bands costing 30-40% more.  We have two BMP sets now, use them regularly, and thoroughly enjoy the benefits of using BMP resistance bands.
summary: Well designed, strong carabiner clips at both ends, all around good value.

reviewText: I purchased these bands to use with Tony Horton's P90X program.  Having used them for three weeks now, I like the fact that this band system comes with two handles which can easily attach/detach to/from one or more bands.  This feature creates many resistance options.  The door accessory is also very handy -- I use it extensively with P90X.  If you are a taller person (e.g. 6ft. plus) than you might want to consider longer bands.  These are what I would call medium in length.
These are great quality bands and perfect for the workout I do. Comfortable handles and door attachment and ankle accessory work as it should.

I've had this product for 3 weeks and it works great. The materials and build quality is superb at any price and an incredible value for what BMP charges.  The tubes, handles, grommets, D-ring and clips are all built to last. I'm using for P90X and workouts on the road. Great product, I would not change a thing.
summary: Gym quality, great for travel and home P90X workouts

reviewText: Been using these with p90x for 3 weeks now.  They are great and they are exactly what I want because I need to combine bands and holding multiple handles was adding extra strain in my hands.  The ability to easily combine bands with one set of handles and having it be very mobile is a huge plus.  But in saying that the handles are plastic and I don't consider myself very strong, but at any rate one of the handles broke so now I have half a handle.
summary: Very good with a little bad

reviewText: I purchased these bands to do p90x because I couldn't use a pull up bar at my house. I had previously purchased some bands from a store that had athletic/workout equipment to do p90x, but when I got home to try them out, they were horrible. They didn't do anything they said they would and had no resistance. It was a complete waste of money. I did a lot of research on my next set and I ended up buying these Black Mountain Resistance Bands. So far they have been great. I was a little worried that there would not be enough resistance due to other people's comments, but they are perfect for me. I use the green, red, and black bands in place of pull ups, and that works well for now. In addition, I have an orange band (35-40lbs) coming in the mail, which in addition to the bands i already have, will definitely be enough resistance even if p90x makes me super buff. The things that I like the best about the bands is that they are high quality, you can strap on all the bands to one handle if you want, meaning you will always have enough resistance, and the door anchor is very easy to use. These are also really nice for me because I have lived in 3 different countries in the last 4 years. I have a set of bowflex weights that go up to 90lbs, but I have had to keep them in storage for the last couple years because they were too heavy to move with. I will be able to take these bands everywhere, and they have a nice little bag they fit into.  Overall i think these bands are great and would highly recommend them to anybody who doesnt want to pay huge amounts of money for weights or dont have enough space for them. I called Black Mountain Products customer support line and the guy I talked to was really nice and helpful.

The fact that you can use multiple bands at once to increase the resistance is the big selling point for this product.  Not "heavy" enough?  Just snap in another band.  I've used four at a time with no problem.  I'm using these for P90x3 as I don't have room for a pullup bar in the basement where I workout.  No, it's not the same as doing actual pullups, but you'll still get a great workout if you keep good form and use the right bands.  Customer service at BMP was GREAT.  One of the grommets on one of the bands wasn't stamped in all the way when I got them.  I emailed customer service, and they got back to me within the hour.  They had a new band in the mail same day and I had it a few days later.  What could have been a bad first impression turned right around.
summary: Great bands and great customer service

reviewText: Black Mountain Products resistance band set with door anchor and ankle strap was a great purchase, especially for the price. In the past I've always been a member of a gym, but since starting a new job and a longer commute, I don't have the free time to go to a gym. I've been using BMP resistance bands instead and I am pleasantly surprised at how well of a workout they give. You can work out every major muscle group, and since they have the door and ankle attachment, you can do many different exercises to keep things fresh and reduce muscle memory.I was a little worried that they would not provide enough resistance, but I was wrong. Since you can clip in different bands to the handles, you can get a lot of resistance. For example, I usually do curls with 70 lb. straight bar, and these bands easily accomplish that and more. I tried doing more but I couldn't.These won't replace a gym membership completely, but if you are looking for a way to stay in shape without buying a bunch of dumbbells, this is your product. Also, they come with a travel bag and you could easily fit them in a travel bag or suitcase if needed. They are compact and relatively light.

I bought this mainly for use when I travel but I also works great when you can't get to the gym.  Amazingly compact as I can easily fit it on my carry-on bag and go anywhere.  It's pretty cool that you can keep all the bands in the door loop and can quickly connect/disconnect the ones you need to do the exercise.  I also like the varied work-out from using weights.  One thing nice is that the resistance increases the further you pull the band, which helps when you are working through an injury as a lot of stress occurs at the beginning of the movement (bad with weights).  Even if you are pretty strong you can get a good workout using a combination of the bands but I will probably get one of the higher weight bands.
summary: You won't find a better travel gym!

reviewText: I like the bands.  The quality of the bands and the handles are good.  Never used the door anchor or ankle strap.  I do wish there was a way to keep the bands together when you hook several up at the same time.  Overall I am happy and to date have not broken the ends off of any of the bands.  The size is nice and small for taking on the road if you need to.

I currently use these bands for my P90x!Pros:You can use multiple bands as they clip onto the grip.Included ankle strapIncluded door strap (for pull ups/etc) **this saved me from having to put a hook into the stud of my wallComes with a nice carry bagCons:They dont tell you that you could also get a FREE ORANGE BAND!!! with FREE SHIPPING! lol...I called them up because there was a little paper inside and he said just leave your feedback, anonymous or not "we dont check it" and call us back, we would be glad to send you an orange band free of shipping. We do this for about 10% of our kits.Why complain? Right?...Keep up the good work!-Mike ReedDallas,TX
summary: Awesome kit, would've paid more for a single band at Walmart!

reviewText: If you are interested in resistance bands or tubes I highly recommend this set.  Very good quality and I enjoy these more than when I would use my 'bands'. The set comes with everything you need. I also recommend 'The Great Resistance Tubing Handbook' by Noel Potvin. It's cheap and has excellent photos that cover various exercises.

I am very please with this product.  It is very sturdy and a great value! I bought it specifically for use with the P90X program, when I injured my elbow early on doing pull ups. This has been a great alternative, as it is much easier on the elbows and you can add bands for additional resistance as you move through the program.

for the price you get a lot. more than you need actually. i dont use more than two weight bands. and thats where it stays for me. got it because of bad elbow joints using heavy weights and push ups and pull ups. this was a good solution for that. i recommend anyone who struggles with joint issues in their workout to get this. problem solved.

These bands are ideal for P90X, Insanity, Asylum, or general warmup/rehab work. Strong, durable and the clips allow for mixing and matching bands for additional resistance. I have to say that customer service was phenomenal. I ordered these bands and unfortunately they were lost in the mail or stolen. I thought I was screwed and resigned myself to re-buying. However, when I e-mailed Black Mountain customer service(and Amazon) about it, Justin not only apologized (even though it was not his fault) but sent me a new set the very next day, no questions asked. This kind of care and attention is sorely missing from many companies today and I feel it deserves special mention. Buy this product because it will fit your needs, but stay for the prompt care and excellent service you will receive. Highly recommended, will definitely buy more products from them in the future...
summary: Great Product, Even Better Customer Service

reviewText: What can I say.  The bands were everything you could want. Great quality and service. Shipped right away. I can't see why anyone would pay more for something else. Nice carrying bag too.

I ordered this product for use in an intensive exercise program. The items arrived quickly sent via priority USPS. I was happy to see that the company is owned and operated in Il. The bands are of excellent quality and I have no complaints about them. They hold up well, feel strong and durable, and come in a carrying case. The bands also offer a good selection of various resistances. Out of all the exercise bands I have worked with before this point, I think these will prove to be the highest quality and most durable. I would buy them again if I had the choice. They are on the higher side of price for exercise bands but the pros outweigh the cons for these.

If you're looking for something to use in your small room, this is a good purchase. Everything comes as listed. Although the bands kinda gets in your way,. But it's strong and well made. I suggests getting something that you can install on your door so it sits on place.

First off, I am 24 y/o, 190lbs, 6'1". Owned the product for well over a month now and I'm using it regularly 3-5 times a week. I messed my shoulder up pretty good at work and so I had to see a physical therapist for a month. After the 6 meetings with my PT, I decided to buy these resistance bands after seeing how EVERYTHING I could do at the PT, I could easily perform at home for free. These bands really impressed me, although my expectations were low since I just needed them to do a few simple exercises for my shoulders. I've been working out with weights since I went to college, but these bands allow me to work out my muscles in many different angles that I couldn't accomplish with weights at home, and it does it in a much safer way. Once I get my shoulder back to where I want it, I'll probably return to my weights, but until then these will be perfect for my rehab.So in short-The Good: cheaper/safer than weights, great for rehabing, endless exercises you can perform with them, door mount is awesome (the ankle mount/handles included aren't very useful in my opinion)The Bad: I'm not a fan of having to combine the bands to increase resistance, only 1 set of handles for all bandsI doubt you'll find a better set of resistance bands for the price so go for it!

This is a very durable and well made product; no worries of getting snapped in the face or having the bands break. I've always had trouble with resistant bands because of being a smaller person. These are better adapted to my measurements than any product I've tried. Don't know if I'll ever become strong enough to use all of them, but guys would have no problem. It's a very good product.
Several bands came with it.I use it with 10 minute trainer.Wish it has the waist strap though but still a good buy!

I've been using these bands pretty heavily for a few weeks for P90X and have no complaints. I'm a 5'9", 155 lb. male and they provide plenty of resistance for all the exercises when combined. A quality product at a great price.

I purchased the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set based on the positive reviews I've read here on the product and the customer service. Fortunately I have not had to use the customer service. But the product is as advertised. I wanted to hold off on writing the review until I got to use the bands for a little while. I have been using it for my P90X workouts along with dumbbells and it has performed flawlessly. The quality of the bands are excellent and when you think about the cost it is a real bargain. Rarely does a product exceed my expectations but this one has. I highly recommend these bands.
I love these bands!  They are amazing and priced very well. I am a quadriplegic and they have really helped with strengthening my arms so that I can convert from a power chair to a manual chair.

I have no complaints about the BMP resistance band set.  They very versatile and of good quality.  The clips allow you to either use handles or attach them to some hooks on the wall.  The transport bag allows me to easily take them on the road when I travel for work.

Ideally I would have a set of dumbbells, but those are much more expensive and bulky.  The bands provide good resistance, especially when you choke down on them or when you use multiple bands (I'm a 190lb guy who used to do a good amount of gym weights, these are a good "weight" although never get quite to the level of a 90lb dumbbell).  The handles and clips seem pretty solidly built, so it feels solid and durable when you use them.

I bought this band set just over 2 years ago and I guess I've been too busy using them to write a proper review.  I take these bands with me literally everywhere.  They live in my bag and when I get bored or need a quick stress reliever, I pop them out and enjoy a little workout.  The build quality on these bands is really top notch.  The rubber has not weathered at all in the two years I have owned them and I cannot see any cracking of any kind.  The handles have good foam padding that shows little to no signs of wear from daily use.Warranty - Well I finally was able to break one of the bands, the one I use most often.  I emailed the company and Rich, the customer service representative, had a new band out to me in less than 24 hours.  No questions asked, no issue, no worries.  This as to be the best warranty experience I've had with any company.  I will continue to give my business to Black Mountain and recommend them to my friends.
summary: Great product, awesome warranty, amazing customer service.

reviewText: Within a couple of uses, one of the plastic handles broke. Now when I grasp the handle, it doesn't grip properly and pinches. I have not contacted the company yet for a replacement handle, but hopefully they will work with me on a replacement.Another issue I had is that the program I'm using switches bands fairly often during the routine. The problem is that I have to stop the dvd and put the handles on another band and it seems to waste a lot of time. I wish that I had bought bands that each had their own handles.I think the product presentation is good and they give you a nice bag to keep the bands in, but I wish I had bought a different set.

I ordered these bands to compliment the P90X program.  I've started using them before the program and couldn't be happier.  Bands are very durable and hold up well.  The door anchor is a nice addtition as well as it allows a larger set of exercises to be performed.  Apparently they also have a lifetime guarantee should anything happen to the bands.My one complaint would be offering higher resistance bands (or a seperate package that includes more high resistance bands).  You can always group the bands together, but it would be nice.
For the price, you would like it to last a bit longer after 400 reps...!The bands are fraying and the stitching are coming loose.  DO NOT BUY unless you want it to be disposable!
summary: Wears and tears like a cheap condom bought from a nightclub washroom!

reviewText: I was impressed with this product. The quality of this product is tremendous. The bands are very durable. The door anchor is also a very helpful tool that comes with this product. It does not do any damage to your door at all. I would recommend this product to everyone.
I am really happy with the product and the exercise guide along with the ankle strap and door anchor makes for a more productive workout.

I have been using these sparingly for the last month or so. They are fairly sturdy and are a good value for money. I travel a lot for work and it is easier to pack these for a quick workout while on the road.

these bands are great. So glad to have them along with the other products which came with the package. Use them almost every day.  Have ordered another set for someone.  Excellent customer service.Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying Case

My only previous experience with resistance bands was rehab following knee and back injuries.  I saw limited use and limited results for them.  No way they could be used for any serious purpose,  I thought.  Limited to light resistance, hi-rep functional strengthening and conditioning within the confines of a physical therapist's office - boy, was I wrong!I lift 5 days a week, and love to incorporate cable machines for full range of motion resistance.  Only problem is (was) that I don't have access to a cable machine at home or on the road and getting to the gym at 0530hrs was an exercise in self-discipline.  I looked at several other band sets from many other manufacturers before selecting Black Mountain.  At this price and with a 90-day return policy and lifetime warranty, if I didn't like them I could return them or let the wife and kids use them.  Throw in "Made in the USA" and I figured they were worth an audition.Well, color me impressed!  I can easily replicate all of the exercises I used to perform on cables and more.  Rows, lat pulldowns, crossover chest pulls, hammer curls, concentration curls, tricep extensions and pulldowns - these have even replaced freeweights for lunges, good-mornings, and calf raises!  Even with no freeweights, you can still get a full-body workout with these bands, and add-ons are available to up the resistance.  Believe me, the pump you feel after a workout with these is every bit as good as you'll feel leaving a gym.I like the stackability of these over the individual bands with handles - you can mix and match throughout your sets to increase resistance between sets.  With the handles, door anchor, and ankle strap, there really isn't anything you can't do on the go out of the small carrying bag.The quality is great - at first I was a little hesitant to put too much weight on the thick nylon anchor, but now I am more concerned about the door frame I put it in!  The foam handles are comfortably sized, and you can even slide them in the loops to replicate pronated and supinated hand positions for various exercises.Now these can't be this good without a few minor limitations.  You do need to be creative with positioning the bands or your body to perform some exercises - you'll find them too long for some, too short for others.  I'm 6'3" and my wife is 5'7" - we both have to make some accommodations, but there is nothing we just cannot do.  Also, the addition or option of a bar would be awesome - hint, hint BMP!All in all, great product - we get great strength training workouts in minimal space.  Whether you are looking to augment freeweights and eliminate cables (like me), or looking to use these exclusively for strengthening and conditioning (like my wife), you will not be disappointed!
summary: Skeptical at first - now I'm sold!

reviewText: I love these resistance bands! They came very quickly and as described. They are much stronger than the other bands that I have and were affordable.
summary: Came on time and as described!

reviewText: I absolutely love this resistance band set!  The included door anchor and ankle straps make it so much more versatile than the resistance bands I was using from my physical therapist.  With regular resistance bands, I had to wrap or tie the bands to my bedposts and could never get them at the right height for the stretches I needed to do.  Not so with these BMP bands!  Just attach the door anchor, and slide it in the door at the necessary height and it stays put for all of your stretches!  works with the ankle strap too.I bought this set primarily to do stretches for my back and knees that my physical therapist has given me, many of which were listed in the little workout booklet that comes with the set.  It only added a few minutes to my routine to incorporate the rest of the exercises that they show in the booklet for a full body workout.  The bands are definitely durable and the lengths are perfect for most exercises.  There are some where you just need to adjust your grip (hold below the handle) to get the same tension.I also love that it all fits into a bag and I can take it with me when I go on long trips to visit my family.
summary: It's like having a portable gym in a bag!

reviewText: I absolutely love these bands!  I have had them for 4 months now, using them off and on, and they are still in like new condition.  I originally ordered these to use with the P90X program (as I cannot do pullups yet), and they work great.  I have purchased other bands at Walmart, and these are definitely higher quality.  Don't let the lower price fool you!I love the latch system that allows you to easily switch bands and even use more than one band at a time.  I was originally worried that the over-the-door attachment would not work, but I have never had a problem with it slipping at all.  My husband has even started using them over the last few weeks and he has nothing but good things to say about them.The one down-side would be that the storage bag was coming apart at the hem upon arrival due to poor sewing; however, that doesn't really bother me because it was the bands I was interested in, not the free bag.  Shipping was extremely fast and customer service has been nothing but kind.  Overall, I am pleased with my purchase and have already recommended them to another family member.  Definitely a product worth your consideration.

I purchased these bands about a month or so ago to use with Jillian Michael's Body Revolution DVD's and these are working out perfect.  There are 5 levels of resistance, so there is lots of flexibility for different body parts and room to grow (when a lighter weight band becomes to easy).  They come with a pamphlet showing various exercises as well.  They are made very well and I expect they will hold up.  I also love the storage bag - it provides a nice compact place to keep them between workouts.  The only thing I would have on my wishlist to improve them would be a way to shorten the length for exercises that require a shorter band.  Instead I wrap the band around my feet a couple of times and that works ok.
summary: This set of bands is great!

reviewText: I have been using resistance bands with a personal trainer in the gym for months now and had been thinking about buying a set.  I did a search on Amazon and after reading other reviews decided on this set. I had originally purchased these with the plan to use them during travel when I wasn't sure if there would be gym facilities.  I was not expecting to really use them at home but have found with the recent snow storms that I haven't been able to get out to the gym and these are the perfect solution without spending a ton of money on weights and other equipment. I highly recommend these.

Like many others I ordered these for p90x. I have a few dumbbells, but have read articles about combining free weights with bands and how you can benefit from using both. I like the bands because they are portable and don't take up a whole lot of room. One thing I've hated since I don't have a 'gym' is having to lug 20 different dumbbells in and out of the closet every other day! The reason I bought these was because you can double up multiple bands to the handles to combine more weight. Meaning once I am curling 40 pounds I dont need to go spend another $40 on dumbbells, but can combine two bands and get the 40 pounds. If you don't want to have to switch the bands between exercises then get the ones with separate handles, but then you can't double up. These are good quality and I've had no trouble with them. Why pay twice as much? These are the best value out there and I suggest getting them for your p90x or any workouts!

Out of the package the information was concise. I like the ability to increase resistence by attaching additional bands to the sturdy handles... I was always torn to just use the strongest single band available in the past - now with the easy detachable multiple bands, i now have the 'choice' and a better chance to make 'strength' changes. Thanks Black Mountain - I'm a happy athlete!

I've been using my bands for about 2 weeks now and have been loving every workout. The clip handles makes it easy to add or drop weight during workouts. The ankle strap and door anchor make for a perfect at home/traveling gym! Love it!

I just recieved my new B.M.P. resistance bands to use with the P90X workout system. As soon as I opened the box I fell in love with them. I am the type of person who doesn't need the expense tools to complete the job. So when I saw these resistance bands and how inexpensive they were. They're strong, well-made, and will last a lifetime. Thats why they are awesome!

Have had these bands for almost a year now and still give me a good workout.  I use them with he 10 minutes trainer videos and perform flawlessly.  Customer service is also outstanding. I would recommend these.
They are great for a beginner and give the ability to increase resistance with ease.  I may purchase another set for work.
summary: They do what you expect them to do

reviewText: Purchased this product in December 2011 as a present for my sister and her husband. It is now March 2012 (3 months later) and one of the metal rings of the band broke during a workout session and cut my sister's husband leg. It also bruised his foot and arm. I do not recommend these until the company fixes the problem as these are dangerous. Will be returning and putting in a complaint directly to the company. Amazon should not carry these.
Love it just to short was thinking that the ropes was longer. It is a must have item nice nice

I inherited these from a guy friend who is looking to build muscle mass.  They didn't work for him because of the intensity of his workout, it was too much for the bands.  Although, he did get some replaced by the company when they wore out quickly, so kudos to the company.  He gave them to me, because my workout isn't as strenuous, so he thought they would be helpful.  And they are great for what I do.  I dropped my gym membership because of cost, but still wanted to continue with one of the workouts I took regularly that used resistance bands.  (I would use these with a DVD, or exercise class, as the start up guide doesn't give a lot of information about specific exercises for toning all areas.)  These are perfect for what I do, and the variety of equipment they give you is excellent, you can change up your routine easily.  When I injured by shoulder (not seriously, just a strain), the yellow and blue bands give an easier workout without adding to the injury, and then I worked my way back up.  I'm very happy with them, and they have lasted several months even with almost daily use (full disclosure, there was a week or two where I was too lazy to do anything).  If you are looking for more serious workout/weight loss, I recommend adding other workouts to your routine, or getting more heavy duty equipment (although my body building friend told me they worked very well for him, but didn't last as long with a daily, super intense workout).  However, if you are like me and working out isn't easy to do (lack of motivation), so you stick to what you are able to commit too despite not losing much weight with it, I can recommend a supplementRaspberry Ketone Platinum (2 Bottles) - Clinical Strength - All Natural Fat Burning, Weight Loss, Diet Supplement, 60 capsules- it's a great fat burner, and helps my workout actually turn around into weight loss and fat loss.  I can't judge the products from the serious trainer point of view, but from the couch potato point of view, the bands are great for toning, and the rasp ketone makes your workout more effective in losing fat.
summary: Great product for getting in shape, don't recommend for serious body building

reviewText: I really like the product and I am trying to find a waist band also. Great quality, very well done.

Super excited to use these bands for home resistance work- recommended by my rheumy for increasing flexibility and muscle tone without irritating or straining swollen joints. At just 20 mins a day, I'm in! D rings easy to use with stiff fingers, padded handle is awesome and gentle.

I wanted to invest in some toning work out equipment to go along with a few other kinds I had. I am not one to exercise a whole lot, I do what I can with the time I have. So, I shopped around online and off but decided to get this one. I like it, it does it's job for how much I pay for it. I have never had any faulty problems with it (but keep in mind I don't use them every day).-The only thing I didn't like were the handles, I think they were just too big for my small hands. They kept scraping against my wrist when I do bicep curls, tricep extensions and blah blah blah. Other than that small bit, I do enjoy them and they work well with my minimal workout.
This is the first set of bands that I haven't broken.  Very sturdy.  My husband is strong, 6'3 a little over 200 lbs and they are strong enough for him to use too.

I bought set of these bands in april which lasted 3 months. I don't work out regularly but black and red bands broke. I thought it might be my fault. I bought another set in august which again broke after using it only 5 times. Now I am left with two sets of yellow green and blue only. I am really disappointed with product. now I have to buy only red band for 10 $.

I have used several different brands of resistance bands and my favorites are Bodylastics, and Black Mountain Products. If $$$ isnt an issue, I would give the edge to Bodylastics, BUT I find Black Mountain Products bands to be a better value. Either brand is great and should last a very long time. Personally I would buy this set and pocket the extra cash.
I was looking for a quality set of workout bands at an affordable price and these Black Mountain bands were exactly that. This makes working out at home much more easier.

Love this resistance band set.  They seem to be holding up and travel well.  Great product for the price.  I've taken them over for my dad to use for arthritic knee therapy and he loves them too.
