Will probably need to get another set at some point as I can't keep my hands on them long enough to use them as much as I want to.

You can pretty much tell that the company has put thoughts into this product in order to utilize the space at home for a convenient workout. Although it cannot provide a complete gym experience, it's still a decent equipment to provide things you need.It's a little bit inconvenient to change the band weight for different exercise, but you'll get used to it later on and will change the bands more quickly. I hang them on a wall hook so that I don't have to take the bands out from bag and untie them every time i exercise. The metallic snap hooks on two ends of bands do cut your skins a bit, so you need to be careful changing band.  Other than these, this band set does provide good amount of resistance for you to keep in shape.

These bands are great! Great company, great product and plus they send you a free orange band with increased resistance. All you have to do it call them and bam! You have your orange band in the mail. I am thoroughly pleased!

I have just gotten into using resistance bands at the gym and decided to get a set for home use.  I really like this product.  The bands are a much better quality than the ones in the gym.  They are easy to use/change and very well made.  I recommended them to a friend.  Been using them for a couple of months and haven't found a down side.

Pros - Great price, great variety of resistance, easy to clip on and offCans - None to report as of yet.I am 6'1, I've used these everyday since receiving them 2 weeks ago, have seen other reviews that they stretch...we will see

I love these and have set them up in my small home gym.  I didn't want to invest in any weights or any expensive equipment and these were perfect. I use them with a few hitching rings I screwed into a support pole in the basement next to my treadmill. My only complaint is that they only come with one foot strap that isn't big enough to comfortably put both my feet in. I will be looking for another foot strap.
summary: Great for small home gym set up.

reviewText: I purchased this product because I needed a traveling piece of workout equipment that is light enough to take with me. I've tries other bands before but this one is a durable one which came with a door piece so I could do many more different exercises.I recommend this for those who are always traveling and can't seem to hit the hotel gym. Now there's no excuse>.
The resistance band set were actually more than I expected them to be; user friendly for the house and the storage bag certainly simplified storage

Snapped myself in the neck once but they are great. I ordered theses along with an incline bench, and I can work out just about every muscle.I am personal trainer and I moved away from my gym, so I now use these to work out. I bought a 3$ floor hinge at wal-mart and I use it along with the resistance bands to workout shoulders, biceps, legs, back, and tricep excercises. I also really like the ability to use combinations of bands because you can fine tune what resistance you want and alter your reps for muscle confusion.Also if you write a little review for them, they ship you an additional band. They say it is orange, but they have a purple one you can ask for that is a little bit more resistant than the orange.

nice to have all in a bag and ready to usehaving the different strength makes it easy to move on in therapyshould have noticed that the bands are not covered - but they will last as long as we need them

when I ordered this product, I was in physical therapy...I showed my therapist, who was so impressed at it's quality, low cost, and the exercises included that she copied all the information to give to future patients...THANK YOU for such a quality product at such an affordable price...Naomi

I requested these bands as a Christmas present to help me expand my workouts on the road.  I use them for P90X DVDs especially for pull up modifications.  Pull up bars and free weights aren't available in most hotel gyms.  These bands allow me to incorporate strength training into my cardio and abdominal routines.Black Mountain Products is a very helpful family business.  I will definitely do business with them again.
These workout (resistance) bands are fantastic.  They are easy to change out to different resistances, and seem to be of great quality.

I wanted to be able to work out at home on days I can't go to the gym, and I don't have the money or space for a bunch of free weights. Thankfully, my wife bought me this set as an early Christmas present. I've only tested them out a few times, so I can't speak to how they hold over months of workouts, but they seem high quality (comfortable handles, metal clips, etc.). I love that this set is stackable so the resistance can be increased substantially. The door anchor is nice and works well too, so you can do chest presses and pull downs (alternatives for a bench press and lateral pull down). While I don't think they can fully replace free weights for everyone, I'm excited to have something to work with at home that is lightweight, inexpensive, and (I think) effective.
summary: Seems to be a great set for the money

reviewText: I bought these to use when I tried P90X, and they wore out around day 60 (I ended up buying the bowflex 5-52 adjustable weights to finish).  I enjoyed them while they lasted, and it should be noted you must have shoes on when using this, otherwise it will pinch/rubber burn your foot...common sense should have told me that I suppose but I learned the hard way haha.

In the beginning I was scared to stretch too much for fear it might snap, but that only resulted in me not getting enough exercise. Don't be afraid to push this product to the max. Solid endurance with convenient instructions and door and velcrow harness.

This product is really great for the price and all the features it has. I got these for doing p90x and they work great. Wish it came with a heavier band than the red one tho. The door attachment is really neat and it works great. The bands are also very high quality and hopefully they will last a long time. I look forward to using these alot.

I have tried many resistance bands before and nothing compares to this product.  The hard ware on the bands are sturdy.  The door anchor is ok, i suggest buying and sinking a few hooks in a wall or door. The bands also come with accessories and great instructions.

The reason I went with these was to be able to stack extra weight together for more resistance. For areas where I am stronger it is nice to be able to put 2 or 3 bands together to get the desired resistance without paying an arm and a leg of lots of bands.

Danger Will Robinson.Snap one band broke away from handle and came back and hit me in the shoulder and left a nice black and blue and bleeding cut.Snap green band snapped, no injury.Door anchor came loose and left a nice red mark under my eye.This set is so poorly made and very dangerous.  Can we get a lawyer?Threw the whole set in trash, before it killed my cats.I give it no stars if possible. Don't buy this junk. The best bands and safest bands on the market arethe braided type. They are more costly, but worth your health and the pets around you will be happy.
Very durable, I use it a lot. I'm very surprised with the results. Great product to use at home and even when traveling.

My husband purchased this for him and I, I have been using it for a couple days and I can really FEEL them working! They come with a paper that tells you exactly how to do the exercises from start to stop, I love them!

I am pretty surprised by how well this product works. I have been doing a daily workout program (Chalean Extreme) and they use resistance bands and/or dumbells. I am familiar dumbells, so I wanted to use that, but the resistance bands were a cheaper substitute (and easier to pack!). After some use, I find that these resistance bands are actually more effective than dumbells because it allows for a flexibility of my body that dumbells do not. I love that the Black Mountain bands come with a metal clipping system because I can combine bands to make even more levels of resistance. The handles and band material seem sturdy enough to use for a long time to come. Some people complained about the length, but I am only 4'10 so these work perfectly for me! I also like that the guide came with a few exercises, though you can always google for more.
I am a personal trainer and I love this product. High quality hardware and easy interchangeability. Not to mention a small family run business with great customer service.

I just received my package, and got them out to test them out. Everything from the bands, the carabiners, the ankle strap and door anchor, seem high quality. Inside the package is also a coupon for a free orange band (extra heavy) which they said will ship in 1 day, and arrive in 3-4 days. My only complaint (and it's my own fault for not paying attention) is that for some reason I expected TWO ankle straps, but there is only ONE included. I want to be able to strap both ankles at either end of a single band (or multiple combined bands), for various exercises. So, I'm having to order another ankle strap off of Amazon. Not a big deal, and not too expensive, but with shipping (not a Prime eligible product), it comes out to $8 or so, which is a reasonable percent of the entire package.Because of that, I set it to 4 stars.
Great product and great price. Would recommend!

Besides from being high quality, (these things aren't gonna snap...) here are the things I like:Connecting the handles and the ankle strap to the bands is very easy. Attaching multiple bands is easy too, and a great way to up the resistance. I like the idea of having a home gym, and I already have dumbbells, but many muscles require more of a pulling motion. For example I have a very hard time finding good back exercises with dumbbells, but now I can do seated row type exercises with the bands. (You attach the bands to the door.) I also much prefer doing a tricep pull down as opposed to lifting a dummbell over my head trying to work the triceps. Basically I have found the bands are a great compliment to free weights, and if I was on a tight budget, I could get by with just the bands and no free weights at all.
summary: High Quality - Exactly What I Wanted

reviewText: This set of resistance bands is the best that I've ever had. All other bands that I've used don't compare. Plus all you get with this set for the price is exceptional. You can't find anything like it. These bands are amazing and black mountain is very helpful. Great buy!!!!
I bought one set for my wife and my mother in law came over and tried them out so i irdered a set for her. They work great.

I've been using resistance bands for a couple years now, mainly in correlation with triathlon training.  I've used several different brands of bands, and i have to say that these are the top quality ones that I have used.  The estimated resistance is quite accurate, and the material is strong.  I have no concerns that the bands will fail, as I have had happen with other bands.  Also, I like the fact that you can attach the bands to the handles, which gives the user a greater number of resistance options.  I would definitely buy these again.  5 stars.

I bought this set not too long ago, to add some new exercises to my fitness regimen. I must say that I'm not disappointed. First off, the quality of the items is impressive. All sturdy, solid and durable seeming. Second, the resistance options and combinations give you a lot of choice over the differences in strength required to stretch the bands. I use these every other day, and I use them thoroughly, and I'm not noticing any wear yet. Their resistance is the same as when I bought them. I recommend this set.

This is a great set of bands for the price. Lots of versatility and the included carry bag is an added bonus. Can't beat the price and BMP supposedly warrants the bands forever. I hope never to have to take advantage of the warranty as I'd hate to have one of these things snap during use. My only complaint and it's a small one is the clips at the ends of the bands are a little difficult to get on and off because of their small size but it's not too bad. The handles are reasonably comfortable.

Worked better than i thought.  great quality.  use them 4-5 times a week.  Offer good smooth resistance with easy to attach handles. I can perform a full upper body workout at home while I recovery from ankle surgery!

Received these bands quickly and just in time for a trip.  They are small enough to travel and not add extra weight to your bag. I exercise a lot and use free weights and a universal gym, but it is amazing how many exercises you can do with these bands.  They provide some basic exercises within the package, but you can find many band exercises on line or with apps. They are extremely durable.  It is a nice change up in my routine.
summary: Great for on the go or at home.

reviewText: When I first got the five bands in I thought that it would be a pain to keep adding and taking off the bands but it actually turned out to be great.  I love this product I have had not problems what's so ever.  The bands are durable and effective.  I would suggest u buy this product because its not expensive and it works.

After two weeks one set of bands (black) broke.  The design of the handle attachment also sucks.  The attachement is metal clip to metal clip with one end stitched onto rough material.  When working out these parts tend to scrape the back and make use very uncomfortable.  Do not buy.

After purchasing and returning two other resistance band products because they didn't even come close to the caliber of product I use as a Certified Trainer at the Wellness Center where I work, it was with a little trepidation that I ordered the Black Mountain Set. From the speed with which it was delivered, to the carry bag and most importantly the "industrial" quality of the product, any fear I held was dismissed. This is simply a great product. I've built it into the programs that I use with clients (particularly my "road warriors" who need a small profile exercise equipment set when travelling), You have to see the heavy duty guage of the metal clips and feel the stretch/resiliency of the tubes to appreciate just how good this set is. Don't waste time with the "name brand" or celebrity endorsed products - go with the BMP set.

These bands are as good as most similar products, and they should last for long time with moderate reasonable use. What is different about this set is a shocking number of reports about torn and broken bands that often caused serious injuries and even a few cases of disability. Also, it's quite unusual to read these reports in some 4- and 5-star reviews.Usually, I don't pay much attention to 1- and 2-star reviews because it's very common for people to have various reasons for dissatisfaction, which have little to do with the quality and usability of the product itself. Actually, since I was going to use the bands for rehabilitation and the number of positive reviews was overwhelming, I decided that this product should serve its purpose for me and bought it in September 2013. This conclusion appeared to be accurate, and, before writing a regular review, I decided to read again what other people were saying. And this time many reviews sounded very alarming, often, apparently, without the author's intention. What could one think reading a 5-star review that asserts that if the exercise equipment breaks, it is beneficial for the user because this indicates increased power of the user, and the sooner it happens the better? And this opinion was not an exception. Somehow, I didn't feel comfortable using this product and conducted in-depth Internet research on similar products including Amazon reviews. The results are as follows:1. As some reviewers suggested, this product had improved over time, and many reported incidents might not be relevant for new purchases, so it might be prudent to disregard old reviews. Unfortunately, many new positive reviews from 2013 mentioned various quality related issues. This could be due to incorrect use of the bands.2. Similar products sold on Amazon have much better feedback, and complains are about incomplete sets, delivery issues, wrong band size, etc., but not about damaged bands and injuries. And a few products, such as Bodylastics and JS Fitness sets have almost no negative reviews. I have no intention to advertise anything, but one should not look any farther than Amazon to find some alternatives to compare and make a choice.3. The bands certainly should not break in a few months and even years unless they are defective or damaged by inappropriate use. Of course, some drivers can wreck a perfectly good car in a few months, but it doesn't indicate they've become superior drivers. If the active or working length of a band is not stretched more than 4 times, the band should serve for many months of daily use.4. There are bands with built-in protective devices, such as inclosing sleeves and enclosed cords, which should prevent possible injuries and traumas in case of band failure.5. The flat bands might be a better alternative since their length and, therefore, resistance can be adjusted much easier. They can be folded multiple times if needed, which increases both resistance and reliability. There are extremely heavy duty flat or loop bands suitable for heavy lifting and body building.Practical recommendations:1. Inspect every band thoroughly on arrival for any possible defects.2. Test every band carefully with gradually increased load and inspect thereafter.3. Contact the manufacturer in case of any issue and/or question. They have excellent customer service, which I had a chance to verify personally on a few occasions.4. This set should be perfectly fine for light to moderate loads and/or infrequent use.5. Read the enclosed instructions before using the bands. The most important safety instructions are periodic inspections and overstretch prevention.6. If no defects are found after a few uses, the bands are likely to be in a good condition and unlikely to break without any indication of wear and tear, which can be revealed by periodic inspections.7. Avoid stretching the bands more than 4 times their active or working length. Rolling a band around the hand or reducing its length in any other way will reduce its working length. This should not be used to increase resistance (overstretch), but only if there is insufficient room for exercises. Using entire band should always be preferred.8. Using bands attached to a door, wall, post, etc. effectively doubles the resistance, saves room, and allows for greater control and variety of exercises.9. Avoid incidental cuts, pinches, scratches, etc., which can damage the band. Always inspect bands after using them in some unusual way and/or by another person.10. If the items above sound like too much hassle, consider buying more reliable and, possibly, more expensive bands with protective sleeves or cords, which will give you peace of mind and can actually be more economic.11. Read customer reviews on Amazon very carefully before buying any product if you plan to use it for vigorous and tough exercises.P.S. A huge number of trivial positive reviews might be caused by the "free orange band reward" promised by the manufacturer for a fair review, which can encourage many people to write a few words instead of agreeing with already existing reviews, which would have been much more convenient for new customers.

They are very strong.  And they don't smell like rubber!  Handles easily move between bands.  Color-coded guide makes it easy to remember the order of strength of the bands.  Great customer service by the company too.
summary: Super strong. They don't smell like rubber!

reviewText: This product suits my traveling lifestyle. I don't need to visit an unfamiliar gym in an unfamiliar town. It's my gym in the bag.
Excellent product and very easy to use anywhere in the home. I use it three to five times a week and it more than meets my expectations. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Everything a beginner to resistance bands needs, has different strengths of bands handles, door uses. I just strapped the ankle strap around the support pole in my basement and it worked fine. Love them

reviewerName: N. Kenyon "author of DAY ONE (Thomas Dunne/St...
reviewText: I owned a competitor's product, a birthday gift to me that I loved--until the strap snapped in the middle or a workout and almost hit my foot. Could have broken a toe, or worse. I had been using them only a month.I was convinced of two things: one, resistance bands are great for an easy, low cost alternative to weight machines, and two, quality is key. I went searching for the best product available and settled on Black Mountain after reading a lot of reviews.I've only been using the new bands for a week or so, but the difference in quality was obvious as soon as I took them out of the box. They are very well made, and I'm confident enough to push them pretty hard. So far, so good!
Great product. Feels very stable while using with P90X for the first few times - only on week 1. Would recommend as an alternative to the ones that P90X wants you to get - cheaper.

I can no longer use 'free' weights. Nor do I want to go to a gym and wait to use the 'machines'. These seem to do what I need for them to do.  Help keep the 'tone' or maybe say regain some of the 'tone' for the muscle.  The shipping was efficient.  The package arrived in excellent shape.  The web site for the company that makes them is a good site.  BUT.............................. I have just now seen I could have bought them CHEAPER with free shipping directly from the company.  I could have saved a couple of bucks.

Bought them to do some upper body work to keep my bones strong.  These bands seem very durable (have used them 2 months so far), and very flexible in terms of making them fit your level of strength.  You can use one band at a time (each one rated at a different resistance level), or use more than one at a time if you want more difficulty after running through all the levels.  Having so much flexibility for so little cost was great.

The bands came as described- no missing pieces.  The bands themselves appear to be of fine quality.  The handles could use a little work.  They are not functionally deficient, and although I have used the band for one month without the handles deteriorating, It looks like they might be the first to go.  I was impressed by the quality of the clasps at the ends of the bands.  The fabric quality/stitching appears excellent and the clasps make adding and subtracting bands very easy.  It would like an option for a package that includes a second ankle strap.  I find switching an inconvenience and would have rather paid a few extra dollars not to have to deal with this.  I would purchase products from this company again. The cost was modest enough that when bands inevitably break, I won't feel bad repurchasing.
Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying Caseits perfect!

The bands are just as promised by the seller, they are good high quality resistance bands with all the needed attachments and allow you to quickly and easily transition from one exercise to the next (possibly even quicker than with an actual weight gym.) I ordered these bands to be use for the P90X videos and I was a bit skeptical at first because I didn't think that fitness bands could provide a good workout - boy was I wrong. By grouping the bands together you can increase the weight resistance to a very high level and provide a nice fluid resistance training session. It also helps to make sure your weaker set of muscles train to catch up to your stronger side. Its a great purchase.

This set provides a wide range of resistance to a person's workout. Each band has a metal clip at the end which makes switching between bands a breeze.  I have tried all the bands and haven't notice flaws. Great product and I recommend it to anyone who does any home workout exercises.
I have used these bands for some time now and they are a good quality product. They are strong, durable, and truly represent different resistance levels. I am glad that I purchased this product.

Have these for about a week now. Very well made, and good selection of differing strength bands. The door anchor and ankle strap increase their usefulness, adding more exercises that you can do. Truthfully, I am an older guy and way out of shape, and so the lightest weight band is giving me a pretty good workout right now. Looking forward to getting more in shape and changing to the stronger bands.Only drawback is that the booklet that comes with it has few exercises, and I find that those are not that well explained or illustrated. However, You Tube has tons of videos with a wide range of resistance band exercises, and many of those are very helpful in demonstrating the different exercises one can do and follow along with.Overall, this is a great product, and I highly recommend it.
This setup is very helpful.  I have MS and exercise is most important.  I am thankful for the guidelines and the different strengths of the bands.

I purchased this product for my beginner clients.  I do not care for exercise machines so to gain some functional stability I knew resistance bands would do the job.  This item was shipped promptly and arrived on time.  The bands have been perfect for what I needed them for.  Very good quality bands as well as high quality ankle strap and handles.  Connecting multiple bands is a great way to achieve proper resistance with this set.  The only downfall is that the free carrying back ripped within days but I keep them in my gym bag anyway so I wasnt all that concerned with that.  Overall I would def. recommend these to anyone who is working in the field or would like to exercise at home.  Amazing product for the money.

I have been using these for a variety of workouts for almost two months now. I'm happy to report that they work great. If I had to say one con it would be that the handles do kind of twist around. Not really a problem, just something you have to get used to, then again, I haven't used bands before. They work well and I would buy them again.

About the product: Comes with 5 colored bands of varying resistance. The handles are comfortable and the clips allow you to quickly adjust the amount of resistance as needed. The door anchor requires no installation, you basically just close the door on the closed end of the anchor and run the resistance band through the open end. The ankle strap is comfortable and is fastened with velcro. The booklet is informative and contains instructions on how to perform a variety of upper and lower-body exercises.About the quality: I bought these resistance bands about 8 months ago and they show considerable wear and tear. The black and green bands have completely torn apart. I did use those bands the most, however I wasn't even using them that often, just light-moderate workouts 3x a week max (with many missed workouts along the way). i did perform overhead presses, but being 5'10" I doubt my height played a role. To be fair, I was working out with shoes, so that may have contributed to the damage. I tried going without shoes, but the bands were uncomfortable under my feet. I notice some resistance band sets come with covers for the bands and I think that can help with comfort and reducing friction.

Short review:  I was so pleasantly surprised at the quality and versatility of this product, as well as the customer support (a real person answers the phone), that I had to share my experience with others.  I love exercise that is related to sports, but almost never do a workout.  I can't put this product down!  It's so easy and friendly to use that it's motivational by design and function.  So get one for yourself.  The product is fantastic and the price very reasonable.

I did quite a bit of product searching before deciding to purchase this set, and wow, I'm glad I did!  This set rocks!  There are a couple points that are particularly unique and good about this item:1) First, I highly recommend getting a set that includes handles and interchangeable/stackable bands (like this one), instead of a set that has handles on each band.  Stackable bands give you flexibility with the level of resistance, but also allow you to keep stacking as you get stronger - meaning you can use this set for longer as your strength increases.2) The craftsmanship on this item is fantastic.  The point where the rubber band attaches to the end clip is really well done - reinforced and sturdy.  I don't feel nervous that it's going to snap off or break.3) the clips on the end of the bands are really top notch!  They attach simply by pushing the clip onto the D-ring on the handle.  and they open easily as well, just push on the spring-loaded hinge and slip it off the ring.  These high quality clips make for smooth and fast changes.  No fumbling with an annoying clip that doesn't open and close easily.Overall, highly recommend!

I was a little concerned about ordering this online but when I tried them, they are amazing. Great for the days I can't make it to the gym.Buenisimos para los Dias Que, no puedo ir al gym. LA verdad funcionan muy bien!
They were a very good quality. I use for baseball workouts, and I have gotten a lot better. Bottom line, they are great bands
I'm happy with this product, it have a very good quality. I think that I could buy more units for selling on my city, if I can get a good price.

I bought this set of bands because I'm going to be staying at home to raise a child for a while so I won't be able to hit the gym nor do I have enough room to build a small weight room.  These are a great addition to body weight exercises, they add a bit more variety to the routine.  They are small and portable and you add them together to increase weight.That being said they are a bit on the short side, you will have a hard time doing something like a military press if you're standing up.  You'll have to modify your exercise to either do it one handed or on some kind of low bench.  I do really like their customer service, you call the number and get a person and they take care of you right there.

I have used these resistance bands a few times now and they meet my needs just fine. I am probably not renewing my gym membership now (I never did much serious free weight lifting anyway) and these bands are also great for travel. They take up no room at all. And they give you a great workout if used properly.One thing: The instructions that come with the product are not very helpful. I recommend going to YouTube and searching "resistance bands" plus the muscle group you are looking to work. Lots of tutorials on there.Overall very happy with my purchase. Seemed like the best deal for resistance bands on Amazon.

I just want to say that I am not a fitness nut. I am 31yrs old 5'9" and 165Lbs and dreaded working out. I am not a competition body builder or anything. I am an average guy. These bands are a blast to use and they are very well built and at around $30 are a steal. I fully intend to buy the Black Mountain chin up bar in the future and am fully confident in the product without having it. Thanks Black Mountain and thanks Dan for being great on the phone. Very polite and very helpful. I hope Black Mountain is around for a long time with quality products. I gave  5 stars based on value, quality and customer service. Thanks.

Super fast shipping! I got the product within days of ordering. The bands are high quality. I use them for p90x and other resistance workouts. They seem awesome so far. I highly recommend these bands!
It's a good product to work out at home buy it's not enough.  Good quality.  The shipping it was to much.

I have been using the Black Mountain bands during my p90x training the last 6 weeks and have found them to be quite good. The bands are quality construction and have a very convenient clipping feature. The bands clip onto hand grips so you can add/subtract resistance relatively quickly (helps me keep up with Tony Horton).The bands have not broken and seem very sturdy. I have snapped cheper bands before and it's not fun! You could lose an eye for sure.There is a nice bag to keep the bands together and some straps for wrist/ankles (not really used in p90x). Black Mountain also has great customer service (I called about new products and a person answered 2nd ring).

I got these exercise bands to use with the P90X workout DVD's, mainly for when I travel and can't carry weights with me. But I also use them at home to fill-in the gaps in my weights. The exercise bands are light (even including all the bands and handles in their nylon, drawstring bag). Before purchasing, I did exhaustive research to find the best product at the best price. After reading amazon.com reviews on these and all the other major competitors, including going to companies' web sites, and checking-out the quality of their information and accessibility of their customer service departments, Black Mountain came out on top. Am still a satisfied user months after my purchase and would recommend them to any exerciser, whether beginner or advanced.  Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set
summary: Exceptionally Happy With These Exercise Bands

reviewText: Arrived on time brand new, and they work pretty well when looking for the perfect resistance bands that really lets you feel it after a workout but not be in too much pain afterwards. Good for those who are starting a good  workout regime, and not wanting to lift heavy bulky weights that may strain your muscles, to me this is the way to go.
You'll get what you see, very nice product for excersing at home, nice bag to keep them together, nice excercises tips
These are a great set and work well for my P90x workouts.  They are sturdy and well-made.  I wish they came with more than one set of handles, but they do change quickly and easily.

I love my bands. They are helping me with shoulder rehab and I am happily progressing toward normalcy. The bands are great with the variety of tensions and easy to transport and setup. I am so glad I purchased these bands and really enjoy going through the routines that are illustrated and others that I have adapted. This is a great place to start if you want flexibility and strength throughout your body. Portability make these ideal for travel.You will always have a gym if you are willing to put in the time and effort to use these bands.
The bands are easy to use, gives a great worhout in just a few ninutes a day. It's so easy to use, you can do them twice a day doing power sets, and be finished in 30 minutes.
Great product the  bands provided work exactly as advertised.  I will continue to use these for travel and other times I do not have my weights handy.

These resistance bands---actually, they're tubes, like jump ropes---are very sturdy, much more so than the Therabands I bought previously.  The carrying case is a nice touch, too.  I expect to get a lot of use from this product.

I looked around and compared item and price and the best deal was here.  This is a small family company and their products hold there own against the more expensive ones.  Unless you are a workout crazyman or don't take care of them, these bands will last years.
Easy to set-up, easy to change bands, easy to use.  These resistance bands are a good addition to a home gym.  Cost effective and the right tool for a variety of exercises.
summary: Good addition to a home gym

reviewText: I've had these bands for a couple months and love them. They're great for toning and bulking and are very versatile. I'm six feet tall and have had no problem with them being too short/getting overstretched(no signs of wear). I would definitely recommend these.
summary: Great Bands! No problems at all

reviewText: Excellent product for the price. The clips give you the option to use many different tensions and options for using the handles. I have seen better products but at two to three times the cost.
summary: Resistance bands give them an A

reviewText: What you see in the photo is what you get along with a guide for the resistance of each band or combo of bands.  It took a while to get this item delivered.  Ordered on the 23rd of May and didn't get it until the 3rd of June.  Seemed like a longer that usual time to get it to my home mail box.  Snail mail was indeed snail mail in this instance.I got these bands to facilitate some rehab exercises for my back post surgery.  I think they are a great value for all that you get and they seem to be very well constructed.  I looked around before I got these bands and there are really a lot of choices out there.  I think this set is one of the best values for the money.  They would also work well for travel as an exercise system in a very small bag that comes with the kit.  I really like the adaptor that allows you to hook into a door jamb v. having to us a door knob.  Also the ankle piece is nice to have as well.

Exactly as described, delivered promptly, and exactly what I wanted.  The manual with exercises is good, having exercises available on their web site is a big plus.  No getting used to, no learning curve, dropped right into my routines.  The ability to zero in on what I want to work on is big, the convenience is big, this is really good for me.
It works well for a on the traveling side workout. Good quality and great colors to make me not blinf
These resistance bands are high quality and are great for a home workout or while on the road. I recommend looking up youtube videos for new ideas for resistance band workouts.

Recived in good time. Bands seem well made handles look like they will last too but im a little sketchy on how much the bands will endure. So far three days on using twice a day and they are as strong as the day i got them. All said i think its worth the price a good purchase.

I love these bands! They are very high quality and sturdy, comfortable to use, versatile, and the length is just right (I'm 5'7"). I'm able to find all the right ways to move to work my arms without further injuring my shoulder. Even with an excellent build catered to the heavy weights, I get a good burn and efficient workout WITHOUT THE PAIN! I may be able to get back to rock climbing sooner than anticipated (not going to rush it, of course).
summary: Physical therapy will be a cinch!

reviewText: I've been using these everyday for over a month and have nothing negative to say they are so versatile with the Zinc-Galvanized Steel Carabiner Spring Snap Link Hooks allowing you to use them anywhere and link them together to add more resistance.I'd highly recommend these to anyone.

Just bought these to use with P90X3 and so far I am really happy with this purchase. At first I didn't think the over the door attachment was included - but really I just didn't realize how simple that attachment is! Works great with the over the door attachment in place of a pull up bar. Love how many bands were included for a great price! Will definitely recommend to friends.
I ordered these to intensify my ab workouts and they have surpassed my expectation. I'm now able to quickly add more resistance by combining different bands together.

These are good to have around for the days you can't make it to the gym. The bands and straps are in great quality and very durable. You can pretty much work out any part of your body with just this product!

The entire resistance band kit is designed to make exercise fun, progressively challenging, functional, and perhaps most importantly, easily accessible.  If you're looking for something different than the monotony of the gym scene or if you travel often, I highly recommend this exercise equipment.
summary: Excellent ancillary exercise equipment for use virtually anywhere.

reviewText: this is great for when i travel and especially when im staying in hotels on my business trips. thank you so much i am very happy with my purchase.

I received these bands as a gift after trying other suboptimal resistance bands.  They are very sturdy and solid bands.  Safety is extremely important as I had one of the previous lower quality brands purchased from Sports Authority, snap causing a nice bruise on my foot. The variety of bands should meet anyone's expectations.  I have used the upper end bands as part of my work-out for P90X and have been overly impressed.  The included accessories include a high quality Velcro ankle strap to work-out lower extremities as well as door strap to isolate the upper extremities.  The clips are solid quality and allow for a quick changing of bands during your work-out.The customer support is superb.  I had a question about one of my bands and offered to photograph and e-mail the subtle finding.  Instead, the customer service rep recommended replacing the band without any questions, and it arrived within 3 business days.  Another great selling point is that BMP includes a lifetime warranty on their equipment.  From my understanding, the 90 day warranty is for a complete refund.  Overall, you won't regret going with these bands and in the unlikely event one of the bands snaps, they will replace it.
summary: Excellent bands and superb customer support

reviewText: In the set you get 5 bands, a carying case, 2 handles,a door stopper, a leg band and an instruction card.The card shows the resistance weight of each band color which is pretty useful, not all companies do this.The 2 handles have a foam grip over plastic and feel pretty comfortable and light weight.The 5 bands are great, each is hollow and remind me of rubber tourniquet tubing in texture, which makes them light and more comfortable to use. The durability, just wow this stuff seems to be indestructible, I've pulled it over so many things for different workouts and they have been performing great.IF you are looking for resistance bands, do your research as i do mine and you will see that this is pretty much the best deal on the market.

I love these bands.  Solely because of the fact that they a versatile. Many bands can't be easily adjusted to increase resistance. With the clip setup you can add more bands of just lash them to things such as posts or fences.  I recommend this product especially those who have access to Smith machines in their gyms.  The notches on the machine make it easy to change the angle of you movements. Lastly it is a must that you purchase the 50lbs band. Just for those who wish to push their own limits. I personally have 2 of them
summary: One band to rule them all

reviewText: The door anchor is very poorly designed and dangerous.The elastic system and grips are fine, but the door anchor is way too small and fragile.  In my first use, the door anchor failed, causing the anchor to slip out under full tension, hitting me in the face.  I was fortunate not to be seriously injured.  I threw out their door anchor and made a trip to the hardware store to make an anchor that was safe.  Now I can use the product without fear of a slap in the face.I do not recommend this product until they redesign the door anchor!
These are great, easy to work with and super durable. I don't know what else to say. Go for it!
These set resistance band are great, love the color resistance band.No heavy to lift, but still get a great workout.I Love this product, Thank you Black Mountain:O)

I'm very pleased with this set.Pros: Very sturdy tubes and grips. I also bought an extra set of grips so my wife and I can work out together. The door anchor has an especially large stopper that feels very secure.Con: A small one - the storage bag is quite flimsy and ripped the first time I opened it. But that's OK since I have many packing gear bags for travel.Overall: the set is a great system for workouts at home or on the road.

I bought these bands roughly around a year ago because I wanted to do some weight training without paying a lot for free weights. I use them for P90x workouts as well as just sets of exercises such as bicep curls and shoulder presses from time to time. I found a resistance band workout on Men's Health that works well with these bands (they do need more resistance band workouts on that website though). I'm 5'7" and they work perfectly for my height.Pros:1) Very portable and sturdy (took these with me while I lived in a tiny apartment abroad)2) One handle with multiple bands allows for more resistance than using multiple bands with different handles3) The included door anchor and ankle strap allow for a wide range of possible exercisesCons:1) Having to interchange the multiple bands takes more time between exercises than simply grabbing a new band (this is worth it, considering you can get so much more resistance out of these)2) These predictably wear down with time and usage (no band can be indestructible)All in all, I am completely satisfied with my purchase and recommend this product to anyone who is working out on the go, is on a budget, or does not have enough room at home for bulky equipment.
summary: Made and designed for its purpose

reviewText: Absolutely amazing product, comes with exercise tips, all in one workout, thank you for a great product, Mike Underwood ( my son )

I the bands feels durable and the bag is great to keep everything in one place to easy storage. I also like the ability to unlink the grips to different bands; it makes it easy to hook onto things or hook multiple bands in one link to increase the weight on it.
Very well made and the bag helps keep it alltogether. I ordered this for power 90 and its been working out very well.

Black Mountain offers a much better value than what was available at Dicks and Sports Authority for half the price. These are high quality bands that come with wall and ankle attachment. I use them for strength training, warm-ups, and rotator cuff conditioning.

I ordered this product about a week ago and received the band set, ankle strap, and travel bag very quickly.The bands are very nice quality, the stacking is easy and convenient (and would seem to put less stress on the bands, hopefully giving them a longer life). The handles are comfortable and easy to grip. The clips appear to be quite sturdy and are easy to quickly add or remove bands from. My wife uses them with the Wii EA Active and is much much happier with these than with the original band that came included with the game giving more variability to the workouts with more comfort.When I received the package, the door anchor was missing; however, a single email to BMP got the door anchor delivered to me promptly.I'm very pleased with the product and the service, and at such a great price it's hard to argue against this buy. I spent a number of months looking for a set when I finally decided on this one and I am very glad that I did.
summary: Good quality, good service, good all-around buy.

reviewText: thought i needed free weights but these work just as good! because ive never used bands before i wasnt sure what to expect i used them as soon as they arrived and i dont feel as sore as i would have if i had used the free weights to do the excersizes i did which is a plus. i also love that it comes with a guide and a little carrying case so you can take them anywhere you want to. great product

Used them everyday for several years with the door anchor and they haven't ripped so far, plus the lifetime warranty makes it a great deal. You can combine a few bands for more resistance, so that's cool. I'll probably buy another set for even more resistance.
summary: Been using them for several years

reviewText: I bought these originally to use in place of weights for various workout programs (such as p90x or p90x3), but I eventually just bought one of those adjustable dumbbell sets. Now I mostly use these as pullup assist bands. I like to attach at least two bands to the handles and throw them over my pullup bar so the handles are both hanging down and stick my foot into them. So far they haven't shown any signs of wearing despite what I'm sure is more weight then what they're meant for (I weigh 150lbs.)As pullup assist bands, they work really well. I can already do more pullups after using them for a few weeks. As far as their normal intended function, they work just as good. I kind of wish there was an easier/faster way to switch the handles from band to band, but that's not really a big deal.

I am very pleased with the quality and value of this product. Its the perfect set for getting a good workout. I purchased these to keep at my desk at work so I can get some sort of exercise while sitting at my desk all day. I have been finding myself sore the next day which is a good thing. I sometimes combine bands to add more weight/resistance with no problem.
The price is cheap.  The material is strong.  Easy to store and carry it around.  It works, my kids love it

These bands are sweet.  I have been using these bands for 1 month for P90X and they definitely get the job done for any type of home workout routine.  This set is particularly nice because the handles are interchangeable with the bands, so there are several different resistance combinations you can create to customize your workout.  Highly recommend.  Customer service is first class as well.  When you call they are very nice and helpful.

This product is pretty awesome - I use it almost everyday.  It's convenient and it has a storage bag so you don't have bands all of the room.  My favorite exercise is the overhead press - you have to use your stabilizing muscles to keep it steady.My only complaint is that the handles feel like they are made of cardboard.  I don't mind it too much, but it would have been nice to have a more sturdy handle.Overall, I think this is great for anyone trying to get in shape.
I haven't used it yet, but it came with all the parts. It looks easy enough to use. The little bag it comes in is convenient.
I've been using these resistance bands for P90X and are a good fit for all of their exercises. Might need to get bands with more resistance next time around.

These bands are great. Here are my impressions after 3 weeks of use:1) Good alternative to purchasing 50 lbs of weights or a weight set. I live in a small apartment in an urban setting without a car. So the idea of purchasing a dumbbell set and having to walk home with it was not good. I bought these bands as an alternative to weights.2) The bands do take some getting use to. I still prefer dumbbells, but for a small apartment, or for people that don't have a car, or people that do a lot of traveling or moving, these bands are perfect. Think of them as a dumbbells set on-the-go.3) Unlike dumbbells, the resistance changes the further you move the grips from the ground. For instance, in one of the P90X exercises involves lifting from ground, to hip, to shoulder, to above your head. With dumbbells, you can get a consistent 50lb weight throughout the exercise. With bands, it feels like 0lb from feet to hip, 20 lbs from hip to shoulder, and 50 lbs from shoulder to above your head.4) What you get in the box: 5 bands at different resistance levels, a pair of hand grips, a door attachment, and a bag. The whole thing is really good quality. It costs $25 for the whole set, and definitely worth it considering it would cost you $75+ if you were to purchase a dumbbell set. Plus you'd have to carry the dumbbells home and find room to store them.5) The band quality is pretty good. I've only used them for three weeks, but am not worried about anything breaking. The grips have pads on them to make them more comfortable to use. The bag is nice because it keeps everything together in storage when you're not using the bands.6) I would definitely buy a set of resistance bands. Don't bother buying individual bands because you'll need different resistances for different exercises. For instance, the 15lb band might feel like 15lbs if you're doing a bicep curl (hip to shoulder), but it'll feel like 25lbs when you're doing a military press (shoulder to above your head). I'm adjusting and using different bands all the time throughout my routine.7) The door attachment is good if you don't do pull ups much. If you do pull-ups more than 2-3 times a week (if you're doing P90X, you will), then I would just pay and get a real pull-up bar.All in all, these bands are good if you want to create a gym at your place and don't have the space for a dumbbell set, travel/move a lot, work out occasionally, or don't want to spend for a dumbbell set. The bands themselves are great. It takes some getting use to. I still prefer using a real dumbbell set but for my small apartment and set up, these bands are perfect.
summary: Great bands. Still prefer dumbbells. But bands are great alternative if you have small space and/or need something portable.

reviewText: I travel a lot for work and if your hotel doesn't have a fitness center or if you don't want to use their fitness center, this is a great way to work out on the road. The resistance bands are strong enough for men and they give you a booklet with some basic exercises, but their are books and DVDs you can get for more guidance. The bag it comes in also doesn't take up much space in your suitcase.

I have used many different resistance bands and these are the best I have ever used!  not only was the shipping immaculate and timely, but the bands show no signs of wear and I have a good feeling that they will last me much, much longer.
I've been using these for P90X, Insanity, TapOut XT and they have been working great.  I like that you can easily switch bands and use multiple bands at the same time.
summary: High Quality and lots of resistance options

reviewText: I have used these bands a couple of times since receiving them, and am happy so far.  The attachments are sturdy, and the bands appear to be good quality. The only thing I would suggest is getting more than one set of handles - if you want to switch bands in the middle of a workout, you have to stop, and change the handles over.  Other than that - they're great.

I use them daily and submit to high stretch. They can be combined to obtain different types of resistance.In about two months I went up 6 pounds of muscle. They are very good substitute for free weights when you are starting.

This product is very solid. Lots of different band strengths allow for variety in the workout. The only downside is a lack of instructions for basic exercises. The small info included is not very helpful. I had to find and buy a separate book for even basic exercises. I think if they included good info on the 10 most used exercises (biceps, triceps, shoulders, squats, etc.) that would raise the review to 5 stars.

Bands are great when working at home or hotel room.Gr8 for guys who travel due to work.No heavy weights you need to hide under bed anymore.For some reason door Anchor and starter guide was not there when i received the bag

A while ago I hurt my rotator cuff doing a bench press.  I have since learned that bench pressing can put stress on your rotator cuff so these need to be strengthened separately.  These bands are provide a wide variety of tensions.  The handles are very comfortable.My only gripe is you would think the box would have a set of set up instructions/tips as well as a basic set of routines.  No matter the latter can be found on Youtube.  Highly recommend this set of bands

I chose these sets for two reasons1. Price, low but not soo low I question durability2. USA Company, you cannot find a deal this good, this durable that also keeps a great american company alive.Pros:Great range of resistancePriceDurableWell constructedCons:One pair of handles: This is important if you plan on sharing this equipment with your loved one.No listing of resistance weight outside of paper that you lose easily: Should be printed on the carrying case but it is not.Overall: Very happy with my purchase, the only improvement I could ask is that they print the weight equivalent on the carrying bag for convenience. Although it is fairly easy to estimate by the diameter of the band.
summary: Great Deal for great resistance bands

reviewText: Excellent product for the price. Bought it to continue physiotherapy for a bad shoulder and realized that I could do almost everything at home, making it so convenient. Combined this with the recommended exercises from the National Sports institute and it has worked wonders for me. Lightweight, adjustable, can be configured any way you like. I even take it with me on travels, simply hook it up to the bathroom door in a hotel room and you've got your own physio station right there.I wish there was another door anchor thrown in but for the price you've got pretty much everything you need and the clips are easy to remove and attach.It is amazing how many different ways this can be used. Probably won't bulk up your muscles like weights would but for anybody looking for physical therapy or simply to keep in shape this is an incredibly useful product.

I've had the resistance bands for about a week. The blue one has broken already, but I'm confident I will get a replacement in short order. The main reason is that I have already emailed BMP about buying the heaviest band (orange) because I didn't see it listed anywhere as a separate item. The Customer service person (Justin) not only found one but is sending it to me free of charge. I emailed them on Thursday and expect to have it by Monday. I expect to get the replacement blue one a day or two after that.The other bands have been fine, and based on the other reviews I don't expect to have problems with these. In any case Customer Service has been awesome and a little unexpected based on other customer no-service experiences.

The bands work great and allow a lot of flexibility in your workout.  Require much less space than traditional workout equipment but provide the same benefits.  Good reference sheet that shows exercises, but I would have appreciated some information about a simple "starter" plan that I could have used to get started with the bands.

I've been using these bands for the past two weeks as a part of the P90X workout series.  So far, I couldn't be happier.  The product works great for P90X, and any other exercise I can think of.  My only complaint is that the bands do not have any markings to indicate which band is which strength.  Obviously the thicker bands provide more resistance, but I've seen other bands that have resistances marked on each band.  This is my only complaint so far.  In terms of value, I am very pleased with the price.  I have seen comparable sets priced much higher.  Very happy with this purchase!
In the product description it said a door anchor was supposed to be included, but there wasn't one in mine. Very disappointing since I want to use this for P90X.
My fiance started P90x but lacked some of the tools so I bought these for her. She is happy with these and switching resistance is easy, which is good. I recommend this product.

I received the product as advertised.  At first I was apprehensive about buying the product considering some of the poor reviews like the bands being poorly anchored to the straps.  I did check and I found them to be quite sturdy.  The manual leaves much to be desired though, so researching on YouTube on the exercises is a better option.
Great power bandsDiferent resistance and easy to add resistance to the same gripthey seem to be well madework perfectly

This a great product.  I travel a lot for work and the portability of this product is what appealed to me most as I could continue my workouts while on the road.  The materials are sturdy and compact.

I really like the bands overall. I had extremely low expectations of them initially but after a month I have definitely begun to notice significant effects from use. The bands would be much better if the handle had the attachment clip instead of the actual band. This way adding/removing bands to increase/decrease resistance would not be so tenuous.

I was very excited to receive my resistance band set in the mail. It is very easy to use and gives me flexibility in weights. I am using it along with the P90X program and found it easy to transition from weights to bands. It is also much easier to toss in my bag for traveling than hand weights. I like having one set of handles so they are not as bulky. I bought an extra set of handles so my daughter and I can work out together. You can't go wrong with this package.

Got these a few weeks ago and have really enjoyed them. Bands feel better than other ones I have seen from other companies. Also, the hooks to change bands are much easier/faster to use than some others I have seen. Door attachment is great, too! I called the office about a promotion they were running and the gentleman working the phone was kind and helpful (and kind of hilarious).

I mainly got these for my wife since she was having trouble with pullups, but I've used them too and they are pretty decent. Best part is the portability; we travel a lot and this mitigates my separation anxiety from my barbell a little bit but is definitely no substitute. They are fine for my wife.It could do with higher resistance bands.

I love this product. All of the reviews are accurate. I've been using these in my bedroom and they are a GREAT work out- I totally sweat and everything. I have bad knees and the bands do not bother them at all. What I really like is how versatile they are.. you can do so many different exercises, working all different areas of your body. A wonderful supplement for those days you can't make it to the gym. I can tell I'm going to tone up very quickly if I keep using these regularly, which I plan to ;)

Ive used only a few resistance bands on normally the ones that come with different games for XBOX and Wii.  Bought 1 or 2 others from Sporting goods stores.  WHen I got these I was amazed how much better they are.  Very solid construction and durability.  Ive only had for a day but did a full workout using all the bands and I dont see any probs in the near future.  Will  of course update if so but..Anyways 5 stars and no complaints.
easy to use, easy to change out parts.  colors make it easy to determine strength of band and easy to grab which one i want.

Bought these to use with the P90x videos. These are great for someone who's a traveller and need to keep up with the exercises in their hotel room. Comes with a nice carrying case which is a bonus.There's only one handle set. The bands are not as long to be able to do all exercises, especially standing up. I am considering buying another set.

Bought this set of resistance bands to use in re-hab from shoulder surgery.  Design, construction and materials are outstanding.  Thanks for a very useful and helpful product.  I am very pleased with my purchase.

This set of resistance bands is complete with everything you need for a light workout.  I bought them to help with my shoulder workout.  This is a really nice system.  You get handles, carabiners, ankle strap, and door anchor, along with 5 different resistant bands.  I purchased the wall-mount, 5 position exercise station to use with these, so I am ready for rehab after my upcoming shoulder surgery.

I use these bands a lot and some of them inevitably wore out.  So once I contact BMP, they sent a full set of replacement bands in just a couple of days.  Very helpful and fast!  I'm glad I ordered these bands, knowing that BMP backs the warranty and sends replacements promptly.  Highly recommended.

Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap, Exercise Chart, and Resistance Band Carrying CaseI looked at several types of resistance bands and this product offered the most variety of resistances, good quality hardware, accessories and a handy carrying bag. We use them pretty often (several times a week) and it's fast to switch bands and change resistances allowing multiple people to use one set. The only improvement I would suggest is maybe a little more padding on the handles, but they are still really comfortable to use. The clips feel really solid, much better than other kits that I have seen. Also, for the price you really get a good, versatile workout kit.
summary: Good product, especially for the price

reviewText: These are really good bands.  Everything came as described.  I've been using them since I got them.  They are really great at work where I can't have a full weight sets.

I purchased this product after spending time at a physical therapist for a back problem.  They wanted me to continue the excercises at home.These resistance band kit is excellent, especially for the price.  I shopped at several sporting good stores before visiting Amazon.This product is excellent quality and very simular to the equipment that I used at my doctor's office. It includes everything you need for a good workout.  I have been using it for several weeks and am very happy with it and would highly recomend it to others to purchase.
Love these bands. I do p90x at home and these are a must have. Recommend them to anyone who works out at home.
summary: Great for P90x or working out at home

reviewText: Money well spent.. best home equipment to u a full body work out....two down side to this; one should of came with two ankle strap and two needed two pairs of hand grips for fast change over from exersizes...most importantly this product gives an awesome total bodywork... thanks.keep up the good work...
summary: money well spent.....the best ever home equipment to give a full body work out..

reviewText: Good product, quick shipping. Bands are strong and feel very reliable after two uses.  Only comes with one ankle strap is way 4 stars.

Been using them for 2 weeks and very satisfied.  Like others say, the door belt thingy works wonders.  My only issue is that I wish they would sell a set with the purple and orange bands and remove the yellow and blue (for those who want/need heavier resistance).  I was able to by the other two, but they cost $20 more.  Still the quality of the set as a whole is excellent.

I like these bands a lot! They are great construction quality and they are quite inexpensive as compared to some competing products in the same quality category.I owned other products in the past and while I am not the Schwarzenegger type for sure, I have managed to break through cheap resistance bands causing pain and/or cuts in various areas of my body. Usually the metal rings would give in under tension and the whole band snapped unexpectedly. That's why at first I was a little hesitant to but this brand and was thinking to settle on more expensive product to assure build quality. I was even more worried after closer examination of the pictures, where I've noticed that what keeps the tube connected is nothing less than the infamous metal ring that likes to fail. However the reviews were good and people mentioned that the customer support is good, so I took the plunge.When I received the product, it wasn't packed in any extravagant box or anything like that, so I wasn't sure my OEM tubes would be good after all. But, after inspecting all elements I've realized that the quality seems good overall. The metal elements appeared to be sturdy and of good quality (I would say B+ quality); the tubes looked good and smooth without any defects, and they streached evenly too; and the handles were OK.So far everything seems to be working fine and I'm slowly regaining trust in resistance bands workouts again, just rarely worrying if something will snap again and hit me.... Maybe this time a piece of the doorframe.What I like about these particular bands is that you can stack them in various combinations to create different tension. So as long as your doorframe is sturdy and you look up few exercise ideas on YouTube and other places you can pretty much work out most of your muscle groups with various exercises. It's also less straining on your joints and creates more resistance throughout the whole movement unlike working out with dumbbells.If you never worked out with the bands, then you should know they are big advantage over dumbbells. I think they work better, are more fun to work out with, are easier to store and are defiantly lighter and more portable. Enjoy!
summary: Quality product for the price of cheap one

reviewText: I ordered these with the pull up bar and I have been extremely pleased.  They are easy to use and very easy simple to pack after use.  I have not had a problem using them with any door and they have not lost any of the resistance that I can tell.  I would suggest this product.
justamente lo que esperaba, el articulo llego tal cual lo describían en la publicación, lo recomiendo 100%, es una empresa responsable

I would recommend this to anyone who wants to try out resistance bands for the first time. Another more heavy duty band is provided for free all you have to do is call to receive the band. They are very friendly as well. Now about the handles it has plastic casing. They both and now it looks like the whole thing would rip apart. I had them replaced for free by the company but it happen  again after a few more workouts. So if your workouts aren't that strenuous they might be perfect.

The product is a high quality rubber made one. The clamps are good and based on the previous reviews, I bought this....I am satisfied with the purchase, and would definitely say these bands are the best ones out there.PS: I buy stuff which is either sold by Amazon.com or FBA, because I think Amazon would generally keep and sell better stuff than other sellers! And thats why Amazon.com is such a great success
very good quality, worked really well so far. very easy to use and does not take up storage space. comfortable handles.

I ordered these bands last week and have been working out with them everyday. They are very strong, durable and reliable. I love the fact that you can add on multiple bands to increase the resistance. This is my 3rd set of bands and by far Black Mountain Products are the best ones.

These bands are high quality for a low price.  I love the fact that you can create your own resistance by adding more bands.  If you call them on the phone, their customer service is excellent, and they will include an orange resistant band with 35-40 pounds of resistance for free!  Highly recommended.
Great product, good quality, easy to use. Its portable so its great if you travel a lot. You can do it anywhere.

My wife and I ordered a set each of these. I prefer free weights, but when I travel for work these do the trick. My wife uses them for all her work outs and loves them. They are well constructed and durable.

I've had these bands for a few weeks and I've really enjoyed using them. I'm rehabilitating my shoulder and they're working great. The carabineer clip is support handy for changing out the bands and it seems sturdy enough to last four a good while. I've been pleased with what I got for the price.

I bought these because I dont live near a gym.  They are great for helping me built some strength to go with my aerobic excercise that I get with my elliptical.  I love working on my biceps with these.

I purchased this product on the information from other customer reviews. i was on the fence whether to purchase bands or straps, and i went with bands. im new to using resistance bands for training, but i want to get in shape for snowboarding and need to balance my time working out with a newborn! this product allows me to perform a training exercise every day without having to leave home. very good product and seem to be very durable. i purchased them in early october and love them. very happy with my purchase.

I'm a VERY busy professional, and my fitness was suffering from lack of time to get to the gym. I bought these bands, and the quality of manufacture was better than I expected; they're really put together well. But, for their purpose, they work very well - they offer good, adjustable resistance and do give you a workout that you can feel when you're done - and saving a drive to the gym. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
summary: Effective tool to stay fit on a busy schedule

reviewText: My wife and her co-workers bought several of these band sets. She is using the lighter bands and loves using them. So out of curiosity, I tried them. At first, I wasn't too impressed with the lighter band.  But I added more bands to increase the resistance and notice it was rather challenging. Had a rainbow of bands for working out.Then I called Black Mountain about getting the <new> heavy duty orange band. It was quickly shipped and I started using it regularly for the past month. Now I use the resistance bands as a home supplement to my workouts.I am impressed by this product and their customer service (Jeff B). It was mentioned that Black Mountain is testing/pro-type a <newer> heavy duty purple band. Can't wait to try it out. Keep up the great work. Regards, RC3000.
summary: Black Mountain Resistance Bands - Great Product!

reviewText: After many years of prodding my husband to convert a spare bedroom into a home gym I finally got my wish.  I knew that my first purchase was going to be a resistance band station.  After a lot of research I decided on this B.M.P. set.  I am a firm believer in resistance bands for both training and rehab.  This set is great qualityand perfect for smaller rooms that can't accommodate large equipment.  For someone like me, who doesn't utilize the heavy weights, these bands provide the versatility of workouts equivalent to a gym full of equipment.
summary: Must have for any home gym

reviewText: It is a bit overpriced for what it is.  Does the advertised job.  Should have some sort of pouch for storage of the items included.
I do the P90X workouts and bought these to use for the training. They work well and provide enough options for different resistance training.
Great quality and service!What you see on the picture is what you get. I bought this product to go along with my PX90 workout.
These have a nice range of resistance and seem like they will last quite a while. Handy for exercising while distracted by something on tv.

Ive never actually seen any bands like these. They can be switched and combined to target different muscles and weights which justifies this purchase alone. If you need bands, these are your best choice.

I have free weights, but I don't want to lug them all over the house to work out.  And for the most part I don't use them where they are stored.  These really help out if I want to move to a different room or even when I'm on the go.
equipment is very useful and full filling. It works excellent and seems very durable and very effective in the desired outcome.

I got these for P90X and they appear to be very high quality. The bands easily snap together to combine resistance to increase difficulty. The handles also have foam over them for comfort.I would recommend these to friends.

Have never used resistance bands before so was not sure what to expect.  But having them for a while now I am very happy.  Carrying bag and simple chart makes it easy to not only use at home but super simple to take on the road when I travel.  Have had no problems with the set.  Glad I made this purchase.  I would recommend to anyone who is starting a resistant band training.
summary: Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set with Door Anchor, Ankle Strap and carrying bag.

reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these bands.  Most fitness equipment is made as cheaply as possible, not these.  They have sturdy web bands and solid metal clips.  The design is great because you can so easily combine bands for greater resistance - which I'm not even close to needing.  I called customer service and they couldn't have been more pleasant.
The band work exactly as expected. The only minor complaint I have is the handgrips on my set had some indents in the foam grip that I find distracting.
summary: Very good, especially for the price.

reviewText: We like using the band set.  It seems to be of very good quality and provides flexibility in our exercise routine.

I am so happy with my Black Mountain resistance bands that I have been using for a few months.  I get the benefits of a great workout, flexibility and the convenience of working out at home. They are very portable, safe to use due to the quality construction, and very effective with at least 36 different exercises that I benefit from.  I have the ability to strengthen different muscle groups and, when combined with other exercises, I get a full-body workout.  I am able to customize my workout to fit my needs where and when I desire.For the money, they are very cost effective.  Due to the five levels of resistance I can tailor my workout for my entire body.  When I travel, I am able to take them with me.  They come with a nicely-constructed bag in which to coral all of the bands, door anchor, ankle strap, handles, and chart all together; compared to taking those bulky dumb bells that take up valuable trunk space, plus they are awkward and are just a pain to haul around and I cannot do all the exercises with them as I can with the bands.  The Black Mountain bands are less intimidating than the gym and, therefore, I’m more dedicated to working out without a costly gym membership.In summarizing these band are great assets, very easy to use, provide me with an excellent workout, and the convenience is just terrific.  I would recommend them to anyone who enjoys working out.  They can make a great gift to a devoted enthusiast who enjoys working out and has to travel.

I purchased this set for use with P90 and P90X.  I have been working out hard with them for about five months now and so far, they have held up well.  Although the product is obviously durable, if you are purchasing these for P90 or P90X, you may want to consider longer, single bands because these can be a pain to change out quickly.

The variety in bands is great to have. Wish there was a wider range of tension though. The handles and connections are very solid. No issues of them coming apart or the bands breaking. For more tension you may want to put colors together.
These bands and their ends are first quality and bell built.  The Door anchor and ankle strap both work well and allow you to do multipe resistance exercises.

I was looking for resistance bands to help with strength and conditioning for taekwondo.  These really fit my needs quite well since the package comes with a door attachment and ankle strap that allows me to train without a partner.  The tubes clip to the handles/ankle strap/door attachment with spring loaded clips rather than just sliding into some fitted slot, and they seem very secure.  I wasn't too sure I would like the metal clips at first, but they are very secure.  I've not seen the door attachment on other products, but this accessory is pretty slick, at least for my purposes.  Rather than attach to the doorknob or under the door, the attachment consists of a nylon strap with a ball inserted into one end.  The strap is then inserted between the door jamb and the door and is secured in place when you close the door.
