What makes this work so well for me is that I can adjust the height of the anchor; low for kicking drills and higher for hand techniques.  The variety of tubing is also more useful than I thought.  I had anticipated needing only one heavy band for my training, but my 8 year old son and wife also like the bands and use lower resistance than I do.  All in all, a very neat little package for the price.

These are the second set of resistance bands I have purchased. I previously purchased the beachbody bands.These bands are a better price than the beachbody bands and come with more bands and accessories. The quality of the bands seems to be very good.I decided to buy these because I needed more resistance for exercises where attach the bands to the door. I really like the fact that you can attach multiple bands together. This gives you a lot of resistance and choice in the strength of the band you choose.One thing I dislike is the bands only come with 1 set of handles.Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.

Purchased the set of bands for use with p90 exercise program and am satisfied with purchase.  The bands seem well-made and the ability to attach multiple bands to a single handle is a definite plus. The cushion material on the handle seems thin and may break down over time and the nylon at the end of the bands rubs on my forearms in an uncomfortable fashion when doing overhead presses. Despite these two minor weaknesses, I readily recommend this product and company, and will be encouraging my coworker to purchase the set today. Great deal. The product shipped fast and customer service was responsive and helpful.

The bands are very well made I have been using them every other day for over a month and there is no sign of wear, they are long enough to give a full range of motion, the sheet of exercises were a little hard to understand do to the lay out on the page, but after a few minutes they became clear.Over all I'm very happy with the product.

These are some of the best resistance bands I've ever had. Very affordable and easy to use. Love the innovative design that allows you to transfer from one resistance to another. I can workout in any way I want to using these bands. Highly recommended!

I've never used resistance bands before but I wanted something that I could leave in my drawer at work and use during some down time. The heaviest band was still a bit light for me but the good thing is you can clip multiple bands onto the handle to make the resistance higher. All in all I am very satisfied with the Black Mountain resistance bands. Great customer service and I received my package 2-3 days after I ordered.

These bands are great.  The only room for improvement would be better carabiners/clips.  The carabiner like things have sticky springs and have sharp edges which could potentially cut through the bands.  It is nice to be able to attach the bands to other things and I have used a bit of rope to tie them off to poles and trees.  Use a bowline around the tree and a linemans loop to secure an additional carabiner to.  This set comes with an exercise guide.  These bands are good when paired with the BMP exercise ball because you can focus on muscle groups.  Isolate the hips for those ab exercises!  Have fun, mix it up!

The variety of band resistance on this set is nice.  It ranges from 2 to 30 lbs.Like the quick release on the bands.  Can stack bands to adjust resistance.I've noticed that Black Mountain sells 40 and 50 lbs resistance bands separately.  I wish they sold a set with these bands included.
Better than expected and I am happy with the quality of the rubber and metal. Still using it and still loving it.

Great bands for exercise!  Made well, and look like they will last for a while.  As with all bands, there is a limit on how much resistance they can give you, but unless you look like Arnold, it shouldn't be an issue.  Instructions are decent, but no exercise routines are given for the ankle strap, so I haven't used it yet.  Looks well made though.  Overall, very pleased with it!

I got this product to add to my home gym and now I am mostly using the bands more than anything else. The bands are well made, the handles are comfortable, and the price was great. What more do you need
full workout in a bag! This set is well made and very versatile. I could carry this on a trip to get a great workout. This is my first tension band set , but I am very satisfied.

I ordered these to do P90X without having a plethora of dumbbells strewn about my house. These take up no space, they are just as effective as weights, and they are much cheaper. The company is top notch as well... if you need help or have any questions about your product, they are happy to assist. I will certainly be recommending these to everyone I know. Thanks, BMP!

I love these bands. They have worked out very well for me. I have used a few times whole traveling and also when someone comes over to work out. We don't have to share my dumbbells. Great deal. Similar products with as many bands are double the price.The anchor doesn't seem to be the best, however, it works and I have not had any problems.

This is a relatively recent purchase for me but so far so good.  I purchased the bands because I am in the early phases of a new workout and wasn't quite ready to invest in an expensive dumbell set.  The product came just as described and incredibly fast.  The carrying case is great especially as I plan to bring these along when travelling. The small size of the carrying case makes it ideal for travelling.  Only downside with case is that sometimes the bands gets tangled inside but only takes a moment or two to sort out.  I did wind up calling customer service with a question about proper use of the door anchor and the person I spoke with was knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful.  Wish all companies were like that.  The door anchor works well between jam and door.  I'm a bit nervous about using it at the top of the door, not because of anything specific to this door anchor, just my overall sense of the security of these door anchors where there is a slightly larger gap. Certainly don't want it to come flying out.  The quality of the bands themselves seem good.  After reading a few of the other reviews, I am going to start making it a habit to give the bands a regular quick scan for fraying and wear and tear but so far no signs.One of the other reviewers mentioned that the set only comes with one set of handles.  I, too, found this to be a bit problematic, as I use  a variety of resistance for different exercises and would like to be able to transition from exercise to exercise fairly quickly.  I found the transitioning a bit unwieldy with the carabiner clips and nylon and it was slowing me down.  I have since ordered a second set of handles and that has been helpful.  If you are looking to transition quickly I do recommend this.  I haven't started combining bands yet but I imagine that when the bands are combined the transition would be even slower.Follow-upCustomer service has been great as I had to get some bands replaced.  In talking with the customer service rep, he was able to identify a particular exercise (lawnmowers) that can place unreasonable stress on the bands if you put the focal point (i.e., foot on band) too close to handle causing an extreme stretch on small portion of band.  That was likely the culprit in the problems I was having.  I really like the stacking function of the band (i.e., combining different bands for more tension) but do get somewhat frustrated as I am trying to maintain a pace to my workouts and it is not always a quick transition and in certain workouts I need to regularly go back and forth between tensions.  It is hard to maintain the pace in those instances.  Multiple handles are helpful - I only have two but maybe three would be better, although would face the same issue if using same bands in different combinations.  Still, stacking function is great and much cheaper than dumbbells.

I have used other resistance bands in the past and found that they are a great workout.  I lost my old bands so I bought these and they are great.  I really like how the bands have interchangeable parts.
….and said they're a great value. Son loves working out, this gives him a lot of choices. Good set of workout bands.
summary: Bought as gift; son loves them

reviewText: Easy to use (love the carabiners) and a very nice package. The quality was good and the price was good.

These bands are very well made.  They seem like they will last.I love how compact they are.  I don't have a lot of extra room to store exercise equipment, so the fact that they all fit in one small bag is a plus.Before I ordered, I was concerned about how much of a hassle it would be to only have one set of handles, but they are very is to clip and unclip to change or add bands.  I like the flexibility of using multiple bands together.The only surprising thing is that even the "heavy" bands seemed lighter than I would have thought.  I am not sure what the weight ratings mean, so that is probably just an issue of my not understanding.  It isn't really a problem for me, because I am sure that I won't need anything beyond what I can make by combining multiple bands.I great investment for someone hoping to progress with weight training - you won't have to keep buying a new band as you get stronger.
summary: Compact, Sturdy and Easy to Use

reviewText: I got this to help get me back in shape.  The bands are well constructed, and excellent way to get back into being used to exercise.  You can do a whole bunch of exercises, and they are super nice to travel with.  Totally worth the money.

I knew what I wanted in my bands (A personal  trainer told me what to bua).When they arrived, everything was perfect.....including the price.No stress. No hassles....and delivered in a timely manner.I couldn't be happier.

I've been using these bands for about a month now and they've found they're way into almost every aspect of my workout. The door anchor and ankle strap allow me to use them for a lot of different exercises and the number of different bands allow for progression.The quality is clearly top notch as well. The feel of every component, from the rubber of the band, to the nylon in the anchor and handles suggest that these bands will last a long time. This is a very good buy.

My girlfriend has been wanting this for the longest time, and I've always been hesitant in buying it just in case it wasn't exactly as described or didn't quite do the job.I purchased this recently and actually gave it to her as an early Christmas present, and she loves it. Although we were skeptical at first with the door anchor, it works perfectly, and the packaging it comes in (with the bag), is easy to take around just in case you wanted to bring it to the gym or on vacation/to the hotel with you. The package even comes with a small pamphlet of what positions you can do to work out.Overall, I hope she gets good use out of this product. It seems like it will be great -- I may have to steal it from her sometimes, haha. :)
summary: great gift for the holiday season

reviewText: When I am away for work, I cant stand to miss a work out.  This product is perfect for the quicky after a good run.  Material is durable and the enclosed bag keeps the bands from scattering all over my truck.  I would recommend this item.

While the bag is a flimsy, the cords, handles, leg strap, and door anchor are all top notch quality. I got these for when I travel and either the hotel doesn't have an adequate exercise room, or it's full when I have time. They work perfectly, giving you a complete work out of your primary and stabilizer muscles like dumbbells, but with the control and safety of a machine. You might have to get more cables are you build muscle, but I just ordered a second set and mix and match my cables to the right weight.

I am  currently stationed in Afghanistan and have little access to gym equipment because our base is closing soon.  These bands are a great alternative to the machines and give a great workout.  Combining the bands to give higher and higher resistance is very easy and provide great workouts.  Also, the pack bag is so small and easy to carry, I take the set with me whenever I travel to other bases so I keep my fitness workouts going.  I highly recommend this product for anyone on the go. Great product.
Exactly what i wanted and i will buy  Black Mountain products again.

I was an avid free weight's lifter for 25 years and recently set up my own home-gym with the Bowflex adjustable dumbbells.  I supplemented the dumbbells with the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set and I love it!!  This band set is an easy to use product with quick attach and release handles.  My son is currently working through the P90X program and loves the bands also.  I highly recommend this band set.

i've been using it for over a month now and I love it. I don't have a large home so I needed something that didn't take up a lot of room. It's a well made product that you'll see as soon as you open up the bag. This is one of the best workouts  !!
The product is very well made and works perfectly. The company is totally honest in its advertising. I would recommend it to anyone needing therapy

I like these bands. High quality, at a good price.Been going to the gym while my boys swim, and now that swim season is ending wanted to keep up with excercising. These fit the bill perfectly. Working out at home is easy and productive with the resistance these bands offer.More handles would be nice, but not totally necessary and can be purchased separately if i really want them.So far so good. no complaints.Good product, would buy them again and would recommend them.

I received this product in just two days and it replaces a set of individual non-stack-able bands I originally purchased for use with the P90X work-out routine.  The bands are good quality as are the accessories (hand grips, ankle fitting and door grommet).  Clearly the stack-able bands are a much more versatile choice and I wished I had gone that route in the beginning.  You can create varying resistances with a simple and effective quick clipping action that is far superior to changing plates on a dumbbell or holding multiple individual bands.  And for the "neat" obsessed hanging a set of stack-able bands on a single closet hook is much easier and more sightly that wrangling a set of 4 or five bands and handles.  Supplied for a fair price by a company that appears to care about its customers, I wouldn't hesitate to purchase more products from this company in the future.

Since I'm not a gym person and I knew I needed to switch up my workout routine a bit a friend told me about these. Great idea. You can anchor them or not use them for different parts of the body and they don't take up alot of room! I like the fact that they have graduated difficulty also.all in all a good buy!

I've been extremely satisfied with the resistance band set. It's been a great way for me to exercise at home or during travel, and without having to have an extensive set of free weights. If anything, it would nice to see an expanded database of exercises and show the area of the body that's activated, but i'm overall extremely satisfied with my purchase!

I was introduced to resistance bands when doing therapy for a shoulder injury.  I found bands to be very useful, not just for therapy but for regular exercise.  I have historically been mainly into dumbells and plates, but I find these are great for supplementing that kind of workout by isolating less commonly used muscles, getting in a quick workout, definition, etc.  For their intended purpose, these bands are very nice.I've been using this particular set for a few weeks and they are very high quality.  The bands themselves are strong and very well anchored.  The handles are comfortable and feel sturdy enough for very long-term use.  The addition of high-quality carabiners is a really nice touch, allowing you to use multiple bands at the same time.  I had thought the door anchor was an odd design, but it works very well.  It's also nice to have to bag for travel purposes.  It would be great to have the exercise guide in the form of some small, laminated cards on a ring, but that's not a necessity.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with this product.

These are very high quality resistance bands.  The rubber pieces are guaranteed forever.  I just wish there were more than one set of handles, although I'm pretty sure more can be ordered - probably on Amazon.
summary: Just Like the Ones at the Gym

reviewText: 5 star product and company.  Excellent value and features.  Crazy fast shipping - delivery beat my Amazon 2 day prime shipped item ordered on same day.  I researched a number of other resistance bands and this company had by far the best value along with excellent quality and design features.  In 2011 they have made some improvements to their existing product related to the grommets that hold these together that really improves the quality and are a lot better than others on the market.  I read reviews of other similar products from other companies where they quickly broke at this location so the automotive grade seat belt grommets are sure to keep these working for a long time to come.  They also include an ankle strap, door strap and holding case which are nice extras that others don't always have.  Their system to enable combining multiple bands together for increased resistance is very well designed and a nice feature that I didn't immediately notice when research them.  They hold up very well and work great with progressive smooth resistance.  I hadn't used resistance bands a lot in the past but I am now a big fan.  With the smooth progressive resistance and ease of use they are a great addition without taking up a lot of space.  Very versatile.  Looking forward to using these more in the future a great addition to my home gym.  I also had a chance to talk with one of the owners of the company and he was outstanding.  This company really appreciates their customers!

I was very impress with the quality and durability this workout kit. I just started to use the product so only time will tell how long it will last.I am able to complete all my exercises in the pool without very little obstacles.
I looked at several other products in the store and this one is by far, better quality and I like that you can combine bands for extra resistance.
Very well built resistance bands and the set comes with everything you need at a great price. I shopped around and could not find a better deal.  And, Black Mountian customer service is fantastic.
Excellent resistance set.This is a very good set with high quality connectors and nice range of resistance, easy to change.
summary: This is a very good set with high quality connectors and nice range of resistance, easy to change.

reviewText: i must say that the product was better than i expected. for me it was the perfect size and i like that you can keep adding more for more resistance.
fits my needs perfectly in size and quality. these surveys that require specific requirements are a pain in my butt.

these resistance bands are excellent. they are well made and do not feel as if they are goign to break. so far i have used them in every one of my workouts over the past few weeks and they are still in excellent condition. the connection points do not slip like some resistance bands, i am confident that they will not break while in use.
exellent product at a reasonable price, highly recommenced and great customer support. Also come with free extra orange band if requested

Handle bar is too short and has rough strap on its sides. It causes friction/chaffing with my index knuckle when doing bicep curls and other exrcises. They could either use longer handle bars or use smooth surface side straps. I am returning this product. I'm getting the SPRI braided resistance bands instead. It's what the trainers use in my gym.
summary: Handle bar is too short and has rough strap on its sides.

reviewText: These resistance bands are well designed for changing out, and adding bands between workouts. Perfect for P-90X workouts when changing resistance is a must. High quality product, and I plan on using these for a very long time!
summary: Everything you need in one package

reviewText: After breaking my Gold's Gym (GG) "black & red" braided resistance band, I decided to purchase a set of Black Mountain bands.  I chose Black Mountain Products because of the many positive reviews by other users.  I’m glad I did!  Shipment was prompt.  I received the bands last week, and have worked-out with them three times.  To date, my impressions of the product and company are as follows:(1) the bands are very well-made and should last a long time;(2) the door anchor, which is included in the kit, is sturdy.  I’m glad the anchor was included, because it enables me to greatly increase the number of exercises I can do with my resistance bands.  I really like using the anchor, and feel confident that the anchor is secure;(3) the instruction sheet included in the kit is helpful.  I especially appreciate that it lists the estimated weights for each resistance band and includes illustrations of six basic exercises one can do with the bands.  Tip for others:  Search YouTube to find other effective resistance band exercises.(4)  Black Mountain offers a full warranty on their resistance bands!  The warranty was a selling point for me.  I appreciated that a small family owned company stands by its products (I wish more companies today did the same); and(5)  Black Mountain customer service takes customer's questions seriously.  I wrote customer service via e-mail, and received a thorough reply within 24 hours (just like the company promises in it's informational materials).  I received a reply from a human being, not a robot.I haven’t used the ankle strap, which was included in the kit, so I can’t comment on it.  However, I'm looking forward to using all the Black Mountain bands and attachments.  I feel my new bands will help me take my work-outs to a higher level, which is why I chose Black Mountain.  I'm impressed so far.  In the future, when I need other exercise related equipment, I’ll definitely consider buying from Black Mountain Products!
summary: Love my Black Mountain resistance bands!

reviewText: This is a great product to keep fit with very convenient to use easy to store my shoulders can't take heavy weight anymore and this is a great way to get in a workout that is pretty awsome and the workout guide is very good also. .....glad I found this
This was one gift that will give back, great tension and feels strong, A good work out for all.I'm going to get me one next time.
if u want good and easy adjustable bands buy this set its totally work the money and the value is good

een using these for a few days and so far I'm very happy with them. Good all metal connectors, removable handles allow for lots of variability on tension. Ankle and door accessories nice. Storage bag is a nice extra. Overall, I dont think I could have bought a better kit for more money!

You cant beat the price on theses and they quality is outstanding and could easily go for much more. I workout about 4 times a week and have for the past few years and have always wanted to start using resistance bands and i could not have asked for a better product.
summary: Do everything they advertise and do it well.

reviewText: I was impressed with the quality and design of these bands. They come with two handles, which attach to the bands with carabiners. I especially like the design of the door attachment. Unlike the other band and attachment I have, this one just slips through the crack and is held in place by a clump of metal that's sewn into the nylon strap. When the door is open, you can poke the clump through the gap on the hinge side. When the door is closed, it's way too big to get pulled back through. I also like how you can hook two or more bands to the handles to create more resistance as you get stronger.
Great product for less cost than in stores.  I have been using with P90X for about two weeks and am satisfied.
My husband received this for Father's Day from our daughter. He loves it!Great product and fun for thewhole family!
I've used these bands a few times without issue or complaint.  I can't comment on longevity though as I haven't had them very long.
High quality bands with numerous attachments and exercise possibilities. Perfect for trainers on the go! I am actually going to get a second set to leave at school.

This is a great set of bands and the inexpensive price made it all the more attractive! I have used every color for various workouts (primarily for the P90X DVD set) and it works great. I enjoy using these much more than I have ever enjoyed classic dumbells. So far, there have been no defects or any breakage that I've noticed, which is a vast improvement over the last workout band I used. If there is anything I would suggest to improve the product, I would pay a few dollars more to include a second set of handles. Most often, a workout consists of using one or two colors, and it would be convenient to have two bands ready to use, instead of having to switch between every set. Otherwise, fantastic product! I do not regret this purchase!
summary: Great basic set for any workout!

reviewText: I've never really previously used resistance bands and so read quite a few of the reviews here before purchasing as well as wrote to Black Mountain Products for their thoughts on this set vs theBlack Mountain Products New Strong Man Set of 6 Resistance Bands. Many reviewers wrote that this stackable set is good for P90X but I have to agree with the few people who said it wasn't so great for this purpose.The quality of the bands seems very good and I'd give the product 5 stars for quality. The problem I have with these is that in order to make these stackable, the connection adds about 6" between your hand and the beginning of the band in comparison to other bands. Compare the pictures here to those for the strong man set.Some strength exercises in P90X have the weight moving very close to the ground. With the extra 6" added, you can't get nearly that same range of motion doing it as instructed and I can't change my body position enough in order to create that range of motion while doing the exercise properly. Maybe this is because I am short but you can watch the P90X video and see that even with the bands that they use, the person using the bands can't really do the exercises as properly as the people using the weights. If anyone wants to comment on this review to disagree, I'll read what you have to say and edit this entry to reflect if I am swayed.The stacking function, though, is helpful. I am 120 pounds and can only do maybe 7 pullups - hence the need to be doing P90X! But I have to stack the three strongest bands in this set to get what I feel is comparable resistance to a real pullup. On the strong man set, you'd have to hold two or three handles in each hand to get the same resistance so this set is easier to use.
summary: Not good for P90X in my opinion

reviewText: Extremely pleased with my purchase.  Everything was delivered quickly, feels high quality and heavy duty.  I also bought the pull up bar and I am really impressed with the sturdy construction.  Had a small issue, called in their customer support and Dan resolved it immediately.  Why buy from the big guy who only cares about moving units when you can buy from a small family run company who takes care of their customers?  Will be buying from BMP again.  Five Stars.
The product came just as advertised. Easy to set up and use and the bag is nice if you plan on working out when you travel.

Bought this prior to P90X routine.  Has been great.  Easy to use and durable.  Did find that I wanted more resistance than what was offered to also bought purple band.  Instead of mounting behind hinge of door also put eyebolt into ceiling stud and use this instead which I like a lot better.Seems like a great product and have been using for 2+ months at this point.
summary: Great product - easy to use, durable

reviewText: This resistance band set is fantastic.  They are extremely durable and are extremely versatile due to the carabiner style connections between the bands and the handles.  I use these for PT shoulder exercises due to a genetic issue which makes my connective tissue very elastic.  If you need a product for resistance band exercise, I highly recommend this product.
This is an awesome product and for a good price.  I use this on a daily basis for back strengthening.

I had never used resistance bands prior to this purchase, but this set has been easy to work with.  During my workout it is easy to change bands out from exercise to exercise.  I also like the carrying bag which really contains everything to a small volume in my closet.

I'm going to post this review in bullet-points to make it faster to read, with a note at the end:--I'm a male, age 23, no serious prior workout experience before starting P90X with these bands--Pros:- Very affordable, especially when comparing prices to weights.- Comes with a variety of weight resistances.- Clip on multiple bands to the handles to increase tension.- Amazing costumer service; band breaks? They'll send you a new one--FAST AND FREE.- They get the job done if you're using them right; great results.- Comfy handles.- Ankle and door straps are great bonuses, along with the carrying bag.- Easy to travel with; lightweight and they fit anywhere.Cons:- Band could get in the way on some exercises.- A little too much slack between the handles and clips on the bands; removes resistance.- Doing some exercises with the bands could be a bit of a hassle; needing to extend your legs or arms awkwardly.Other Notes: My experience using the bands has been limited to P90X, but considering P90X covers just about every kind of common exercise I think it's safe to say I've put these bands through a good test. I've had to get the red band replaced twice so far in 4 months. The first time I noticed a rip, and the second time the metal clasp broke off and hurt me quite bad during the 'box lifting' exercise. However, the second time was most likely my fault; I shouldn't have put THAT much tension on it. I sent them an E-mail both times and got a response the next day with my replacement bands arriving just 3 days later; the quick and kind costumer service made up for my minor injury (metal clasp shot my side and left a bruise). Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these bands to anyone looking for an affordable way to get in shape.
summary: Finished a round (3 months) of P90X with these bands...

reviewText: Well built bands.  The handles are very comfortable and easy to use.  I've always lifted free weights so using resistance bands was a bit of a change, but I can see the advantages especially mobility.  They are very light weight and can be used just about anywhere.
For the price I can not believe the number of muscle groups that can be worked with these bands and attachments. Package also includes instructional booklet and carrying case. Great for traveling.

Who needs weights when you have Black Mountain Products resistance bands? These bands are so easy to use & when you have them there is no need to go to the gym. There are so many different exercises that you can do with them to work all parts of your body. My fiance had me order them & at the time I didn't believe him but now that he has showed me how to use them it is just awesome! Who would have thought?! Thanks Black Mountain Products!!
strong and stacking them togther gives me a workout just as good as the gym would so now its time to get in shape

I bought these for my boyfriend who is a peronal trainer. He has been using them on his clients and has told me that they are great quality bands. He uses them for circuit training on his clients and says they work great. We love how they are so easy to switch out. These bands are stong and are a great price for all that you get. I am very happy with my purchase.A few weeks ago two of the metal clasps broke on the black and yellow band. I called b.m.p and they sent me a whole new set. I was very pleased with the customer service. I would definately recommend these bands.

My husband and I have both been using these cords for about a month. We both love them as they are so easy to use and you can bring them anywhere. He did a workout at a trailhead the other day. We have purchased a couple of videos to learn more exercises. There are very good but basic ones described in the enclosed booklet to get you started. They look well made, but I think you should inspect them periodically to make sure your shoes haven't damaged them during workouts. We camp a lot during the summer and these will definately go along on every trip. You can do stretching, strength training and use them in an aerobic routine and feel them working. Can't go wrong with these!
This set offers a wide assortment of resistance strengths. It is a very user friendly product. It is great for traveling.

Purchased the bands in order to correct certain body imbalances without having to join a gym. The bands work very well for chop and lift exercises prescribed to correct imbalances. Simple to add progressive resistance. Have only used them for a month but they seem very well-made and I expect them to last.
summary: Resistance Band Set Works as Advertised

reviewText: So far i cannot complain. I was using them for P90X and they seem to be fine. A little short maybe but workable.

I don't normally expect much when purchasing an item for under $25. But the BMP resistance band set is pretty awesome. It is durable, diverse and good quality. Why pay $12-15 for one exercise band when you can have this set. Allows you to use multiple bands at once for a SUPER heavy resistance band or pick the proper weight you want. Excellent for quick workout, getting a pump or doing P90x.

I have found this product to be very useful. It allows you to do a variety of exercise in the comfort of your own home, and it also provides you with the opportunity to do certain exercises that you wouldn't normally be able to do with dumbells. An big added plus for me was the fact that the whole package is very light weight, thus making this very easy to transport around - you are getting the workout of heavy weights without the extra pounds in you baggage when you are on the go.Another bonus with this item is dealing with customer service. I had a few questions that I was looking to clear up, and their answers were both prompt and thorough. They are a family owned company and seem to care about the customer, and I feel that piece of mind is worth a great deal when you purchase any item online.One bit of heads up, the exercise chart showing some exercises that you can perform with this equipment is very basic. So I did end up going online to search for more exercises to do with the bands. Don't expect much from that sheet, but via youtube and a Google search, you will be able to find an ample amount of exercises that you can perform with the set.Lastly, I found the ability to add and subtract resistance bands to a single handle to be a very convenient aspect to this particular exercise band set. You don't have to carry around a set of handles for each individual band allowing for less bulk in the bag (makes quite a difference if you're traveling).

These bands allow me to successfully perform the workout I need while at home. I work long hours at home on a computer (medical transcription), which is a sedentary job. For too many years, I have been unsuccessful at consistently making time to work out at a gym. My weight has increased, and my energy and conditioning have decreased. These bands allow me to fit exercise into random parts of my day. After three weeks of daily use, I find that going up stairs is easier, my restless legs syndrome is resolved, and my energy level is improving. These bands are exquisitely user friendly and have been constructed/assembled with sound logic and durability. I also purchased an instruction DVD titled "In Home Fitness with Resistance Bands," which I find to be very beneficial and a good supplement to the exercise booklet provided with the bands. The black bag allows convenient storage for the bands. I recommend this product to anyone who wants progressive resistance exercise at home.
summary: Perfect exercise equipment for my needs

reviewText: I don't have any other bands to compare these to, but these seem solid.I like the handles a lot and they have a decent carry case. The red band (heaviest) certainly doesn't seem like 25 pounds, but I use them on and off for p90x, but I don't do them often.They seem like they will last and I think they had a 3 month warranty, so if you're getting them for p90x (and more dedicated than myself) you could get them replaced if you need to.The door jam loop for "pullups" is great.If you need bands, these seem like a great deal: Durable and affordable.

I bought these bands to use at home for P90X.  Been using them for 3 months now and have no complaints.  They are well made and show no signs of wearing out, unlike their user.  Called their customer support line about a special promotion and was treated very kindly; would definitely recommend these to a friend looking for a cheap, simple way to do resistance training at home.

These are nice as they are mobile and can be used anywhere you need to workout.  I wasn't sure how much muscle strength I was getting from using these until my husband and I had to remove some large shrubs.  After he pulled the stumps out with the pick-up, we both loaded those huge stumps into the truck to haul them away.  Both my husband and I were surprised at how much I could lift and load into the truck!  Those bands really do work!The bands come with two handles to clip the bands to, and ankle strap, and a door jam strap that has some kind of hard ball in it to hold it in place when the door is closed over it.  Then you can put the band through the strap and pull.  There is a little booklet with exercise examples.  It all comes in a very easy to carry bag so you can take it with you.

I got these for my boyfriend for Christmas and he LOVES them! He already has more definition in his arms and is dedicated to working out everyday :) They are fantastic and easy to use and the variety in resistance is fantastic.

I don't like going to the gym, have a small apartment but wanted to do some resistance work.  These are great.  They let me do a lot of exercises, are very small to store, and were easy to figure out how to use.
summary: Just what I was looking for

reviewText: I purchased these after a recommendation from a friend.Overall, I love the bands and they've been going strong for about 3 months now with regular use.  I haven't tried stacking the bands yet, but I find them easy to use and interchange.  The over the door strap is also very sturdy and has worked well for me.I agree with some of the other reviewers that it would be nice to have an extra set of handles.  I am also 5'11" and it does seem like I have to stretch these a bit far for full resistance.All in all, I'm happy with my purchase!
Very useful and quality product. They should provide one or two spare handles which will be quite useful for the price paid

I love this set of exercise bands. I purchased them for my son who is backpacking through Southeast Asia and staying in hostels. Any room with a door will allow him to do 90% of the exercises he normally does. All these bands roll up into a nice bag for travel and the whole kit is fairly lightweight. The idea of shared/interchangeable handles is ideal for his situation and I am hoping they stand up to his expectations.I have tried them out this week and think he will be quite pleased with them. The reviews are promising and I am hoping that they stand up better than department store bands I have purchased in the past. But am pleased to see that the company that makes these bands appears pretty solid. In the package I received, there was a coupon for a free extra orange band which was even a heavier gauge than the black band. I'm looking forward to receiving it, and I think the company offering it at no charge is a great way to create customer satisfaction,  a very nice touch.
summary: very pleased with both the set and the portability of it

reviewText: I like it because I can take it anywhere I want. Mix and improve the strength according to my need. Love it. Very good for exercise if you don't want to go outside/Gym .
I have used it once so far but am pleased with what I received.The package came quickly, The merchandise was well packaged. Everything looks to be high quality. CAnt wait to use it with p90x3.
Good Value For The Money and Perfect for the Novice or Intermediateworkout, and it's compact for the business traveler.
I have some trouble lining up the bands with the posted resistance. It doesn't exactly correspond with the written resistance levels. But the product is  very useful in my exercise routine

I had never really used lifting bands before buying them, but i seen them in a few of my workout videos and decided to make the purchase. These Black mountain lifting bands have 5 colors starting pretty easily, that get more stiff as you move up. When you get to #5, you can add the #1 to it to create #6. Some huge beast might be able to use 3 or 4 bands together to create a massive rubber resistant band but it would be very awkward to use.In all, i would totally buy these again if my get lost and i'll recommend them to friends if they ask where i got mine.
summary: Easy to Extra Hard  - Lifting Bands for Everyone

reviewText: Great deal! Didn't break, good price and worked very well! I am still using them with no problems! GOOD CHOICE!

This is something thats good for a quick last minute workout. Cant replace a gym, but better than just sitting on the couch. Adds more variety than just a few push ups and sit ups can do. For the price, very worthwhile.

These bands are great quality and a good price.  I use two and three of them together depending on the exercise and they work well in conjunction.  Handles are comfortable and the set is compact enough that it doesn't take up a lot of room.

I've had issues every time I've tried to order pull-up bars for apartments I've lived in. Door frames are too wide or narrow, despite advertising claims, inevitably creating the biggest disappointments for me.I'm really glad I got these bands. I'm easing my way into P90X, and just about everything on the pull-up bar or free weights can be replaced with the bands. The door hinge is super easy and secure, and so is the foot loop.Really, really happy with this purchase so far.

BACKGROUNDCurrently, I am in the process of starting my second round withP90X: Tony Horton's 90-Day Extreme Home Fitness Workout DVD Program. The exercises call for some equipment to be utilized. If you lack that equipment, the program shows those preforming the exercises utilizing alternative methods to complete the routine. I thought it would be nice to mix up the different methods for something different.REVIEW:The purchased showed up with everything included in the photo. There was the carrying case, an instruction manual that was brief but explained what the combination of colors would add up to, an ankle/soft grip strap, and a door anchor.The resistant bands are of a higher quality. I tried out the resistant bands in the store and felt that the material making up the bands including the clips were very cheap. These feel durable and have held up quite well through vigorous usage during this second round of P90X.I know it states one size fits all. Myself, I am 5'8, these bands are perfect. If you are shorter and have slack, you are able to adjust. If you are a taller male, you might have some issues preforming the exercises to their full extend since they will not stretch the distance you need them to.PRO:++ Durable material. Built to last++ Includes everything needed in one set up plus extras to complete exercise routines++ Great for any exercise routine as well as physical therapy if lifting weights is too great but need natural resistanceCON:++ Only one set of handles included. Annoying to continuously switch bands during work out routine++ Need labels on bands so I can remember the weight strengthCONCLUSION:These are a great addition to anyones work out gear collection. They are durable and able to fill a variety of roles from additional exercise routines to aiding with physical therapy. A recommended purchase.
summary: Great for any exercise routine including P90X as well as physical therapy

reviewText: I lift real weights (DBs, BB, and a smith machine in my garage) but I wanted these just to be able to do cable exercises. This set is excellent if it lasts without breaking. I am about 165 and bench a little south of 225 (2 plates on each side of the bar). So while I'm not super strong, I do workout and with stacking the BLACK + GREEN + RED bands, bicep curling that stack at 20 reps (I was doing a high-rep workout) was great. The point is, you can actually get real, tough workouts with these as long as you anchor it well, maintain decent form, and stack the bands appropriately. You can see several types of exercises you can do with them at [...] They also come with this set, printed in a pamphlet.

started using these bands several weeks ago and getting use to not using free weights.  the versatility of using bands vs free weights gives the me the opportunity to utilize them anywhere,unlike clunky weights.  Still getting use to the different feel that you receive from the bands. As time goes on I will update my experience for others to consider.
I bought this set of resistance bands, so that I could take them on business trips.  The product is high quality, and the customer service is top notch.  Highly recommended!
Not exactly ripped, but prettttay toned.  It's been a couple of years since I bought this, but they still work great and use them almost weekly when I travel to hotels with my work.
this came in fast and is exactly what they said it would be. Tried it as soon as I got it and they are every bit as good as weights

I've been using these as a supplement to the days I can't make it to the Gym.  So far they've worked real well. I'm relatively new to resistance band training and am still in the process of trying to figure out the right combination of bands to use for each exercise. The clips are great and make it real easy to add and remove bands for each exercise.  They seem to be well constructed and appear they will hold up real well, only time will tell.  I'm excited to take these with me when I travel.
I bought these to use with a P90X program.  They are well built and easy to use.  I recommend them without reservation.
Very good product - you can add resistance to really get a feel. I was frustrated by other bands as I usually work out with weights and did not feel anything with those bands. But this one delivers!

ive been using these for about the past 30 days for p90x.  they are great.  fast delivery.  they get the job done no problem.  hint - put 2 bands on the handles to add more resistance instead of trying to stand on them in the middle. sometimes you have to, but it can be a pain to get them to loop in the middle and not come out from under your feet and all that. all in all they are great!

I bought two sets of these. One for the office and one for the house. I love how versatile these bands are. I can use them for myself and my children can also use then. They are made of good material and I think they will last a long time. Defiantly recommend.
This product is exactly what it claims to be.  Switching bands is easy and you can add multiple bands at a time for more resistance.

I love this product!  The ability to mix and match different tensions to create the desired pressure is awesome... I use this a lot at home to increase the weight on me for using pushups and other sorts of exercises at home.  They are very durable and come with a lot of attachments which makes this so useful.
This band set is durable, comfortable and has great resistance levels! Fun to use and a great little carrying case! Keep up the good work!

GREAT BANDS!!!!  If you are looking to really build you body up with an inexpensive, well made, extremely effective product, these bands are awesome. So, A few years ago I basically completed the P90 transformation program that was the predecessor to the P90X program. Instead of using weights I used bands and became an instant believer in their ability to build muscle. Now, fast forward a few years, I recently was given the opportunity to do the P90X program with a few friends as a competition with accountability so we will all finish the program at the same time. I got them all convinced that bands are the best way to go and we recently received our B.M.P. product bands in the mail. Below is what I think about the bands.1. First, Shipping was great. The bands came well packaged, on time, and were stamped with "Priority" and "Take special Care" stickers.2. The bands themselves are intense. As I mentioned, I have used bands in the past. The biggest problem is getting enough tension on the bands for various exercises. However, this set of bands basically trumps those worries completely. I am an in shape guy, and if I use all five bands at once, I can barely get them all up. The set of 5 gives PLENTY of resistance for any type of workout your going to be using.3. I did a lot of research before getting these and I really think you will be stoked about buying them. The materials are really heavy duty. I put these bands through some serious stretch and they are working tremendously.Hope this review helps, Like I said, I convinced the guys Im working with to get bands as well and they are just as stoked. Its funny to see them switch from weights to bands because they used to make fun of me for using the bands.... until they tried them. Now they realize how intense they are. Good Luck WHOOOP WHOOOOP

As I'm sure you can see from so many great reviews, you can't really go wrong here. My first impression is about the quality. I did not expect this good quality for the price, not to mention the extras/appurtenances that came with it. The ends of the bands are secured well. The metal connectors and hands feel solid. Door jam works perfectly. The addition of the ankle strap and carrying pouch make it an even better value. There's even a short start up guide to give you some ideas on how to use the bands for a few basic exercises (but really, the ways to use these for exercise is limited by only your imagination).

I have tried other bands and these are built solid and are holding up. Last pair from different vendor eventually just broke. The connection points are solid and I really like the product. I work out 4 times a week and would highly recommend this product.

So many possibilities! Have only been using this product for a week, but they are amazing! Love that they provide much more movement than free weights and are stored in a small bag! Endless combinations with all the different resistance bands! Highly recommend!

After looking extensively for quality resistance bands that would not break the bank, based on the wealth of great reviews these got, I went with them. Everyone was also raving about the excellent customer service, which I must say I'm impressed with as well! Extremely high quality as well as versatile product! Will also be excellent for traveling, small, lightweight, having only one set of handles. Quality carrying bag as well! Doing shoulder rehab, these are perfect! Have already made good progress before the purchase so didn't think I would even use the lightest one. However was pleasantly surprised to find, even that one is very substantial! I use it for internal/external rotation, rotator cuff exercises that demand light weight because they are easy to tear. Very satisfied considering the price is so affordable! Thank you very much!
This item is real excellent for men who every time has trip ore has rotation work schedule.With that you are independent from gym location on the field (desert in my case).
summary: Excellent product for doing exercises anywhere

reviewText: I ordered these resistance bands about 2 months ago, and so far they have been excellent. The bands are very strong and can be combined with multiple bands to create alot of resistance. I can already feel my shoulders strengthening and my biceps growing.

We looked at many resistance bands and band sets in our local stores, but this set is much sturdier and complete than anything we found locally.  My husband has developed a cubical style workout to do in his truck cab while on the road (to rehab. an arm injury).  These bands are perfect for that workout.We are impressed with the product and will gladly buy from this seller again.  Shipping was very fast and the information was accurate.  Thanks!
summary: Much better than those sold in the stores...

reviewText: I purchased these about 9 months ago and recently had a problem with one of the bands.  I sent an email to Black Mountain Customer service and without any hassle or questioning, They immediately sent me a replacement.  I'm very impressed with such great customer service and would buy products from them again.
summary: Black Mountain Stands behind their products

reviewText: This was my first time using resistance band training. These bands are good quality. If you are going to switch between exercises that need different levels of resistance, I would suggest purcahsing an extra set of handlesBlack Mountain Resistance band HandlesThey allow you to use to sets of bands and switch between them faster.I do with the heavist of the bands (red / orange) could be longer. I do some exercises that require standing in the middle of the band and there is just not enough length (or strength from me) to extend as far as I should.Overall, great.

Purchased these bands when I also purchased the P90X workout program.  They seem to work well and provide the flexibility to encorporate these into the workout.  The price seems to be acceptable for the product.I would purchase these again if needed.
summary: Well worth the price & work well with P90X

reviewText: My son asked me to buy this for him--he used it as a sort of home gym while he lived with us. He brought it with him to Cambodia so he must like it.

These bands are very high quality, I could tell the moment I took them out of the package. I have been using them for several weeks now and have noticed no deterioration in the material, nor does it seem like there will be. I got a great deal on them through amazon, and Black Mountain Products (BMP) will send you a free band just for reviewing their products. These are great for those of us who don't have the time or the money to go to the gym, and you can still get a full body workout with these easy to use bands. All the bands fit inside the rather small bag that BMP provides, so they store very easily. Overall great product! Thank You BMP!
Great product been using for awhile n it seems to still be holding up well....jst wished the package had 2 ankle straps instead of jst 1....
This set of resistance bands is great for everyday use (home, office and travel) and the price is right (compared to the cost of multiple resistance bands and/or weights).

These bands are what keep me from going crazy. I actually have two sets, so that I can show other people how to use them while I do my workout. The handles feel cheaper than other bands that I've used, but they hold up well enough. The ankle piece, I'm on the fence about. I compare it to the IronMan ankle piece that is a lot beefier, and I trust it. So far it's held, but it feels flimsy.I would prefer the rings on the foam handles were a little bit larger, in case i want to double up more bands and have them all on a single handle (So you could be hooking up more than 5 rings at the same time.Overall they are getting a lot of use, and eventually they will wear down, but the price is good enough that it's worth going through a new set, even every few months. Customer service is awesome, you call these guys and thy pick up the phone and actually talk to you. That's really a plus
summary: Doesn't replace a gym, but I don't have a gym

reviewText: I just got these bands for P90X about 2 weesk ago and could not be more pleased. You get five adjustable bands, a door anchor and a ankle strap for under $30 compared to 3 bands with no extras for $40 from beachbody, you cant go wrong. The best thing about these band is that you can adjust the resistance by quickly adding or removing a band. The quality and durability seem great so far, they are being tested. The ankle strap and the door anchor are great. I havent had any issues with the anchor as some have, just make sure your door is shut tight. I look forward to these bands lasting a long time and more P90X workouts after I am done with the first 90 days.

I started the p90x workout recently and bought these in lieu of free weights.  I really like them, but the attachment buckle can get annoying when you're trying to do any modified workouts such as anything that requires you to pull your arms close to your body.  The metal buckles chafe a little.  There aren't any sharp parts and it doesn't injure me, but it's the only thing I would change about them.  Unfortunately, I suspect that is also what makes them so durable.  I would buy these again expecially because they seem to be really good quality for the price.
summary: Bought these in lieu of free weights

reviewText: Highest quality bands that I have used.  The bands are made of quality, long-lasting materials.  I like being able to hook more than one band to the handles.  I do recommend purchasing another set of handles and a door anchor.  That way during your work out you don't have to move the door anchor, higher or lower, depending on the exercise.  Same for the handles.  Some routines have you using the door anchor and then switch to the band alone then back to the door anchor.  Very affordable price for the quality of the product.
These were a great buy for me! I was spending $50 dollars a month to use them at the gym and now I have them at home. Great quality!

I've actually owned these for a year.  Work muscles at home with door jam attachment and pack for wintering away from home.  I've worked with a trainer ~ these bands fill in just fine when needed.  I thought they might stretch out of shape but that hasn't happened.  I'm focused on upper body strength to ward off further loss of bone density.  Pro-active for strength seems like the a good plan.  I've been happy with Black Mountain Resistance bands.  I use these bands twice a week.

Great quality and good selection of different resistances.  Easy to use. Comes with a little book of excersises that's really basic. I also ordered a video an combine the two for more variety and more leg work. Priced in store for $15 for one so you can't beat the price!

I have found these bands the best made and easy to use. They have the right resistance and the handles are very secure and make me feel secure using them.  The company is owned by 2 brothers and a dog.  Nice comb.
the only thing with this is I would like to have some of the banda a bit shorter. otherwise I enjoy them all.

I'm really happy with the quality of these bands. The company included a customer satisfaction pledge, and I had some questions about the product, so I called them. I was surprised to find that my call was answered directly by a person, not a recorded menu. Danny answered my questions about the product, and further described how they had tested and rated their products, clearly proud of the quality of the company's offerings. It was very nice to deal with a small but passionate company and talk with someone who had been involved in developing the product who also took time to deal with customers. Excellent service that I would not have expected.
summary: Great product with great customer support

reviewText: Perfect shipped fast and works well

I always wanted to try a set of bands, and finally got the chance when I found this set. These are great, and even for someone a little technically challenged, they're easy to set up. There's a strap with a larger end, and you put the larger end in between a door to anchor you. Then you just put whichever strength band you'd like through the strap, and you're set to start training! A nifty little exercise booklet comes with the set, and it's an excellent workout. I can't wait to integrate it into my regular workout, as you can use these to train so many different body areas that you can kiss using machines at a the gym goodbye. Not to mention that since the bands allow you to weight train while moving more naturally (unlike machines, which have you doing the same motion again and again), these are also safer to use than the machines. I also get to avoid the unpleasant testosterone-poisoned jerks at my gym and weight train at home, which is always a plus. :)A+, this will be fun!
summary: Excellent way to weight train at home!

reviewText: I will definitely  continue to purchase products from Black Mountain.  They have a great warranty on their bands and they are easy to use.
Excellent substitute for free weights. Built better than the cheap ones you get with T25. Would recommend instead of free weights as well if you are on a budget.
Fast shipping, exactly as described and great price. I've been using the stretch bands, these are so much better, I feellike I get a better workout. Thank you!!
summary: Exactly what I was looking for!

reviewText: I have had a few different resistance bands but these are the best by far.  The caribeaner clips make it easy to switch between bands and keep the bands portable by not having to take a set of handles for each band.  I use them at home for P90X, and take them to the gym for Tabata workouts.  The 25 pound band feels like 25 pounds which is hard to find.  (The other weights all feel accurate too.)Good quality product.
These work very well.  Haven't used them long enough to know if they will hold up over time. Using them with p90x.

I bought these from Amazon a few weeks back to work out on my P90X routine in my basement. The product came a little late (due to weather delay). The packaging was easy to open. The items were as described and really easy to set up. I am using the door clamp to use these in lieu of pull up bar. You will need to add couple of bands to get the right resistance for work outs. First thing I did is marked each band with their respective resistance so I don't have to look it up while I worked out.I would highly recommend everyone looking for resistance bands to try the Black Mountain Products. They stand behind their products.
for the people who wants to do workout at home, i think this one will help a lot.for myself, i think these can help me a lot for my home workout plan.
i just got these bands and fast shipping. they are perfect quality for p90x or any other work out programs.
I like this band, very compact, easy to store and Band exercises I find more beneficial as tension in the muscles is maintained through flexion and extension. I would recommend this band

I’ve only used these twice since getting them and for such a basic set they don’t seem that bad. I’ve done one strenuous workout on them and one easier workout and they seemed to perform well. I’m just worried that I’ll need to get a more expensive set as time dwindles on. Cool to know that there’s a good warranty on them, and I don’t feel like I wasted any money.
summary: My new weight loss tool for home use! BAM

reviewText: Excellent product.  Great quality.  Reasonable pricing.  Impressed with the packaging that keeps all the bands in one bag instead of having them scattered.  Recommended to a neighbor who is going to order a set.

Comes in unique travel pouch, all the bands and different weight values are in easy to understand instructions. Great workout, in a little bit of space, but a whole lot of varied exercises can be done with these bands. First time for me using bands, why go back to bulky weights.

I use these bands during my exercise routine. I have used them about four times a week for  several months, and they are still in great shape. They are  especially  convenient when traveling, as the bands are extremely light,  and can be packed into a very small space.  (You couldn't do that with, say, dumbbells). The bands come  in different strengths [color coded], so you can start light, and add resistance as you grow stronger. All in all, I would highly recommend this product.

Received a pack of B.M.P.'s new 2011 resistance bands recently featuring extra thick automotive grade seat belt grommets, stronger higher thread count nylon, and longer lasting rubber tubing.  I cancelled my gym membership so have been relying on these primarily to work out and home and they do not disappoint in the slightest.  The ankle strap is comfortable and secure, the door hinge works as advertised, and I especially like that the handle grips are padded and rotate freely.  The bands are stackable so you can use them in series to increase weight accordingly, and the color coding is easy to remember.  Highly recommend.

This is a great product. I'm a mechanical engineer and I'm impressed with the quality of the connectors and the stitching. This really is a quality product - I'm happy I didn't skimp- I know this will last !

I have owned this band set for several years and the bands continue to be my favorite workout tool.  Easy to use, easy to pack for travel, high quality and fun to use.  I currently work with a personal trainer and she likes them so much she purchased a set and is now introducing some of her other clients to their value.  With the bands, my trainer has created multiply workouts for me.  The workouts are low impact, target all body parts, and make working out easy.  I love them so much I recently purchased a set for my daughter.  I recommend the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set to anyone who wants a great workout experience.  Thanks Black Mountain.  Sherril
The bands are great and would be 4 stars but the carrying bag strap was broken and unravelled when I got it out of the box.
Asked a master fitness trainer to help me with using this band set to work out.  After an hour working with these bands, he asked me to get him a set!  Quality product at a reasonable price.
Been using these for a while now and have put them through tests. Very solid construction and come in very handy in my home gym. Definitely can be used for a multitude of exercises!
summary: Very versatile and better than what you'd find in stores!

reviewText: The bands and handles have a solid build.  It is very easy to attach/detach the bands to change the level of resistance.  Also, the bands came with a handy bag for storage.  I would recommend this product to a friend.
Quick delivery. Bands are excellent quality and provide great variety of resistance. Easy to change handle attachment. Door anchor is a must for P90X. Great value!!!

This product is ok for Bandas good for the price. Easy to useThere some exercise that will be best to use a weight on p90x do I can't really use them for all exercise. I still don't regret buying these bands. Good quality. And they will make you break a sweat!
I am very happy with these. It was a great deal and I received them in very good time.They work really well. I really liked the carry bag that came with it!

A very handle and versatile system.  I don't use it for the heavy stuff, but have used it a lot for lighter warm up and shoulder therapy type activity.  It seems well made and easy to use (except the cheap bag it comes in - which has already ripped).
summary: Good quality band set (in a cheap bag)

reviewText: Great set of bands for daily usage at a reasonable price. Various levels of strength bands included to target different muscles.Received with in a reasonable amount of time.
Great workout.  I use these instead of the pull up bar.  I get great results. Would definitely recommend it for anyone who doesn't have a pull up bar or weights.
I have arthritis in my hands and these high-quality resistance bands allow me to do a lot of exercises I can't do with free weights.  Highly recommended.

bought this set to use in between therapy sessions following shoulder surgery. works great as advertised and will be most helpful in obtaining a speedy recovery. plan to use this product for continued strengthening after therapy sessions are complete.

This product made by Black mountain is a solid product. It is especially good for your home or office use. Reason I say that is because, if you do not have the time to go to a gym, these bands are a good substitute. If you have a door, you can do a lot of the exercises. Let me re-phrase that. If you have a door that opens up to a larger space or hallway, you can do a lot of the exercises. If you live in an apartment you will sometimes not have enough room to stretch out as walls tend to get in the way. What I like about this set is that you can tack on as many or as little or mix and match the bands according to your level of expertise and strength. You can actually do more that what it says you can do in the workout booklet provided. If you have gone to the gym before and have worked out with free weights, you will be able to duplicate some of those exercises as well. Just use a little imagination and what you have at home, like a chair, a wall, etc. The padding on the grip is adequate. I can see it just not lasting too long if you use it everyday. And for the price, you can't beat it. I'm very happy with my set.
summary: Good for home or office use

reviewText: I bought this set of resistance bands two months ago and have enjoyed using them.  One of the clips on the bands broke, and a quick e-mail to Black Mountain Products resulted in a very quick reply and new band being shipped to me the next morning.  I am very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend these.
summary: Easy to use, great customer service

reviewText: Briefly, I consider myself a fairly athletic individual. I played multiple sports all through high school, and while I don't play sports here in college I have always kept myself pretty fit by training for and running marathons, lifting weights a couple times a week, and participating in intramurals.However, despite my history I have never really used resistance bands before but after talking with some of my friends, I decided to buy a set of resistance bands for use while traveling and on the days that I didn't feel like going to the gym. I bought this Black Mountain Resistance Band Set last week and after a week of use I have decided that resistance bands are my new favorite thing. You can do so many exercises and still get a great workout without all the hassel of going to a gym / buying weights to use in the home.That being said, given my relative inexperience I feel like this resistance band set is a great product for the amount of money that you are paying. For $25 you get 5 resistance bands in varying degrees of resistance and two handles that clip onto the ends of the bands. The bands themselves seem to be sturdy and well made, and the clips as well. It also comes with a door and a ankle mount and a good carrying bag to keep it all together. When everything is in the bag it is small enough that it could fit comfortably in a suitcase, which I appreciated since I travel a lot for recruiting and for my job while in college.All in all, seems like a great buy. I have been very happy with my experience and the for $25, it is a great value as well.

I have had the bands for 2 weeks now.  So far they are a great replacement when traveling.  I don't need to find a gym.  The total combined weight is between 175 and 225.  It comes with some exercises in the manual.
These resistance bands work great.  I use them with the WII exercise program.  I like the handles for the bands.  The way they hook onto the handles you do not have to worry about them snapping off.

These bands arrived promptly. They were in mint condition. They were a gift and the person who received them was thrilled with them. They loved the selection of levels of difficulty the bands offer as well as the bag since she travels with them. Thank you!
Exactly what I wanted. Note - you get one set of handles to switch between the different strengths. They are really nice quality

I love the bands!!  They are even better than I thought they would be.  I love that I can remove and attach as many bands as I want to use, simply by unhooking them from the handle.  The clip is metal---much more rugged than the plastic ones I've seen at the gym.  Fast shipping and great service.  OVERALL TOTALLY SATISFIED!! :)

The Black Mountain resistance bands are excellent for people who don't want to spend a dollar per pound on traditional weights. The bands are versatile, allowing me to focus on muscle groups that only expensive workouts machines could target. They are also fun to use. I recommend this product to anyone who wants to stay fit and toned at home.

I will start my review off on the product. I love my bands. I travel quite a bit and take these bad boys along with me wherever I go. When the weather is bad, I default to my bands and get the exercise that I need. My only concern is the length of the bands. They are very short for certain exercises and you do not get the full extension needed for a workout. Quality is ok and they fit easily into a carry-on.Now for my thoughts on the Black Mountain Products company. Its concerning that they sell this set on Amazon directly from Black Mountain but they are $3.00 more than their own website. Plus they provide free shipping. Since they are the same product from the same company, why not charge the same price? Go figure. I am sure the extra $3.00 they make per order is being donated to a very important charity....
summary: Bands Good, Black Mountain Pricing, Eh!

reviewText: I waited several months to write the review so I could talk about the product over a longer period other than just the first use.Like most people I use the bands for P90X and they work great. When I started the program I was using dumbells and the bands are much better. My results per workout are almost twofold with the bands, since the resistance provides an isometric workout. These bands also give you more flexibility in terms of how much weight/resistance you want compared to the P90X bands.I had 2 concerns when I first purchased them:(1) My workout room gets extremely hot during the summer and I was worried that it would affect the band's elasticity. I've had them all summer and so far I haven't seen any signs of degredation due to the heat.(2) The description of the product has the max weight equivalent as 35 lbs with the red bands, I was worried this wouldn't be high enough for me. However this proved to be an unfounded fear, since when you hold the bands on the muscle contraction it increases the workout exponentially (much more difficult than dumbells)There are two concerns I still have however:(1) For P90X some of the workouts require you to step on the bands. If you are mixing two bands for increased weight it is incredibly difficult to find a good balance for both bands on both arms. In this situation one arm will experience more resistance than the other.(2) My sneakers have tiny, soft rubber, spike shaped treads on arch (maybe only 1/16 of an inch or less in diameter). When I stepped on one of the bands with the arch of my foot I noticed the band got several pinholes from the treads. This worries me because I'm afraid thif at over time these pin holes will grow and one day the bands might break. None of the other bands have this issue since I didn't use the arch of my foot for them, so I recommend that you don't use shoes with miniature spike like treads on them when stepping on the bands.The door latch works perfectly too, doesn't slip out at all like someone people have had concerns about. I haven't used the ankle brace yet.I recommend using gloves with the bands for shoulder press and tricep exercises, as the cloth on the handles will rub against the back side of your hands.Its the perfect price, I used the free super saver shipping, Amazon said 5-8 business days, it came in two. All of the pieces promised were there.
summary: Does the job as perfect as possible

reviewText: I bought these because I quit my gym when I moved. I installed some hooks and it replaces a lot of the circuit machines I used to use at the gym. My husband uses all of the tension bands at once to get the full tone out he wants. I only need two or three to get the work out I am used to.

The bands are really great as far as being able to switch up the amount of resistance. The foam around the handles is comfortable to hold. The information that comes with the bands helps to determine which combination you need for the amount of resistance you're looking for. I'm using them in conjunction with P90X and they're working out very very well.The only thing I have had any issues with is the area where the caribiner/clip is attached to the handle is slightly abrasive and rubs my arms during some of the exercises. It's not breaking the skin or causing any lasting scrapes, but it's not the most comfortable feeling in the world. My only other (totally superficial) complaint is that my storage bag ripped the second time I took the bands out. The seam seemed to be held together with adhesive rather than being stitched. I simply replaced it with my own bag. That obviously hasn't affected the utility of the bands in any way.Great product!
these rubberbands do  the trick! thy are very tough and can withstand a lot of stretch and they are heavy to pull. exactly what i wanted

I am 6 ft 6 and I as well am doing the tony horton work outs and have been pleased with the product thus far. I was worried because of my height that they may not give me the work out desired. so far that has not been the case. I am very pleased at what I have seen and dont at this time. the product also offers a door anchor, a strap, work out chart and a hook to combine diffrent desired colored bands for more weight resistance. this is awsome! this beats haveing $1000 of dollars of free weights in the house. although, I still love going to the gym. This will be a welcome routine for getting back in shape and doing it with less joint pain. I give the black mountain a 4 stars.

I am incredibly impressed with BMPs product. The resistance bands are of very high quality and are perfect for exercise programs such as P90X. My package arrived a few days BEFORE the estimated delivery. Also,  when calling with a question, the customer service rep was extremely kind and helpful. I will definitely make other purchased with BMP in the future.

I got these bands three weeks ago and I LOVE THEM!They are perfect for my routine and allow me to stay home more often while maintaining my exercise routine. I think these bands are perfect for toning, strength training, etc. These bands have provided me with satisfying and enjoyable work outs in the convenience of my own home.These bands are safe, strong, and effective.
