I would definitely recommend these and would certainly make future purchases from this company.

Just received this set. The quality appears to be outstanding. Great system of being able to combine different bands. I purchased this for travel use but will definitely use it at home also. As usual, Amazon's service was terrific.
Product arrived just as advertised. Broke a couple of bands after just 30 days of use. Might never break for the average user but if you are really using them hard they could break on you.
I bought this for my husband who has a free weight set upstairs which he loves, but he said he likes the bands better and the freedom to use them anywhere he wants.  Total score!

The first thing that you will notice about the product is the good quality materials and workmanship. Considering the potential danger with resistance training, I like that I dont have to worry about the band snapping or the handles breaking. I would definitely buy from them again. I also like that the company is based in the US, its nice knowing if I wanted to contact them, they aren't in India. One suggestion I would give them is on the user manual. They have a list of exercises that you can do with the equipment. I didn't notice a particular order to the exercises though. I think they should organize it by muscle group. Not a big deal though, since I have specialized knee exercises I use this for.
This is a great set of bands for simply workouts .  Being a couch tater, I like to work these instead of lying about. It's simple.

I bought this set of bands to begin a workout routine based on Joey D's book "fix your body, fix your swing" . This product was considerably more in terms of number of bands at a much better price.  The quality is excellent, they work great and I saved almost half the price over the products prescribed with the book.  Looking for high quality bands at a good price, check out Black Mountain.

Started using these resistance bands to strengthen the my shoulder after a recent injury.  They quickly replaced the TRX and weights that I had been using for strength training.With these resistance bands I am able to get an effective, low impact, and customizable workout.  There has been a noticable improvement in the stability and strength of my upper body since using these bands.

I travel a lot so I bought these to do P-90X on the road. They pack tightly in the bag that's included so they take up very little room in the suitcase, and they can be used in any hotel room. I really like the ability to combine multiple bands to get the right resistance, and the resistance is high enough for most men while doing P-90X. They seem durable, and I'm optimistic they'll last a long time.
The product is great. I was economical and I received the product quickly.  The design for use with the door is great. Overall the product exceeded my expectations

I bought these specifically for golf swing exercises and they are great.  The quality is better than I would expect and the hand grips and comfortable.  You can easily use different combinations of bands to achieve various resistances.  I'm now able to do exercises throughout the day at work in my downtime and reduce my night time workout time.
Kinda annoying to have to switch handles throughout the workout, but it's a solid, well made product.  Pump it up.

I purchased these based on price and Amazon reviews and I am happy with my purchase.  I spoke to customer service before purchasing and was told if I order through Amazon I would get an extra heavy duty band (orange I think).The extra band was not included, I called customer service and quickly received the band.The instructions are not that detailed but you can find exercises on utube.  I still don't know what to do with the ankle strap.  I feel they are a good deal and worth the price.

Have been using several times a week for over a month and so far the product has been exactly as described.  Thinking about getting another set.  The door anchor has been used as much as the bands and has worked very well!

I have used this product for about one week and have been very satisfied. I use them in place of free weights for ordinary resistance exercises, and I use them in conjunction with the Black Mountain pull up bar as well. My only complaint is that the the straps -- not the bands themselves, but the straps -- can irritate my forearms and upper arms during certain exercises. I don't know if other resistance bands have solved this problem. I just wear longer sleeves. I recommend this product for P90X.
summary: Works well for P90X and with Black Mountain pull up bar

reviewText: Hit all the major muscle groups with solid resistance. Perfect for home gyms. Came in a nice pouch for easy storage or travel too.
summary: Great for a quick work out.

reviewText: Great product. Bands were well packaged with instructions. Quality product. Bands are coded by color so easy switching and adding bands for increasing or decreasing resistance.  Well made product that is well worth the money.
summary: Great product and customer service. Thanks!!!

reviewText: These are very useful and are just as pictured in their add. I have used them and they are really user friendly.
It is what it is. If you're looking for exercise bands, these ones will do the trick. I would recommend.

I received the product as advertised, with no missing parts.The bands, clips, handles and other attachments are high quality, for personal use (as opposed to more commercial grade equipment). Looks like they will hold-up well.The instruction book is straightforward, with explanations of various exercises, and illustration of the bands anchored and un-anchored to the door.  The door anchor was easy to setup, worked well and does not look like it will damage the door over time.Using the bands was simple and effective.  It was easy to connect and switch bands.  Handles were comfortable.  Bands felt smooth and solid along all ranges of motion.
summary: Quality Product at a Good Price

reviewText: Product is great for travel, easy-to-use, durable, versatile (multiple bands can be used and attached to hand grip at one time), and a perfect length for a tall user (6'4"). Love the door anchor and ankle straps, as well, which provide additional workout options. Product arrived soon after ordered. Customer service was friendly and knowledgeable when called on the phone.

I was using just an elastic band for exercising. You would have to fold over or re-tie onto handles to make it more resistant. Using the Black Mountain bands is so easy, quick change etc. I have experienced no problems at all accept getting sore from the work outs. Great product and i have recommended them to friends.

I had these bands since November 2010.  I wanted to wait before I typed up a review so I could have enough time to try out the bands and make sure they work.  I must say that these bands are GREAT!  I am a 39 year old male and I use the bands for P90X.  I do not have the room or the budget for a full set of weights so the bands had to do.  I had another set of bands I bought from Amazon before (I will not mention the company) but they were ok. They cost the same amount of money as these, but they always felt a little weak.  I was afraid I would outstretch the bands when I did certain workouts.  One day my son popped a band.  Several weeks later I popped 2 others.I went to Amazon and looked up other bands and came across these.  I read many good reviews on them so I gave it a whirl.  I am so glad I did.  These bands are made very well.  I do not feel like I will pop the bands.  I am a big guy and I feel challenged by using the orange, black, and red bands when I do curls.The orange band came as a bonus if you called or emailed the company.  The only negative experience I had (and it was not really negative) was that I had to contact the company twice to get the band.  Both times the band was faulty.  However, customer service was very good and they got the band to me very quickly within 5 days.  That was excellent.If you are using P90X or any other type of exercise program, BUY THE BANDS!  For the price and the quality of the bands it is sooo much worth it.I usually do not write reviews on products, but I had to write one about these bands.  You will not regret it!
These resistance bands are great, they give a terrific workout!  If you add a jumprope to the set, you have all the things in a small bag to take with you when traveling.

I bought these bands to use with the P90X fitness program and have had a great experience. They come with a variety of different resistances which facilitate switching bands for various exercises. The handles are easy to clip on and off the bands, and the metal clip makes it easy to attach more than one band for greater resistance. I would recommend this product to anybody using an extreme fitness program or just trying to improve their fitness.
Excellent way to exercise at my sedentary job. I would recommend this for anyone that has to sit a lot at work.

The bands are sturdy and well made.  I really like that you have one set of handles that you can attach to different bands.  I also like the attachment to use with a door.  The suggested exercise guide is clear and easy to follow.  I'd totally recommend this product to others.

I received these in the mail yesterday and used them this morning. So great! I've never had this good of a workout without having to go to the gym. It a fantastic alternative to weights- super easy to change which muscle groups you are working. I love that everything rolls up into a tidy small carrying case that it comes with. I live in a shoebox in NYC and the space saving aspect is a tremendous asset.

I bought this set because I couldn't decide which weight band to get.  This set comes with 5 bands which is great because I use lower resistance weight than my husband & son. It also comes with a convenient storage bag, and door mount.  The quality is excellent.  The grips are very durable the feel is top notch.  A great addition to our home gym.
I love using my resistance bands!  I use it with P90X2 and it works great! They are really strong too. I am totally satisfied!

The Black Mountain resistance bands have worked very well for the 55 and over group I am training. The give me options for people with limited strength and flexibility. The bands have performed very well and are holding up very well.

I recently purchesed P90X and don't have the money or space for a progressive dumbbell set. The Black Mountain bands fill the bill. The bands and handles are top notch and I feel confident and secure doing hard work outs with them.

Product is as-described/pictured.Was a little less strength than I thought (but that's my own fault for just not being familiar with resistance bands in general).Still should work alright for basic excersises and toning.BUT... BUT BUT BUT...I hate being tall. 6'2". These bands are not reeeally for us taller guys. YES, you can use 'em and I guess get the same effects....ish. But you'll face resistance sooner in your motions than other average-lengthed individuals. I also tend to have orangatang-lengthed arms. Like a freakin' pteradactyl. Again, these bands are not designed for us.You'll face resistance sooner in your motions, and thus you'll have to use lesser-than-other-anticipated weighted-bands and just do more reps to get the same effect. This logically means stressing the bands more (though I've only used mine a few times, and thus haven't witnessed this yet and so am only theorizing based on the feel of the bands when I use them and my gut feeling).BUT: They're well-built. GREAT price. And come with neat little carrying pouch and instructions for about 10 excersises. I just wish their directions gave more explanation (or visual depiction of your body) as to which muscles each excersise is supposed to workout (primary, secondary).All-in-all, great product for great price. If I were an average-sized human, I'd probably have given it a 5-star.

Excellent quality and craftsmanship, definitely more than I expected. Showed up at my doorstep in the timeframe quoted. As a railroader I travel for work and these will allow me to work out even when I'm away from home in the hotel. The handy pouch and their lightweight and durable construction means they will last as well as not add too much to what I already take with me. Great price!
summary: I've been workin out on the railroad...

reviewText: Great product! Much better than those from bodylastics! I recommend this product to everyone who wants to workout anywhere. This packs easily and lightly into any suitcase or bag!
I use this when I dint get to go to gym. It allows you to perform a lot of different excercise in the comfort at at home.

Bought these after a co-worker's suggestion, who bought them earlier last year. I've been using these for a week now and they seem pretty good.  Love the fact that you can easily combine multiple bands to increase the weights.  I travel a lot for work and these are so easy to pack in the handy bag that comes with the kit.
Everything seems to be of good quality.  I haven't owned it very long - will update on longevity later on.

My new triathlon coach started integrating "tubing" into my workouts to help build strength for swimming. I purchase these instead of the company's $30 price for only 1 resistance band (aka tube). This has several high quality bands and there is a strap to use in doors and another one that will likely be useful if I want to use it at the gym.I was really impressed with the quality and the bag.
Excellent value. The company makes every attempt to solve any issues. I like it.they've provided perfectly adequate workouts for someone used to free weights

Bought these bands for P90X.  Had a tough time deciding between these and bands that each have their own handles on them.Pro: The reason I went with these was to be able to stack extra weight together for more resistance.  For areas where I am stronger it is nice to be able to put 2 or 3 bands together to get the desired resistance without paying an arm and a leg of lots of bands.Con: You do need to sometimes switch bands depending on the exercise, so be prepared by having them laid out in in easy area.  You can try and use different size loops to use 1 band for a super set of exercises.Overall they seem very sturdy and well designed.  I do wish they were labeled by weight, since I am colorblind I sometimes grab blue instead of green.

These seem very well made, I have been using them for several weeks now.  I love them because they can be used in a small space, yet still give you a good workout.  I will amend this over time as far as how the product holds up.  So far I am very happy with them!
summary: Well made and great to use anywhere!

reviewText: I purchased these to complete P90X3 since I wanted something mobile.  I love these bands.  I highly recommend using these based on the quality and ease of changing out the bands so quickly.  They attach so easily to the closed door and hold up nicely.
summary: Purchased for P90X3 - Love these bands!

reviewText: I have always been wary of resistance bands because I've heard so many horror stories of bands being made poorly and people getting hurt badly when they break. However, after reading the great reviews on these, I decided to try them out. By the end of my first workout I was no longer afraid. It is quite obvious how well they are made. Others that I've used can't even compare. The door anchor and ability to attach more than one band to a single, sturdy handle only adds to their awesomeness. And in case this wasn't all awesome enough, I ordered them 6:30am on a Tuesday and had them Wednesday afternoon!! The very next day!

I brought this product base on the reviews I read, I am a personal fitness trainer,and I wanted to work with a client who do not like working out in the gym,  resistance bands were a good substitute, it is well constructed it was delivered on time the only thing I would have like to see is a little more exercises on the exercise charts but all in all its a very good product.Black Mountain Products Resistance Band Set (Five Bands Included)

These bands have really assisted me in my rehab from surgery, especially in gaining muscle mass as free weights are not really an option, anymore. I progressed rapidly and, now that I am on the red bands, I'm excited to see where the orange can take me. The bands are high quality and durable, as are the clips and handles. For the price, this is one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon to-date.

While I still can't figure out how the door anchor works (and there was very little documentation with the product), the quality of the bands and the variance of weights included is very good. The handles and joints are solid. I'd have no problem recommending this.
Bought this for my husband for his birthday and he and I both have gotten great use out of this product. Very light weight and good sturdy product
Love em..... Best decision I made... Bands works perfect.... I take them to the gym with me everyday and I'm starting to see results... Will tell my friends about them

I purchased ther these for my son after a LOT of research for a Christmas gift, so I can't speak to their long term durability YET, but I'll post an update here after he's used them a bit. My 13 year old son begged for heavy weights and resistance bands after he got to use them at a football training camp.  His doctor advised against heavy weights at his age  (can damage the bone growth and keep your smaller kid small if the growth plate hasn't fused shut yet. Anyhow, the doctor said that resistance bands can still help him bulk up like he wants WITHOUT inhibiting his growth. Yippie!!! SOOO, I started searching for made in the USA resistance bands. Trouble is, there's a catch. Resistance bands are made from rubber from a rubber tree which isn't indigenous to the US. I called and spoke to the owner (two brothers own and run this company, no pesky automated phone line or overseas language barriers to deal with when I called!). These are indeed assembled by hand by the owners in the US but because the rubber comes from Malaysia, they can't call it "Made in USA". Grin, but I can. These arrived in two days thanks to the wonders of Amazon Prime and I was VERY impressed with the density andGREAT quality of the bands and ankle strap. You can't beat the price either (I found everything else to be more expensive through Amazon and other sports stores). Plus, I like that my money goes to support a small family owned business rather than support another country's economy. All in all, this was money well spent and should make my son as happy with the purchase as I am.
summary: GREAT quality, Made in USA, family owned company

reviewText: I bought these bands specifically for P90X and so far there hasn't been any real problem with them.  I have been using them for about 3 weeks now and they are great because you can customize your resistance better than any other bands I've seen.  You can connect any of the 5 bands to the handles to create a perfect resistance.  I would recommend these bands for people who are into harder workouts like P90X and lighter workouts.
I wanted something that I could use at my house which would be quick and easy to start a workout with.  This was a great choice.

These bands are really in good quality. The hooks are designed to snap on and off easily. It comes with the manual which tells you how to create your own resistance level. The door attachment works well too!
summary: Not bad! Create Your Own Combinations !

reviewText: I purchased this product for both travel purposes and also to be able to perform a variety of motions that you cannot do with free weights or machines very easily.  I travel often and I just throw the small pouch into my suit case as it doesn't take up much room.  I also use the product for rehab on a troubled shoulder as it allows me to perform many different motions that are not easily done with free weights or machines.I would recommend this to a friend.
summary: Great exercise product to take traveling

reviewText: Let me just start with a little background. I am a 20 year old, 5'9", 145lb, Biomedical Engineering and Pre-Med student at my university, and tend to use exercise as a way to relieve stress and get my mind off of my highly intensive workload. As such, I frequent my campus gym very regularly, be it to lift, squat, run, row, or swim. Additionally, I am the COO of my school's Krav Maga club, and recently started practicing Tae Kwon Do. As such, I like to think of myself as being quite physically fit.I started looking into my own set of resistance bands a little while back, in the hopes that I would be able to add some more variety to my warm ups, stretches, and workouts. More importantly, I wanted something I could use in my dorm room or hallway that didn't make much noise and didn't take up much space (it is a dorm room, after all). They also had to be low maintenance and quick to use (whenever I pull an all-nighter or just a late night, I try to do something active every hour or so to prevent myself from going crazy or falling asleep). That's how I stumbled across these resistance bands on Amazon.Let's start with the pros. (I have only had these for a week or so, and as such, can't comment on the longevity of the bands. I will try to update this review when I can say more on the matter.1) Quality make. Each band is securely attached to a metal carabiner at both ends, and can be easily attached or removed from the handles to increase/reduce resistance. Other than the foam covered plastic handle, everything is comprised of quality rubber, metal, or durable fabric.2) Compact and easily organized. The bands come together in a little black drawstring bag, which is small and lightweight enough to simply toss in my gym bag before heading to practice or the weight room.3) Attractive. I know it might be weird to say this about what are basically big elastic bands, but the set is nice to look at. Black and metal, with the individually colored bands. I have had friends comment on how 'sweet' they looked (they liked using them as well).4) So so so easy to use. Again, these are big pieces of elastic attached to handles. While I'm sure someone can figure out a way to hurt themselves with these, it's not easy, and the variety of exercises one can do with these is fantastic. (The kit comes with a little paper booklet with some basic exercises, which is a nice touch). The door anchor and leg strap are pretty self-explanatory, and offer even more options for workouts. It's also nice to be able to combine bands to increase resistance, though if you do it with ALL the bands it can get a little crowded (though that hasn't stopped me)Now is the time I would normally talk about the dreaded cons, but frankly, there aren't any to note of (as of yet. I'll try to update this in a couple months). If someone insisted I complain about something, I would just say that the handles seem to be the component of cheapest quality, but that's only because the rest of the set is so nice.One thing it would be nice to see in the future would be a pair of fabric loops, for attaching to a bench press bar (for resistive sets). The handles work fine, but the rigid nature of them means that the bar digs into the handle when attached, which might reduce their lifespan. Also, this is just me, but I don't really see myself using the 2-4lb yellow band for anything, and would much rather have a second red or black band for extra heavy resistance.In conclusion: Yes, I would buy this again. Yes, I would recommend it to a friend (already have, and I'm going to take them to Krav Maga tonight to see if anyone else is interested). Five stars, and I will most certainly be looking at more of B.M.P's gear in the future. One other thing to note would be that my set came with a free orange resistance band coupon, which is supposedly even more resistant then the red 'extra heavy' band. The gentleman on the other end of the phone was very friendly, and I look forward to receiving it. I would have rather had this orange band included in place of the yellow band, but that's not something to complain about.
summary: Excellent product at a very reasonable price.

reviewText: 5 stars, great product.  Couldn't recommend this more.  Great buy!  You will not regret this purchase at all.  Must buy!

I had a trainer order the bands for herself and then she set me up with my own program utilizing the bands.  They are a great option instead of weights or in combination with weights.  They are easy to use and the handles are easily switched from one band to the next!  Love them!

Very pleased with product, build quality just as expected and top notch. Been using daily for weeks, strength and durability seem to be very good, and resistance levels are MORE then adequate for most any exercise. Also QUITE enjoy the versatility of being able to manipulate the different resistance levels by adding/removing the different bands from the primary hand grip ring, very easy and quick to use.... Very helpful in adding that extra element to any fitness routine!

The best feature is the ability to stack the bands. The hooks work well and seems well made. The bands give predictable resistance and will provide a good workout. I have not used them alot so I cannot comment on the durability of the bands. I am giving four stars since I have nothing to complain about; I think five stars would need to be granted after extensive use only. I did call their customer support, it is a small company and they do pick up their phone - by themselves, not a offshore call center.
So far, i have no complaints About this products. I use it 5-6x per week and haven't seen any damages since I bought it 2 months ago. Good quality.

You can not beat this set of resistance bands. Especially at that price!! I bought a very similar set of a different brand at Walmart and was extremely disappointed. This product is of superb quality and I've enjoyed using the bands every day since I've received them.

I love these bands!  They are the best resistance bands that I have ever owned.  I am using them for P90X and they integrate perfectly into the program.  It is very easy to change the amount of resistance of the bands via the clips.  The bands are also very sturdy.  I highly recommend these bands.

Since I am on the road a lot and sometime just too lazy to go to hotel gym... plus, I don't always remember to bring my gym shorts while on the road. This product really made a difference since I simply throw it in my suitcase and I can get most of my resistance workout wherever I go.Pro: Superlight weight, clear color code... simply put: it works!Con: I can see it could be a problem for tall folks
I travel often on business and these bands are great to keep up with my workout.  They are compact, easy to pack, and have a variety of exercises I can do on the road when there isn't gym access.
summary: Great workout tools for business travellers

reviewText: Got my bands, they seem ok, not much use out of them yet, but i am at a loss. where is my door anchor? ankle strap, present, handles, present, bag, present. Door anchor, Absent

I purchased two sets of the Black Mountain resistance bands about 4-5 weeks ago (one for me and one for my girlfriend), so we could begin P90X. The bands work great and are a perfect alternative to using dumbbells. They are easy on my joints while still providing the resistance and range of motion that I desire when working out. I had never used resistance bands prior to purchasing this product and am very pleased with their ease of use and the results they produce when working out. I highly recommend this product to all.

These bands have metal clips that snap onto the grips and are of high quality. What is nice, is that that you can mix and match the bands to get the desired weight on the grip. While the grips are good, they are not designed to take all 5 bands at once and the plastic tube the strap goes through will crack. I emailed customer service and they immediately sent out a new set of grips, no questions asked. However, I went to the hardware store and replaced the plastic tube with a metal pipe (you will need a sewing machine). Now I can load as much weight as I want. Love this item.

I really don't think I can add anything that hasn't already been said.  This product is a great value for a great price.  I especially like the personal touch that this family run business gives to the product.  They seem very attentive to how their customers feel about there product.  I really can't think of anything bad to say about the product.  I like how the design allows you to add more resistance just by attaching more bands to the handles.  Also, the door anchor and ankle strap are a nice bonus.
summary: Great product at a great price and backed by a very attentive family run business

reviewText: I've used other resistance bands, and after about 3 months they typically snap.  These have been going strong 2-3 times a week for 6 months and no breaks.  Good assortment of weights and combinations, can't go wrong.

If you have ever worked with TheraBand or other types of elastic bands, the Black Mountain Resistance Band Set represents a major upgrade.  Very sturdily made,  very easy to vary resistance by either changing or combing bands, and very easy to vary the angle of resistance by sliding the door anchor up or down.  You really could use this for a complete home gym.The instruction booklet offers very little in the way of suggestions for workouts.  It's a single 8.5 X 11 sheet with all of six exercises illustrated on one half of one side.  Unless you already know how you plan to use these bands, I would suggest getting another booklet.  I bought the Great Stretch Tubing Handbook on Amazon and it was worth it.  I have a torn rotator cuff and it includes specific exercises to strengthen it.An ankle cuff is included with the tubes with no suggestions how to use it, nor are there any exercises shown that use only one hand, necessary for rotator cuff strengthening.One suggested improvement: the tubes are passed through a loop in the fabric door anchor.  That is, the nylon fabric is doubled back on itself and sewn, creating a loop.  I think it would be easier to use if a D-ring, such as used in the ankle cuff, were sewn into the door anchor.  This would make it easier to pass the tubing through it and also easier to fasten one end of the tube to the door anchor when using just one hand.Finally, a nice drawstring bag is included that holds everything.  Take it all around, a good buy.
summary: Great hardware; software not so hot

reviewText: These work great and they come with clear instructions. Customer service was so friendly. Included an offer for a free additional band.

I bought these bands for use with P90X because our home doesn't have a doorway suitable for a chin-up bar.  After three weeks I am very satisfied with them.  It is quick and easy to switch the handles between bands, and since they are stackable they provide plenty of weight for pull-up exercises.  Everything seems very well made and I'm sure they'll get me through 90 days and beyond.

Perfect especially for a large range of resistance. One thing is be careful using the door anchor, because when I was using the red-black combination it slipped through from under the door and smacked me in the eye. I had no problem with just the red band by itself. I should have just been smarter and read the instructions first about it and notice how much gap there was under my door and the force being exerted. Maybe if the anchor had something hard (besides a rolled-up cloth anchor) to anchor onto behind the door it wouldn't have been a problem. Ouch! LOL
summary: Perfect but read instructions about door anchor first LOL

reviewText: I have used free weights ever since I have been excercising and I purchased this product so that I would have something to take with me when I travel and for what it is, it works pretty good.  I was surprised with how much resistance these bands actually provide.  For Standing excercises, it is great.  For squats, I recommend doing one legged squats since I will not be able to hold the bands for two legs.  It is a nice product to have for travelling.  I will definately mix them in with free weights cause they can target a lot of little areas that free weights cants.  Free weights are heavy and there is more risk of injury.  When using the bands, you have less of a risk of hurting yourself because there are no weights that can fall on you.  I separated my shoulder one time using free weights, and I am always looking for new ways to excercise.  These are definately a good choice.

The product came quickly and was exactly what we ordered with the exception of the door anchor.  We contacted the customer service and they were excellent.  Very friendly and effecient.  Would definitely order from them again.

I bought these a month ago thinking that they would be substitute for buying dumbbells. I love them they saved me more than $200 and I can do everything I need with them.  The only thing that I wish is that they would send you 2 door anchors I called the company and they offered to send me one free of charge. They also are sending me a free orange band (30-45 lbs.) just for writing an honest review.  I will definitely be a return customer
I've been using the bands for more than a month. I've already moved to higher tensions. they are smooth and reliable. A good buy for me
Good product. did everything i expected. i would, and have, recommend this product. helped me in rehab of torn rotator cuff.

I order these resistance bands after getting a pair of functional workout gloves;Arazi Performance Fitness Workout Gloves.  The main reason I choose these bands is because of the clips on each end.  The gloves I own have loops built into the actual glove.  So with the bands, I can hook up the glove and do my normal dumbbell workout while adding some crazy resistance from other angles.These bands are priced a little higher than others but don't let the price scare you away.  I first purchased some similar bands from my local store and they were actually cheaper than these, but as the old saying goes, it is usually true..."you get what you pay for".  They were not defective in any way but when you use them, it is clear they are cheaply made.  This becomes even more evident when I began using these bands I ordered from Amazon.Also, you'll receive a bag/carrying case which is nice for when I want to take them to the gym with me.  I also imagine it would make traveling much easier to if you go on the road with them a lot.  For the amount that I use these and the quality of construction, these bands turned out to be a great find.

I am a trainer at a YMCA and have been involved with physical therapy fo over 7 years.  I recently had shoulder surgery and needed something to continue my recovery on days that I am home.  This product was exactly what I was looking for. The metal clips make for a quick, easy and strong.  I Can easily switch the bands to move efficiently through my workout. I can use mutiple resistances band combinations to find the right amount of resistance to continue to increase my strength. These bands are better than what I have used and trained other people with at my Facilities.  I would definitely recommend this product.

Purchasing the BLACK MOUNTAIN resistance bands is one of the best investments that I've ever made and have been using them for two months now. I spoke with the owner Dan Weidner pertaining to some questions about the bands and the man is an absolute professional. He was very polite and answered all my questions and told me I could contact him anytime. He sincerely wanted me to feel happy with my purchase.I'm a 55 year old man with several medical conditions that now prevent me from work. I'm on social security disability due to a 38 year chronic back condition, 13 years of fibromyalgia and recently diagnosed with several bulging degenerative discs. This has resulted in several misaligned discs causing me multi-level bi-lateral foraminal stenosis of the spine. I have moderate to severe numbness in both my legs. Since I was a teenager, I have done some form of exercise, swimming, running, bodybuilding, elliptical and Nordic Track. It is only after I turned 52 that I really began to have major medical problems due to the combination of the above. I lost the ability to lift weights which has always been my physical therapy. I need to keep active and keep my muscles active and strong to support my spine and reduce the muscles spasms caused by Fibromyalgia.I thought I'd give these resistance bands a try and I couldn't be more satisfied customer. I have been lifting weights for 35 years but can't use them anymore, that is, unless I want to end up in the emergency room. These bands are very easy to use. I find them to work my muscles better than weights and weight machines because they stretch the muscle throughout the movement, really great for my Fibromyalgia condition. Of course you should use the appropriate band(s) and do the exercise fluidly and slow, no jerking or relaxing upon completion of the movement to get the full effect. These bands remind me of the bands I used for swimming team practice.I would recommend purchasing these resistance bands sold by BLACK MOUNTAIN as they are well worth the money. Take this review from someone who has been into fitness for most of his life and who has used a variety of gym equipment; and if you have a muscular/neurological conditions like me than these are for you.The bands are well made and the hand grips are very comfortable.I've altered several exercises in the manual to fit my condition and added a few of my own as follows.SEATED ROW - IX and XIVPlace door anchor about 18 inches above floor.Put resistance bands into door anchorSit down on floor with legs flat on floor at a 45 degree angle facing door (opposite angle from door anchor.)TRICEP EXTENSION - IIIPlace door anchor in top middle of door.Put resistance bands into door anchorPush down and back with BOTH hands bending at the elbow.LAT PULL DOWN - XIII (standing as in instructions does not work for me)Place door anchor in top middle of door.Put resistance bands into door anchorSit with back against door and legs straight out on floor.Pull resistance bands straight down to where handle is parallel to shoulder.(This gives better support for my back and allowing for a better stretch).The following are exercises not in instruction booklet.SITTING LAT CHEST PULLDOWN(This builds lats in upper back and intercostal rib cage muscles.)Place door anchor in top middle of door.Put resistance bands into door anchorSit with back against door and legs straight out on floor.Keeping arms fully extended, pull resistance bands straight down (palms facing floor) to 12 to 18 inches above knee.FOREARM CURL(This is similar to exercise V the curl but builds forearm muscles instead of bicep.)Place band under feet.Curl band with palms facing down towards floor, instead of palms up as in bicep curl.FORWARD LATERAL RAISE(This is similar to exercise VI side lateral raise but gets deltoids at a different angle.)Place both feet over center of band.Keeping arms straight, raise arms forward and over head.
summary: One of the best investments that I've ever made

reviewText: I am one who reads reviews before I purchase. And I am glad I did as this was not the first Resistance Band I looked at. They are really high quality and I have big hands (yeah insert your own joke) and it is nice that I don't completely wrap around the handles. It comes complete with several bands and attachments in an easy-to-get-the-bands back in the carrying bag. I would buy again but know I wont need too unless it is a gift as they come with a lifetime replacement warranty. And I would buy as a gift. Hope this helps someone to make the right choice and choose these. One last thing...they are a mom and pop business. So it is great to support small businesses too.
summary: If you have big hands... This is a Quality Product!

reviewText: Bought this in anticipation of getting more physically fit and initially didn't use it. Then I broke my ankle and was confined to a hospital bed at home and the band set was invaluable. The set allowed me to do a variety of exercises without stressing my ankle, we even connected the straps to the side of the bed. They are now a staple of my everyday regimen. And with progressive resistence I will be able to use them for a long time. High quality and a great price. Highly recommended.
You can combine these bands to get a wide range of tensions and between the wrist strap, handles and door piece they can be used in a variety of ways.

I tore my rotator cuff playing racquetball.  My doctor recommended rest, heat, ice and rehab exercises.  After a few weeks of that regiment with only minimal exercises I ordered this set of bands.I have found the bands very easy to use.  I can get up and pop out a set or two with very minimal setup time.  I'm starting my third week with the bands and my shoulder is definitely better, although I still have a long ways to go.I have to travel occasionally for work.  I plan to bring these with me on future trips and will report back on that.Recommended.
summary: Rehab for a torn rotator cuff

reviewText: We purchased two sets of these bands for use with P90X.  We have completed one full cycle of P90X and part of a second cycle, although we eventually switched to weights for most of the program.  We continued to use these bands for pull-upsThe Good:These bands are easy to use, and being able to clip multiple bands onto the handles is helpful.  Some people may need more weight than this set can provide.  Since my wife did not use the "heaviest" red band very often, I borrowed hers to make my simulate pull-ups more challenging.The door strap works well near a hinge, and these bands also worked well over a pull up bar.  Overall they have held up fairly well.The Bad:Out of our two sets, one strap broke at the metal clasp.  I expected one of the rubber tubes to give out, but instead the metal snapped where the clip swivels around on the post that attaches to the band.  Fortunately no one was hurt when it went, but it left a mark on the top of the door frame when it went during a pull-up.Some of the bands show a lot of wear from friction when standing on the band to shorten it or to increase tension, as the P90X videos demonstrate.  Again, none of them have snapped, but we stopped using one of the black bands just in case.Overall:I liked the bands to get started on P90X, but ultimately decided they weren't giving me the workout I wanted.  As soon as I switched to some "dial weights" I felt I was getting a better workout.  The weight ratings on these bands did not match up with using actual weights at all.  In theory, if I was lifting 20 lbs according to the band tension rating, I needed to back down to 10-15 pounds on the free weights.Still, we were not disappointed in our purchase of these bands.  They are a good value and we are pleased to own and continue to use them.

I am pretty strong, but I had shoulder surgery so even though I finished P90X I could still only do 3 pull-ups. With these bands I am able to get a much better workout for my shoulders and back without the pain. I really like the D-rings they use so I can put two or three bands on at a time while using only one handle. It allows me to actually do strength training with bands.

Resistance bands in general are excellent for introductory exercise regimens, and for rehabilitation purposes. The barrier to entry is extremely low, and so they have become the favorite tools of many special demographics of exercisers.My wife is 7 months pregnant, but was a P90X2 trainer for long before she became pregnant. She has continued through unaltered as much as possible, but we needed some bands to do the altered exercises that would be especially difficult or dangerous for a pregnant woman. We wanted high quality (wouldn't snap or lose resistance) and affordable price.Man, oh man, did Black Mountain knock this one out of the park.The bands are grommeted strongly and are exceptionally sturdy. The handles have an awesome feel to them, and there is never the fear that they are going to snap and injure you. They let you simply focus on the workout. They come in a good range of resistances and can be combined in a modular fashion to achieve more resistance, like most bands. But the clincher here is the build quality - as stated in the title, superlative.Very reasonable price too, considering a free weight can cost nearly as much - ONE weight.You won't be disappointed, so don't worry about that. If you know what resistance bands are for, this is the way to go.
summary: As resistance bands go, these are superlative.

reviewText: I bought these for my son (16 yrs old and in great shape). He loves this set of exercise bands. He had a similar set they used at school with the trainer. He uses them on a daily basis and continues to find new exercises (including inventing some) with these.They are very light and compact, and easy to change the resistance.From a company perspective, Black Mountain included in the package a coupon for a free extra orange band which was even a heavier gauge than the black band. A very nice touch from the company for an already great product. My son is excited to get the extra band and is already inventing new challenges to perform with the extra resistance. Thank you Blank Mountain!
summary: Great Product from a great company with great service

reviewText: Ordered Black Mountain bands and I am pleased after having used them for the first week.  We also ordered an additional pulls for my wife so we can share the bands.  She will not be needing the heavy duty ones, and we can both benefit by this.Enjoying my workouts, and feel like I did not have to buy a pull up bar, but still feel the effects of doing pulls up and feel the burn.

I bought this exercise band set to make sure I had away to continue strength training in the office while my weights sit in my garage.  I'm finding after a few weeks of regular use that these bands are high quality and working well.  A couple of notes: The strap is threaded through the handle but not attached, so the handle slides on the strap while in use, rubbing the strap against my hand as I complete my motions.  I would prefer it was fixed.  Also, the door anchor depends on the door being closed (and locked) for safety - if someone opened the door, it would be dangerous (I don't have a lock on my office door).  I will be using a doorstop to keep the door closed.  The relatively light exercise sheet isn't that helpful, but so many exercise routines are available immediately online that I don't think that matters much.  The part of this purchase that I love is the FULL guarantee for the materials and obviously attentive customer service.  I will always take some chances with a product if I know they answer the phone and back up what they sell.
summary: Great set for use in the office

reviewText: I couldn't be happier.  These were a great price, made in USA, and are high quality.  I'd definitely buy these again and recommend them to a friend.

I got these in the hope of not having to need to buy heavy, expensive weights for workouts. I thought bands would be a cheap alternative to dumbbells. While they are to an extent, this package only comes with very low-resistance bands. The "heaviest" band has only about a 30 lb resistance, which is the red one. All the other bands seem to have ultimately no use. The "lightest" band starts at 2 lbs of resistance! I don't know why someone would need a band with only 2 lbs. Along with 2 lb yellow band, i see no use for the also very light blue and green bands. The only other band besides the red i use is the black and only when i do straight arm lifts. If you are looking for high-resistance bands for high-resistance bicep curls, Don't buy this. Frankly, if you are a guy don't buy these, unless you have a use for VERY low-resistance bands. Women should find this package useful though.

I blog about exercise and nutrition when on the road [...] and have found that these bands are a must for travel, particularly when staying in hotels that do not feature a fitness center.  Personally using mostly free weights to build and tone, I was happily surprised to discover how the resistance bands really work the muscle groups.  Plus they are wonderfully light and pack nicely into a suitcase without taking up much room.  I don't go anywhere without them these days but also use them at home when I can't break away to get to the gym.
summary: Great Product When On the Road

reviewText: Great item. Would recommend to anyone looking for exercise bands for physical therapy. Not exactly a strength training item but still has some decent resistance.
great for when you need to workout in 10 minutes. very easy to set up, and use I would recommend this for beginners  or intermediate exercisors
I like that I can easily double up multiple bands to one grip.  Good quality product and had everything I was looking for.

These bands have exceeded my expectations. I purchased these for use with the P90X Lean program, and they allow me to do all of the exercises, with some modifications. The bands are high quality, and the handles and straps are rugged. I use the bands 2-3 times per week, and expect them to wear eventually--I plan to replace them with more of the same product.
Good bands shipped fast seem fairly sturdy added some nice resistance to my workout.They also come with a nylon bag to keep them in so their out of the way.
These bands are made of good latex. The carrying case is nice. I like how you can attach multiple bands to the handles to create a custom resistance level. The door anchor works well also.
This was by far the best set of resistance bands I could find in the UK - especially for the price. Great range of resistance, and the conversion chart does come in handy.
Very handy, they worked well and are adjustable to meet both my needs as well as my husband's needs. Easy to use and very effective.

Review of BMP:  I mostly use the black, red, and green, and they show no signs of wear even after I step on them during workouts.  The yellow one did snap the first time it was used, but I called the company and they sent me a new one in two days no questions asked.Resistance bands in general: I think they are harder to use than freeweights and I don't seem to get as good of a workout.  I do like that they are cheaper, smaller, and easier to store and transport than a set of weights.  I've never used the ankle attachment, it doesn't seem very effective.  The door attachment is very useful though.  I would definitely recommend these for someone with limited storage space or if they are going to travel with the bands.

These are a good price for some good bands.I don't like that you have to mount the strap for these to be fully useful. the way this is intended to be used is mount the wall strap and run the bands through the strap. I have been able to use them outside of that but I was not aware of this design when I got these.

I am 6'4 and have been using the bands for a few weeks without any issue in the P90 program, I love them! I called Black Mountain to ask some questions and they have great customer service and stand behind their products and workmanship. I like the range of resistance and assortment of bands. Good stuff!Update:After a few months, my red band started to get small tears in it. So I contacted the company and they promptly sent a new one.

I purchased these bands as a replacement for a pull up bar since I'm 6' 2" and pull ups are a difficult when your feet drag the floor.  I was also looking for a light weight system I could take with me while traveling.  I have the bands for a couple of weeks now and they work very well.  The bands come with a bag that actually is large enough to fit all the components in easily.  The handles are well made and comfortable. If you are looking to try a set of bands, you can't do any better.

I was looking for something to allow me to workout at home and on the road and would not take up too much space. The bands are very high quality and the carrying case works great for throwing everything into a suitcase. I wish it came with another set of handles because sometimes I am constantly changing back and forth but not a big deal and comes exactly as described. Overall great product for the price and I would recommend to anyone looking for a good set of resistance bands.
summary: Exactly what I was looking for

reviewText: I had never used resistance bands before, and was a little worried about their strength and durability.  My wife and I have both been using them in our daily workout routines and they have performed beautifully.  These bands were a great addition to our workout, you can't beat them.

I used something similar in a boot camp last year.  I couldn't continue with the boot camp but I like the resistance band training so I wanted to buy my own set.  I look at several brands and chose these based on other reviews.  I am glad I bought these.  They are high quality and I'm sure they will last for many years.  I highly recommend these bands.

These should be in everyones personal gym, I got 2 sets for higher resistance and also for a set for my wife, easy to take along for traveling and very small.  I laugh everytime I look at the pictures in the manual of the little guys doing the exercises but these work great!!  Also give you a great workout!
These were purchased for a relative to assist with their recovery from a debilitating stroke.  The relatively light resistance and ease of use, so far has been 'just what the doctor ordered'.

I have been using this product for about 4 times a week since I bought it. It is the first resistance band I bought and I am satisfied with it. It is well made and serves its purpose. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a resistance band.
Great exercise bands! I ordered the P90X and got these to do my exercises. Very durable and easy to use. The handles might be somewhat awkward at times, but overall I love them.
The bands are easy to use and are really helping me with my P90X training program. I only wish they came with extra handles. Other than that this is agreat product.
just got them at the P17X point, made a big difference for shoulder work. Less strain. Travel lots, so travel bag convenient. Carabeeners work good. Friendly company.
summary: Great value, fast shipping, convenient packaging

reviewText: I love how you are able to use the product on the road.  As I travel quite a bit, I am able to bring the bands along with me and they are of a high quality rubber that I feel comfortable stretching and using on a consistent basis.  I've been using it for a couple weeks now and work through a few resistance exercises that keep me in decent shape on the road.
These bands are very well constructed and offer a variety of uses for your exercise needs. Very durable and offer resistance from low weight to very heavy.

I have used this for about two months already and it has been amazing and very convenient. I am able to perform a lot of exercises at home that my limited home gym cannot provide and with the various free-range of motion is a plus. The best thing I like about this is the ability to add on more resistance or switch to a lower weight resistance. I've already recommended to many of my friends and coworkers, and a couple of them purchased and absolutely love it! It's a gym in a bag! And best of all, it's VERY affordable! Plus, great customer service!

So far so good!  Also, the company has outstanding customer service and even sent us a free band just for placing our original order and calling them.The handles are comfortable. There is a good variety of band tensions to select from and the additional accessories are a bonus; not to mention the carrying case.I highly recommed this product.

The band of bands that is. Get fit and start working out with these bands! I wasn't very familiar with the whole weight resistance training with rubber bands thing but they're really easy to get the hang of. Don't be intimidated by these!
summary: I decided to join the band

reviewText: this is a good set of work out band I have a bad back,and I need to loose weight.l love it

These were recommended to me by one of my clients who loved my professional bands but didn't love the price tag that came with them. Since then many more of my clients use these bands. They are well made, sturdy, stand up to every exercise that I can come up with to put them through (from squats to lunges to overhead presses, deadlifts and everything in between.I have clients that use them 2-3 times a week for 30-45 minute workouts. The transitions are fast and easy. The ankle strap is comfortable. If there was any complaint, it's that the door anchor is 3 plastic beads that you put under the door or at the top of the door. If you have any appreciable gap in the top or bottom of the door, pulling the bands could make the anchor slip or come out. When we need to anchor to a door, we use my anchor which uses a donut ring instead and holds without slipping. I hardly feel that is worthy of docking a star as it is not the construction of the bands, but rather the house causing the problem.I would highly recommend these bands (and do to my clients, regularly). I'd just make sure where you are anchoring it has a very solid connection and no extra gaps.
summary: Many of my clients use these!

reviewText: I am currently in college and the work out room is always busy. Often I have to wait before I can even use the equipment. Due to this I work out in my dorm room. These bands are great for working out at home, on the go, or at school. They also store easily and do not take up as much space as dumbells, and cost less. The diverse strengths (colors) of the bands offer the ability to work all muscle group to the max. I also find it helpful to use them with an instructional video to help further the effectiveness of my work outIn addition to these bands I also bought the door frame pull up bar by the same company. It was an easy assmble and only required and adjustable wrench to put together.

These resistance band are exactly as described and are great for a variety of users.As someone who works out at a gym 2-3 days per week I wanted something I could do at home without buying a full gym with weights.  I purchased these bands along with a vertical wall mounted eyelet station.  The clips on these bands attach easily and smoothly to the wall brackets and are quiet when in use.  The bands are well made and look to be extremely durable.  The pricing was so reasonable I decided to buy two sets.There are dozens of exercises you can do with these bands.  If you don't have wall brackets you can easily use a chair or door frame to help increase the number of movements you can do with these bands.  The varying resistance is perfect for different exercises and for different users of varying strengths and abilities.I highly recommend these bands for travel, home use, office use, or to carry out physical therapy in your own home (if recommended by a doctor or PT).
summary: Great Resistance Band Set for all Types of Users

reviewText: I love the fact that you can attach as many as you want on each handle for greater resistance. Having the door anchor has been a real benefit for doing other exercises. I would not hesitate to purchase these again.

Initially, I was quite impressed with the build quality of these bands. I  bought a set for my father , who is  70 years old,  to use for some basic strength training exercises. After about 3 months of use at 4-5 times per week, the blue and green bands (which he used most frequently )  have  cracked/broken.  I am guessing, my dad used it at a  moderate intensity  at the max. So I am disappointed with the build quality of these resistance bands. Those in the market for a resistance band should look at other vendors with superior quality.
summary: The Blue and green bands broke

reviewText: Purchased these to use in hotel rooms on business travel, and have carried them over into home use as well. A very good value.

This is a great set of resistance bands, although they are my first. They've held up well over the past year, and the door jam and leg strap, (which can also be used to strap onto other objects for an anchor) are also perfect. I didn't realize how much I'd need those.
Perfect for usage with any workout routine such as P90X, Body Beast etc. Long Lasting and durable. I use it mostly for pull ups and the back gets a good workout
These are some great bands! I use them with my work outs and also for my clients. They love them and so do I!
I think this is one of my home gym itens that have the best cost x benefit.. great product, i recommend!

I purchased these bands to use with P90X.  They seem to be well made - I did not feel like they were going to break while I was using them.  The handle can slip making them a bit uncomfortable to use, but that doesn't prevent them from doing the job.  I had never used bands before, but they were much cheaper than buying more dumbells....after a while, I decided I liked the dumbells better.  However; these are GREAT for when I am traveling and want to workout on the road.  I would highly recommend taking a Sharpie Marker and writing on each band the resistance level because unless you use them everyday, you won't remember which band is which.

These bands are very sturdy and well made. i like the handles as they rotate when you use them. You can use several band together to create more resistance. The door holder is wonderful. You can exercise just about every muscle with these bands. The storage bag is great for travel and for keeping everything together. You can't go wrong with this product. They are cheaper than a months fee to a gym and better than the treadmill or exercise machines i have that i use to store my clothes on! They don't take up space or require changing seats and things like my bowflex. There are several bands ranging from very light to strong so I can use the lighter weights and my boyfriend can use the stonger bands. And as you progress you can go up to a stronger weight band. Give them a try it's a great product for the price.
Have not had a lot of use yet but appears to be a great product - so far I love it.

Very pleased with the bands that I purchased from Black Mountain Products.  I am able to do all of the resistance excerices for P90X, as well as modified pull-ups and chin-ups, which is a major plus.Good quality bands for the price!

This pack with the door piece is perfect for what I need. I can emulate pushups, which I can't do normally with my joints, using these bands. I can also emulate pullups and due to my lack of having a pull up bar that is a very big sell for me. If used properly these are just as good as, if not better than, free weights except they're half or a quarter of the cost.I will say however if you are a heavy lifter, or someone who needs 70lbs+ in resistance, then perhaps look for a pack with heavier bands. This is good for beginner/moderate users, but folk with advanced fitness levels will probably need more.

I got my shipment very fast. I like the booklet that came with the packet. It has simple workouts that are easy for beginners. I have been using these for a week now and I am really impressed with the product. I would definitely recommend this to others.

The product is well made its construction is sturdy and well designed. I like that on each end they have clips for the handles. The product and packaging are exactly as described. They are perfect for my home gym. The customer service was great. I called to order a few more straps and they mailed them that day. I would order from them again.

Was concerned because i read that people had issues with the bands cracking and breaking.  However after a month of using them i have had no issues.  It could contain some better instructions on explaining how to properly use and suggestions on different techniques, but other than that it is a good value/quality product.

I have been on the look for a great set of exercise bands for the last several months, and decided to order these.  Best decision ever.  I use my feet to anchor my bands all of the time, and so far there has been no fraying, which is common among other brands.  Also, changing tension is so quick and efficient.  Plus, with the clips you only have to worry about one set of handles, making packing even easier.  Lastly, the added anchor and ankle band allow for more exercise movements.  With the bag to carry it in it should be a no brainer that this is the brand to go with.

Great customer service, quality strong build and bands, very versatile functionality with door attachments. Included limited set of workouts. Would recommend this seller and product, would purchase from them again in the future.

I have had this band set now for a few weeks and I have to say they are a great way to avoid getting fat while working as a driver. During my down time instead of watching movies and playing games I decided to try these and with a lil will power and these bands I get a nice workout in the bus and also in hotel rooms. Made very well great purchase!!

My wife and I recently purchased a home work out program that says you should use weights or resistance bands. We deffinently couldn't afford to buy a bunch of dumb bells for $30 or more a piece. So my wife suggested that we try resistance bands.Honestly I was extremely reluctant to even try bands, since any lifting routine I've ever done up to this point has been with free weights or a machine. So I got on Amazon and started searching and reading reviews. Black Mountain Products by far had the best reviews, so I went for it. Plus whats to loose when you get so much for such a great price?Everything arrived right on time. When I opened everything I was instantly impressed with the quality product that I received. B.M.P has great warranty information and very specific and understandable instructions for using this product. They write their number in bold so you can't miss it and if you have to call them feel free to, my wife had a question and they were pleased to help her!Anyway on to the bands... I actually love these things! Easy to use and very user friendly. These bands accomidate my wife as well as myself. She uses the lighter bands and I use the heavier combinations to create the perfect workout resistance. My wife and I are very much over weights and love these B.M.P bands!Thank you for your time! Buy them, you won't regret it!

I got these bands as I did not want to spend a lot of money and I also wanted high quality bands to do P90X with. These are perfect as they allow stacking of multiple bands on the handles. Theres a large variety with great quality. I probably wont use the door anchor or strap but only because I have no current use for them. The price of these should be double but for what it is at now I would not wait to scoop these up. Oh and for those that are gunna do P90x... I highly suggest the bands for the range of motion you get and also the portability of them.A+ Product BMP, Good Job!

I have been using these bands for the past month as part of my routine exercise regimen. The product appears to be made from high quality materials. I like the ability to combine different bands to generate more resistance. The door anchor allows one to replicate similar exercises found with weight machines at the gym. BMP customer service was excellent. I contacted BMP after one of the bands broke. I received a replacement within 5 days. These bands have a lifetime warranty. I strongly recommend purchasing an extra set of handles and door anchor. This saves you the hassle of constantly unhooking and hooking bands. One can get a great workout with these bands. They are an excellent alternative to expensive home weight machines that take up a lot space (everything fits nicely in the carrying case).

I have been using these bands with P90X for 2 months now.They show no signs of wear and tear just yet. They also provide as much resistance as you need; just a little if your a beginner or a whole lot if you really want to work hard.The handles are extremely comfy.

I received my Black Mountain bands today and immediately worked out with them. I am completely happy with the way these bands performed. A couple of years ago I purchased a set of the "bodylastics" exercise bands and have never really been satisfied with them. On the bodylastics, the hook for the handles at the ends of the bands is to big and when you use them for certain exercises they scrape outside/inside your wrists. Plus now that I have the BM bands, the difference in quality between the two is crystal clear. The BM bands are an all around better product.......especially for the price. I highly recommend.
I read good reviews, the price was good, so I bought them! and I am not dissappointed.good quality product

Did a comparison of what was available at local retail stores and found that these had a lot more resistance options at a much better price.  Quality seems good (have had them for about a month...no complaints) and the storage bag is extremely nice for those of us sharing our home gym with our living space.  For anyone who has used a Bowflex and is familiar with the rod setup, the concept here is similar.Last, but not least, my wife is recovering form shoulder surgery and these have been great.  Being able to customize the resistance and a use a light load when necessary is ideal.  Her range of motion and strength have increased considerably due in part to these resistance bands.

I only did quick tests with them, but they seem to be good quality and I suppose you can get a lot of exercises. The booklet comes with only a few, but that's what we have the internet for :-)I hope they last long. I plan to use for travelling, but someone told me that it's good to use them for a while after your regular workout (working the same area you worked with the weights), and that it gives good results, and helps lengthen the muscles. I will research more, but I'm very hopeful it's true.
summary: Still need to test, but looks good

reviewText: I love this product excellent quality and very durable!  I would highly recommend this product!! The straps at the ends of the bands have excellent craftsmenship
I just recently got this set and I have to say it's amazing! Its very durable and feels great when I use them. Definitely recommended

This is an all-in-one portable gym for anyone who travels often. This is a very good combination of versatility and portability. The 5 bands offer a range of resistance options. The elastic resistance bands offer more directions of motion. This is perfect for exercising the smaller muscles that will usually not be engaged while using the regular gym equipment. I have been using this for over 2 months and hope to enjoy this for a long time to come.

I had my left knee replaced in early January & used this product as prescribed by my physical therapist to strengthen my leg . I have used this product for over nine months with great results.ThanksVincent Avitello

I bought these bands for light work - injury recovery.  I find these bands spectacular.  Attached at one end (very well made attachments) they allow me to stretch and bend and use the muscles as gently or as firmly as I am able.  My partner who is considerably larger and has good muscle mass also enjoys them very much and has received an additional benefit through the lengthening of an ancient scoliosis through systematic stretching.  We bought two sets to create different resistance stations by matching the colors and using the handles (we need to buy an extra set of these handles) and it works very well.I love them so much i never mind giving a stretch as i go by, and doing a set or two of muscle building, and its made a wonderful improvement in my overall healing.BMP I would say has a true devotion to its product and continues to improve it.  Their customer service is excellent, their product is well made.  Of course they have to be used intelligently - it seems obvious that putting too much weight on the bands is never going to be adviseable so choose your proper resistance and have at it.
When I travel it is hard to work out or find time to go to the hotel gym.  This is a great product that is light and easy to take in your suitcase so you can work out in your room.

This resistance band set is made of high quality. I've been using it for a month now for my T25 workouts and it's been great.  The construction quality is good and the bands work very well and I don't have any concerns with them breaking. The included exercise booklet is great and the different attachments it includes help you do a variety of workouts. I did learn a few things while using them that people might want to know.1. Even though there are multiple included bands that allow you to do different weight combinations (great feature), it takes time to attach the bands to the handles, and sometimes I don't feel the effort to un-attach and attach the bands. This gets emphasized on the T25 workouts due to the fact that the workouts are fast paced, I don't want to stop and spend a few min swapping bands. I am looking to get http://amzn.to/1b8DJ67 which will allow me to at least have 2 different weights and I can change dynamically in my workout.2. The exercise booklet is great for doing different exercises and I think people would be very happy with doing that and having that variety. I mainly purchased these bands for T25 and I realized when I got into it that T25 even though they support resistance bands, the muscle and workouts they do are better suited for dumbbells, like weighted squats don't work very well with resistance bands due to resistance is hard to get on a down motion of a squat. This isn't a ding on the product, just a realization that dumbbells do have their place if the workouts a video does is based around them. It isn't enough of an issue for me to want to crowd my living room with dumbbells though.Overall I'm very happy. The price point is ridiculous for this kind of quality. Look elsewhere, and you find a single band for $15-20.  Even them selling the handles alone cost $10.  But right here for $30, you get all the bands, the handles, the straps, and the book, and they're quality made.
summary: Great price for a lot of value

reviewText: I used to use Therabands and needed something a little heavier and more sturdy.  These completely fit the bill.  I've used them when I can't get to the gym, and they are extremely portable and easy to use.  I am impressed at the quality of each band and of the connector points being all metal.  I am 5ft10 and weigh 180lbs.  I bench 240, curl 120lb, and shoulder press with 60lb dumbells at the gym.  These WILL NOT replace gym work for heavy strength training or muscle building, but they have plenty of resistance for me and do a great job for maintaining muscle tone and rehabbing injuries.
summary: Great Quality.  Great Supplement to Weights

reviewText: These bands are a great addition to your training arsenal. They are really well made and with the removable handle design they give you a lot of flexibility to select the correct level of resistance. I'm using them with P90X2 and they are perfect for use on some of the move as well. You can also substitute them for dumbbells for many others moves. The best thing about the bands is their portability so if you are traveling or away from home you can pack them up easily, and bring your workout with you.
summary: Great Product to Use with P90X2

reviewText: i took a chance buying this item . i am very impressed by the quality .  i use them all the time--vw

I purchased a set of Black Mountain Bands on April 18, 2013 and received them within a few days. Three months later, I am happy with this purchase.My purpose for purchasing the bands was to continue my rehabilitation from operations needed for reverse shoulder replacement, in June,2012 and Neck surgery for a broken neck in November, 2012. Because of the neck surgery, I was required to wear a neck brace for 3 months. All of this, really affected the strength in my neck, back, shoulder and arm muscles.When Physical Therapy appointments ran out, I needed something to continue getting stronger and the bands filled that need.The handles are comfortable with easy to connect metal ends to bands metal ends. Plus you can add bands to the handles for extra resistance. I used the bands everyday, until I got strong enough and with doctors permission started to go to the gym. I go to the gym three times a week. The other days I continue to use my bands.I am 83 years young and back to playing golf again.
Came with no damage in shipping. Easy to assemble. Make sure  arms are alined with inner holes on long bar or else short bar wont connect. no shaking on doorframe for pull-up bar. Very happy

I recently ordered this set of bands from BMP and was delighted from start to finish.Ordering was easy, and the package arrived by the time I was hoping for. It was also very easy to observe the progress of my package on Amazon's "Track Your Package" function.When my package did arrive I was delighted to see that it was exactly as described online with no surprises or disappointments.Now that I have had a chance to use the bands I could not be happier with the purchase. The entire set seems to be made of very durable, strong, and efficient materials that leave me confident that they'll withstand heavy use. I also like that there is ONE handle that you can clip multiple bands to. This does two nice things: 1. It makes it easier to stack up multiple bands for extra resistance (you won't have to hold multiple handles in one hand), and 2. It all takes up less space in the bag because there are two handles total, not five. Very good move, BMP.BMP also included a very helpful chart that explains the different band resistance levels, what the resistances are with combinations of bands, and with some nicely depicted exercises.All in all I am very pleased with my purchase and would strongly recommend BMP to anybody.

I tried a few different bands before my college and home gyms.  What makes these bands different is that these bands can actually be detached from their handles.  This is important because if you use bands with dumbbells, the handle on the bands can really get in the way.Also, the various levels of resistance really help.
Happy with the bands, they work great and seem to be better quality than most. Would recommend to friends and family.

I bought a set of these bands to work with my fiancé on strength training and also so I can get some good work in at home. I can honestly say this is one of the better sets of resistance bands I've seen anywhere for the price. I love how much variance in weight there is. It allows me to start from square one with my fiancé, who is a beginning strength trainer; but I can easily increase the weight for her or myself. The latch mechanism is awesome and gives me much more confidence in use than the plastic latches a lot of other systems use. The durability of the bands themselves are nice as well.My only quarrel is that I wish the bands were about 6 inches longer.
