This parachute is alot of fun.  My kids love to play with the parachute.  Not only do they play with friends, but it has become a family fun game.  My kids love to see howlong they can keep a ball bouncing on it.  Durable and easy to store.

I should of listened to other reviewers when they stated that the material is not flowly parachute fabric.  The fabric is crinkly, stinky plastic like fabric that does not behave the same way that a parachute would.  It smelled of plastic right out of the box and the colors were purple, gold and green.  Very similar to Mardi Gras.  It is going back because I intended to use it with babies and if I don't like the feeling of the parachute on my face, its not soothing or soft, than the babies definitely will not either.Amazon was amazing as usual.  Great shipping and returns.  Very quick.

My kids and the rest of the kids in the family love playing it however i do wish it had better material. The first day my niece grabbed onto the handle and a piece of the parachute (material) together and her little nail cut a couple little openings on the material, and now im afraid that  with the force of the parachute being swung up and down it may make thw parachute rip faster since it already has little hoes, its not that bad but you Can tell. I just had to show my niece how to hold on to the handle itself and not grab the material. Overall, as long as the kids enjoy it, im fine with it
summary: kids love and enjoy it very much

reviewText: Use this at pre school and a 2 year olds bday party.  Is always a hit.  Don't even need balls with it.

A huge hit on my granddaughters 4th birthday party. It was well made, colorful, and lots of fun. It was definiteyou a great choice for a birthday party. Ordered the 25 small colorful blow up beach balls which were a lot of fun when we placed them on top of the parachute and threw them into the air. This was one of my best purchases ever! You can't go wrong with this purchase.
i got it for my 5 year old sister and she only wanted to play with it all day.
This is a hit with the kids.  Outside or inside.  Great quality, durable and bright colors.  I would highly recommend.
We all remember doing this in school. Not much else to say but it is still as fun now that I'm an adult with three girls :)
This parachute is very colorful and perfect for classes or parties! Durable, large enough for 8 or more.Very happy I purchased 3!!

I received it within 3-4 days of ordering, which was a very pleasant surprise. The toy itself does have a smelly powder on it when received, but it's okay after washing. Very interesting colors and patterns on it. Kids I've used it with seem to enjoy it and I really like it as well.
summary: Fun toy for wide age range

reviewText: It's a parachute, but it's also so many other things!  My daughter loves to make tents with hers.  It folds up small, and is much more hands-on and imaginative than other toys.  Nice to have when other kids come over to the house (birthdays, family gatherings, etc.).  Good buy!

I have two children (ages almost 2 and almost 6), we have never enjoyed this toy.  You need at LEAST 6 people in a circle in order to play any game on this.  The parachute is a fine size for indoor usage (not too small of a room), but too little to get underneath.  I've been wanting a parachute for my kids for a long time now and I regret this purchase.  In order to get SOME use out of it, we've put it over tables to use as a tent, but honestly blankets work better.
summary: Not fun unless you have a bunch of kids

reviewText: For the past several years I have vollunteered at my kids' school for their anual field day, and I am always assigned the parachute activity.  From grades K-5 most kids chose this as their favorite.  There are so many games and activities for this simple parachute, I even enjoy them with the kids.  So of course I had to buy one for home.  I have three kids ages 8, 7, and 3; we all have fun together.

I remembered this from my childhood and they don't use them often in school so when I can across this I had to buy one. It is made with great quality and I think it will last for quite some time. It's large enough for several kids to play together. Was a great buy for us.

There are 6 grandchildren in the family and we got this to keep at grandma's house for everyone to play with.  Even the adults have fun with it and remember when we used to play with one when we were kids.  We got the 10' size so we can play with it indoors as well as outdoors.  The kids (even the babies) absolutely love it and the little ones stand in the middle and laugh while the older kids hold onto the parachute.  I totally recommend this toy for the whole family to have fun with. The only suggestion is that it should come with some plastic balls so you can bounce them in the middle (like popcorn).  We actually have some from another toy we use.
Great play experience for small children. My grand kids loved it and get it out for parties and play time.

This parachute is lots of fun. Very durable, bright colors, easy to hold on to. All of the seams are sewn nicely, and I suspect that this parachute will last for a long time. It is big -- definitely look for something smaller if it's only for a couple of kids. We had six playing with ours, and it almost wasn't enough to be able to do some kinds of parachute games like running underneath. It came in a nice mesh bag that the parachute fits in even if you don't fold it -- it can just be shoved in there and then the bag can be hung by its drawstring for storage.

What do you do when you have 4 or more kids of the same age in your house. Here take this parachute and go outside. Putting a ball on the top and letting them bounce it out is a fun game. Or bouncing the ball and trying to keep it on the parachute for a more difficult game. This one is not quite big enough to walk under and pull it down while you are inside. Well it would work for small kids, not with an adult in the group.
It's a very good size playchute, very durable. Kids love to play with it in the classroom or in the park.

I remember playing with the large parachute when I was in grade school in PE.  The entire class had such a good time!I purchased this for my 5 year old godson and his 3 year old sister for Christmas.  Now, it's not as much fun with just the two of them, but when the neighbor kids come over, their mom brings it out.  That's when the fun begins.  It's amazing how long a piece of material can keep a group of kids entertained!

I teach preschool and school age fitness and this is perfect for that age group. I bought two so that we could have groups and first time using it the class was full of nonstop joy and laughter. It is affordable and good quality. I would recommend to anyone! Great Fun for smaller groups and not an overwhelming size.
Happy with purchase. I bought it for 3 families with young children and I believe they are all enjoying them.
Boys ages 6, 4, and 4 and girl 2 years of age and even the adults loved this - it appears to be well made and will last a long time
summary: Kids had a blast with this playchute

reviewText: very nice coloring but tore only after a few times of playing with it. I had a different one that lasted a few years with my kids playing with it.

I bought this as a party game for my daughter's 4th birthday.  The nice thing was that she got to use it over & over again after the party.  The kids loved it!!!!  Her 2 year old sister asks to play with it all the time.  We drap it over the table and they play under it and they even love just sitting on it outside.  It was played with all summer long and now that winter is here it's coming back inside.  It was well worth the price.  I was actually suprised how durable and large it was.  One of the best toys I've bought!!
My girls are 5 and 3 and have played with this parachute everyday since the day they got it.  It is wonderful for promoting imaginative play.  I would highly reommend this item.
summary: The most popular item in our playroom

reviewText: The parachute was made of a stiffer plastic than the parachutes I see at schools which are softer and more fabric-like.  It works very well though, as me and my 2 year old were able to lift it successfully while tying a 3rd end to a doorknob (motherhood makes you a little like MacGyver lol)Great for the price, and good to use at birthday parties!
summary: Works very well, great for parties. Crunchy material, not soft like the ones used at schools.

reviewText: I wouldn't buy this for a child over about 6-7. It is flimsy and nothing like I used to play with at our local elementary school. I would say this would be fun for 3-4 kiddos under the age of 6.
I bought this for an infant play group, and the babies really enjoy it.  It's fairly big for babies.  We need at least three moms to use it.
exactly as describe.  Kids love it .  I recommned ito o o o o o o o o o

This was perfect for me. I am a music teacher and it is a good size for my classes of between 18 and 20 young students. Any more than that would be a squeeze, I think. It has been used a lot and has survived the pulling and stretching it has endured so far. It seemed a little stiff when I took it out of the packet but it soon loosened up and now works like a charm. It also has a handy sized carry bag which is easy to pop the parachute into when I am done with it. Altogether, a great product and very good for the price.
We used this at our daughter's 3rd birthday party and the kids loved it.  It is very durable and fun.

This parachute is the hit of the party, playdate, or just an afternoon in the yard.  My two little girls grew up at gymboree classes and love having their own parachute.  They have hours of fun whenever we pull it out.  The parachute is durable and can be machine washed.  It packs up small into its own duffle bag.  A great item to keep in the trunk of the car in case you end up at a park or somebody's yard with no playground equipment.
Great for preschool kiddo's.... they love to play under it on it  and with it.  Great size for 8-10 kids
Good toy for the kids to enjoy active play. We used it at the beach with a group of kids and adults. A little small but still fin

I have had other parents say it was the best buy I ever made and I agree! Every time I bring it out to the park for my daughter and her friends it is a hit; they play under it, run with it, and whatever else comes to a preschooler's mind. We are often afraid that the rough treatment and dragging each other around on it will tear it, but it withstands all. Easy to clean too. Not sure at what age they will outgrow it, but for 3-and 4-year-olds it's a must!  If you buy it you won't be sorry!
summary: A hit at every get together!

reviewText: My daughter's love playing with this parachute. It's perfect for when their cousins and friends come over for play dates.

The parachute is lightweight, durable, colorful, and was great for sitting under while it flopped up and down as well as for catapulting a 10-year-old into the air.  The latter is not the intended use and I'm sure the manufacturer does not recommend this, but as a testament to the strength of the fabric and the stitching, there have been zero signs of wear or failure after hours of "field testing".
I used it on my son's birthday party, and the kids just went crazy and had so much fun with it!

This is my 2nd parachute for my gkids.The first when to toy heaven!  They have had fun for over 4-5 years. We live in Brazil and when I traveled to the US this past month, my gdaughter asked for the circle thing...She di not have a name for it.  It was christened at my gson's birthday party.  I ordered the large size and  my son said it was a big hit at the party for many different ages of children.

I bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday party 5 years ago.  It is still in great condition with seams and handles in tact.  I don't use it regularly, but its still very bright in color and drapes nicely.  I like the bag for storage!
This parachute was a great classic buy.  We got it for my daughters 2nd birthday and used it to play games with the kids...They all loved it.

I bought this toy for my almost 2 and 3 year old boys, as well as for a gift for a girls' 3rd b-day. I admit that it's not as easy or as fun to use unless you have at least 3 people holding the chute. It will be a big hit at any party, playgroup, or get together. All ages are drawn to playing with a parachute and all have a blast. It also fosters group creativity and dynamic play; turn taking, cooperation, and collective participation. I love the bright colors that just add to the fun and festivity of play. Get outside and have a blast!
It is fun for kids to play with this colorful parachute, although it is less good for a single child. Also, it is easy to store.

I thought i was going to surprise my Nephews with a new thing they never saw before.  But they had seen this in there day care.  That didn't stop them from having hours of fun with it.  It seems to be there new favorite toy.

My daughter, who is 3, loves this parachute! The day we received we brought it outside and enjoyed it with the neighborhood kids! Would love the option to buy a CD with it for activities/music to go along w/playing w/parachute!Seems very sturdy, solid construction and handles. Great size!
summary: Lots of fun--perfect outdoor group activity!

reviewText: The playchute is so colorful who wouldn't want to play with it?It seems to be made study enough for many years of play.The chute is big enough for six to eight children (under six years).Besides taking turns, just think of all the spacial concepts littleones can learn with this fun tool.  I bought five and have one moreto purchase! Stuff bag could be a little bigger.
summary: Sturdy enough for many years of play

reviewText: I purchased this parachute after working with several Vacation Bible Schools in which it would have been helpful.  Now, I have my own kids and figured it would be a great play-date, party and VBS investment.  The look on my son's face as he joyfully played with it the first time was certainly worth it!  I worked with 2, 3, and 4 year-olds and they all enjoyed it in one way or another.  I look forward to pulling it out when we have kids over to play!

I ordered this for my new German Shepherd puppy because I want to start training for agility. This tunnel is completely indestructible. Her sharp puppy teeth can demolish anything I give her except for this toy. She wrestles and attacks and plays with it more than any other toy. It is great exercise for her, and she loves running in and out of it. It is worth every penny. I kept thinking as soon as she wrecks this I am going to order another, but after 2 months, it is good as new.

This parachute is a lot of fun!  Kids come up with all kinds of uses for it, but our favorite game is to put the baby underneath the parachute in the middle and just pull it up and down.  He gets a kick out of it and the older kids love to see his reaction.This one is bigger than I thought it would be, which is a good thing, but unfortunately we actually don't have enough people to play with it when my husband is not home.  If each person holds onto 2 handles it can fit about 5-6 people around.  But if you have only 3 people to play with, while it still works, it's more fun with more people.  But I guess that's the way all games/toys should be!Definitely recommend this for outdoor (or indoor with a lot of room) activities with lots of kids!
All of our children love this tunnel ages 1-8. The cat even races through it. It is very durable and stands up to a lot of rough play. They seem interested in it after several months of use.
summary: Fun for everyone... even the cat

reviewText: I would recommend it. The kids enjoy it and it is very durable. I had this when i was a kid and it is hard to find stuff that I grew up with and it be as durable.

This is a wonderful tunnel. My 2 year old granddaughter loves it, but her cousins that are older had a great time with it too! They stood upright and walked around bouncing and falling in the backyard onto the grass.
The kids at my daycare love this!  Perfect size for my little ones! I read other reviews and they were all right!
Wish there's a bigger sizes available. Though it could provide shade, it would the best if its waterproof when there's a sudden shower at the park or open atea.

I bought this for my 10 month old daughter for Christmas. She loves it!!! Great price, the material feels very sturdy. There is extra padding on the wire portions so their little knees wont take a beating. It also collapses down very easily for storage and to open you just release the velcro straps and it goes right to shape. Would definetely recommend and would buy again.

I purchased this for my grandchildren (2 1/2, 3 1/2, 5 1/2) and they love it. It stores easily which is a real positive for us. I was surprised at the games they were able play with it while using their imaginations. I highly recommend this item!

My son goes through phases with this toy. One day he'll play with it all day, then he'll forget about it for weeks. When he does play with it, he is all giggles. I love to hear how fun he thinks this is. I didn't love when he demanded I crawl in it 9 mos pregnant, but it made him so happy and for the most part it is pretty easy fun.

Got this for my 4-yr old son to bring to his two sets of cousins' houses.  It definitely intrigues the kiddos.  It would be better with more mature children (5+).  Smaller ones just want to run under it, but it's a worthy purchase even for that.  Very happy with this parachute - seems very durable.  Glad for the storage bag also.  Look forward to using it other places and when my son and his cousins (and friends) get a bit older.
Love the tunnel have three small children that love to go through the tunnel all day long. Tunnel is able to be connected to tents with round openings.
Both my sons 7 and 3 love this equally...This was good purchase.  I should have purchased the tent with it.

This was a gift when my son was 1, and he is 4 now. He still asks to play with it often. It is big so we keep it hidden away most of the time, which makes it a special treat when they get to play with it. It is great for teaching kids "through" "in" "out" and "over". Older kids use it for imaginary play - hiding from bad guys and the like.  After so much use one of the strings broke so that's why I gave it a 4 for durability. Overall though it has stayed in really great condition. Definitely recommend to give as a gift or for your own children under 4.
This tunnel is very easy to set up, easy to put away and works well with the pacific play tent.  My son enjoys playing with it and so I love it!
Awesome product!!! Very sturdy design!!! LOVE how it collapses so you can literally store anywhere! Fun and exciting for any toddler, keep my kids busy for hours!
summary: Even my 4 year old loves this

reviewText: This is the most durable play tunnel that I have found! I am very impressed by the way it holds up to my 3 and 1 year olds' rough housing! It looks as good as the day it was pulled out of the box! Another great feature is that it can very easily be folded and put away when we need to free up the living room.

Oh My!  We saw my daughter instantly fall in love with this toy at a friends house, and just had to get one.  Sometimes these types of reactions backfire, and our daughter decides the toy was only fun at someone else's house.  But not this time!  The tunnel is a constant fixture in the living room, and at 1 year old, she loves crawling back and forth through the tube, playing peek-a-boo with someone at the other end, and hiding inside with other toys.  The cat likes it too ;)
love this!  my son just loves this play tent and the best part is that it folds up great for storage!
Bought this for my daughter as a toddler, she loves it!  Made well, has stood up to a lot of rough play!  Would recommend.
My daughter and her friends love this toy. We used it last weekend for her 1st birthday party and all the children aged from 1 to 10 had so much fun playing with it.

Our 10 month old loves to play with this toy, but the first day we used it, the fumes from the material were so bad that we both got dizzy. A couple of hours airing out on our deck did the trick, and now we are back to fun times in our tunnel!
very very nice for a puppy All you have to do is put it down in a sturdy place ,Your pet will like it

We bought this for our 2 year old son. He totally loves going through it. We have only been using it for a couple months in our home and it is already ripping along the stitching. It has also become a little dangerous as the metal spring end has come apart and has ripped a hole in the nylon. We can't put the spring end back to where it should be so it pokes out. We thought it might have lasted a little longer than a few months. It's not as "rugged" as it claims to be.

We've had this tunnel for years and it is just so sturdy.  Countless hours of play and lots of kids and it is still like brand new!  The kids love it and I can get it out for a day or two then easily fold back up and put away until our next play.  Doesn't take much storage space and there are lots of different ways you can play with it.
My kids love this, I have 2 year old and a 5 year old, and I was surprised at how much my older son enjoyed it.  Both kids squeal with delight inside it.  It takes a  beating and has help up well
summary: My kids love this, I have 2 year old and a ...

reviewText: I purchased this tunnel for the second time just recently.  The first time was for my son when he was 2.  His is now 12 and still perodically uses this tunnel when he his hiding from his friends while paying "Zombie Apocalypse". Definitely durable.  This time I purchased this tunnel for my 1 year old grandson.  Report is that he loves it as much as my son did and does.  Highly recommend!

This is the best toy.  We play together and my daughter cant stop grinning and giggling. Great quality after 2 months of Kid and dog wear and tear it is still in great shape. Very impressed.  I recommend this highly.

This was a gift for my 18 month old granddaughter, given at a family gathering. She immediately knew what to do. Her 7 and 11 year old cousins played as well (as did the cat). Very well made, nice colors and I like the easy storage velcro. I was a bit upset at the 20 x 26 by 20 box the item came in as it measured 16 x 16 x 3.
summary: fun for a variety of ages.

reviewText: It is just a coil collapsable tube meant to go with a matching kids tent but its a ton of fun itself and for my 3.5 year old too.

My three kids have loved this tunnel since they were two(they are now 5,7 & 9) They still play with it alot. They do a variety of things with it including magic tricks where the child inside will "magically" disappear. It's great exercise too to be on your hands and knees. They also love to play "tornado" with it, where one child gets inside standing up while the others throw stuffed animals into it, meanwhile the child inside throws them back outlike a real tornado does.

I bought this for my Siberian Husky puppy after seeing the high costs of the same item for dogs.  It's nice quality and folds up easily with velcro straps.  Perfect toy for your puppy to mid-sized animal.  Nice quality product and bright colors.

I bought this for my 2-year-old nephew and he LOVES it! He is a bit rough with it, but it has held up for several months now. It's a great toy to let him burn some toddler energy and is great for indoors - it fits in my brother's small living room and he says it's simple to open and set up and then put away.

My daughter loves this tunnel.  It's made of good material, is big enough for her to grow into (I can climb through it on my stomach), and it's a nice length to climb through.  We plan on buying the matching tent soon that can be attached to it.

I purchased this item for my 11 month old twin boys. They LOVE IT! They push on the outside of it and move it around the room. They crawl through it and laugh the whole time. It's great. Only had it one day, but so far so GREAT.

All my nieces and nephews ranging from 10mths - 7 years have gotten well beyond my moneys worth out of this. It's perfect on a rainy day or when the kids are bored. VERY DURABLE. I have mine 3 years and its still holding up like the day I bought it and I have had some rough boys playing with it.
summary: Kids of all ages love this from 10mths-7 years

reviewText: I bought this tunnel when my son was around 15 months old.  Now he is 4 and both my kids are getting so much use out of it.  The tunnel is very durable and the primary colors look great in my playroom.  My kids have come up with all sorts of different ways to play with it and it continues to last.  I would recommend this product for anyone with little kids.
summary: Mother of a 2 and 4 year old

reviewText: What a disappointment!A. Its a long un-secured tunnel. It constantly moves and what's the point?B. My 20month old son got caught up in the thing due to the fact that it was moving as he was crawling through it!C. MADE IN CHINA...Can't seem to find hardly ANY toys made in AMERICA. somehow, I just don't believe they are using "safe" materials.D. IT SMELLS like plastic. So bad it fumigated my entire living room. Had to open the doors and windows...I even had my dog try it outside....the thing moves and rolls side to side...we could not figure out how to secure it at all.perhaps this works for some but for us this was a total waste of money., I would send it back but its not even worth the hassle. Do yourself a favor: GO THE TO STORE and purchase this. If your looking for as tunnel...keep looking. this is DEFINETLY NOT it! smh

We recently got this for our 2 year old son to work on his OT issues and strengthen his back muscles. He loved it right away and started crawling back and forth in it giggling up a storm! It is pretty well made and has nice straps with velcro that allow me to close it up each night and store it neatly. I think we will be using this for awhile. Good product!
summary: Pacific Play Tents Find Me Multi Color 6' Tunnel

reviewText: My kids love this and play with it all the time.  They are 7, 6, and 1.  We got it for the 1 year old for his birthday and it was a hit with all the kids!
Our 13 month old daughter loves crawling through the tunnel.  We also play quite a bit of peekaboo in and around the tunnel.  Hours of enjoyment.
I got this for my son when I noticed he loves getting under a blanket and hidden while his older brother plays with him. Once he started to use they are now both regulars at hide and seek.
summary: My 11 month old godson loves it

reviewText: This is a great product. Very easy to collaspe and put away and my daughter loves it. Still asks for it about twice a week. She is almost two years old. Only complaint it does not attach well to the pop up house I have but good enough. Definately reccommend.
summary: great continuos fun you get your monies worth

reviewText: The kids really liked this and it has held up well. We only use it inside. And they only get it out a few times a month. The downside to me was that the wire hurts your knees when crawling through. My kids often put a blanket in the bottom to make it softer.
We bought this for our daughter whose a toddler and she loves crawling in and out of it. Great buy!

I bought this for my 18 month old grand daughter for Christmas, and she loves it.She loves playing hide and seek, and this is perfect for that.It's lightweight and easy to set up and collapse and store.
summary: Well made, easy to set up and store

reviewText: I got this for my son for his first birthday. He absolutely LOVES it. Great, well-made product and great price.

This is great quality and a lot of fun!  Warning though, as soon as you undo the Velcro straps the springs open up the tunnel and they are so powerful that it can go airborn.  Not sure if that will lessen overtime, but definitely use caution when opening.
summary: Great quality but watch out for those springs!

reviewText: I just purchased a 6' Pacific  Play Tent Find Me Multi Color 6' Tunnel.  This was the SECOND ONE I have purchased from Amazon.  The first one, now two years old, is still going strong!  I have two, vivacious, Pembroke Welsh Corgis.  When I got the first one, I had just started their agility training.  To make it easy to use in a second, I just left it set up.  I used empty laundry soap or kitty litter jugs, filled with inexpensive litter and some water, for weights.  The first tunnel has been set up in my yard for two years now, in the south Florida sun and rain.  The only times I took it down was when high winds were predicted.  Except for slight color fading from the sun, it is in PERFECT condition!  The metal spring rings have not bent.  There are no rips or tears in the nylon fabric.  I got a less expensive one from a toy store last year, and it is not in as good as condition as the first one.  The reason for the additional purchase is to add length.  With 3, 6' tunnels, I have the option of having 3 short tunnels on a practice course or putting them together with velcro and having a long tunnel.  For me, this is the best, most economical, but best quality, way to go.
summary: GREAT FOR A DOG AGILITY TUNNEL

reviewText: Age recommendation is I think for 3 and up, but my one year old boys love these. We have two that you can connect into one long tunnel or have two short ones. Easy to scrunch up and store or take with you. Seem to be good quality too!
Its a big tunnel. The kids use it with forts and the like and they love it. Collapses nicely so that it can easily be put away. Nuff said. Perfect item!
I bought this tunnel after reading the reviews for it and it has lived up to my expectations.  My kids love it, it is durable and it folds up easily for storage when they are not playing with it.

I ordered this toy for my 2 dogs who are still quite young and are in desperate need of distraction and activity when I can't take them out for walks.  It's just as much fun for them as it is for children, I'm sure.  Plus, it's easy to open, close and store!  I keep this product in my backyard and so far, it's been resistent to the rainy weather we've had.Danielle Di RienzoBrooklyn, NY
This was an item from the wanted list at the humane league of lancaster and was sent directly to them

Purchased this tunnel as a gift for my son's first birthday. He loves to crawl through, especially with someone waiting at the other end. Durable construction, bright colors. Best part is how it folds flat for storage or for easy travel to Grandmom's house.

I purchased this tunnel to accompany the matching Pacific Play Tent we had. My 4 and 2 year old boys love it! It is very durable when they play, and it is also very easy to store away when they are all done.

Puppies have a great time with this.  Learn not to be afraid.  Inter active play time for them.  Probably good for a kid too, but I have dogs.Good inexpensive tunnel for them to have fun with.Pacific Play Tents Find Me Multi Color 6' Tunnel
Have had this now for almost six months. No visible wear or fraying at all. Was concerned about that based on other reviews, but so far this is holding up well with daily use by my daughter.

I got this as part of an agility course I'm making for my 2 Pugs! They love it!!! The weather has remained cool, so it's still in the living room. They chase each other thru it all the time. It's very sturdy. Even their sharp claws haven't disturbed it a bit! Thanx for a great product! Deb

Bought as a gift for twin grandchildren for their first birthday.  Was a little worried that it might not be stable enough for them to crawl through without hurting them. It is cushioned well over the frame, and very secure.  They love it and think it is so funny to go back and forth, chasing their big (4yr old) sister!  Great buy and BIG HIT with the grands!

I bought this tunnel for my 2 grandchildren - -age 2 1/2 and 10 months.  They absolutely LOVE it!  They spend lots of time crawling thru - -chasing each other - and playing peek a boo.  It folds up very easily and travels with us too.  It's great for a rainy day and we have even used it on the beach.  Highly recommend it.
Great grandson enjoys this toy as well as the play tent.  He loves crawling into the tunnel and then into the tent.  It is a safe and good exercise.
I agree with others - the construction is solid, with heavy nylon fabric and steel rings. Glad I avoided the vinyl ones - this should hold up to our robust 3 and 1-year old grandkids.

Our two year old daughter adores this toy.  It is easy to take out and put away with the attached Velcro straps.  Once stored it takes up almost no space at all.  It is also very, very rugged.  No matter how much abuse our daughter gives it, it just springs back into shape.  Now if only her parents could fit in the tube without doing a "military low crawl"...
summary: Great for an Active 2 Year Old

reviewText: This thing is great! We got it for our 19 month old boy and he is having a ball with it.  it seems to be super durable and the little foam they put on top of the ribbing on the inside really helps make it soft ont he hands and knees. what I really like about it is how durable the seams are. we like to fold it up like we're going to store it and then put it on the floor around him and let go so it exends vertically around him. the 'spring' is strong enough to stand all the way up and the seams are thick enough it doesn't rip or stretch. i've even crawled through it a few times without issue.He also got a tent from another company. I get worried everytime I move it or he gets in and bumps up against the side that its going to rip apart. no where near as good construction and I know it cost more than the tent made by Pacific.Overall I'm very satisfied with this product and as always Amazon comes through with a great transaction and fast shipping.
summary: Pacific Play Tent a big hit!

reviewText: I bought this for my gymnastics business.  This tunnel is used on a daily basis for children ages 1 through 10 so it has been used at least a thousand times over the years.  It looks as good as the day I first got it.  Children not only love crawling through the tunnel, but can play peek-a-boo, or roll a ball from one end to another person at the other end.  I highly recommend it for any parent.
summary: Very durable--I've had for several years at my business.

reviewText: Our dog likes running through tunnels, so this works well for us.  He's a corgi, so he's short and fits right through it. He doesn't like it when it moves on him, though, so we always put something on either side of it so it can't roll around.
summary: use it for a dog tunnel

reviewText: This tunnel is the most fun for kids when they can or can't go outside. They have loads of fun for hours. Delivered in a timely manner.

Such a great toy! Our daughter actually bugs us by wanting to take it out all the time. She loves it and if you are small enough, you can go in too. It folds up nice and small, I recommend this to everyone.
I'm 2 years old. My grandma and grandpa bought this for me because I use one at gymnastics and love playing in it now at home too.

My son (and our cat) love to run/crawl through this tunnel.  It is good quality and sturdy...even I can crawl though slowly without destroying it.  My only concern is that I've been looking for addon's but folks are indicating the units are not really that compatible but this is a good start.  Watch the price, it fluctuates considerably.

Our one year old daughter has loved this tunnel for a few months now.  We bought it thinking she was "having problems" crawling (first time parents ha!). I can't say this helped her but she has lots of fun going through it.  I crawl through on occasion and it kind of hurts my knees.  Definitely doesn't bother her though.  She's always very proud of herself when she gets to the other side.  Might look into the tent or whatever else connects to it.Also - we live in a small condo.  This folds up really easily and is super compact.  Its really nice to have something "big" that we can actually have in our home for her to play with.
My niece has one and my daughter loved it so I had to get her one.  It's the perfect indoors activity toy.

Love this crawl tunnel! My one year old loves going back and forth through the tunnel. It's also very sturdy and is able to support him when he stands up against it. Easy to fold up and store. Would definitely recommend this product.

This is exactly what I was looking for. My 9-month-old loves it! She will crawl to one end, turn around and crawl back, and keep at that for quite a while without ever getting out. She has a blast in it, crawling and laughing. Sometimes she likes to stop in the middle and just hang out for a bit, or roll around in it. She also likes when we chase her through it (although it's a tight squeeze for grown ups!) or sneak up on her and peek in when she's "hiding" in there. It is a great quality tunnel, the price is right, and I love the primary colors. I would highly recommend this to anyone. I'm sure it will provide years of entertainment and will be great for outdoor play come spring. My favorite type of toy is simple ones like this that don't require batteries and kids can use their imaginations and have endless amounts of fun!
This play tunnel is loads of fun for indoor play.  Great colors and nice material.  Our grandson loves this tunnel and his tent that matches.

I purchased this for my one year old grandson. At first he just stared at it, then  i got on one end and said i see you and he started crawling thru. Now he loves it he will sit inside it he puts he books in there and look at them  he plays hide and seek in it
Got this for my 18m old nephew. He was scared of it at first but grew to liking it. Now he finds it loves when I open it and it springs open then crawls through it giggling.

I am an Occupational Therapist, and use the tunnel in my therapy sessions.  My kids love it.  I often use it with puzzles, shape sorters and other activities.  It helps to increase sensory input, center and calm kids.  As I said before, love it!

I'm going to keep this review short and simple. My son loves it and it seems to be very durable thus far!  As a bonus, our dog loves running through it too!  Overall, this is a lot of fun, make the purchase today!

My grandson is 15 month old and as soon as we opened the package he proceeded to crawl through the tunnel several times  backwards and forwards,  I am sure it will give him much pleasure.  The tunnel fold up very easily to carry with or store away very easily.

We have a playgroup in our neighborhood for toddlers every week. Whenever it's held at my house, this tunnel is definitely the favorite toy in the house. Kids love climbing through it, playing peekaboo.Educational? Maybe for teaching about object permanence.Physical? Great for play time, either alone or with other children. Works well as part of an obstacle course, too.I never would have thought of buying a tunnel for my son, but I am so glas our friends gave it to him for his 1st birthday!Also, it folds up (the spring "collapses") to about 4-6 inches for storage.
My grand kids like playing with this they think there under ground sometimes. Wish it was twice as long for them .
Great fun for grandson's 2nd birthday party! Not sure how long it will last but I know he had great fun on his birthday with all his cousins !
The grandchildren really loved this tunnel.  It's circumference and length was a perfect size for kids.  It's sturdy and also folds up for easy storage.

The play tunnel was bought as a gift to my Grand son, in fact we bought 2 so that he could have a longer experience. When you're one it's a great hiding place in the garden. It's good to get away from the 'Olds' - they're too big to get in. It's downright fun to crawl at speed through and come out in a totall different place. He's enjoyed it and we've enjoyed wahtching him enjoy it.
summary: Play tunnels are fun when your one

reviewText: My two year old granddaughter loves to play with this tunnel.  I am surprised how much "jostling" it can take.  It is durable, and so good that it compacts so easily.  Next I will get the tent to go with it.

Purchased this tunnel to replace an agility tunnel that was destroyed by our pups in 1 day.  We are on week 2 with the tunnel, and it still looks like the day we bought it.  This tunnel exceeded our expectations, is extremely well made, and of a higher quality than any we have owned or looked at in pet supplies.  The pups spend hours running through and playing hid and seek in the tunnel.  We are able to use it inside and outside the house.  The Velcro straps help hold it securely when collapsed for night time storage.  I would definitely buy this product again, but I am confident we will not have a reason to replace it.
This is so much fun for our whole family. We purchased for our 1 year old grandson, now my 36 year old daughter crawls through it as well after the toddler. It easily stores away for convenience.

My nine month old loves this tent tunnel. We just received it yesterday and he has already crawled through it several times. He has also chased the cat through it and smiles every time he see his mommy at the other end calling his name. I don't usually review items but felt the need to because I almost didn't purchase this item because someone else in the reviews said it smelled like gasoline but that is not true at all! There is a new tent smell when you first open it but fades fast. Love this item and so does my son. Worth every penny!
summary: My nine month old loves this tent tunnel!

reviewText: I bought this tunnel for inside my home for my 3 dogs.  Our one dog who has done agility before loves it!  Reasonable and very sturdy!

The material of the product was much better than I expected it to be.  It is thicker and so far, it is holding up quite well with some stress.  Our daughter don't play too rough with it, but we have friends' boys who would jump, tug, roll and do all sorts of thing with it, and it's great!

My daughter got this for 2. birtsday and she has always great fun using it together with the crawl n play house. We use it in the living room or outside and always its stored or changed in a matter of seconds. If she is playing with friends they are even sitting on it and falling over it, its so flexible that it doesn't hurt. Playing with friends she has big action going through the tunnel with them.

I purchased the tunnel alone (not the attachable tent) for my 18 month old.  She loved it from the start and immediatly crawled through a couple of times (barefooted).  I have had it less than a week, and the seam arount the blue end of the tunnel began to unravel.  My dauther had craweld through without shoes exactly 5 times befor the seam gave way.  It't too much trouble to send it back, so I will repair it on my own and hope the other seams hold.

My friend has this for her son, and her new puppy fell in love with it, so I thought I might try it for my new girl. So, I bought this for my 10 week old puppy - she just loves it. It took her a minute to get used to it, but now she'll go out of her way to run through it. So far its held up quite nicely to puppy chewing, running etc. What I really love is that is sooo easy to fold up. I can put it away in a minute and when she's ready to play I can just pop it open. So much fun - plus its big enough that she'll be able to play with it long into her growing stages. Very fun toy! Not sure if kids of the human variety enjoy it as much as the furry ones, but I recommend it if you have a playful puppy!

We got this for our 8 month old that loved to tunnel.  He has been using it for the last 2 months and has a lot of fun crawling through and rocking balls back and forth in it.  Shortly after we got it we had 2 4-year old boys over for a party and they played with it VERY HARD (including both standing up in it, together, falling over, repeating).  The tunnel is no worse for the wear.

I got this tunnel for my dogs.  It seems very durable and was very easy to set up.  It is smaller than the ones used in agility competitions, but is good for practicing at home or teaching the concept of tunneling.  Word of caution to large dog owners, its only 19 inches in diameter so it might be too small for your dog.  I have three small dogs so its perfect!
My children loved an earlier larger diameter version of this tunnel.  This one performs well but my grandson will out grow it quickly.  An adult would could not crawl through with their child.
summary: Great For Toddler's But a Little Narrow

reviewText: I originally bought this on the advice of people who train puppies in agility skills. Their suggestion was to not buy agility tunnels, but instead, find a decent & afforable tunnel in kid toys. I went with this tunnel based in other buyer reviews and now it's time I add my own review.I have a now 26 week old pup and didn't want to invest too much in materials if agility ended up not being her cup of tea. As I said, this tunnel came with good reviews for durability and the price was right.Well, turns out she loves training to go through this tunnel, so I just ordered a second one to extend the length. I love that option! and it's one of the main reasons I went with this particular tunnel.Now, to be real:  I never leave the tunnel out for her to just play with. I am sure she would ruin it ... after all, she is still a pup with a big chew & destroy drive. Fortunately, this tunnel is easy to set up & take down.So for those of you thinking about dog agility training - or not - this product worked out well for me and I can recommend it.
summary: Perfect tunnel for training my energetic puppy!

reviewText: The quality is good, it was just a little stained when it arrived? Not sure if it happened in transit or not.
Meet all my expectations.  It is fairly long, so to fit in our play area i attached the two ends with the Velcro trap to make a half moon.
My children love this. it is very sturdy and folds pretty small... my kids have put this tunnel through a lot n it is still alive. I would definitely recommend this tunnel !
summary: Daycare children love this to for a good 30 min.

reviewText: My kids went crazy over these right out of the box... I mean batty.  COnnect this to a home made fort and you've created a virual paradise... can't go wrong!

Have triplet boys and they are developing at different times.  The tent keeps them entertained even the one not crawling asyet.  It's easy to put up and stores well since it ties into a small ring.  The boys and mom are have a good time with thetunnel.  It also cleans easily with a wet cloth.  Great fun.
summary: Great fun and encourages them to crawl

reviewText: Even adults love to slither through this tunnel.  May be a bit daunting for children who dislike enclosed spaces, or to adults who try to tame it into the storage configuration without first having a game plan, but it does provide hours of enjoyment, esp. when attached to the go-with tent.
summary: Good for preschoolers who like a good slither space.

reviewText: I bought this for my 15 month old and 1 year old twins that I babysit. They love it. They laugh and chase each other. Hours of fun! Highly recommend.

I'm impressed with the quality for the price here!I bought this as a practice tunnel for dog agility.  It's light, so I use two stick-in-the-ground poles criss-crossed over either end to hold it in place.  But it's lightweight and compact when folded up.  Very durable fabric for the price and weight.
We had purchased another tunnel from a different manufacturer and it did not last at all.  This one has exceeded my expectations and is still going strong!

I bought this tunnel based on all the great reviews, and wanted to come back and add my own. This is such a durable and sturdy play tunnel. My boys, 9 months & 2.5 years, have absolutely love this tunnel. They both play in it together for quite a while, and have the best time. It is a really great way for them to entertain themselves, as well as a fun way for mom and dad to get involved. I'm also ready for spring as I plan on taking this outside to get some pictures of them in it. The lighting will be great with the type of material that is used to make this tunnel.
summary: This is perfect for babies & toddlers to burn some energy!

reviewText: I bought the play tent for the price, and also how colorful it was.  The only tent I found locally was one that looked like cubes attached to each other, and I knew that would take up too much room in a den setting.  I have had this kind of tent before when my own children were small.  If you don't want it in the middle of the floor, it can be placed along a wall.  I am very pleased with this product.

My dog loved his agility class. Once it was over I wanted to get some agility items for our yard so he could continue trainig, but the kits made especially for this were a bit expensive for what you got. We got this for the tunnel and our dog loves using it for agility exercise.
summary: Works great for training my dog on agility

reviewText: Two year olds love this plus their older friends play in it too.  They crawl from one end to the other and race to see who gets back in the middle frist.  They take toys an books in there to hide an play.  They have hours of fun with this. Now the good part is that it is clean, beautiful bright colors, light weight and stores in a tiny space and a child can get it out by their selves anytime they want to play.
Love it!  My kids think this is great.  Fun for indoors and outdoors.
summary: Love it! My kids think this is great

reviewText: My one year old son loves it and my dogs also seems to like running in and out of it.

My wife and I bought this for our 18 month old daughter and we all love it.  it's very easy to store, the material is very strong and thick so I dont understand why people on here are saying that the material rips easily because my kid beats on it and pulls it and everything and it is holding up very well!  Also I love that you can buy more tunnels or tents to connect on to it.  I would recommend this to anyone with small children ages 1 and above.
You cant go wrong ordering this for any toddler... A lil big but that makes it more fun, can attach more than one together

I saw this item go on Amazon's "Lightning Deal" for around $16, and thought it would be worth a try for our extremely active and adventurous 18 month old. It arrived quickly, and I immediately took it out of the box, un-Velcroed the straps, and POP! It was set up in about 0.5 seconds. It's about 6-feet long and is made of quality, durable material. Our son loves going through it and hiding in it, and even eats his snack in there sometimes. It also makes a great addition to living room forts! I love the fact that it easy folds flat and straps in place, so we can put it in the car and take it with us on trips, or store it easily on a shelf or under the bed. If you find this item on sale again, grab it!

Another reviewer commented that the velcro fasteners were a problem because they stuck to clothing. This is not a problem. That part easily folds back over the opening. My 18-month granddaughter likes to throw balls down the tunnel and then crawl in after them. She also likes to name the 3 colors, but I don't think the purpose of the tunnel is to be educational. I think she will use the tunnel more as she gets a little older. My two boys loved their tunnels when they were kids.
My granddaughter loved this, and it seems very sturdy.  It is also nice because it can be stored in a very small space.

I used this tunnel for 9 very active Australian Shepherd pups. The ran through it, played inside it, jumped on it, chewed it. It is still in ONE piece and no holes! It is a perfect toy, durable, easily set up and taken down. I highly recommend it!
As described. Well padded wires make sense. I'm glad a I bought it. Now when I want to get lost in a rainbow world of my very own, I can crawl into my Pacific Play Tent Find Me Tunnel!
summary: They Make a Series of Tubes!... like the internet!

reviewText: Well made. Exceeded my expectations. My little buddy likes it too!! Works well for indoor and outdoor and cleans up easily. Will be picking up another.

I bought one for my grandson, which he  has been enjoying for the past five months.  It is sturdy and packs up into a small space, so when you're not using it, it doesn't take up much room.  Because my grandson enjoys it, I bought this recent one for my granddaughter.

This is my 2 years old daughter favorite Christmas present. She is using it in different ways. She is able to open it up by herself and she is hiding from me. When I move the tunnel she is laughing loudly. We are playing that there is a storm in the tunnel when I shake it and she is trying to escape from the tunnel. All her teddy bears and dolls are visiting the tunnel very often. I am glad we bought the tunnel.
This product turned my child blue! The first time my child played in it, he came out with blue hands, feet, and clothes. The dye was everywhere!
And she loves it.  So, I got one for my 2 yr old grandson too and he loves it too.  Very sturdy, easy to put away, ok to leave out in the rain.  I highly recommend it.
summary: I actually got it for my Jack Russell Terrier

reviewText: My son is only 2yrs. old- so he thinks the tunnel is great! and tons of fun!  I agree, but wish I would have bought one with a larger diameter so I could crawl through with him.  I have gone through it, but on my belly (like a military crawl)--it's quite a workout!Also, I added velcro straps for storage b/c I found the ties to be inconvenient and getting knotted all the time when my son tried to untie it himself.
My son and daughter enjoy this so much I just wish it was made with a heavier material that held up. The seams have started to come undone and. It's got small snags along the metal inserts.
I received this as a gift for my one year old twins and it is one of their favorite toys.  They now play peek a boo with us and eachother through the tunnel and have spent much time playing with it.
summary: Perfect gift for one year old

reviewText: Very Nice Gift...they loved it. Exactly as stated and looks very sharp. Was exactly what I was looking for... 5 Star
summary: Very Nice Gift...they loved it. Exactly as stated and looks very sharp. Was exactly what I was looking for... 5 Star

reviewText: We had been looking for a good deal on a play tunnel and we've been very happy with this purchase. My border collie mix loves running through it as part if the agility course we set up or him.
summary: My dog loves running through this tunnel

reviewText: My one year old boy/girl twins received this for their birthday from their grandma and they love it! Best gift by far! Highly recommend!

I got this tunnel for my 1 year old. He loves it.  it seems like it is well built an of good quality, but a seam was coming apart on one end.  I have another one one the way and I hope this was a fluke

We got this for our 9 month old daughter for Christmas and immediately had a friend's WILD 3 year over to put it to the test.  It stood up to full on attacks from every angle all night long. Our daughter loves it-giggling wildly while playing peekaboo & dragging treasures in and out. Easily compressed with velcro loops, it takes up almost no storage space.  Awesome, active, urban dwelling sized toy.
The toddler I gave this to loved it very much, it is a lot of fun, great for gross motor skills and peek a boo.

Santa got this for our 10 month old.  He likes it when Mama is on the other end and he can crawl to her.  Even our almost 3 year old loves going through the tunnel.  It seems very well made and will last a long time.  I like how it folds up so easily for when we need more space.

Item came quickly, and was as I expected pulling it out of the package. It is, and does, what it says it does. Its a 6 foot long tunnel for kids to play in. NOT IN THE INSTRUCTIONS, THOUGH: DRESS YOUR KIDS IN BLUE CLOTHES FROM HEAD TO TOE FIRST. If you don't dress your kids in blue prior to them playing in it, they'll do it themselves! What I mean? The dye from this tunnel bled ALL OVER the carpet it was on, as well as any piece of clothing or any inch of skin that came in contact with it. I tried washing it in the bathtub 2x, first with hot water, and 2nd time with hot water and detergent. It took out some of the dye, but is still transferring to clothing and skin when played in. If not for that, it'd be perfect.
Durable, colorful, generous length.  The kids love it and it works well with their various tents.
Received this today and my daughter loves playing in it. I am now thinking of purchasing the tent that goes with it !
Lots of fun and easliy closes up when playtime is over. Would recommend them to friends and family. Granddaughter loves it!!

This tunnel is just what I hoped it would be. It's colorful, a good size, easy to open and close up. My son has used it, off and on, for about 6 months and it shows no signs of wear. My son started playing with it when he was 12 months old. He loved it right away and would laugh as he crawled through it. It's not too much trouble for me to crawl through now and again, which I do because my son thinks it's hilarious.We used this outside sometimes. The wind will blow it away really easily, so watch out not to leave it in the yard if you don't have a fence.Some of the reviews complain about the ties. This tunnel doesn't come with ties any more, it comes with velcro straps. This makes it really easy to open or close up. I haven't had any trouble with the velcro sticking to the carpet, but it's too bad that they don't make the velcro strap have a section at the end where you can fold it back over on itself (to keep this from happening).I keep the tunnel folded flat behind the door in my son's room. Easy to store. It's nice to have a big thing that promotes being physical and running around having fun without a bunch of plastic junk and battery power.
summary: Excellent value and good fun for kids

reviewText: My son is almost 2 and LOVES his Pacific Play tunnel. It's very well made and folds down flat so it goes anywhere with ease. I'm very picky about quality and this product impressed me. It's not flimsy like others I have seen and it stands up to a toddler's rough play. If you're a Mom wondering which tunnel to buy, this is a great choice.
She constantly asks us to open it up.... She's 16 months. Great gift for her. You can also us a flash light along the outside of it to play with toddler.

I bought this tunnel because I was looking for a small one to use for agility training. I got it home and my daughter (17 months) LOVES it too. Looks like I'll be ordering another one for the dogs and let her keep this. It is a little small for big dog use but perfect for smaller dogs. It's durable material and folds up and straps in nicely.

This is a very high quality, durable play tunnel.  It actually looks better in real life than it does in the picture.  I actually bought it not for kids, but for my dog for agility practice.  It's very sturdy, high quality fabric, pops up very nicely, and packs away very nicely.  The only thing is that because it pops up so strongly, it's a bit difficult to use it as a curved tunnel for agility.  Also, I need sew on loops so that I could stake it to the ground.  For agility, you will need to either stake it or weight the ends, otherwise it'll roll and fly all over the place.  We do currently have it in the house, and it stays in place without weighting it, since there's no room for my dog to get a really running entry into it.  For kids, I highly recommend this tunnel.  For dogs, if you're on a budget, this is a great tunnel as well.
I use this at my daycare, the kids love it! I bought 2 and hook them together to use it for transition to the next room,  they crawl through it from one room to the next! Lots of fun!!

This is a very durable tunnel. Attaches with velcro, we have a different brand of play tent we tried to attach it to, it was not perfect but worked ok. If you are buying this to attach to another structure make sure it's the same brand. Either way it was cheap enough I'd buy it again.
Great tunnel, keeps kid entertained for hours and easily collapses for storage. Great buy!
summary: Great Active Toy - Perfect for Active Toddlers

reviewText: This product is such good quality. I bought it because it folds flat to store but had no idea the quality would be so good. Velcro and material are sturdy and my heavy 11 month old can crawl throw it with high speed and it stays pretty solid too. If the truth be told both my husband and I have also crawled through it. ;) A brilliant thing if you're tight on space on a permanent basis and going to be brilliant for his 1st Birthday with his buddys!

We bought this for our 16 month old son since he likes crawling under toys and through different crawl spaces around the house.  At first, he was hesitant to crawl through, but once he did, he raced back and forth over and over and over again.  It is easy to wrap up for a quick clean up with three Velcros.  I'm glad we made this purchase and I know it will bring many hours of fun.  I would recommend it to any parent with an active kid.

Cute tunnel. It incites pretty active play in my kids so I'm glad I have the room for it! It's great for the ease of setting up, taking down, and storage! I haven't had the trouble another reviewer had with the velcro sticking to the carpet either. Nice that it can go with other tunnels or one of the tents. Too bad the tents only have one attachable opening. It would be cool to make a maze of these things outside!

I got this for my two young ones and they love it. It has withstood tons of toddler abuse and still no tears on it which says a lot. I had bought another tunnel prior to this and they wreaked it under a month. For the price it is a great find and it lets the kiddies play countless games.

This tunnel pops out easily making it great for rainy day indoor play. My son loves to drive his trucks through and the tunnel is made of very durable and easy to clean material that makes it possible to drive even his biggest trucks though without worry. Great rainy day fun. Perfect for playdates. Very tough and durable and best of all it wraps up easily and takes up very little space when stored. Perfect!

I have 2 kids. 1yr old boy and a 6yr old girl.they both love this tunnel... without any tent attachments.I also have a 13week old pit bull who enjoy to run through it... she does occasionally bite the side of it and try to drag it around the house.. lol  she has yet to cause a rip or tear!It is a quick easy store  away.BUTCAUTION!!! when you undo the Velcro straps for it to open... BE CAREFUL!!! IT WILL SPRING OPEN AND HIT YOU OR ANYONE WITHIN CLOSE RANGE!! lol
We are proud owners of two English Cocker Spaniels, Winnie and Gracie. They think the tunnel is great! The command is "tube tube" and off they go, running through the tunnel.
summary: Our English Cockers love this tunnel!

reviewText: My toddler loves this toy, and I can easily see several more years of enjoyment ahead of us. Also love that it collapses and expands so easily to get out of the way.

I bought this for my 18 month old granddaughter.  While she really likes it, it seems rather small diameter wise and by the age of two, unless she slithers through on her stomach, it will be a pretty tight fit while crawling.  Also, if I was going to purchase another one, I'd buy the one with the clear see-through side.

This is the second tunnel that we've purchased from this company.  The first tunnel was the see me tunnel, and it just didn't last long due to our rough and tough boys.  The wire came out of several of the rings.  However, this tunnel seems much more durable since it is the same material all around it and not partially mesh like the see me tunnel was.  Our 3 boys love this tunnel, and they range in ages from 1 to 5 1/2 years old.  Great for indoor play during the cold winter months!

This tunnel is terrific: I like the quality constuction & bright colours; our 1 year old grandson was thrilled to crawl through it & it's stury & large enough for our nearly 4 year old grand daughter to enjoy too.

I actually bought this for my mini poodle to play in. He has a blast in it! I make different path ways for him to learn by attaching it to his crate in a half moon shape by leaving the center strap alone, then pushing it up against the bed so he has to go all around his crate, then through the tunnel, and finally enter the crate for treats or toys I've put inside for him. He will play like this for hours! of course you need to keep an eye on pet or child while they play, but it's just as much fun for me to watch as it is for my dog. It's so easy to set up and to break down to put away under the bed. I highly recommend the Pacific Play Tents Find Me Multi Color 6' Tunnel.
summary: Pacific Play Tents Find Me Multi Color 6' Tunnel

reviewText: My 26 month old grandson is having a blast with this tunnel. It's a great indoor activity for these frigid winter days. He burns up some of that 2 year old energy and has so much fun doing it!

My son loves to play in this tunnel and to get us to try to fit ourselves through.  An average adult could fit through (which we all know happens).  This is so cute and great quality-- no rips or tears after a year of fairly heavy use.

Our pup doesn't really know how to play with this tunnel yet.  She has gone through it a few times, but sometimes she'll just walk around to get to the other side.  It's really cute...sometimes, she'll even hide her treats in there.  It's very easy to use.  It does move around a little bit if not braced down by anything.  I'd prefer it to be an outside toy, but for the mean time....we just keep it in our living room area, so she knows that she can run through it if she wants.  She does enjoy biting the velcro at the end of the tunnel. Sometimes she even tugs the whole thing around our living room (granted that she only weighs a little over 6lbs).  It's too cute...i'd love to have my little nieces play in them too.  Maybe then my pup will feel more comfortable to use it more often.

I just bought this tunnel for my two year old daughter. Her nursery school has the neon see-me connecting tunnel, and she just loves it. They didn't have that one at our local [store], so we bought the 6' Find-Me Play Tunnel. I think this tunnel will last a long time. My kids have already jumped on top of it, and the dog even tried to crawl through. It seems to be quite durable and is not made of cheap plastic like some of the less expensive tunnels. It's definitely worth the extra money.
This tunnel was great for my Cub Day Camp the scout had a great time using it.  It stay together for the whole week.
Great toy, the kids spend hours playing in it and clean up is easy and stores in a small space.

I bought this for my 15 month old for christmas and out of the mountains of gifts she recieved this is by far her favorite.  We have had SO much fun with this tunnel, the possibilities are endless!  The tunnel also comes with velcro extentions at the end so you can attach other products (like tents and such) so next year I will be able to get the tent for christmas as an addition.  So many fun memories already and so many cute pictures!  The fabric is very durable and definately worth the money, I would recommend this to any mother looking for a fun toy for their kids...literally endless fun. My favorite buy so far this year!
summary: Want to have fun with a toddler???

reviewText: Kids love tunnels and this one did not disappoint! Just plain and simple fun!  Unfortunately I am a little to plump to join in the fun!

This tunnel was purchased for a 1 year old.  She has been the only "tunneler" to date since receiving it in early December.  It hasn't gotten a lot of use, as she is in day care during the week, although when she does play in it she really enjoys it. Six weeks after receiving it, I noticed that the nylon encasing the hoops was wearing thin (actually breaking through in a few places.) Full disclosure:  no carpeting here, only hardwood floors.  A better design would have padding around the metal hoops.  I have seen tunnels with padded hoops and was hoping to find that kind (I thought it would be softer to crawl on) to no avail.  They may be out there, but in all of my online searches I have never found mention of padded hoops.
Durable and fun. 12 month old grandson received this for his birthday. He immediately loved crawling into it and his 4 year old sister loves to play with it with him.  Good purchase!
summary: 12 Month Old Grandson Loved it Immediately

reviewText: This gift was a great choice for Kayden because he loves playing hide and seek with his big brother and he is not  disadvantaged in any way.  For the cost it has given great pleasure at a small price!

This pacific play tent and Tunnel is my second purchase of this item , I bought it for my grandchildren on both occasions. Each of them have a great time with pretend play and love to crawl out and surprise people when they pop out of the doors and tunnel..Both were purchased at Amazon.com

Purchased just the tunnel for our extremely rambunctious toddler.  Has stood up well to a couple of months worth of abuse.  He likes to lay sideways in the middle and kick outward.  He only seemed to notice the wires once - when he face-planted into one of them.  No injury, but it must have hurt.Folds up great when needed, although you have to be careful when expanding it out again because of the tension that keeps it upright.

This is great.  It folds up small and fits in a closet.  When it is open, it is a great place to throw some ball pit balls and the little rims help keep the balls from rolling out...at least, until someone climbs in.  The kids love it more than any ball pit I have had and it gets a lot of attention.  I haven't used it for the five year old yet, but the toddlers just giggle and have a great time in it.  Its big enough that a two year old can sit up in it, so I'm sure that my 5 year old grand daughter will enjoy it too.  Very nice and easy to store for Grandma's house.
Our girls love this! Owned it for 3 years now and still as good as new! I would highly recommend! Folds up nicely too.

I must say I did not use this tunnel for its original purpose--for kids (although I'm sure they'd love this too).  I purchased it for a local doggie-day-care and the pups love it! Great exercise for them! Great price too!
This tunnel is compact, folds easy and provides fun for our twins.  Once they knew they could get in and out of it freely (they're 1), it was game on!

This was way better than I could have hoped for, my Whippets and Labrador can run through this tunnel easily.Super fun for them and us, they are learning skills and getting exercise.They have jumped on it a few times (not sure why they would do that but heck it looks fun) and no rips. Very nice product for a fair price, would buy another for sure. Worth every penny.
summary: Tunnel is great for my dogs!

reviewText: My daughter was thrilled when I popped this thing out. She basically lives inside this thing now. lol. So, if she's happy, I'm happy.

We now own 3 of these and the kids and pets have hours of fun playing in their tunnels.  When they get bored with them we put them away and pull them out another day.  One of the best toy purchases we've made.
summary: Fun for my kids and pets!

reviewText: The 6 great-grandchildren ages 1-5 loved this.  They have had so much fun with it.  I would recommend this to smaller children.

Any one who has ever enjoyed a child or grand child of crawling age knows that one must acquire a crawl-through tunnel.  We wore out two of them when my kids were little.  This is for a grandbaby who is learning to go through it.  Colorful, well-made
my daughter loves this tunnel - it was only $29.97 - a great value for the price.plus the tunnel is easy to compress and velcro for easy storage.

My 2 yr old Grandson had a birthday party and of all the gifts he received this one was the best of them all. All the kids from age 8 months to age 10 that were at the party couldn't stop playing in this tunnel. Built very sturdy and easy to store. Even though I can't see when the kids will ever store it as super fun. My grandsons sisters were even planning on closing it up with blankets on each end and sleep in it. I really believe this is the best gift I have ever given!!!!

I bought this tunnel for my daughter for her first birthday, and she has loved it ever since!  She has so much fun crawling through the tunnel and hiding in there.  It is a great chance for any child to get exercise and to add some fun and excitement to their day!

Bought this for my 3 year old son. He loves it so much, that is why I'm giving it a rating of 5 star. There were two 2-inch tears at the red portion of the tunnel. But even after days of crawling, the tear did not get bigger or longer. I could not return the item because it was delivered to me thru my sister in law in L.A. I'm from the Philippines and returning the product would be too much trouble.

I have 2 boys (ages 7 and 4). They have had this tunnel for 2 years- and they still love it. It hasn't gotten any holes in it at all and they play kind of rough with it. They like to throw stuffed animals through it too. It collapses pretty easily with the velcro straps. Great tunnel. I highly recommend it!

Can I just say how much I love Amazon!?!? My son saw the UPS man drop off the boxes for this tent and tunnel and somehow just knew it wasfor him. It was adorable he went running saying, Daddy, Daddy, Daddy!My husband opened the packages, popped out the tent and tunnel and BAM our son was playing. Set up time, seconds! It took longer to get the box open.We ordered both the tent and tunnel for our son and for our nephew in California. What a great deal and great products. They are constructed well. The tunnel is a very strong wire with padding and the tent has padding on the bars and is equally well constructed. My son easily can open and close the zipper on the tent which was a pleasant surprise.We did find a very small (1/4") square hole in the tunnel, so I recommed inspecting the items upon receiving. Amazon is wonderful our replacement tunnel will be here tomorrow with a label and box to return this one. So how can that even be considered negative> It can't, flaws happen.We love this tent and tunnel. They pop up fast and put away just as easy. Our son has a blast playing in them both and that was exactly what we were looking for! Thank you Amazon!
summary: Love Love Love it!!! 2.5 year old boy

reviewText: This was one of my kids Xmas presents(1y/o, 2y/o & 4 y/o). It's a heck of a lot more durable than the ones you buy in the stores. 'Folds' up in seconds & stays closed with three Velcro straps that are attached to it. I couldn't ask for it to be any better.

We've had this tunnel for over 3 years and it gets almost daily play. My 4 year old son loves using it to add to his forts and his bigger brother loves playing with it too. They tend to play rough but this tunnel has held up over the years. It is in the same condition it was years ago and could be passed off as being brand new. Would definitely recommend. Love the colors too, lots of fun!

I bought this for my 16 month twins and they have spent loads of time using it. The only criticism is the metal rings are quite thick and hurt if you kneel on it wrong as an adult anyway, the kids so far haven't seemed to notice, however the up side is that it is really sturdy and capable of taking a lot of abuse from my 4!
My 1 1/2 yr old son loves to crawl through this tunnel and it never gets old! It's very well made! I'm so glad we got this for him.
I purchased this tunnel for my 1 year old and he enjoys it a lot , but his older siblings play with it even more.

Durable. Quality. Fun for one kid or multiple kids. Stores away nicely. Medium size adult can fit to play with child. Good for active play or calm play such as reading inside of tunnel. Can't go wrong with buying this.
Love this tunnel.  It folds up very compact.  It seems durable and it's light weight.  My two year old and her older siblings really enjoy it.
bought this tunnel for my agility dogs and it does very well...my granddaughter likes to play in it with my cesky terriers (agility dogs)  they all love it!
summary: use the tunnel for my agility dogs

reviewText: I am using this tunnel for our dog's agility training, and it is working very well in this capacity.  It is made of a sturdy, woven material that should stand up to this wear well.  It folds and stores easily and is just as attractive as portrayed.  Our dog is small (15 lbs) and can easily go through the tunnel, but a larger dog might have difficulty.  We are really very pleased with this item and recommend it without reservation.  P.S. it probably works equally well for children.
We had this shipped to our 2 year old granddaughter.  We did not see the product but she and her parents were happy with the gift.

I got this tunnel for my dog and she just loves it.  I use it for practicing agility.  But, she is also having fun running through the tunnel while play ball.  If it's durable for a dog, then it would be great for children.  I give it a A++++ all the way.
summary: Great toy for Children and Dogs

reviewText: This is a great tunnel that we use in a mommy and me class.  Kids love it and it is great for coordination.
Excellent purchase, we love it! We take this everywhere we go as it's so portable - even on holidays. Our boy was six months old when he first got this.
I have only had the tunnel for a month, but my daughter and all her friends love it.  It is lightweight and compactable, so easy to transport.  Overall, a great toy to have in the arsenal.
my Australian shepard puppy is jumping on/around/through this tunnel.I'm connecting to a tunnel I borrowed to make it 12 feet long.The dog is loving it.  Kindergarten for future agility dogs.

I ordered this play tunnel and had it sent to an address 500 miles away.  I trusted the previous reviews.  I have not been sorry.  My grandchildren age 12 mo. and 3 1/2 yrs...are both enjoying it.  The oldest child wanted to sleep in it.  She took her favorite blanket and sleep dolly and stayed inside for a long time.  Her mother said she especially liked the easy storage factor.
Purchased this for my two year old grandson.  All of the wired parts are well padded for maximum safety and comfort.  Great fun for older siblings too!  Well made.

I bought it for my two yorkie puppies thinking it was for dogs but unfortunately its for kids.the size turned out way to big but they enjoy it. Plus make sure u have some space and patients when it comes to closing it and dont point it towards your face when you close it :-)

I bought this for my son's 1st birthday. He LOVES it. Not only does he love it but my older 2 boys (6 &4) also love it. I love the fact that it folds for storage. It is also very durable. My older kids have really played hard with this tunnel but it is holding up well.

This is a nice lower priced tunnel for small dogs (under 30 lbs.)
